1b1(rgyud): rgyu bar smad du/ sany+dza m+b+hi nas twA smra par mnan sdug
1b2(rgyud): dadu/ 'dzum dpal mi shes sems dpa'i don dam pa
1b3(rgyud): yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
2a1(rgyud): / 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul
2a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsu me las rgyal// rdo rje dbang phyug
2a3(rgyud): d+ma dkar po'i spen// pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal/
2a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyal// rnam rgyas pad+ma dkar po'i sbyin// pad+ma rab tu rgyu/
2a5(rgyud): rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer ldan pa'i
2b1(rgyud): rlabs la sogs// lug nu rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// dpa' bo 'jig
2b2(rgyud): rung gzugs can dang // rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gra sore byed pa// shes rab thabs dang snying rje
2b3(rgyud): che/ 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs
2b4(rgyud): ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btung rnams kyis lhan cig tu// mgon po
2b5(rgyud): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal to// zil mo sbyor ba byas gyur nas/
3a1(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i/
3a2(rgyud): phyir/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar bdag thob bgyi// nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrug cing // mi
3a3(rgyud): shes 'dom du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla mad 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs
3a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i bla mas bshad du gsol// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/
3a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ye shes
3a6(rgyud): sku ste ra byung ba// don thab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// pog ma par dang mthar dag pa// mtshan yang
3b1(rgyud): dag par brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang
3b2(rgyud): yang yang yang gsung ba gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams kyis dgos pa yi// gang yang yang dag
3b3(rgyud): rab gsungs pa// bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur
3b4(rgyud): bgyi/ nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang
3b5(rgyud): dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du/ gsol btab thab mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs
3b6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge/ ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams
3b7(rgyud): 'dul byed pa// 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag/
4a1(rgyud): na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// 'grol phan pa'i don dpyod/
4a2(rgyud): snying rje che dang ldan gyur te// 'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan// yang dag brjod pa don che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// gsang ba'i
4a3(rgyud): bdag po khyod legs so// de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha'
4a4(rgyud): dag rigs chen po// gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum las ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
4a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par 'byung ba dung // skye ba med pa'i chos can 'di// tshig
4a6(rgyud): gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs// a A/ i I/ u U/ e aM/ oM oM/ a aHs+thi ti hr-idr-I/ dz+nyA na mU d+hi ra haM prad+d+ho bud+d+hA na/ t+yA d+hi bad+d+hA na~M/ oM badz+ra tIt+ta nuHkhats+tshed/ prad+hA d+hA na mU d+hag/
4a7(rgyud): tAn kA ya/ lA gI shwar/ ar ba can ya te na maH'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byed // oM yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'o
4b1(rgyud): med dam pa yin// thog chen po sa skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa sngam pa ste// brjod pa can cim+b+ha yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tugs la bar byed/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sangs/
4b2(rgyud): can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi che / mchod pa chen po ga su rbe// gti mug tho sdegati sun sel/ mchod rten slo sa khrob chen po da che ba/ mchod bachen po chags pa che/
4b3(rgyud): chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba/
4b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che/
4b5(rgyud): mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don sgrub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul
4b6(rgyud): khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba bstan pa ste// brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/
4b7(rgyud): so pa che la thabs che ba// sngon lam ye shes bya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// ring rje cher ba blo mi mchog/ shes rab chen po tho chen ldan/ thabs chen byed pa chen po
5a1(rgyud): 'dru dzin pa ngas sa gas phyogs pa na pa/ 'phrul rkye rna pags/ spyo sbyin pa byags pa'o/ pa sa
5a2(rgyud): chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drug shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/ bla ma gsang sngags che
5a3(rgyud): mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las
5a4(rgyud): 'byung ba// gsang sngags chen po dag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul//
5a5(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po den bcu'i don//
5a6(rgyud): thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag/ yang
5a7(rgyud): dag smra zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med pa gnyis med smras// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan//
5b1(rgyud): mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod// de bzhin gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba dag rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po/
5b2(rgyud): che tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi 'dren pa min/ tshig rje tshig bdag sgra
5b3(rgyud): mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshogs bden bden par smra ba dang // bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // bse ru so sor 'dren pa ste/
5b4(rgyud): nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil
5b5(rgyud): bar gyur pa gos pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bder gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/
5b6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa// bya ba byas pa skem sar gnas// ye shes 'ba' zhig nges byung ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar/
5b7(rgyud): ldan pa 'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam na ston pa po// don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/
6a1(rgyud): sa / dang gas su
6a2(rgyud): saldan pa med ma sa/ chogs sa ga dang yang ga 'as/ nas 'gyu/ sa ga na nam
6a3(rgyud): mchog gi dang po zhwa gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga y-i bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdagacod panacan// spyan lnga chags pa ra
6a4(rgyud): pa'achang // sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po ngas pa mchog/ shes rab sring 'byung ste gnas te// chos kyi rgya gnas thaMng mthar byed/
6a5(rgyud): gcig pu sra ma khregs rdo rje'i bdag/ 'phral du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me po che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/
6a6(rgyud): ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don
6a7(rgyud): chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs
6b1(rgyud): gzugs ca byung ba'o// mchod thos rjeng 'os drang thong // rigs gsul 'chang bags sngags ldan// dang tshig chen po gsang sngags las/ na rdzogags ma
6b2(rgyud): theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhugs// rdo rje lpags kyi zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo 'argyal ba
6b3(rgyud): gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can
6b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba// mi g.yo ral pa gcig bsgyings pa// glang chen lpags
6b5(rgyud): parlon pa 'chang // drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa// hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad mo chen po gang rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che
6b6(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM gi gzugs// rdo rje mda' yi mtshon 'chang ba// rdo rje ral gris gcod mdzad pa// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pa
6b7(rgyud): g.yums la ba// rdo rje 'bar ba gtsigs pa'i mig/ ma mo skyes rdo rje'i bar bste// rnga rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mim brgyab ste rdo rje'i tshig/ rdo rje'i spun bya gu las/ rdo rje'i lha ni lus gci
7a1(rgyud): phung rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams// rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs// rdo rje 'phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gang rgyangs hA hA des
7a2(rgyud): par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug smra// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog
7a3(rgyud): yang dag med de de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi drung ste sgra chen po// chos kyi gaN+DI smra bo che/
7a4(rgyud): rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang
7a5(rgyud): ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// snang ba med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// chos kyi tog ni tsher
7a6(rgyud): byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po gcig gzhon lus// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// slob dpon 'jig
7a7(rgyud): rten yon tan shes// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa// skyabs dang skyobs pa bla na med// nam mkha' khyab pa longs spyod pa// thams cad
7b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa ye shes 'jo// ma rig sa nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus ni byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son// ye shes dbang bskur rtso/
7b2(rgyud): pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyan// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa// sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol// nam mkha
7b3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas// sems can kun gyi klu chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thog/ lhag ma kun las
7b4(rgyud): rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po
7b5(rgyud): che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan thogs sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes pa rus shes pa// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes
7b6(rgyud): sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes rab zhi bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags
7b7(rgyud): pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs// rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog
8a1(rgyud): sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra// 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phud phud pu ral pa can// ral pa
8a2(rgyud): mgo re cod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang // tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar
8a3(rgyud): phyin dka' thub che// khrus ldan go'u ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs par tshangs pa rig/ tshangs pa mya ngan 'das pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// mya ngan 'das
8a4(rgyud): zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde ba sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// gsal min mi snang
8a5(rgyud): gos pa med// cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra mo sa bon zag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin tu rab sad rnams sad bdag/ thams cad mi
8a6(rgyud): shes kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas
8a7(rgyud): thogam tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa// ye shes mig gcig drim med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug spa ba che// sde ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i
8b1(rgyud): rgyal dang smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med// kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid 'phreng ldan bltan sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// snang ba gsal
8b2(rgyud): bar byed pa'i 'od// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing / nyon mo sand gyi bu che ba/ sdug gu 'jig rten dadum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/
8b3(rgyud): phyogs bcun ma mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyan mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyu/
8b4(rgyud): khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun dga' dngos po 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig
8b5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs
8b6(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags bral dang po chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs/
8b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna
9a1(rgyud): tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang // rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// mtshon cha
9a2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo dzi na jig/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams thams cad rnam par brgyan// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang
9a3(rgyud): dag ye shes zla snying 'od// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor che// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ma lus rdo rje skyil krung ste// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu bzang
9a4(rgyud): po blo gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po
9a5(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// skad cig gcig la shes rab che// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang /
9a6(rgyud): chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon gsum pa/
9a7(rgyud): ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don smrab dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab krol byed// nyon
9b1(rgyud): mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blon skrag 'chang dpal dang ldan// dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgyabaskyod cing
9b2(rgyud): rkang pa brjo pas par byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// namam pa 'khyab par gyur byed pa// rkang pa gtsug sa masbrel gnon pa// sa mi nga po mthil la gnas
9b3(rgyud): cu mo gnon// nang pakyi ba snyen mo la gnas pa// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi sbyin// dam pa'i drin te 'jigs pa med// rnam / chags rang bzhinas
9b4(rgyud): sems dang sa/ dpa rdzas/ dngas pa sa smras da gyu' ba// sang pa'idu pa'amachos kyi // spyod pa'i 'dud chugs la gas 'das// da kyi rnam pa dag
9b5(rgyud): dag pa smin dkar bzhin dru kar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyis 'char ba'i dkyil ltar mdzes// 'dod chags chen po mamama' 'od// dra srang bzang po mdzes mchog
9b6(rgyud): gyu sa sa
9b7(rgyud): ma/ // ma ma
10a1(rgyud): yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags/ nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid las skyes/
10a2(rgyud): sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba
10a3(rgyud): thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis srid
10a4(rgyud): rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig
10a5(rgyud): rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku yi mtha' ni rnam sgom pa// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems
10a6(rgyud): kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyi// 'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dbyed can// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs
10a7(rgyud): khams rnams nam dag bdag/ las kyi lams rnams par byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las nal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// zhon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs// bag chags
10b1(rgyud): bcas pa rab spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don ma dang pa// 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang / sems can/
10b2(rgyud): kun gyi yid kyi yul// sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa// sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas// de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son// sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems
10b3(rgyud): kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa yin / 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung
10b4(rgyud): po lnga yi don// skad cig thams cad rnam sgom pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med sku ste sku yi mchog/ sku ni bye ba rnam
10b5(rgyud): par 'gyed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge
10b6(rgyud): med/ gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyes pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge drug/ rnam pa thams
10b7(rgyud): cad rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// cha med cha ldan las 'das pa// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang // bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang /
11a1(rgyud): rgyung rig pa// ti dzin skye sgra ma mchog/ longs spyor rdzogs su kun tsi rtul// sprul pa'i skuHsku ya~M mchog/ sangs rgyas sbal ba'i rgyud 'ang ba/ phyogs /
11a2(rgyud): sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha yi dbang po lnga yi lha// lha man dbang po sbyin byed bdag/ lA yi bla ma 'chi mang dbang // rab 'joms rab 'joms dbang /
11a3(rgyud): pong srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lang
11a4(rgyud): bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs par mthar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad
11a5(rgyud): pham par byed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os stod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog
11a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// nam mkha' mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu
11a7(rgyud): 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten dpe las
11b1(rgyud): 'angs paste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag do mchogaca sa rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i bang/ rgya ldan pa 'dis ston pa// 'a ba'i sa pa gnas can no// trAs byung sgyum byo nga
11b2(rgyud): cing dron kya dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum gyi bskal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jams dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog rkyod 'dzud
11b3(rgyud): yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal
11b4(rgyud): 'dud// sangs rgyas dges pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud/
11b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud // sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung
11b6(rgyud): khyod la 'drad// ye shes las byang khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku myong
11b7(rgyud): 'drad do// lag na do rdo rdo rje 'chang 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma dres pa
12a1(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang
12a2(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsod nams dang ye
12a3(rgyud): shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang ji srid
12a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gis bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par
12a5(rgyud): bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni nges khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos
12a6(rgyud): nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'ang/
12a7(rgyud): ni shin tu yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / spu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang bar gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas
12b1(rgyud): kyi byang chub pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blan med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos /
12b2(rgyud): dbyings rtogs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs su gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
12b3(rgyud): ye shes rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'o// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams ca kyi dri ma med
12b4(rgyud): pa shin tu yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum
12b5(rgyud): tshogs pa'i zhing ngo // theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol
12b6(rgyud): ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel
12b7(rgyud): ba'o/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o//
13a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par bsdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la
13a2(rgyud): gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin no// sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang / ngag dang / yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag par sbyor ba thams
13a3(rgyud): cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o//
13a4(rgyud): lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o// 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o// ngan song gi sgo
13a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'gegs pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs
13a6(rgyud): pa bstan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rab tu bsgred pa'o// dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams
13a7(rgyud): kyi myur du grub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom par lhag par rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams
13b1(rgyud): kyi ston pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o// yang dag pa'i/
13b2(rgyud): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rdzogs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid
13b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro// 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang
13b4(rgyud): dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams
13b5(rgyud): cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs
13b6(rgyud): pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar/
13b7(rgyud): byed pa'o// bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o//
14a1(rgyud): rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o//
14a2(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag
14a3(rgyud): rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid mi gzhungs par
14a4(rgyud): byed pa'o// nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang / dge ba dang / zhi ba legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags
14a5(rgyud): pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// shin tu dag pa rnams kyi
14a6(rgyud): shin tu dag pa'o// shin tug cang ba rnams kyi shin tu gcang // shin tu 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi shin tu 'byor ldan no// shin tul shes pa rnamam kyi shin tu pa shes pa'o//
14a7(rgyud): 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du
14b1(rgyud): gyur pa'o// rten 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grwar gyur pa'o// nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po
14b2(rgyud): chen por gyur pa'o// blang bar bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar
14b3(rgyud): gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu thob pa'i
14b4(rgyud): phyir thams mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o// spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o// zang zing dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu
14b5(rgyud): gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi sa bcu rab tu thob par
14b6(rgyud): gyur pa'o// gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do// lhag par sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do//
14b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad
15a1(rgyud): chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal
15a2(rgyud): bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang rigs kyi bu
15a3(rgyud): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
15a4(rgyud): kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bre zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ dum bu ma yin
15a5(rgyud): pa tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
15a6(rgyud): dang rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan rnams la'ang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / mtshan gyi don gzhan
15a7(rgyud): dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / de kho na yid la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas
15b1(rgyud): gnas pa dang / chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang / dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni dus
15b2(rgyud): gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par dus te yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par
15b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud
15b4(rgyud): la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i
15b5(rgyud): spobs pa'ang nye bar sgrub par byed do// dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po'ang nye bar
15b6(rgyud): ston par byed do// gdul dka' ba gdul ba po rnams kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul
15b7(rgyud): pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar
16a1(rgyud): ston par byed do// sngags dang / rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud dang / dgra phyir rgol ba dang / gzhan gyis
16a2(rgyud): mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan mo nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod pa thams cad dang / lam rnams su'ang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// tshungs
16a3(rgyud): pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / smin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang /
16a4(rgyud): dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngag dang // 'phrog ma dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du mtshan mo
16a5(rgyud): dang nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / gnyid sad pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag
16a6(rgyud): pa dang / gcig pur gnas pa dang / skye bo mang po'i nang du song ba dang / ji srid grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal
16a7(rgyud): po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang dbang po'i phur ba dang / sgo lang dang / lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang / grong khyer gyi bar dang tshong lang gi nang du gnas pa dang
16b1(rgyud): dbring yang sgo dang / dang / dben pa dang / A dang / drar mod dang / nams cad cing du nye bar son pa dang / 'bags d+ha dang / 'dugs pa dang / myos pa dang / rang
16b2(rgyud): pa rtag tu thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sred pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro//
16b3(rgyud): gzhan yang gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
16b4(rgyud): pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang dag gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / ma mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang / gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang / gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang
16b5(rgyud): srin mo dang / sha za mo rnams te/ de rnams thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sde dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis spyod lam dang lam rnams su'ang mchog tu srung ba dang / skyab
16b6(rgyud): pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de'i lus la mngangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed do// nad med pa dang / stobs dang / tshe 'phel ba'ang nye bar sgrub par byed do//
16b7(rgyud): 'di ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di nyi ma so sor ma nyams pa yang dag
17a1(rgyud): par blangs te mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha don du byed pa dang / glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
17a2(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang / yang de'i gzugs kyi rjes su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul pa'i sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid
17a3(rgyud): las gdul bya'i dbang nye bar gzung nas mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang lhan cig gnas pa nam mkha'i
17a4(rgyud): mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang ngan song du lhung ba'i 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan
17a5(rgyud): du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi
17a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / des bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro//
17a7(rgyud): lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang / nad dang / mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po
17b1(rgyud): dang chom rkun dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgung pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi bsngags pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa dang
17b2(rgyud): spod pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / grags pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po dang / rigs dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes par
17b3(rgyud): gyur pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang / yid dpa la 'bab pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang / mthong na dga' bar
17b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang / skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
17b5(rgyud): longs spyod che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa dang / 'khor mi zad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par
17b6(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang /
17b7(rgyud): thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang sgra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// tshig gsal ba
18a1(rgyud): dang blun po ma yin pa dang / blo gsal bar 'gyur ro// mkhas pa dang / le lo meng pa dang / chog shes pa dang / don che ba dang / srid pa med par 'gyur ro//
18a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang / rtsis dang / shes pa dang / bstan
18a3(rgyud): bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'tsho ba dang / kun tu spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par
18a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur ro// nyan
18a5(rgyud): thos dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang
18a6(rgyud): de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro//
18a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags
18b1(rgyud): te shin tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa mang por yongs
18b2(rgyud): su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla ni med pa'i chos ston pa po dang / phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor
18b3(rgyud): lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o// oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba sa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+rA tsak+ShuHa A a~M AHpra kr-i tri/ pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA d+haya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA nA kA ya/ many+dzu nA~M/
18b4(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pa dA ye ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya hA ra ha ra/ oM hUM hr-iHb+ha ga ban/ dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ wA gI shA ri/ ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha
18b5(rgyud): d+har+m+ma d+hA t+yA d+hI na gar+b+ha aHde nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgunas thal mo sbyar// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// rnam
18b6(rgyud): mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de// khro bo'i rgyal por bcas rnams kyis// bsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po bdag cag rjes yi rang // legs so
18b7(rgyud): legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// rnam dag
19a1(rgyud): legs pa'i lam 'don// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// zab cing yangs la cu cheb// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/
19a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don
19a3(rgyud): dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so// / thun mong dang thun mong ma yin
19a4(rgyud): pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan
19a5(rgyud): gling gi dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sna bsgyur chen po de dag gis/ rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod/ 'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du
19a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur/ rgya gar skad du/ mA yA dz+wa la ma hA tan+t+ra rA dz+nyA nA ma/ bod skad du/
19a7(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i
19b1(rgyud): steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa/ rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ba
19b2(rgyud): yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byas pa
19b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying las yang dag par 'byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas/ zhal bzhi'i ske gro skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che chen po dang / 'od
19b4(rgyud): dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang /
19b5(rgyud): pho nya mo dang / phyag brnyan dang / phyag brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba'i bdag nyid dang dmigs pa dang bral ba/ thugs
19b6(rgyud): rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
19b7(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos brgyan pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so//
20a1(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//
20a2(rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
20a3(rgyud): nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na
20a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i
20a5(rgyud): sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal
20a6(rgyud): po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams
20a7(rgyud): cad kyi 'byung gnas stang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
20b1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ri mo'i gzugs dang / sgom pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / stang skabs dang / sbyor ba dgod pa dang /
20b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / dbab pa dang / bslad pa dang / dbrog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / nyam thag par bya ba dang / gcad pa dang
20b3(rgyud): bsreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / bskrun pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma gzung ba dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o//
20b4(rgyud): de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang
20b5(rgyud): dag 'khor du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so// de la re zhig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon
20b6(rgyud): med par gyur na ni/ dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas/ slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing
20b7(rgyud): g.yo sgyu meng // gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing // sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// theg pa che la rtag
21a1(rgyud): dga' ba// de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs// phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing // nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang // gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang // /
21a2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mi shes pa// snying rje yod pa ma yin dang // dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la// rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang // bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min// gong du bstan
21a3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid dang // ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung // de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams bstan// de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the
21a4(rgyud): tsom med// dge dang sdoms la dga' ba dang // rtag tu bla ma la gus dang // rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed pa'i// yon tan ldan na slob ma yin// slob dpon ci 'dra ba lta zhe na// bla ma sangs rgyas
21a5(rgyud): kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon rnams nams
21a6(rgyud): kyang ma yin no// yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing // skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi//
21a7(rgyud): dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa dag/ rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// slob dpon spod pa gang yin te// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung /
21b1(rgyud): ngan pa gtum po las byed pa// mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya// mnar med shin tu skye g.ya' ba'i// dmyal ba bstan sa gang yin pa// der ni slob dpon sdod byed pa// gnas par 'gyur zhes
21b2(rgyud): rab tu gsungs// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgribs te// bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i// sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
21b3(rgyud): po sgyu 'phrul drub las 'di ni 'jug pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas thams
21b4(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
21b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma
21b6(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i ye shes snying po 'bar ba rdo rje snying kur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyir 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas phyag na rdo rje
21b7(rgyud): sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
22a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyon cig/ dang po kho nas yongs su bzung bar byas te/ srong dpon gyis lha nyid kyi spyad stabs su 'dra/
22a2(rgyud): la lag pa g.yas bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gsil nas rdo rje 'gros kyis yongs su bskor bar bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hUM
22a3(rgyud): zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o//
22a4(rgyud): slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil
22a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yid dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang /
22a6(rgyud): rnamamanyan lding dang / mi 'as tso nga / rigs sngags sgrub pa dang / rgan pa dang / rgan mo g.yog dang 'bor du bcas pa gang dag 'dod pa rnams dengs shig/ 'di ltar rje 'chang shi ba/ 'a thas
22a7(rgyud): myur ba nyid du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar bas ma tshal pa brgyar 'gas par
22b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gni rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// g.yas bzung ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang
22b2(rgyud): sa ga'i drug stangs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / 'thun pa'i rkang stabs dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / rdo rje gdeg pa dang / rdo rje 'jo tshul dang / rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs
22b3(rgyud): dang seng ge stabs dang / seng ge glal ba dang / bung ba 'phur ba'i stabs dang / rdo rje sgrog dang / rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje'i stang stabs dang / rdo rje dgug pa dang // rdo rje gar dang
22b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje'i byin rlabs dang / rdo rje'i gdu bu dang / bu med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang / rdo rje'i dra ba dang / stobs po
22b5(rgyud): che'i 'degs pa dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / ral gri thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i thabs dang / gtun shing gi thabs dang / ba dan gyi
22b6(rgyud): thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / pad+ma'i tshul dang / be con gyi thabs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang / lcags kyu'i thabs dang / 'bras bu'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi thabs dang
22b7(rgyud): gzhu'i thabs dang / mnga' bzung ba'i thabs dang / mnga' 'phang ba'i thabs dang / zag mdung bskor ba'i thabs dang / mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang mdung gi thabs dang
23a1(rgyud): mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang / rdo rje'i 'dug sbyangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang / rdo rje skyil mo krung dang
23a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / dpa' mo'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang / rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang
23a3(rgyud): mdun du dgu pa dang / phyir dbye ba dang / mtha' yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / sprin sgra dang / gsus po che dang / rgyal po'i phur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang / phur bu brdung ba
23a4(rgyud): dang / dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba de lta bus sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan la dbab par bya'o// rang gi ming
23a5(rgyud): nas smos te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas sa'i lha mo lta gon du gnas par bya ba ni/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
23a6(rgyud): spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes lan
23a7(rgyud): gsum brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol//
23b1(rgyud): sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang // sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod// de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ mtha' kun tu yang mtshan nas spros te
23b2(rgyud): thig ler bya'o// de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya ste spos chus spyi bor bsang
23b3(rgyud): gtor byas nas/ lag po snying kar bkram nas su// rtse mo lnga pa rgya gram bya// g.yas pa srung srung bcings nas su// lag mthil so shing ku sha sbyin// de nas 'dug ste gsum
23b4(rgyud): la skyabs su gtang ba dang // sdig pa kun tu bshags pa dang // bsod nams kyi rjes su yid rang ba dang // bdag nyid dbul ba dang // byang chub tu ni sems bskyod par bya'o//
23b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis
23b6(rgyud): bzung // zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga bzang po bya ste/ slar
23b7(rgyud): yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyis gzhir glo g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam bzang ngan bltas nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// tshan dang
24a1(rgyud): thig la sangs rgyas lnga'i// ngo bo dag kyang sprul par bya// 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas//
24a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste// nyes pa thams cad snam spangs pa'i// tshon rtsi dgye ba brtsam par bya// dang por slob dpon nyid kyis dgye// de nas kun tu slob mas bya// dang po sa gzhi yongs
24a3(rgyud): gzung ba// gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste// nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin// tshon sna lnga pa'i srang bu yis// khru stong pa 'am lnga brgya bar// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// yang
24a4(rgyud): na khru lnga khru do pa 'am// khru gang pa yi bar du bya'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi// dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri// dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad gzhag
24a5(rgyud): shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrugs pa// lho phyogs su ni rin chen 'byung // nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med// byang phyogs su ni don grub rnams// 'khor lo'i grwar ni lha mo bzhi// dngos grub sbyin par
24a6(rgyud): mdzad par bri// dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni spyan ma'o// me'i phyogs su ni mA ma kI'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su ni gos dkar can no// rlung gi phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma'o// rdo rje
24a7(rgyud): shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gnyis pa laM shar phyogs su ni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub du rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o// grwa rnams su skul byed ma dang
24b1(rgyud): rin chen sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so// de nas yang 'greng bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar phyogs su byang chub sems
24b2(rgyud): dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams bri'o// lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa
24b3(rgyud): rnams bri'o// nub phyogs su ni mthu chen thob dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o// byang phyogs
24b4(rgyud): su zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o// shar sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do// lho sgor ni shes rab mthar byed do//
24b5(rgyud): nub sgor ni pad+ma mthar byed do// byang sgor ni bgegs kyi gshed mthar byed do// grwa rnams su ni mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / be con sngon po dang / stobs po che'o// zur
24b6(rgyud): rnams su ni rdo rje bri'o// sgo'i ngan logs su'ang rdo rje bri'o// 'khor lo ni tshon rtsi dkar pos bri'o// gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po gsum gyis bri'o//
24b7(rgyud): gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no// de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o// dbus su ni pad+ma 'dab ma
25a1(rgyud): brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o// snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje'o// lho phyogs su ni rin po che/ nub phyogs su ni pad+ma/ byang phyogs su ni ral gri ste/
25a2(rgyud): de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba mgo la bcings nas/ mgul pa
25a3(rgyud): dar gyis bcings pa la// ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa// rin chen sman 'byung snga lnga dang // spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang // bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum
25a4(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi// las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do// sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya// yang na ku sha'i chun pos
25a5(rgyud): bya de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo//
25a6(rgyud): de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar gzhag par bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su spyan drangs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan
25a7(rgyud): drangs nas gsal bar bya ste/ gzhug pa dang / bsdams pa dang / dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang / ra ba dang / dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad po
25b1(rgyud): byas la/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / gdan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'ang bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o// bstod pa dang
25b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i glu dang / dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / rgyud kyi sgra'i khyad par yang dbul lo// rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o// bstod nas
25b3(rgyud): bzod par gsol te dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir gsol ba gdab po// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go// de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang
25b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas gnas lngar bsrung zhing gnas lngar cho ga bya'o// hUM dzi na dzi ka/ oM A ro li ka/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/
25b5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste//
25b6(rgyud): pra tits+tsha badz+ra ho// tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g.yogs 'grol lo// de ring dang pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis// sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs//
25b7(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya/
26a1(rgyud): de yi snying po 'di yin te// pa sh+ya badz+ra/ gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no// de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// gos dang rgyan
26a2(rgyud): gyis legs par brgyad// steng du bla re bre bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang // bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis
26a3(rgyud): klubs// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slo dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro// dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis// bkra shis
26a4(rgyud): tshogs bcad glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya//
26a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de nyid rigs par bsam// de lta bur ni bsam nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// thur ma me long 'khor lo dang // dung dang rdo rje glegs bam dang // gser dag
26a6(rgyud): dang ni dngul rnams kyis// mi shes rab rib la sogs pa// ci rus par ni bsal bar bya// thur ma la sogs med na yang // phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya// de nas dam
26a7(rgyud): tshig bstan par bya// de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis// srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang // dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems// slo dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti zhing //
26b1(rgyud): sdang la byams shing chags bral ba// nams kyang bya ba ma yin no// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis/ khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor// de nas bla mas yon blangs te// sa dang yid
26b2(rgyud): 'od chung ma dang // rin chen gser dang nor bu 'bar// mu tig byu ru la sogs dang // lus kyang dbul du gzhug par bya/ bla ma la ni gus pa yi// slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya// bla ma
26b3(rgyud): de ni mgu bar bya// bla ma mgu ba dngos grub kyi// gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung // de nas slob ma bslang ste// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod pa ste sbyin sreg gi las bya'o//
26b4(rgyud): de nas cho ga mthong bas las byas nas// sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang // de bzhin sgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// las rnam thams cad tshim par bya//
26b5(rgyud): de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su gsol// bsgrims te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas// chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang // ba yi lci bas byug par bya/
26b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// slob dpon nyid kyis bskur bar bya// slob mas cung zad mi bskur te// de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par/
26b7(rgyud): bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
27a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
27a2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman
27a3(rgyud): pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshed du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ oM les rnam par snang mdzad do// oM hUM/ mi 'khrugs
27a4(rgyud): pa'i'o// oM tAM/ rin chen 'byeng gnas so// oM hAM/ 'od dpag med do// oM khaM/ don yod grub pa'i'o// oM ga gan lo tsa ne hUM/ spyan gyi'o// oM ka~M rik+Shi ri/ mAm
27a5(rgyud): kI hUM mA ma kI'o// oM ka T+Te bi ka Te kau Ta ka Ta ka ro Ta bIr+ya swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i 'o// oM ta re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ sgrol ma'i 'o// oM satwa badz+ri hUM/ rdo rje sems ma'i 'o// oM rat+na badz+ri hUM
27a6(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen ma'i 'o// oM d+harma badz+rI hUM/ rdo rje chos ma'i'o// oM karma badz+ri hUM/ rdo rje las ma'i'o// oM tsa le tsu le tsu de swahA/ skul byed ma'i'o// oM rat+na lo ki rat+na dz+wa li nI swah+Na
27a7(rgyud): rin chen sgrol ma'i 'o// oM b+h+r-i kuT b+h+rUM/ khro gnyer ma'o// oM badz+ra shri kha le hUM pa swahA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i'o// oM maM/ byams pa'i 'o// oM mu/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// oM si man+ta d+ha
27b1(rgyud): d+hu bran tu ba dang po'i'o// oM bar+b+ha ha stan d+hu/ spos kyi spang b.ra'o// oM dAn ke tub tad+hA/ ye shes tog go// oM Sh+Ta ba Ni wA d+ha pA le d+d+ha/ bzang skyong ngo // oM swA ka re ma m+b+ha sA ga ra dz+ra/
27b2(rgyud): blo gros rgya mtsho'o// oM ak+Sha ya dz+nyA hU~M/ ak+Sha yak+Sha a karma A pa ra Na pa ri sho d+hi na swahA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o// oM pra ti b+hA ne pra ti b+ha na kuTI hUM ka spobs pa brtsegs pa'o// oM sA me ma hA s+thAm pa
27b3(rgyud): tiswAhA/ mthu chen thob pa'o// oM sirba a pA ya dza te sarba pA paM sho d+ha hUM/ ngan song thams cad spong ba'o// oM sarba sho ka ta mo ni nAm ti hU~M/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i
27b4(rgyud): blo gros so// oM dz+wa li ni ma hA dza la ni hUM/ dra ba can gyi 'od do// oM su d+hA na shri ye hUM/ nor bzang ngo // oM tsan+de tsan+te tsan+d+ra bya ba la ke te swAhA/ zla 'od do// oM a mr-i te pra b+he a mr-i te hUM
27b5(rgyud): 'od dpag med do// oM ga ga nag gan bai ra lo tsan hU~M/ nam mkha' mdzod do// oM sarbaM na pa ra Na bidz+nyA ban d+ha/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// oM yasan+ta kr-ita/ gshin rjegashed do// oM
27b6(rgyud): kI tang gzhan gyi mi thub pa'o// oM pad+mAn+ta krita/ rta mgrin no// oM a mr-i takrAN+DA li big+h+nAn+da kr-ita/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor ro// oM a tsa la hUM haM/ mi g.yo ba'o// oM Tak+ki hUM/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o//
27b7(rgyud): oM nI la dar+dz+dza ma da NA hUM/ be con sngon po'o// oM kro d+ha hUM dzAH/ stobs po che'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go// 'di dag la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par
28a1(rgyud): las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'
28a2(rgyud): rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so// khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so// bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so// pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i
28a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas so// de dag la sogs pa ni spyan drang ba'i sbyor ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
28a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag nade/
28a5(rgyud): rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyi ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhes/ ye
28a6(rgyud): shes rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig/
28a7(rgyud): oM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gis mchod// zhi ba thor tsugs cod pan 'chang // zhal gsum gyis ni
28b1(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// gser gyi mdog can phyag drug pa// dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can// bgrang 'phreng ldan zhing mda' yis ka brgyan// g.yon gyis lha mo'i num 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs
28b2(rgyud): shing lha rnams bred cing khams rnams 'dzag/ 'bar ba'i 'od dkyil brgyan pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'phro ba// rab tu byung zhing legs 'khyung ba// de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms te/
28b3(rgyud): gsang sngags nang gis bzlas brjod bya// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam// 'jig rten dbang phyug
28b4(rgyud): 'od chen bsam// thor btsugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha// dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyad// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra// zhal gsum spyan gsum
28b5(rgyud): 'bar ba la// phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can// phyag gnyis pad+ma'i 'jo tshul can// g.yas na bgrang 'phreng rdo rje 'chang // g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la// ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa
28b6(rgyud): nA nga gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing // kun nas 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lag nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i// bsregs 'brel ba la lta byed pa'i// de 'dra'i tshig
28b7(rgyud): gis lam bsgoms na// ring po mi thogs sangs rgyas 'thob// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i
29a1(rgyud): gzugs la hUM zhes bya// sems kyi rdo rje bsgom par bya// mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa// cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/
29a2(rgyud): rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyad// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa// cung zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg can// phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la// rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang // gnyis pa na ni
29a3(rgyud): ral gri gdengs// lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na// bzhi pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsdams// de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud// gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste/
29a4(rgyud): bzhi pa lnga rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin// rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag skom pa// de yi rdo rje sems bstan zhig
29a5(rgyud): ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro// sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
29a6(rgyud): tAM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rin po 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa// thor tsugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// bde ba chen po kha dog dmar// ting 'dzin
29a7(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams par bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa ste// phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang // g.yon pa rin chen yongs su 'dzin// 'od zer ser po 'phro ba las// rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin
29b1(rgyud): chen nam/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis/ dzin chen char gyis rgyas par byas// tshan chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ga ye shes las bsgrub
29b2(rgyud): par don yod rdo rje bsam par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa// margad ta yi 'od ltar 'bar// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang // g.yon pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid// sangs
29b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing // legs par sgrub phyir slar yang sdud// 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing // ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs// 'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa// nam mkha'i snying po thug
29b4(rgyud): pa che dang 'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi// mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ rgyal ba
29b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang brgyan// lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa// zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba// cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma// dang po'i phyag ni mchog
29b6(rgyud): sbyin mdzad// de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste// bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhag pa can// rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na// gsum pa na ni
29b7(rgyud): bgrang 'phreng ste// bzhi pa gzhu yis legs par brgyan// 'od dmar 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te// lags pa thal mo sbyor bas byed// sangs rgyas
30a1(rgyud): rnams kyi sprin 'phro bar// ye shes rdo rje spyan ma bsam// byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i
30a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rdo rje rigs can mA ma kI// lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas// ut+pal
30a3(rgyud): sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// 'od dmar shin tu 'bar ba can// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gnyis pa rdo rje legs par bsdams// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa
30a4(rgyud): sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang // dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can// sangs
30a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba// 'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o// sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// zla ba'i mdog dang
30a6(rgyud): ldan pa'i yum// ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan// zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma// phyag drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste/
30a7(rgyud): gsum pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan// g.yon pa pad+ma bsnams par bya// gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor 'phreng // gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing // rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// sangs rgyas
30b1(rgyud): gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad// pad+ma'i sprin gyis rgyas par bsgom// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// rin chen skur ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyis rgyal ba dren dra/
30b2(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ta yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che// 'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/
30b3(rgyud): phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // bzhad pa margad 'od dang ldan// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon
30b4(rgyud): pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal nyid// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can// sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa// dga'
30b5(rgyud): mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// skyes mchog rgyal
30b6(rgyud): bas gsungs pa yis// sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming // sems ma dang ni rig chen ma// chos ma rdo rje las ma ste// rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma// de dag ji ltar rigs par sgom//
30b7(rgyud): de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i// 'phags ma bzhi yi ting 'dzin to// tsu gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa// ming ni skul
31a1(rgyud): byed ces ma'i gzugs// sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag/ bdun gyi gsang sngags glu yis bstod// yi ge dgu pa thabs dgu can// lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin/
31a2(rgyud): zhal gsum ston ka'i 'dam bu mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung skal ldan dar la bab// rig sngags thams cad sgrol mdzad ma/ dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam// bzhad
31a3(rgyud): cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i 'od// mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin// lce ni glog bzhin lcib par mdzad// g.yon pa la dog
31a4(rgyud): dmar po ste// tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par mnan// rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i phyag nyi shu rtsa drug la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas
31a5(rgyud): snying ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// gsum pa na ral gri'o// bzhi pa na rin po che sbyin pa'o// lnga pa na shing thog bi dza pu ra'o// drug pa na
31a6(rgyud): mda' gsor ba'o// bdun pa na dgra sta'o// brgyad pa na dbyug to'o// dgu po na tho ba'o// bcu pa na lcags kyu'o// bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o// bcu gnyis pa na se gol gtog pa'o// bcu gsum
31a7(rgyud): pa na bgrang 'phreng ngo // g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no// gsum pa na pad+ma'o// bzhi pa na ril pa spyi blugs so// lnga pa na zhags pa'o// drug pa na gzhu'o//
31b1(rgyud): bdun pa na mdung ngo // brgyad pa na 'khor lo'o// dgu pa na dung ngo // bcu pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o// bcu gcig pa na bum pa bzang po'o// bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo // bcu gsum pa na
31b2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya// la yi zhing cung bsgos pa yi// steng du bla gos gyon pa ste// sna tshogs tshig kun
31b3(rgyud): bzar gsol/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro// sum cu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang // bgegs rnams shin tu 'jigs skrag par// thal mo sbyor bar
31b4(rgyud): byed pa ste// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing // bsgrim nas gsang sngags brjod pa des// sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur
31b5(rgyud): zhing dang sdig pa kun las rnam par 'grol// rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa
31b6(rgyud): rin chen sgrol ma zhes bya'i gzugs// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan// na chung dar la bab pa'i tshad// zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste/ phyag
31b7(rgyud): ni rin chen gdu bus gtams// phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba 'khrug/ g.yas pa'i phyag na mi 'jigs sbyin// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/
32a1(rgyud): g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams las sdigs// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar// rol stabs thabs kyi zhabs kyis gnon// sangs
32a2(rgyud): rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud// chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// b+hU yi ye shes
32a3(rgyud): las bsgrubs pa// 'jigs las sgrol ba khro gnyer can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa// rol pa'o stengs la
32a4(rgyud): brtson pa ste// zhal ni khro dang bcas par bzhad// legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lha can// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be con 'dzin par bshad// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang
32a5(rgyud): gsor// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams// gsum pa na ni mtshon cha gzhu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // de bzhin gzhan dag legs
32a6(rgyud): sdud pa'i// nyal dang 'greng dang 'dug pa dang // lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes/
