32a7(rgyud): las bsgrubs pa// ming ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud// thams cad 'ching ba bskyed pa ste// sems can ma rungs phung bar byed// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug sngo bas gzugs bzang ma/
32b1(rgyud): zhal ni cung zad bzhad par mdzad// lag pa g.yas na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gsum pa na ni mda' yang bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni zhags par/
32b2(rgyud): gsungs// gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtsod// sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba/ rdo rje lu ba rgyud bsgoms na/ byang chub smad cig gis 'bob na// dngos grub gzhan la ci zhig spos/ rdo
32b3(rgyud): sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// me yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// de yi 'og na pad+ma ste/
32b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan// phyag gnyis chos 'chang phyag rgyas brgyan// g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa// sems can skyob pa mchog sbyin mdzad// g.yon
32b5(rgyud): pa lha rdzas klu shing gi/ me tog ze 'bru'i mgo lcogs bsnams// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// sprin chen de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad// byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyis rdo rje rnam par
32b6(rgyud): brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// muM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gzhon nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam// shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa// zab mo tshul ni ston pa po// zhal gsum spyan gsum zur pur
32b7(rgyud): gsum// gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// cod pan bzang po mi 'khrugs can// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis klubs// 'og na pad+ma chen po la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/
33a1(rgyud): 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste// zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa la// dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin par bya// gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid// gsum pa
33a2(rgyud): na ni mda' yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang // gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// shes rab ye shes mchog gis klubs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin
33a3(rgyud): sprin gyi bsnams// 'phro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pas bsgom// 'jam pa mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// spos kyi glang po ye shes tog/ de bzhin
33a4(rgyud): du ni bzang skyong dang // blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni// mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid// ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob// mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo// nor bzang dang ni dri ba'i 'od/
33a5(rgyud): de bzhin du 'ad 'od dpag dang // nam me la'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel// de ltar nga sogs grangs med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa kun// sa thes yig 'brurnams las 'drangs
33a6(rgyud): yon byag cu'i sbyor bcun/ zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// sna rdzogs thabs kyis rol par mad// byang chub sems dpa' 'di yin// gsang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya
33a7(rgyud): mngon ldan 'dra ning 'jos rnam/ rnam gyisan mdag tu ma// dri ga la shes las bslabs pa// gzibadzi ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi// ni shin rje'i dgrags rnas thags pa//
33b1(rgyud): pa'im ltar 'bar bste// char smin gyin 'od dang 'dra// zhal drug pa la phyag rngug pa// de bzhin zhabs drug mi 'thung 'dra// gsus rnaMm shin tu che ba ste// den drag po can po na
33b2(rgyud): ljags 'jil rdo rje mche ba can// sbrul gyi rgyan par brgyan pa ste// sdug lpags kyi ni sham thabs bgos/ rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs// de yi 'og tu bang byas// ma thong 'phra na
33b3(rgyud): sgra 'khyil ba// as chos ser la sgra chen 'byin// rnam la sna nagyi 'jugs pa// thAgs m+b+ha la na rnam par bzhugs// 'am bya'i dpal rjes rnam par phyin+tu// dang po'i na ni ma
33b4(rgyud): bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa'i choms kyis spros mnan khro// g.yas pa'i phyag nA ral gri ste/ gnyis pa na ni rdo rje nyid// gsum pa yis rI mda' yang gsor
33b5(rgyud): g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu ni badrangs pa yis// shin tu legs par rnam par brgyan// lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud
33b6(rgyud): gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs// g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba// pad+ma dkar po thogs par bya// 'og tu lha dang bgegs kyi rnams// sngar mthong nas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'od zer dmar po 'bar
33b7(rgyud): dang bcas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud// rnal 'byor dag gi sgo nas su// bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de// 'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa dang // legs par bsams te
34a1(rgyud): kun chos shing // 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod kyang // nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur// gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rjeg shin rje gsod pa'i
34a2(rgyud): 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// prA yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag d+hag gis ni rnam par brdzun// mdog
34a3(rgyud): ser mi'u thung gzugs can la// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin
34a4(rgyud): g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan// sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste// lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs// gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste// gsum pa na ni mda' yang
34a5(rgyud): thogs// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu mi 'dzin// gsum pa bzhu can yin par gsungs// spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa// rim bzhin 'gro zhing sdud pa
34a6(rgyud): 'di 'dragoms pas parnams par bya// zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// he yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ rjem
34a7(rgyud): brlam thar byed pa// zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa// 'dog dmar po phyag brgyad kun// smani sbrul gyis dkris pas// badral bcugs rol pa'i snabs// khrob sgri bas gzegs mdzad pa/
34b1(rgyud): dang po zhal ma par ba 'ang / khams paltams ni 'jam pa ste// g.yon pa tshams kyis smrasmraman pa// su lags pas la zhing slob lnga// byams pa'i phyagan swA// gnyis pa d+han/
34b2(rgyud): to gsungs// bsum pan ni lcags kyi s+ho// bzhi pa na ni mnga' yang gsor// ma yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum d+ha nAn ni paid+yA m+b+ha// bzhi pa dzi na
34b3(rgyud): nyid do// de yi cod pan mi 'khrugs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag/ 'phro zhing 'dra bar bsgoms byas na// 'dzub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rtamachog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting /
34b4(rgyud): 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin// lag na rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum po// bgegs
34b5(rgyud): rnams 'joms mdzad phyag drug can// dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog/ zhabs
34b6(rgyud): kyis bgegs ni mnan pa ste// gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na ni dgra ltar gsungs// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs
34b7(rgyud): mdzub zhags pa can// de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'gro bar// ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya// bgegs
35a1(rgyud): da mas cad tshul ba'i la gas pa rdzas pa la bzhes byab nga 'an to// rdzu lags las bsgrubs pa// gas dras pa'i zugs ldan/
35a2(rgyud): zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa// gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la// dang po zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas// khrag gis brlad pa'i ljags kyang 'dril
35a3(rgyud): g.yon pa tshems kyis spros mnan khro// rmugs snying ka'i phyogs kyang bka'// mgrin shun gyi ni mdog can te// rin chen ri stangs pad+ma la// rol pa'i zhabs kyi stabs su bzhugs/ thub pa bgegs
35a4(rgyud): kyi chu 'jing 'joms// phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// 'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor na// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor//
35a5(rgyud): g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu ni bdungs pa la// chang pas bzung ste lta ba dang // sna tshogs me tog gis bcings pa'i// cod pan
35a6(rgyud): dang ni dbu rgyan thogs// zur bud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog/ mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin dag gis// cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro// de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang /
35a7(rgyud): sgom pas sgom par byed pa de// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi// them skas la ni 'dzeg par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa
35b1(rgyud): kya nga na// rnam ma sa las bsgrubs na// na 'ad pa rtsam pas// nAlangs rnams pa ldanas pa// sa zhes rgya rnags/ nas sun ma na
35b2(rgyud): pa'i thor tsugs cod pan babang po can// dang po'o zhal ni bzhad pa la// g.yas pa yis ni rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa choms kyis spos mnan zo// dpral bakhro ga nyer rim pa can//
35b3(rgyud): ba char sprin lta bu'i mdog/ dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can// phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// g.yas pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rol// g.yon pa yis
35b4(rgyud): ni num 'dzin// gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsdams// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i thabs// rig tu bgegs kyang rnam par mnan// sangs rgyas lang long 'phro mdzad pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis
35b5(rgyud): bsgom byas na// bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob// snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khrong be con sngon
35b6(rgyud): bo can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshems kyis smos kyang
35b7(rgyud): mnan// sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste// lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs lcang lor 'khyil ba ste// dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// pad+ma la bzhugs rol stabs can/
36a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni bcon nyid// gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin/
36a2(rgyud): gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid bsdams// dkyil 'khor dam po 'bar ba can// sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprin ni rtag tu 'phro// bags kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba
36a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi po hUM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni// ye shes dam pa stobs po che// zhal ras gsum po spyan gsum pa// phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan// sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par
36a4(rgyud): brgyan// mig dmar sgra 'bar gyen du brdzes// mgo bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa// pad+ma la bzhugs
36a5(rgyud): 'gying bag can// drag po'i tsham rngam stang stabs can// phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad// 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste//
36a6(rgyud): gnyis pa be con thogs par mtshon// gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs// bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan// g.yon pa sdigs badzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni thob
36a7(rgyud): nyid daphyag bzhi pa ni gzhu can la// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba// sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya// gnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
36b1(rgyud): b+hU gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste// sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum// gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba// 'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// ting 'dzi gyu/
36b2(rgyud): rgyar rnam par gnas// rin chen ri stengs pad+ma la// rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams// gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can// zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis brgyan//
36b3(rgyud): gos dang rgyan gyis klubs pa ste// chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// phyag rgya rin chen snyem dang // rdo rje pad+ma ut+pal ldan// lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs// gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can// kun tu 'a#
36b4(rgyud): lo'i 'phreng ba dang // 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas// nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad// byang chub snying po der gnyer
36b5(rgyud): bsangang 'di 'dra 'khor lo can bsgom zhing // bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob// byang chub snying po tham cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dzaM gyi ye shes
36b6(rgyud): las bsgrubs pa// gnod sbyin gnod nas sku gsum can// zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis na// pI dza pra ri ne'u le can// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am// yang na bzang po'i 'dug spangs gnas// ngos na rgyan
36b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyis// brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag/ rin chen char pa 'bebs par byed// mgo zo steng na sangs rgyas lnga// de yi cod pan bzang po yi// g.yon phyogs rtse bran rgyan yang chags/
37a1(rgyud): ma mas na ma rapa 'bengs pa sa no rdzas 'dod pa las sa smra na
37a2(rgyud): ri por mi thogs gang par 'gyur// lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi// mu yang rtag tu 'bral bar bya// rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma yi ye shes las
37a3(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer can// ta bdun ldan pa'i shing ltar bzhugs// 'bar ba'i lag 'byor snang mdzad pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan/ yun drug 'dog sar po /
37a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu bsrung bar brtson pa ste// 'jo sgeg tshul du zhal yang bzhad// na chung rkyen ni g.yo ba can// cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// thor tsugs me tog rnams kyis brgyan// g.yas pa'i phyag
37a5(rgyud): na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni khab skud bsnams// gsum pa na ni mda' yar gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa a sha'i yal ga ste// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// gzugs
37a6(rgyud): brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis// sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang // mig dang kha ni 'drub par byed// gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'bad pa dag/ gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lha mo hUM mdzad bsgom par
37a7(rgyud): bya ba 'di ni sgom par phyed pa yin// dbang du sems can rab tu 'gro// sdang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa'i ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i//
37b1(rgyud): ras pa'i slod shing 'artson// zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa// zhal ras bshad cing blo dang bcas// rgyar rnams rkun gyis brgyan pa ste/ nanung gzhon nu drug drugs// g.yas pa'i bya ngorjes
37b2(rgyud): pan ni dgra sa nyid// gsum pa mnga' yang rnam par gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzu ba zhags pa cad// gnyis shing lo'i bam po ste/ drug gsum pa na gcu nyid do// zor tshugs me tog 'phreng bas brgya/
37b3(rgyud): de steng la dog lnga po dag/ rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// mdog ser pad+ma'i gdar la bzhugs// dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bar ba// khro ba'i sprin 'phro spu mdzad cing // gnod gang skying rgu
37b4(rgyud): nang gnas pa// de dag khro bo'i mis kyang sreg/ phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyis// kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad// de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms nas// mings thams cad
37b5(rgyud): bar mdzad// nang thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dza yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rig sngags mtshan ni drag sel ma// sbrul mgo bdur
37b6(rgyud): gdengs ka can// nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nur mtshan ni 'bar ba can// bzhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste// sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan/
37b7(rgyud): phyag ga rol pa'i stang stabs can// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa ral mi thogs par brtson// phyag gsum pa no gar thabs kyis/
38a1(rgyud): stang stabs tshul gyis mnga' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa drug gi me tog can// phyag gsum pa ni gzhu nyid do// dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyam
38a2(rgyud): gser mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can// dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste// kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'phro ba can/
38a3(rgyud): phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i// kha ni dza yis rnam brgyan pas// dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs// rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma// dug gis phog pa rnams la bsgom// de ltar bsgom par
38a4(rgyud): byas pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob// nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba// gdengs ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// tri yi ye shes las
38a5(rgyud): bsgrubs pa// sku chen ha la ha la ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// zor tsugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// zla ba chos pa bsnams pa'i lha// dbu rgyan thod pa dag gis brgyan//
38a6(rgyud): tsugs rgyal po'i sku gadzugs dazugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang // sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul cani// phyag brgyad zhal yang band pa ste// smad g.yos
38a7(rgyud): stag gi dgas pa nabs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa bgrang nor 'phreng ba can// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gsor// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan// gnyis pa yis ni
38b1(rgyud): num dzam/ ban panams tsuny-id // mams pa mdu bsgyum / ma gyis yongs su rnas pas/ da 'dzumam / da du tshangs kyis dag
38b2(rgyud): la zugs pa/ rnam pa'i spa bas rdul du mnas// chan drug na bathags par// rnal 'byi sams dngas brnas par bya// sas rgyas rang shi sa nga n-i/
38b3(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung // rnam par mchog ting 'dzin ces// khazas thams cad pa byed cing // nang gyi sngags pas sngags brjod cing / rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ byang chub tu /
38b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren// 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrubs pa// ha la ha la yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sa yi ye shes las
38b5(rgyud): bsgrubs pa// stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i// lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste// sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzad ma// phyag stong ldan zhing dbu stong la// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan//
38b6(rgyud): brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang // sdig pa'i thabs kyis dgongs pa can// phyag g.yas mchod sprin lha rdzas kyi// ral gyi lcags kyu mda' dang ldan// phyag g.yon pad+mo rdo rje nor// zhags pa gzhung
38b7(rgyud): sA re can// mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste// bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin// rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas// nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro// glang po rta dang skyes pa dag
39a1(rgyud): za bar mdzad ma 'phreng ba can// de yi las kyis bskul ba yi// gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod pas// 'di byas pas ni spang bar
39a2(rgyud): 'gyur// dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// trAM zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i
39a3(rgyud): sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa la/ ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bsnams pa//
39a4(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / chom rkun mdzub mos sdigs pa ste/ rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag/ mthong bas dpung rnams bcom gtor bas/ lha mo rtag tu bsgoms
39a5(rgyud): na ni ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob// 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// stobs
39a6(rgyud): mo che pha rol gnon par mdzad ma spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mda' dang / phyag g.yon na rdo rje dang
39a7(rgyud): zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / gzhu bsnams pa dang / sdang ba'i bgegs rnams lhung bar mdzad par bya'o// bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcug nas su// lha rnams
39b1(rgyud): bar bzu ba yas/ ma ma rgyas ni dbang bcur dang / de yi mang 'dubyas pa ni// 'am pa'i bathags ca 'drag par bam/ 'gas pa'i byab rgyas mtshan nanas/ smras pa gags dus
39b2(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / dran pa yis ni bral nas kyang // mngal ni bsod napas dag gis sbrel// mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
39b3(rgyud): 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes rol pas bskrun// lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma// gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la// phyag drug lang tshodaral bab// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// 'jo sgog thabs bcas
39b4(rgyud): 'bar ba ste// de yi phyag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad// gnyis pa 'bru yi snyem can// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang // rin chen char 'bebs gzhu yang 'dzin//
39b5(rgyud): grogros mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing // mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs// rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang // nor kun gyi ni char pa dag/ 'bebs par byed pa bsam par bya// nor gyi blo gros
39b6(rgyud): chen po 'di// de ltar sngags pas bsgoms na de// dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang // nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad// byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma// de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid
39b7(rgyud): bsgom// nor gyi chun gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes las bslabs pa/ rngon mo 'bar ba'i zlog 'phreng can/ ming ning dul dkar las
40a1(rgyud): skyes mo// stobs mo che la pha rol gnon// gsus 'phyang mo la mche gtsigs ma// skra ser mo 'am kham pa gyen du brdzes pa// thor tsugs dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa// spyi bo la mi
40a2(rgyud): 'khrugs pa bzhugs pa/ phyag bco brgyad pa/ mgo bcu gnyis pa/ stan gsum gsum can/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ drag mo lag na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa/ smad g.yogs seng ge'i
40a3(rgyud): pags pas g.yogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / lhag dbyug dang / mdung
40a4(rgyud): dang mchog sbyin pa dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / be con dang / zhags pa dang / dgra lta dang / tho ba thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mdog gnag pa/ pad+ma'i gdan
40a5(rgyud): la rol pa'i stabs su bzhugs pa/ sdang ba dang 'dul ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta bu/ rtag tu hUM gis hUM mdzad pa// bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par bsgom// sems can kun don tshogs pa yi// byang chub ring/
40a6(rgyud): por mi thogs 'thob// sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rang byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// k+Shi zhes bya bas bsgom pa'i gzugs// rgyan
40a7(rgyud): rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can// mgo bo skra tshugs phyed du gzung // de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang // la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste// de la kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog 'phrul pa
40b1(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan// gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa// phyed bzung bas ni rnam par rol// dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi// rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs/ 'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis/
40b2(rgyud): de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs// tha ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos// nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sngags la oM aHhUM/
40b3(rgyud): yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs// khyab 'jug lha chen mes po ste// gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bskul cing // rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na// mod la dngos grub tho
40b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi// sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te// rdo rje yig 'bru
40b5(rgyud): rnams bsgoms nas// de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du sgrub// 'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i// bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang // lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud kyi
40b6(rgyud): rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas// de
40b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs kyi ye shes bskyed/
41a1(rgyud): par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las byung ngo // oM b+ha ga pa ti ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba a sAd+ha ni swA hA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs
41a2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes// bdud kyi dpung rnams 'das 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes par byed// zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/
41a3(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na// shi ba rnams la srog sbyin mdzad// ma grub pa rnams grub par stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i
41a4(rgyud): mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad bskyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di 'byung ngo //
41a5(rgyud): oM shaM ka re/ shan+tiM ka ri g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa/ thams cad kyi ni mig phye nas/ rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur
41a6(rgyud): sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad mo// de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yi// sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma s+ho// ni dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad na'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
41a7(rgyud): bair sngang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa badragar gyi skang stabs thugs kyis rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs nas
41b1(rgyud): chos thams cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo // oM ka Ta bi ka Te ni ka Te kak+Sha Te swAhA/ de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// ting nge 'dzin
41b2(rgyud): gyi mig phye nas// rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed// rgyas pa chen po yum yin te// chos mdzod rnam par 'phel mdzad ma// bsgoms shing bstan te bzlas brjod na// rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom
41b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs
41b4(rgyud): thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so// oM tIre tut+tAre tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyis rnams// spyan phye rnam par gdangs nas su// ye shes rdo rje
41b5(rgyud): ldan pa dran// lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// skye dgu rnams ni mingag gzhug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/
41b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAMHoM kha la khA hi lA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA shA hasta/ tsatar mu ka la/ tsa tur b+hU dza/
41b7(rgyud): thams sa sa/ ma @ ma masamal
42a1(rgyud): sarba man+t+ra na/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu drA na/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hu tAn/ tha ma tha ma/ ni mra tha ni mtha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pra be sha ma pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye baM ba shA ta/ dzA bi tan+ta ka ra/ ku ru
42a2(rgyud): ku ru ma ma kAr+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mAM bi laM ba mA ba~M laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ d+hU hUM/ pang pang/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA shA ya ri pA/ ka ra ka ra/ big+h+nAn sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/ he he b+ha ga
42a3(rgyud): ban kil+li ra ya si ma ma sarba an+t+ra sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun// 'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad
42a4(rgyud): rdo rje ra ba dra ba yi// ye shes sna tshogs can la lta// srubs gcig pa 'am srubs gnyis pa'i// thod pa bzang po rnyed pa dang // rkang rjes pa yi cho ga la// lha mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis byin
42a5(rgyud): brlabs te// sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su// myur bar lugs kyi bar du ni// rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom
42a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po nam mkha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje gsum rnams las snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM na mo badz+ra
42a7(rgyud): kro d+ha ya/ mahA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i tra kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han d+ha b+han d+hA/ ha na ha na/ da ha da he/ gar+dz+dza gar+N+Na
42b1(rgyud): bi s+pho Ta ya ba s+phoT ya/ sarba bidz+nyA bi nA ya kAn/ ma hAg Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ye swA hA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa yis// grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni// yid phyung nas ni skrag par gyur/
42b2(rgyud): log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'dar// sku gsum ye shes mchog menga' ba'i// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran// de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni// rlung gis gtsug pa'i shing lo lo// khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas
42b3(rgyud): sung tshogs padag rkang pa'i drung du gzhag/ rdzu drung par byos bskul nas su// bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen gyis rin chen
42b4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i zhi bo chen po sku gsum rnams las byung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra d+hI/ oM hA dzin ri tin+da hUM hUM pa bang
42b5(rgyud): swAhA de nas khro bo'i 'di brjod pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'jigs par gyur cing smag gyur nas// gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran// srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro/ skem
42b6(rgyud): byed gdon rnams gzer ba la// rdo rje gzer ba'i sbyor ba yis// hUM tsam gyis kyang las byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med
42b7(rgyud): pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad+ma'i khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM hUM hUM hUM ta ru la/ bi ru la
43a1(rgyud): sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ya/ dz+wa li ta/ bi s+phu l-i ga/ an+dan+da ha sa nA daM ni/ ke Sha ri sarba to pa Ta ka ra/ badz+ra khu ra/ r-i nag+hA ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shA sa ma ru to kak+Shi pA d+hA ra Ni d+ha ra/
43a2(rgyud): b+hI Sha na an+d+ran+yA ta/ Ta Ta Ta hA sa a pA ro mi tA/ ba la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga na b+hI te b+h+r-i ta gai/ ad+h+yA Shi ta/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha dA ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+tan/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sid+d+him+me A be Sha A be Sha ya
43a3(rgyud): badz+ra sarba dze ra bi shA tsAn/ sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha to b+ha ba/ badz+ra daSh+Ti kiny+tsi ra ya si/ au daM duSh+Ta gra ha naduSh+Ta sarba ma bA d+hun d+hu na/ d+hun hu na/ tha ma tha ma mar da mard
43a4(rgyud): mar da pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi d+ha baM d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI g+h+raM ha ya grI bA phar/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra g+hA ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ne tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta ya pa
43a5(rgyud): badz+ra lu rA paT/ badz+ra khur rin g+ha ta nA ya pha/ pa ra man+ta bi nA sha nA ya pha/ badz+ra trai la kyai b+ha a ye ka ra phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san+ta sa nA ya par/ hUM hUM hUM pha pang ba
43a6(rgyud): swAhA de nas khro chen byung ba yis/ rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams// yid ni 'dzags shing skrag par 'gyur// 'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnams 'khrugs nas// byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing //
43a7(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje dran gyur pa// lag pa la ni pad+ma dang // ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar bsam// khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o//
43b1(rgyud): mi bzang drug ni drang bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
43b2(rgyud): zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ e hi oM hi/ b+ha ga b+hanA/ nI la badz+ra daN+DA/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gu lu
43b3(rgyud): gu lu gu lA pa ya / gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kram/ b+ha ga ba na bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tAM na shrI b+h+yAM/ da ha da ha/ dar da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bA ta ya pA ta ma
43b4(rgyud): ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo nA pa ya/ sarba karmA ni/ ts+tshin dats+tshin da/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ a s+thi mai de a s+ya ru d+hi ha ra mad dza mi di bi shA mad dza/ ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e d+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ sarba big+h+nAn/ sarba
43b5(rgyud): man+ta Ni sarba mU la kar+m+ma Ni kr-i ti ma Ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar dmar da/ i daM me/ kAr+yaM sA d+ha ya/ hUM nI lA ya nI la badz+ra daN+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ b+hig+h+nAn/ bi nA ya ka/ nA shA ya
43b6(rgyud): nA shA ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dip+ta NA ya/ sarba sha tA nAM hr-i da yA ni pI Ta ya/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ pa ra bid+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe da ka hUM bi d+yA/ nA ma shiSh+Na ka/ sa ma yA a nu smA ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra bA tsa na tsa/ mar na ma ni kr-in+ta
43b7(rgyud): hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru / hu ru hu ru/ phar phaT/ hUM hUM kr-i tin+t+ra ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA ba ya kaha na badz+ra daN+Da na swA hA/ khro bo chen po mchog gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi
44a1(rgyud): ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na
44a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya
44a3(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM pha phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT oM dz+yo ti nir
44a4(rgyud): nAd hUM hUM hUM phaT pha pha/ oM mahA pA la ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis// gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun// yid ni shin tu 'jigs skrag ste// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran
44a5(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis// las kun rab tu grub par byed// char pa chen gcod gyur la// char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje
44a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod par khra ba 'di rdo rje skra gsum rnams las byung ngo // namaHsaman+ta ba n+tu/ Ta byung / de nas khro ba gsungs pa yis/ gsangs
44a7(rgyud): rgyas thams rab tu 'ang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sngag/ 'dur cing bung mas srung bar gyur// nga ga yas sna tshogs rdo rje mi gagyur bas mi ma nam ngas pa// klu gsum la shes stong sa na
44b1(rgyud): bayang tha ma ma par bsnyen byas te/ sayang sngags can rnaMs pasag nas sa// sems can thams ca bang byud / nas sa ldadu 'das rnam par yang mdzad chen kyang rjo da /
44b2(rgyud): pas rdza mabya bar ning 'dra ba'i ma shes rab tu bar bzhes bya ba 'an la snyoms par thugs nas rdo rje tham mamam pa sa po 'didi rjeg ma rnams las byung ba rA
44b3(rgyud): a tsal kAN tsaH/ ma nanamaT+Taman+tu/ sarbAs r+b+ba/ r+m+mA n+t+ra/ tan tam/ da da nga/ monam / mog par/ sa tes/ badz+rad+has ku rba/ sang+yas tras/ seMn par mA \u0f7f/ gar+b+ha kAd+d+ha han n-i/ khan d+ha banan/
44b4(rgyud): A bi sha sA bi sha man+t+ra pa la ka/ d+hA na d+hA na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+nAn/ mA ra ya mA ra ya duSh+TAn/ bak+Sha bak+Sha/ saT+Tan ku ru ku ru/ ke ri ki ri/ ma hA gi Sha ma badz+ra swaT ya s+pho TA ya/ hUMhUMd+h+r-i/ traM ba l-I ta
44b5(rgyud): ra ga na rta ka/ A AM I hA hA hUM/ a tsa la tsa tra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ta ka Ta Ta ma hA ba la sha ta ya/ par man+tan/ oM aM hAM hUM/ maM shud dz+yaM tu lo ka/ tuSh+ye tu badz+ra/ na mo tu sU oM pr-i ti ha ta ba le b+h+ya/
44b6(rgyud): dza lA ya/ tAT/ a sa ha na ma swA hA/ de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba// khro bo stobs chen 'di gsungs pas// lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug byed// gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// 'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur//
44b7(rgyud): bdud kyi snga rnams lhung nas su// tshig cing rab tu zhum pa bzhin// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis// bcug pas 'jigs pas nyin bzhin du/ gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid/
45a1(rgyud): sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs
45a2(rgyud): pa chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so// oM sun+ta ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na hUM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/
45a3(rgyud): a na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ bi d+yA rA dzA hUM phang / de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// lha yi bu mo thams cad ni/ sgra tshugs zhig cing gcer bur gyur// mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag sku gsum
45a4(rgyud): rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i// zhal gyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam par mdzad// be shes kyis ni 'joms dran gyur// lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te/ rdo rje zhags pas btsongs nas
45a5(rgyud): sra bu mo thams cad dgug bya ba// bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par bgyings pa'i dga' ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs
45a6(rgyud): nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do// 'khor lo tshal rnams gnas nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin dag dang /
45a7(rgyud): de bzhi rdo rje ma ba'i dzin/ rdo rje lug cugags thogs 'bye/ ldan margyan la gas las 'byung so// gas sngags skyes par bdag bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgu byas
45b1(rgyud): lam las/ rdzas lam ma / sa/ mas sa nga 'ang mas u thas la hA/ rdul
45b2(rgyud): med rdo rnarnam par dang mdzad ni/ u ches pA pa la bdag yin/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khom la gnas pa/ rdo rje bdud rtsi 'bebs pasas ste/ lan drangs bdu brjod pa yis dzin
45b3(rgyud): bar lugs/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byang ba// rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yis// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis// gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gugs// rdo rje gsum 'drugs khro bo na// rdo rjes 'og gnas
45b4(rgyud): pa steng lha ma yin kun nges sreg cing // lha min bu mo rjes chags pas// gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nas su// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// drangs nas lha min bu mo 'gugs// btsag dang thod le kor
45b5(rgyud): dang ni// ba bla 'byor par 'gyur na ni// gzas zin tshen khar bcug ste// rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub// drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang // lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma// mngag gzhug bcas par
45b6(rgyud): 'jigs skrag ste// ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs// sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs zhugs te// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// lag na rdo rje
45b7(rgyud): lcags kyu thogs// khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// gnod sbyin bu mo bkug nas spyod// phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// 'gug par bya ba la
46a1(rgyud): tshig gsungs pa// gzhan du byas na grub mi 'gyur/ rgyal po'i zhabs kun gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas/
46a2(rgyud): yang dang yang du sprul bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
46a3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // oM shU li ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ klu mo dbang chen grags
46a4(rgyud): pa dag/ gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni// klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// bsam gtan rdo rje
46a5(rgyud): mthu dang ni// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis// gser gdub rgyan ni gsel ba yi// klu mo'i mig yungs bkug nas ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i// klu mo nye bar spyod
46a6(rgyud): par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnam mkha'i chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sprul byed ma chen mo'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen po 'od
46a7(rgyud): gsungs so// na mangs san budz+nyAnA~M/ sasurba bud+d+ha ka nA nan/ d+ya thA/ oM rgyal rgya'i tsun+de swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa'
46b1(rgyud): rnams kyi las// ting 'dzin las g.yos par gyur/ 'du rnams rgyal zhing che nas pa// khams cad tshungs 'debs par byed// sa ma chog gi ma dang // 'dzin bram nu mo dang // nga phyu
46b2(rgyud): bras rnams 'thugs nas// saca brngan skang ma na dran// sa thags 'don bzlas pa dag/ rnam pa yan sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa cas gyis 'chub 'byung zhing/ bdag na rab tu 'ongs spyong drub/
46b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer 'di rdo rje sku gsum las
46b4(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni trA se tA sa ya/ bai ri Ta b+h+r-i ku/ Ti ti Ti/ bai Ta Ti bai Ta Ti/ shwe te/ shwe te/ dza Ta ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams
46b5(rgyud): ni g.yos shing 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs te// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// yid gcig tu ni dran par byed// nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba
46b6(rgyud): yis pa rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas// lha min bu mo gsang ba yis// bu mo bkug nas spyod par byed// 'dis ni las kun byed pa dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin// yang na
46b7(rgyud): gsang sngags thams cad ni// skye bo med pa'i nags tshal du// sngags pas bye ba bzlas nas su// las rnams thams cad bya bar gsungs// gang gzhan slob dpon sdod pa dang // theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang // migang
47a1(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyang dag gi/ sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa// de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// de ni rtag tu gnod kyis zin// bsgrims nas gsad par bya ba 'am// yang na lus ni
47a2(rgyud): gzhig par bya// sngags pas 'di ltar byas nas ni// byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni// sku gsum ye shes las 'byung ba'i// khyad par du ni bsgom
47a3(rgyud): par bya// dgra la 'di ni the tsom med// khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa 'am// dur khrod thal ba 'am bshang gci yis// brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang // rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su// khro bo'i
47a4(rgyud): rgyal por sbyor byas te// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te// khro bo'i mdun du bcings nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni//
47a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig/ bshang gci yis ni spags pa'i gos// rul ba'i dri can smad pa dag/ bgos nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod na// mod la 'chi ba 'am bskams par 'gyur//
47a6(rgyud): dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos// bgos nas khro bo 'khrugs nas ni// lan grangs stong du brjod na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig/ sgra ni lkug par bshig nas ni// kha bzhin rnam par
47a7(rgyud): bsgyur byas te/ rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni// nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ khang stong ngas no ba'i mdo'am/ mtshan ma gcig pa
47b1(rgyud): sa6// rna thul spyad pa brtsam par bya// de yin rjes sa lan// nga rdzas las byas phu dra dag/ sor bcad cam tshad A lA// lan mas pacwam brgyad 'du pa // rnam
47b2(rgyud): nibatab nas sa// ngam yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug/ sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang // pra pre ny+tsa li nang rol du// 'tshang ba'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur/ yangs/
47b3(rgyud): pas thod pa yongs tshang ba// khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang // de la gsang sngags tshig bris te// rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas// dgra yi sgo 'am yang na ni// grong du sbas na nges par smod// ta la'i 'dab
47b4(rgyud): ma'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bos gsang sngags legs bris te// dgra yi khyim mam sgro kar ni// sbas na 'chi'am bskams par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to//
47b5(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang
47b6(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn par pa / kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM parda ba
47b7(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la/ badz+ra d+ha ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra / kI la ya hUM hUM hUM lang pa / de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje dbang chen zags pa kun// brgyal nas 'jigs skyes gyur te// rdo rje rnam snar
48a1(rgyud): mdzad pa dran// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung ba 'am// lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig/ rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam
48a2(rgyud): bzhag ste// 'od bzang me stag 'khrug pa can// sku gsum rdo rje mtha' gtugs pas// gzugs brnyed pa ni bsams nas sbyar// rnam snang phyag rgya chen po 'am// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// phyag rgya chen po
48a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed// 'dod pa'i khro bo nyid du ni// rdo rje phur bu bsams par bya// bdag nyid chen po stobs po che// bdud rtsi thabs sbyor rdo rje dang // rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis// sdang dang gtum po gcad
48a4(rgyud): par bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // thugs nas zhabs la thugs bar du// rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms// rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon// 'di ni phur bu'i
48a5(rgyud): mthu rlabs te// steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi// ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni// myur du 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
48a6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par babyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sgra gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi thu/
48a7(rgyud): bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ ha ra ha ra/ dIp+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ mthe ba'i ngos kyi drung du 'dugs/
48b1(rgyud): snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su// rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya/ btab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gi bzhengs par mdzang/ gzhan du byas na grag
48b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyi phur bu zhes bya
48b3(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams las byung ngo // oM badz+ra na dzA hUM/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su// me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis
48b4(rgyud): mnan// rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhes mdzad do// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
48b5(rgyud): 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam par babyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyis bur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang //
48b6(rgyud): gsung dang // thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM tri oM b+hud+b+ha ba/ rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis// pad+ma kha bye 'bar ba yis// 'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab
48b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin/ cho ga
49a1(rgyud): bzang po tsam gyis ni// rdo rje mkha' dbyings mtha' gtugs pa// mnan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka'
49a2(rgyud): stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams// dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su// rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog
49a3(rgyud): kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa// kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig/ ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad// gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di// bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste/
49a4(rgyud): bur bu de nyid rnams las byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad gdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can
49a5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM mA rI ts+yai de ba tA yai swA hA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// dbang chen drag pa'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar gyur// sras rnams kyis ni spyan
49a6(rgyud): yang phye// 'di ni las rnams thams cad ma// chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma// 'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na// 'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
49a7(rgyud): po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
49b1(rgyud): nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so// oM mahA sa ha sra pa mdzan pa ra sid+d+hi mI ge ma Ni badz+ra Ni hUM pa swAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas shing rnams
49b2(rgyud): rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // bdud kyi ris rnams g.yos par 'gyur// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa// thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su// bcom ldan rig sngags mthu
49b3(rgyud): stobs kyis// gnod bgyid thams cad gzir lags so// gang ni rig sngags stobs mo che// pha rol gnon pa 'di zlos pa// der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing // der ni bsrung ba dag kyang bgyi
49b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
49b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs so// oM b+ha ga ba tI d+h+wa dza gra ke yu re pa ra sai n+ya bi d+ha na sa na ka swa sai n+ya pa ri la ni/ u lU kA mu khi
49b6(rgyud): kha kha khA hi khA hi pa ra sai n+ya ma a nan+ta b+hu dze/ a nan ta mu khe pra ha ra pra ha ra hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i
49b7(rgyud): rab g.yos shing // bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par gyur// gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas// 'dzags shing skrag par gyur pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid
50a1(rgyud): kyis tshigs lags te/ bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na// mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrub tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
50a2(rgyud): mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so// oM
50a3(rgyud): ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re swA hA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang // rig sngags rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni// mi yi skye dgu 'tshe byed pa// mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pa dang // log 'dren kun dang
50a4(rgyud): sdang ba'i rnams// mi bzang mi lce tshig gyur nas// 'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis// rdo rje snang mdzad drung lhags te// zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras pa// bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal/
50a5(rgyud): rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa// gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing // rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi
50a6(rgyud): rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo nor gyi rgyun 'di gsungs so// oM ba su d+hI ri ma hA ba su d+ha ra br-iSh+Ta ni pA ta ni ba su swA hA/
50a7(rgyud): nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi// rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag/ yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi// drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su//
50b1(rgyud): dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa// bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i// mtshan ni mi mchog sgrogs bgyid na// de la nor gyi char 'bab cing // nor chen dang ni ldan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das
50b2(rgyud): kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin me glog 'bar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// a re pu tre ni pra ku pa ta tsaN+De/ ma hA be ga
50b3(rgyud): d+hA ri b+hid d+hu dzi tre/ ma he da ri/ ro dzi ka pA la ma la d+hA ri Ni dza Ta ma ku Ta/ min+ti te/ nA nA pra ha ra Na/ d+ha ri hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba ta tha ga taM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ ku ru ku ru/ hUM hUM/ pra ma d+ha ma/ sarba she trA NI/ sho na
50b4(rgyud): ta bi ba/ pra tsaN+Da/ be ga d+ha ri/ pa tsa ta pa tsata/ bi ki ra ta sa ta ya hUM/ da ha da ha/ sarba sha trUM/ sarba duSh+TAn/ ni krin+ta/ pra sa da ya hUM/ ma hA bA ga ba te/ dz+wa la dz+wA la hUM phaT/ che ge mo zhig ma~M ba sha man
50b5(rgyud): ya swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa yis// bdud kyi gnas rnams chog par gyur// dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams// dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris
50b6(rgyud): nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar bya'o//
50b7(rgyud): de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to// brkos pa'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// mnan pa dang rmongs par
51a1(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
51a2(rgyud): nas rdo rje chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM hA ri t+yai ma hA yak+Shi NA ye/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba yak+Shi NI pra be sha ni swA hA/ de nas 'phrog dga' 'phrog ma ni// gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang //
51a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su// dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur// khro mo'i 'khor lo'i gnod sbyin ma// brgyad dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te// lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can// gnod
51a4(rgyud): sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su// gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
51a5(rgyud): zhugs nas mings chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so// oM pI shA tsi par+Na sha ba ri sar+b+ba mA ra pra sha ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/
51a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang // sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags// ya me shing 'o ma can dang til// 'o mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur// nam mkhar kun nas rig sngags
51a7(rgyud): kyi nga rgyal mo legs par bkang nas su// bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni// mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par
51b1(rgyud): bsgyings pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
51b2(rgyud): sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig/ gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam 'grol zhing //
51b3(rgyud): 'di ni lus ni byin brlabs te// rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bong gnyis
51b4(rgyud): bteg pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste/ gsung byin
51b5(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs
51b6(rgyud): pa las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag
51b7(rgyud): steng g.yas pa sa la g.yon pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od
52a1(rgyud): dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar byas pa las gung mo gshibs te
52a2(rgyud): bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni
52a3(rgyud): rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje las mi'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyor ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du
52a4(rgyud): byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshogs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul bzung ba ni mA ma ki'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyor te pad+ma kha
52a5(rgyud): bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te/ mthe bong gnyis dbus su gzhag nas cung zad bkug
52a6(rgyud): pa ni sgrol ma'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshig dbu mar gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bong gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o//
52a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan
52b1(rgyud): nyid du byas pa 'di ni khrog nyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu chur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lug rgyung ltar bcings pa 'di na rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
52b2(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas bkris pas mthe bong gnyis mdun du
52b3(rgyud): bzhag pa las cung zad bkrug ste kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas bathal
52b4(rgyud): lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdung la mdzub mo gzhibs te bsgrengs pa las bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag pa ni d+ha
52b5(rgyud): mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi srin mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa
52b6(rgyud): gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa
52b7(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni be con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying kar bzhag la
53a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par phyar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te spang
53a2(rgyud): nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ ut+pal kha bye ba'i tshul du bzhag
53a3(rgyud): pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhug pa/ lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i snga ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang po che'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha'
53a4(rgyud): la bsgreng pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes rtog gi phyag rgya'o// bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying kar bzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi
53a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor so rngan chu rlabs drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni blo gros mi
53a6(rgyud): zad pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la/ g.yas pa se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis pad+ma cung zad la bye ba
53a7(rgyud): ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan song spong ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa
53b1(rgyud): ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas
53b2(rgyud): la g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas
53b3(rgyud): pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa
53b4(rgyud): ni sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la hUM zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas pa phyar
53b5(rgyud): kha ni ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang ba las mdzub mo dang mthe bong skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa lab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams
53b6(rgyud): kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis
53b7(rgyud): las mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
54a1(rgyud): khams spyan rdzu smra sa r+dz+nyA/ gas na 'i sa dus pa la du sa smra smra
54a2(rgyud): cing khro ba'i lta bas blta bar bya ba na rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe' chung gnyis bam/ mdzub ma gnyis lcags bya'i tshul du byas nas 'i'i grwang banag sa d+hu zhes bya zhing khri bral la
54a3(rgyud): lus gcu ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brgyang ste bsnol nas rkyen du btog pa ltar byas pa ni dkyila'i khor gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid
54a4(rgyud): las khrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing btegapa ni go dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mtshan khung du bsdams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams
54a5(rgyud): cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon brkyang ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / 'khrul 'khor
54a6(rgyud): 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du
54a7(rgyud): byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hUM zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos sdigs pa ni rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings
54b1(rgyud): pa las mdzubs gnyis brgyang ste phur bu'i rdul du byas pa ni rnga myur bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i rdong la chur brdung ba'i rgyal dubyas pa na nga ba ba'i byas bya'o// lag pa gnyi dro du
54b2(rgyud): chur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brgyad ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje 'u chur bcangs tesag la
54b3(rgyud): drang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la khro ba'i mig tu byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya na//
54b4(rgyud): lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis
54b5(rgyud): gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phur pa dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab
54b6(rgyud): cing rkang pa ya gtsigs la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu bskums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce 'jib cing hUM phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams
54b7(rgyud): gsum khyab pa'i drug kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dag gi tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje
55a1(rgyud): mda'i phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis las gung mo gzhibs te bsgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du bkug la/ mthe bong brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni
55a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgreng la g.yas pas pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ha la'i phyag rgya'o//
55a3(rgyud): khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis bkris las mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgrengs nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma rnams
55a4(rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa'o// g.yon pas thod pa bzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas ral pa bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgreng lag mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni g+har thabs kyi
55a5(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las ser mo rnams cung zad phye ste mthe bong la ge mthil du gnag/ de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas/
55a6(rgyud): pan byab 'jug gi phyag rgyu'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i rgyal du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag cu'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo long stong du sbyar te ma tog ltar byas pa ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//
55a7(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi na// rgyab tu 'dud pa ltar 'dor zhing / rdo rjesams ma la sogs pa'i// rin chen cod pan 'phreng dbang bsku gting nge 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can / ka 'khor lo mnga' ba'i ma/
55b1(rgyud): rnam pa// sangs rgyas sa na pa' gengs pa'i// gas pa'i ma sa byung ba bams// byang nga bar 'dzitshu la can// seMnam man drug tu yis// ga rgyal du donas kyang // zlunas chub tu sham/
55b2(rgyud): shing rinas sangs rgyas can gyes pa// rdo rje d+hang ni snang bar bya// de nas 'bring rdul 'phreng ba yis// lha rnams can la btsung bar bya// 'dzegag thabs la spro ba las// lag gnyis bskor nang ma
55b3(rgyud): dang ngag yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis// ga thabs byas la mgo la gzhag/ me tog dbul ba'i tshul duni// gang gi me tog thal mo sbyar// bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis// lung po gnyis ni brnags
55b4(rgyud): bsgreng // bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis// mtheb gnyis mar me'i tshul du bzhag/ dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas// dung por lta bur mchod yon dbul// de nas lha rnams kun la yang // lag pa'i
55b5(rgyud): gar gis byug tshul bya// de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su// lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung // dud dang gling bu bud pa dang // lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yo ba// bsil yab tshul gyis gsil
55b6(rgyud): ya ba dang // sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya// tshon 'gyed tshe na lcug phran ltar// bskyod cing tshon gyis 'phreng ba dgye// lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la// g.yas pa yis ni lha ba shos dbul// khang pa
55b7(rgyud): brtsegs pa bzhag nas su// gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang // gdu bu ska rags rkang brgyan dang / rna cha do shal sna lnga gzhag/ de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzugs/
56a1(rgyud): bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag / nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// grwar ni pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang /
56a2(rgyud): dril bu ga yer ka'i dra bas brgyan// gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra g+ha na n+d+ha ra Ni ti/ pra ra Ni ta/ saM pra ra tsi ta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She ta waH
56a3(rgyud): li tang pra dA pA ra mi tA/ nA da sA b+hA be badz+ra d+ham hr-i da ya san+to Sha tsi hUM hUM hUM/ lag g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // sna tshogs lugs su 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje glu yis bstod pa bya// rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa// 'di ni
56a4(rgyud): don dam mchod pa yin// gang gis rnam tog rnam spangs te// byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas// lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa// de yi mchod pa bla na med// sems can gang gis dbu ma yis// theg pa
56a5(rgyud): gong ma ma bsgoms shing // theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa// de yi mchod pa kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis// mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang // ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas// legs
56a6(rgyud): so zhes ni rab tu gsungs// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste/ rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis// nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob/
56a7(rgyud): rdo rje theg chen legs pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ zab cing rgya che legs pa ste/ rdo rje rin che makun 'dres legs/ de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i
56b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje theg pa bsdags pa thos nas/ dga' bas smra zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso ba rdo rje sdang mdzad la/ dga' ba'i yid kyis spong/
56b2(rgyud): par byed// thog ma med cing skye ba med// 'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med // mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba/ rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags/ thabs su brtags pa gang yin des/
56b3(rgyud): ye shes kyis ni sras po kun// rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// zhes smras so// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por
56b4(rgyud): mkhyen// dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni// dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis 'phreng bas bskor ba yi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab
56b5(rgyud): pa yid rnga spos med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/
56b6(rgyud): nachung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing // g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su// g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bya sgra snyan 'khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyis
56b7(rgyud): bya ba byas par 'gyur/ gcig gi lag pas kun nas 'khyung ba ste// gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi bzod me tog 'phreng ba 'thor// bzhis bde ba yis ni mnga' yang
57a1(rgyud): 'phen// gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag/ bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no// oM a
57a2(rgyud): nut+ta ra sarba pU dzA me g+ha ud ga te/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byam thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul
57a3(rgyud): dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin
57a4(rgyud): gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
57a5(rgyud): kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa/ byang chub sems ni rin po che/ bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par
57a6(rgyud): thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la/ lus kyang sem kyi rnam pa yin/ sem kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin de nas byang chub sems dpa'
57a7(rgyud): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spa dang gsung dang / thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba zos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma kun tu bzang po ni// sku gsung
57b1(rgyud): byag par rjecan// chos rnams skye bamadang pa ste// g.yo ba cad cing brnyas pa skyed/ rtog pa'i ma grangs pa 'di/ bskyed par byazhes rab tu gsungs// des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin shags pa/
57b2(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dgas skyes te/ chos can med cing chos nyid /
57b3(rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
57b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs sgra med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ngos
57b5(rgyud): med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so// /
57b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po skye ba med pa ste//
57b7(rgyud): dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes// dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
58a1(rgyud): pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin pashegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang blas ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gas nas byang chub kyis ras 'di gsungs so// rnam
58a2(rgyud): rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin//
58a3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang //
58a4(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag/ kye ma'o chos ni
58a5(rgyud): bstan pa rnams// bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis// mi g.yo yi ge las byung ba// rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa// byang chub sems
58a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems pas/
58a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// rin chen lus sung rgyal bya// lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te// dam tshig yang dag dbul bar bya// gdan rnams sa so
58b1(rgyud): nams gam cho yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon mgo ma sogs// sil sman ma tshwar sogs ngo ba bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis btag / rnal 'byor gsum
58b2(rgyud): shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyis byin brlabs rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin brlabs
58b3(rgyud): yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon bskyed pa che// phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin// rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa// de ni brtag par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor
58b4(rgyud): cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag/ skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par// rnal
58b5(rgyud): 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags// rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag byas te// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing
58b6(rgyud): thal mo gsum gyis sbyang // dag gyur de nas blo yis ni// sems la so sor brtags par bya// sems la so sor brtag nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag
58b7(rgyud): chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag gazla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag/ lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i// oM gyi myu gus bskrun par yis// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje skur ni bsgom par
59a1(rgyud): bya AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung // sems na hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus// snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdo/
59a2(rgyud): gzugs 'od na byed bsams te/ gang rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod// rgyar kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes
59a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te// cod pan 'phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi//
59a4(rgyud): sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro// yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i// phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyem pa dang ni rtogs ldan ma// mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po// rnam
59a5(rgyud): par 'phrul par byin gyis brlabs// kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor lo khyab byas te// dga' bas dga' byed
59a6(rgyud): bzhi yang spro// ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun las pad+ma yi// ngo bo ya
59a7(rgyud): nirol pa dang // aM zhes bya ba 'phos pa las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa// nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta// sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang // rgyal
59b1(rgyud): mam la gags can dang / se snyan mchod pa'i rnan pa ni// rna chogs rnams kyis mchon par bya// rnam kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyini lhas brtson sanas/ d+hang ches pa dang bral
59b2(rgyud): dang mi gsal gug kyad nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas// de nas gsang sngagaso bzlas brjod bya// bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang /
59b3(rgyud): g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing // rdo rje klu tshul sna tshogs dang // ba ngadan tshul du bya bas mchod// bzlas pa'i mjug ni brtul nas kyang // gshegs su gsol te bdag nyid bsrungs// lus dang ngag dang
59b4(rgyud): sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur na yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub
59b5(rgyud): des ni myur thob nas// zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// phyag chen pad+ma'i gdung brgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten
