59b6(rgyud): dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' cher rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyum bshig pa kun shes shing // dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po cher
59b7(rgyud): bo sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i
60a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyi nang gi
60a2(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka' stsal to// lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig/ 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni// de yi ming smos rdo rje yi// dkyil
60a3(rgyud): 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang // rang gi las la sbyor ba na// 'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas// bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya// zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas//
60a4(rgyud): rgyal la rin chen gos dkar mar// dbang la sgrol ma lu gu rgyud// yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// drag shul spyad la mA ma kI// khro gnyer can ma dag gis
60a5(rgyud): bya ngang 'di dag shes rab rol pa ste// chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa// gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na// gdon mi za bar 'phrin las mdzad// spyan dang lha mo sprul byed ma// dbang po zhi ba
60a6(rgyud): zla 'dra ba// phyag gnyis na ni bgrang 'phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa// dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas// bum pa rdzu ba'i mdangs ldan pa// bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste// lag
60a7(rgyud): gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis// rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du// nad pa la ni bdugs par bsam// rin chen ma dang gos dkar car// sku che la dog ser po ste// lha mo ser mo snang ba la/
60b1(rgyud): phyag na rin chen bdunan// rang ba tang 'dzin gyis sprul nas// yad 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drang // drang kyis rab tung bang ba dang / rdzurang nan pa
60b2(rgyud): nang rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur// l+h+wam chen mdog dmar ba// sgrol ma de bzhin lan rgyud/ kun nas 'od dmar 'bar btsun// wa rdzas legs kya gagras thogs pa/ rang /
60b3(rgyud): cing spyan phye bas// 'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du// bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa dag/ bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni// skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzad// mings gnod pa gzhig pa'i
60b4(rgyud): phyir sku chen nam ra kha'i kha dog can// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du// mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni// bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog/ lha mo khro gnyer na
60b5(rgyud): ma kI nga mnad lta bu'i mdog can ma// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra spogs pa// rdo rje sdigs par brtson pa yis// rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du// khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char// 'bab par rnam par bsam par
60b6(rgyud): byang rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des// bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed// sbyor ba 'di yi mod la ni// 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am// yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad// byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la// rdo rje sems
60b7(rgyud): ma rin chen dang // chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi// sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang // bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste// rang gi phyogs nas las byas na// 'bras bu don yod sbyin par
61a1(rgyud): byed dang khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin// der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul// rkang pa'i rjes kyis bslangs la/
61a2(rgyud): dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsre// de yi ras spangs mi rus dang // chu 'gram gnyis kyis dag ni// btags nas lung bong gcin gyis sgra// de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar
61a3(rgyud): bya dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang // 'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te// dgra bo tsha bskyed pa'i phyir// de yis lus nang rab tu dgang // de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba// lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang // srin bu
61a4(rgyud): me 'khyer 'dra bcug ste// zhags pa yis ni dam du bzung // de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug/ bsgrims nas de yi ming smos te// dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par// po so cha yi tsher mas dbug/ mi rus las byas
61a5(rgyud): phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung bas// dpral ba snying mgrin dpung mgo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab// nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis// me sbar ba la bskal bar bya// mkhas pas/
61a6(rgyud): rkang pa nas brtsams te// mtshan marnon pos gtubs nas ni// 'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis// de yi dum bu sbyin sreg bya// las 'di la ni lhag par yang // rus sbal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar/
61a7(rgyud): zhi ma'i phung ngam nam byang na// las ni 'di nyid bslab par bya// las 'di byas nas nges par ni// gang zhig rgyal bas ba grangs na'ang des// nges par 'dzin byab 'drag dang // lha chen tshangs pas ci zhis spos
61b1(rgyud): ras rgyam thul gyud pa'i ga 'o/ gsad pa'i la shes las sprul te// rlung gi yang ni bshad par bya/ bsgru b+ha med kyi bsgyu nasas/ ga du sgya gyug par bu// lab ma nga/
61b2(rgyud): btson rdo rje gtun shing zhags// lag nas 'khor lo mda' gzhu can// khro bo sna tshogs bsdams pa des// bsgrub byi zhags pas btsongs nas su/ rdo rje yin khro bo yos// lce yo phyogs su khrid pa dang /
61b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang // de ni ral gris gtub pa dang // rgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam// oM hUM badz+ra rAk+Sha sa/ bAk+ShA ya tha par/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang // bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis// kun nas yongs
61b4(rgyud): su bskor nas su// de dag zang thob byed par ni// sgom zhing ming nas skul bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rdo rje rnga mo rnam bsams te// bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pas// de yi rgyab tu
61b5(rgyud): zhon nas su// rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du// lho phyogs su ni bkri bar bya// de yi rkang rjes sa la ni// rlung gis rtsubs pa'i shing lo la// de yi ming nas brjod byas te// rdo rje sna yon drung du sba// de lta bur
61b6(rgyud): ni sbyor ba'i las// sgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na// brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na/ sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos// de ming gsang dang sngags spel te// 'ug pa'i sgro la bris nas ni// dge sbyong bram ze'i
61b7(rgyud): smras dkris te// sa yi 'og tu bsgos nas gzhug/ rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni// 'thab mo 'gyed du 'jug par bya// de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'byo bar 'gyur// hUM zhes bya
62a1(rgyud): bas gang ba yis// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas nas// rna ba'i rtse mo nas bton te// bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya// lus kyi tshogs ni thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su//
62a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros 'gyur ba// des ni lus kyang bskam par bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te// kun nas kyang ni gzhig par bya// oM badz+ra DA ki nA/ a mu ka s+ya rak+ta A kaR+Sha tsa sha ya hUM phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa
62a3(rgyud): 'di yis ni// bskams 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas ni// spos kyi thig le bdun byas te// de dag kham pa'i phor ba dag ga/ de ni ri rab
62a4(rgyud): thams cad nas// rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te// rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis// de dag rnams ni mnan par bya// yaM zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rlung 'dun rnams// laM zhes bya bas mtshan ma dbang chen gyi//
62a5(rgyud): nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya// de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la// klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can// rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi
62a6(rgyud): zhabs mthil gyis// klu rnams mnanan char sprin char pa 'bebs// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis dbus klu rnams kyi// snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su/
62a7(rgyud): 'jigs dus char pa lta bu char pa 'bab// nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal// nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni// kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin// hUM zhes bya ba'i
62b1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i lce yis bldag/ ngadabugs rngub pa yis bkug nas dbyung ba yis// shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya// yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar ba// btang bas skad cig lan bcad
62b2(rgyud): gtubs te/ gahUM zhes bya bas sngags pa byas na ni// nam mkha' dag kyang sngon ka'i dus ltar snang // me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas sdang mdzad kyi// zhabs drung dpral 'byes nas byung mi g.yo bran// bdu
62b3(rgyud): las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs pa// khro ba grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas// bgegs rnams sreg mdzad hU~M ga~M sbas bkang nas// 'jig rten
62b4(rgyud): gsum po gang ba'ang rnam par 'jig/ rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las// mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la// 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis// lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags mig
62b5(rgyud): tu gad ba// tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug nas// phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung // oM sum+b+ha badz+ra mu sa le na/ rtswa d+hA ya na ra big+h+nAn hUM phaT/ las 'di bsams pas mod la ni// me yi bgegs
62b6(rgyud): kyang bzlog par 'gyur// stang zil kha dog lta bur nam mkha' lding // lus la sbrul stong dag gis brgyan byis pa// mkha' la 'dug nas gdings ka stong ldan pa'i// klu brgyad dag dang char sprin rnams la
62b7(rgyud): bsgo nga brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas// sprin tshogs bum pa'i char gyis me yang gsod// nam mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkab nas ni// mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang bcad/
63a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra nA rA ya NA/ nir ba bA ya/ hab ma mu me g+he hUM/ zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog/ phyag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// lha mo bzhi pa bsnyems ma
63a2(rgyud): byams ma dang // chu sprin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing // g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag/ ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste//
63a3(rgyud): sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing // rin chen cod pan dbang bskur bas// nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yin// thog thog rnam par zlog par
63a4(rgyud): byedang oM mahA puk+ka badz+ra/ che ge mo dza zhes bya ba dang // hUM zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Ta ban d+ha hUM phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis// bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i
63a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od dpag med// don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang // bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po// kun dang drag po'i ting
63a6(rgyud): 'dzin la// gnas pa yis ni khro bo dang // gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad rig rgyal ma// rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag/ rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams
63a7(rgyud): yang gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su// yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'jum bstan nas// thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad/
63b1(rgyud): ga' bar mdzad pa'i mang la ni// sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa// shes rab chen po'i thob 'dren pas// bsgrims tes sor gsor nas des// bde chen ting 'dzin laganas te// ldam das
63b2(rgyud): 'jo tshul gyis bltas nas// lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// ye shes lam ni rab ston pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// yid
63b3(rgyud): rgyas pa yis tshig gsol pa// ci slad rnam pa thams cad du// zlar gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang // smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam par bsgyings pas gsungs// byang chub chen po 'dzi rje
63b4(rgyud): can dang lag na rdo rje gsol mod la// brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gos ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad// sgom pa'i lam la legs byung ba// rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs// bde bas byang chub
63b5(rgyud): thob 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi// rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/ gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing // mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med// dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag/ dus
63b6(rgyud): gsum 'das pa nam mkha' 'dra// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs// rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni// thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya// phung po dngos po
63b7(rgyud): yod med pa'i// byang chub sems ni grogs gyur pa// spro ba dang ni btung ba yis// sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya// sems kyis sgra ni 'thob 'gyur zhing // sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin//
64a1(rgyud): sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par sgom// sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste// byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas// gyo mo lnga/
64a2(rgyud): ni sngags bzlas te// legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la// sbyor bsgoms pas bsnun na ni// rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs// zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin bsod
64a3(rgyud): nams ye shes las// byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la// bla med byang chub snang bar byed// dngos po don dam mi shes pa// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas// /
64a4(rgyud): ngan par rtogs pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang // dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs// de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs// mi shes pa yis
64a5(rgyud): yongs su brtags// bdag tu 'dzin pa mngon zhen pas// don dam phyi rol byas pa yi// theg pa dman pa pa rnams kyis// bla med byang chub ji ltar 'thob// byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// lhag ma dang
64a6(rgyud): bcas lhag ma med// lhag bcas phung po'ang ba ste// nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs// lhag med bag chags med pa ste// mkha' ltar drim med pa yin// bla med byang chub 'di lta bur// sangs rgyas
64a7(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par bshad// de yi byang chub sbal ba'i phyir// las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin// rnal 'byor can gyis gsang sngags gang // ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du// rtag tu ma nyes byas ma grub pa'i/
64b1(rgyud): zhag sang yis pa shang byas// don pade blag thabs kyis su// char chad nas na sgrub pa bshad// rdo rje lcags brtul po che/ rdo rdzogags pa rab tu byed/ dam bcu gapa brjid me/ rjon bur bu dang 'dri zu
64b2(rgyud): rdo rje zo brdung ba ste// rdo rje nag mo cher 'bab pa// lha rnams kun la 'jigs pa srid / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di// bsgoms nas las la sbyar nan// dmachog rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir// mtshungs pa mang
64b3(rgyud): pa'i las byed de// gsang sngags rig pas hUM zhes pa'i// lcags kyu gtang nas zhabs drung dgrag/ 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sgying las 'grag gad mchog gis ni zhugs pa dang /
64b4(rgyud): rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas// rdo rje phag mos kun tu bsdigs// rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis// gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga po// dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka dang // de bzhin
64b5(rgyud): dpung pa gnyis su gdab// rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon// sdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzugs brnyan mig g.yor gyur pa dang /
64b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab rdzogs pa'i// dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad// 'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi// sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i sgrub
64b7(rgyud): pa thos nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya bas gsol te// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo chen po legs so zhes// zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa// dam pa bshad pa mdzad pa
65a1(rgyud): legs// sems can lan phyir thugs rdza yi// lugs kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs// bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi// ye shes rnying ku'abar ga lags// gsang ma
65a2(rgyud): cad bstan pa yi// rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs// theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na// bla med byang chub bde bar thob// oM badz+ra aM ku sha A~M kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pA sha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra Tak+ki rA dzA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra
65a3(rgyud): muSh+Ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mu ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM/ ye shes kyi snying kus snying po car du gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la'ang bstan par mi
65a4(rgyud): bya'o ngang rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
65a5(rgyud): pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do// oM zhes bya
65a6(rgyud): ba mgor bzhig ste/ a ni bzhin gyi papral// hUM ni bskul nas snying kar gzhag/ ya ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// bzhag nas bsgrims te gdeg byas nas// 'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yaM/
65a7(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad dbab par 'gyur// dbab sdod srul byed gzugs de yi// gzugs kyang po bsams nas sa// rdo rje 'chang ba'i ngadargyal gyis// gsang sngags paskems dang bcas par bzas
65b1(rgyud): brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i 'phreng ba ni/ na maHsa man+tan/ san+yags bad+ha ko n+da nan/ r+b+ha thA/ oM tsa le tsA le tsun+da swAhA/ brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa mang par 'dul ba/ stobs che
65b2(rgyud): pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sna dang / zhags pa bsdams ma/ khro mo chen mo khro mo'i dbang phyug sa drag pa'i gzugs can mA/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ brus
65b3(rgyud): stong ma ma pham ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lnga thams cad kyis phyag
65b4(rgyud): byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i spun gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul
65b5(rgyud): can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUR+Yas brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de dr-i dr-i druM druM/ mr-i mr-i/ ru ru/ sru sru/ ru ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ sa ra sa ra/
65b6(rgyud): mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sa ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da had he/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang /
65b7(rgyud): thag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bral bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / la las skyes
66a1(rgyud): pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+hA ya/ ma ra da ya mar da ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta ba ya/
66a2(rgyud): u pa d+ha ya u pa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ badz+re Na sa ra sa radaN+De na/ mA ra mA ra/ khang+ge na hUM hUM hUM/ tsu tsu tsu/ tritr-i traM/ oM tsa le tsurje sarba sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de ni rdo rjes bskul nas su/
66a3(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu gsil bya zhing / rdo rje bcing ba bskyed par bya'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas oM// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang // 'brel ba'i pad+ma bzhag nas su// A zhes bya
66a4(rgyud): ba brgyad kyis brgyan// dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su// hUM bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya// kham phor kha sbyar nang bcug ste// steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan// sgom zhing gsang sngags bsgral
66a5(rgyud): tshig gis// bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang // ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis// kun nas kyang ni bkri bar bya// 'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i// lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur// sngags la mdzes pa'i
66a6(rgyud): bdag nyi na// la dag dmang ba rje can// 'dod dgas mdang ldan pa'i gzugs// 'dod pa'i lha dang ldan cig bsam/ skragasum ldan pa mang 'thugs shing // man pa las nes na yang gadrug
66a7(rgyud): mi gra ma gyub bas pad // 'ad pas rnying ngag ga sa ya sa// ga da bal ma skye n-i// 'du can du man panags// dza rdza mang ma las brdzur ma/ 'azus nas
66b1(rgyud): 'jug pardo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur// rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir// 'dod chags rdo rje can yang sgom/ me thong las byas cang te rdul// sde'u'i dgas/
66b2(rgyud): pa g.yogs nas ni/ ngos nyid la ni pad+ma bri// bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya// de yi dkyil du bro bris te// mi yi swa yis btags nas ni/ mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi// khro hUM ming nas brjod cing
66b3(rgyud): brdung // lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bris// grwar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma// 'gugs par brtson pa'i lcags kyu bya// gtso bo khrag 'thung cha lugs kyis// gzugs
66b4(rgyud): can gyis ni rting bas brdung // 'dis ni khams gsum rnams gnas pa'i// bu mo zas sbyin 'gugs par 'gyer// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la// gnas pa yis ni nga rgyal gyis// rnal 'byor 'khor
66b5(rgyud): le rdzogs gyur na// tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang // lha dang lha min la sogs// rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed// gang che dbang nyid la gnas pa// de cha thams cad mngag gzhug 'gyur// bltas pa
66b6(rgyud): tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am// de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis bskul nas// rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar// ji lta ji ltar bsgom byas pa// de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed// sbyin sreg de
66b7(rgyud): nyid la gnas pa'i/ me yi lA ni zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams ches// tshis par gyur nas dngos grub stir/
67a1(rgyud): gsang sngags lhag chang gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skong // de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// gtsub shing las ni byung
67a2(rgyud): ba'i me// dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i// me yi las rnams rab sgrub pa// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa// zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa// dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer ba
67a3(rgyud): rdo rje mtshan ma bdag gis brgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+mo gzhag/ ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su/
67a4(rgyud): lag pa gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin sregasbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag/ g.yon du chu yi snod dag go// las kun byed pa
67a5(rgyud): bzlas nas su// bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku sha'i rtse mos gnon po yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyed cing //
67a6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon chur skyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su
67a7(rgyud): gsol// oM sarbA ye/ da pya bya/ A be shes R+R-i shri ma/ dbyig byeg/ ba tsan+da ya~M swaH/ lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te/ mtshani yon mchong pa nas lngang bral// ma ma byas sa nas padapon
67b1(rgyud): gazlas pa me la tshig gsam pa// mdong bani 'ag la ban dang ldas// thod dmar ral pa'i bar rmugs can/ na'i dkyil 'byor la gnas shing // las kyi 'ad bar rnams kyis brgyad// lag pa dang ba
67b2(rgyud): sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor 'bring // g.yon na ril ba sbri blugs te// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la/ drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ 'di lta'i gzugs
67b3(rgyud): ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/ kun nas lan gsum sreg thugs dpral// de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya/
67b4(rgyud): rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs// pad+ma lcags kyu'i
67b5(rgyud): rnam par dag/ me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag/ de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang
67b6(rgyud): swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring ba dang // bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba'o// 'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par spe la// dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang /
67b7(rgyud): dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pas// hUM zhes pa dang par dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang
68a1(rgyud): spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar// sngags grub chog shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha// gang dag yin pa
68a2(rgyud): mchod par bya// sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing // dang po dgang blugs bsreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya//
68a3(rgyud): bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang /
68a4(rgyud): sems can mi shes pas rmongs te// thams cad shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par
68a5(rgyud): brtags// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas pa med// sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan// dam pa'i don du dge spang na// bsod nams
68a6(rgyud): med la ci zhig smos// dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te// chu las rgal ba'i gzings byas nas// de la 'jus te legs rgal na/
68a7(rgyud): bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyis lam ni bskyed byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin// de phyir rnam rtog dra spongs la/
68b1(rgyud): zab mo yini chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta
68b2(rgyud): bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mnos// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdams nas// nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam par
68b3(rgyud): brgyan// rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du gyur// las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i// skyes pa bud med gzugs mngal// brnyas pa nyid du mi bya 'dis// rdo rje lus can dam tshig
68b4(rgyud): yin pa ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yis// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbyung // rdo rje sems ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis// tshig dag rnam par
68b5(rgyud): mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po ste// khrag la rin
68b6(rgyud): chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'dren pa// thub pa skyed mchog don yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen nga yis
68b7(rgyud): bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni// rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs// sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis
69a1(rgyud): gsungs// bshang gci khu ba mchil ma khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhin bsdus pa// sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis// dam tshig bsten par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya//
69a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di ni sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
69a3(rgyud): pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gsang sngags
69a4(rgyud): sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho gas yang dag par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin la// gnas shing sku gsung thugs
69a5(rgyud): bsgoms te// mdun du 'khor lo legs par gzhag/ sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par// bsgom zhing 'khor lo bsgrub
69a6(rgyud): par bya// me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od // 'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur// spyan ni bzlas brjod byed bzhin du// bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya// rgyal chen 'khor lo 'grub pa dag
69a7(rgyud): 'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur// mi 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgom zhing // rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas ni// rim pa bzhin du bskul na
69b1(rgyud): 'dis// sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing // 'bar ba'i 'phreng can mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur// mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du// rdo rje bla med blang bar bya// rdo rje rgyal po blangs
69b2(rgyud): pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur// gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor nas// sems can sems la gnas pa yi// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // 'jig
69b3(rgyud): rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing // kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms nas ni// rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste// sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na// rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur//
69b4(rgyud): rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du// 'od bzang gzi brjid 'bar ba can// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi// nor bu'i rgyal po blangs par bya// lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par
69b5(rgyud): 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin// rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing // sems can kun gyi dbul ba 'joms// gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can// sangs rgyas
69b6(rgyud): zhing du rnam par rgyu// 'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms nas/ pad+ma chen po mdun bzhag ste// rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na// 'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa// 'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba
69b7(rgyud): can pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur// gos dkar can ma'i gsang sngags kyis// yid las byung ba'i pad+ma blang // pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis// 'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur/
70a1(rgyud): chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing // sems can rnams la bdud rtsi stsol// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang byed gtso// bde ba can gyi rgyan du gyur// don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms
70a2(rgyud): nas ngang ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste// rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni// sgom pa 'di nyid kyis bskul na// rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od// ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur// sgrol ma'i gsang sngags
70a3(rgyud): bzlos bzhin du// ral gri bla med blang bar bya// de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas// don yod grub pa gnyis par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing // sems can rnams kyi mi shes gcod// rtag tu dri med
70a4(rgyud): snang gyur te// mu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin// rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che// zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren
70a5(rgyud): mdzad ma// rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI// rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang // lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzad ma// mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma// rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad// de nas bu mo mig yangs ma// lo ni bcu
70a6(rgyud): drug lon pa la// gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan// gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can// gcig cig bsgrims te btsal nas su// lha mo byi dor legs byas te// rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma// las kyi rjes su bsgom
70a7(rgyud): byas nas// bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis// pad+ma la ni rdo rje gzhag/ sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul// gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang // de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yis// mod la sgyu mas dregs myos
70b1(rgyud): nas dang rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab lag/ pad+ma la nas bdud rtsi btung // rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni// 'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs lnga yi// sku ni yongs su 'gyur/
70b2(rgyud): ba 'thob// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun las// thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste// 'dod lnga'i yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i
70b3(rgyud): byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs nas// rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur// grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs// rjes su chags pas/
70b4(rgyud): bde ba yi// rdo rje theg pas bde ba yi// rdo rje theg pas mnyes par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni// lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang // las kyi phyag rgyangs bshad de// de dag las
70b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya dag/ ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas// dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// sna tshogs 'dzin las mdzad par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams/
70b6(rgyud): gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste// chu khams mA ma kI zhes bshad// sgrol ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod// gos dkar can ma
70b7(rgyud): me ru bsgrags// rdo rje dam tshig nam mkha'i dbyings// ston pa rdo rje 'chang bas bshad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so//
71a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang // gsung dang / thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam
71a2(rgyud): pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas
71a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
71a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji
71a5(rgyud): ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o// de ci'i
71a6(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
71a7(rgyud): khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mngon
71b1(rgyud): par mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pa yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
71b2(rgyud): ston pa yin no zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsum phyung nas slar yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i
71b3(rgyud): bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po pas ni/ rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags
71b4(rgyud): so de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no// de nas
71b5(rgyud): byang chum sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin chen 'byung ba dang
71b6(rgyud): don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi mo chub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
71b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72a1(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
72a2(rgyud): kyi ston pa yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems pa de dag gis/ de bzhin
72a3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs
72a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'
72a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems
72a6(rgyud): la gnas so// sems gang la gnas/ gang du'ang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// dkyil 'khor dang / ting
72a7(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / stang stabs dang / 'dug stangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang / slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid
72b1(rgyud): bcu yin par gsungs so// dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dag dang / gsang chen dang / ye shes rnams pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas
72b2(rgyud): bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o// bla mas dam tshig ji ltar lta bar bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o// bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang
72b3(rgyud): lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o// 'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par bya'o// de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par gsang sngags
72b4(rgyud): smra ba nga yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur ro// skyes
72b5(rgyud): bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzad pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sems can la rnams la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bslu bar mi bya'o zhes shes par byas nas
72b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o// gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / migo sbyin pa'i dga' ba spyad pa dang / dka' thub/
72b7(rgyud): ji lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa 'am/ bdud rtsi'i ro thob par mi nus so// rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste bsgom par byas na sdig pa las 'grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
73a1(rgyud): rnams dang / chos bdag med par bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor long du chud par bya'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod
73a2(rgyud): par bya'o// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// bzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskur bas// bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba// gsang zhing sbas te
73a3(rgyud): gzhag par bya// 'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs// rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad bya zhing // de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na// bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis// sems can
73a4(rgyud): thams cad dbang du byed// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
73a5(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa
73a6(rgyud): chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang babs kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
73a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ki ba tsit+ta kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
73b1(rgyud): gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ga shin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
73b2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje
73b3(rgyud): gshed dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gshed dang / mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsartsi ka dang /
73b4(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau rI ste/ de rnams mtshams su'o// de dag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom
73b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes
73b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to// zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yi// gshin rje mthar byed bsgom par bya// bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang // zhe sdang thams cad bsal
73b7(rgyud): ba'i phyir// 'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom// phyir mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang // ra ba dra ba de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa po bdud
74a1(rgyud): 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyis bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges
74a2(rgyud): par phyung ba dbus su ya dang k+She ma med ya ts+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o// ya sogs yi ge dang po las// gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba yin// yi ge k+She ni gti mug brjod// yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs// yi ge ma
74a3(rgyud): ni 'dod chags nyid// yi ge da ni drag dog 'gyur// gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags// yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur// yi gets+tsha las dbyug pa'i gtso// lag na pad+ma ni yig las// lag na ral gri rA las/
74a4(rgyud): yin dang dza las tsartsi ka zhes brjod// yi ge sa las phag gdong ma// yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags// yi ge ru las gau rI dran// Na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi// thod pa bzhi ru 'dod pa yin// sna
74a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba// nam mkha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam// de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed// gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya// shar du gti mug rdo rje ste// lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin// nub tu
74a6(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje ste// de bzhin byang du phrag dog go// mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tsartsi ka sogs rnam par sgom// sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tho ba la sogs rnam par sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/
74a7(rgyud): mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gshin rje gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs
74b1(rgyud): par ba oM d+hUHSh+T+r-i wi wi tA na na hA d+hU rang pa swAt+ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dzin dzig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
74b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa
74b3(rgyud): oM A ro li ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
74b4(rgyud): pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM muD+ga ra d+h+r-i ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM daN+Da d+haka/ de nas
74b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags
74b6(rgyud): gsungs pa/ oM khar+b+ba d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mo ha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
74b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i gis bsngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti
75a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gau rI ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
75a2(rgyud): sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko6
75a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges pa bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la/ in+d+ra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog/ phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa
75a4(rgyud): nyid ngagashin rje gshed ni bsgom par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la// gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa nyid// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/
75a5(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa// gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan// phyag na rin chen bsdams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang byed pa// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i
75a6(rgyud): 'o nga phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa nyid// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la// rin chen marga 'od dang ldan// phyag na shubs can bsnams pa nyid// phram rdo rje rnam bsgom bya//
75a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom
75b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs
75b2(rgyud): rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa'i// phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod
75b3(rgyud): chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rje gshed po las
75b4(rgyud): kun pa// rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso/
75b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje mig dang / rdo rje rna ba dang / rdo rje sna dang / rdo rje lce dang / rdo rje lus dang / rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab
75b6(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i// gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa// gshin rje gshed 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo// skud pa gsar pa legs bsgrims
75b7(rgyud): langang legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis// skud pa shes pas thig gdab po// gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mtshan rnams thams cad rab rdzogs shing // bar chad thams cad rab nyams pa/
76a1(rgyud): zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i ma byung la// rtse mo lnga dang ldan mnyam pa'i// las kyi rdo rje de la bri// rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje de yid dbus/
76a2(rgyud): su bre ngaral gri byang gi phyogs su bri// 'khor lo'i 'od kyis bskor ba yi// 'khor lo shar gyi phyogs su bri// 'od kyi 'phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// rin po che ni lho ru bri// pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs 'dra'i
76a3(rgyud): 'od nga pad+ma nub kyi phyogs su bri// 'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i// shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri// lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya// nub du pad+ma'i me tog ni// yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal/
76a4(rgyud): 'od kyi 'phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// ut+pa la ni byang nub bri// shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste// dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor// 'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgor// byang du rdo rje ral gri'o// shes pas dkyil
76a5(rgyud): 'khor rdzogs pa la// mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis// 'jigs pa med par mngon par mchod/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed
76a6(rgyud): nag po'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
76a7(rgyud): bstod nas gsol ba btab pa// sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi// 'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms dkyil 'khor// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo// mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod/
76b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen ngos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga nges par byung ba/ oM AHhU~M/ rdo rje ma lce sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang // rdzogs pa'i
76b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs// ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid// dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid// tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par/
76b3(rgyud): bsgom// ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms pa// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa// pra ma zhes bya rnam pasam/
76b4(rgyud): byang dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste// rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin// 'dod
76b5(rgyud): chags rdo rje dbang du bya// rdo rje las kyi thams cad du'o// rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis// mi tshil mi yi thod par gzhag/ de bzhin mi sgras sdong bu bya// dur khrod dag tu ngu bsgrub// mig sman dag ni de bzhin du/
76b6(rgyud): mig sman las kyi sgom pa dang // las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// mig sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur// khrag dang gur kum bzung byas nas// sgrub pa byug pa bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// rkang pa
76b7(rgyud): byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa lo// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis// lcags gsum du ni bcug byas na// las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par bya// rkar ta'i lcags kyi ral gri no// las kyi sbyor ba
77a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi rim pa bye ba ste/
77a2(rgyud): le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye ba'i bye ba las/
77a3(rgyud): sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa// nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid
77a4(rgyud): kyis ngang 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/
77a5(rgyud): yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog gam byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bud
77a6(rgyud): med dbang du bya ba dang // srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du// zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste// gro ga'am de bzhin spyug shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas// na ma nams rnam sten la// gnag dang yu can ma yin
77a7(rgyud): pa'i nga kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug/ skud pa dkar pos lam por bcing // shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis// me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor// gshin rje
77b1(rgyud): mthar byed chu shel 'dra// bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// bsgrub bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi// bum pa dkar po zla ba
77b2(rgyud): 'dras// rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te// bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam// oM na maHhriHSh+T+rIHwi kri tAnA na hUM hUM pa pa / de ba dat+ta ya shAn+tiM ku ru nA ma swA hA/ zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// skyes pa
77b3(rgyud): zhi ba'i gur kum gyis// bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang // 'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yi// swA hA sa ming ni brgyan pa yi// bsgrib bya'i ming ni bris byas le// ma re dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni// kham por kha sbyar nang
77b4(rgyud): du gzhug/ skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// me tog ser po dus gsum gtor// byang du kha bltas mdog ser ba'i// gshin rje gshed du bdag nyid bsam// bsgrub bya zla ba ser nag la// bum pa ser pos
77b5(rgyud): bskur bya zhing // dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la// spros las rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kritAn d+hu d+hu phar paT swA hA/ de ba dat+ta puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM pha @
77b6(rgyud): bau ShaT de ba dat+ta s+yo pa puSh+TiM ku ru bo Sha Ta swA hA 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// gro ga'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi// khu ba'am tsan dan dmar po 'am/ srin lag
77b7(rgyud): gi ni khrag kyang rung // yi ge ho yis brten pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// 'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar du// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba gzhag
78a1(rgyud): skud pa dmar po bcings byas la// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// kha dog dmar po che 'bar ba//
78a2(rgyud): zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'o// bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya// rang gi lus las byung ba yi// 'od zer dmar po'i lcags kyu yis// bsgrub bya 'gug par bya bar bsam// sngags ni spro zhing
78a3(rgyud): khri bzlas bya// des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas// rkang pa gnyis su lpags gyur nas// gos bral sgra ni bshig gyur pa// rnam par bsam la bzlas pa brtsam// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// mar
78a4(rgyud): la sogs pa bral byas la// du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mes// 'khor lo de ni sgrub pos bsro// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ho de ba dat+ta ba shi ku ru ho/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phar
78a5(rgyud): swA hA rang bau ShaT de ba dat+ta su la ba sha ma na ya bau ShaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs so// dur khrod gos bsam yang na ni// rang byung gis bskus ras la ni// khrag dang rgya skyegs
78a6(rgyud): bsres pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la// yi ge dza dang yi ge hris// ming ni rnam pa brten byas la// btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod// kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te// skud pa dmar pos bcings
78a7(rgyud): byas la// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// nub ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra dmar// lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi// bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgom bya// snying la lcag
78b1(rgyud): lus pa nas ni// skanas zhugs pas btsungs byas te// gcer bu s+thA ni ma bcings par/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yi// seng ge dmar ba'i sang 'dug la/ rdzas lnga yis ni pas bya zhing // 'os
78b2(rgyud): btsun bsam par bya// gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na// seng ldeng gi na ma mngag la// der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya// brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor la bsro// oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kri tA nan hU~M hU pang par/
78b3(rgyud): hrIHa mu ke A kAR+Sha ya hrIH/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kri tA na na hUM hUM pha pa dzA/ de ba det+ta A kAR+Sha ya dza/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// dur khrod go sa~M la mkhas pas ni// yung
78b4(rgyud): ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// yi ge lam gyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// kham phor kha sbyor nang du ste// kham phor ser po'i steng du gzhag
78b5(rgyud): de la mkhas pas re khA bri// re khA bdun nam yang na bzhi/ mnyam par gzhag pas bri bar bya// ri rab lcog brgyad ces grags pa// de yi steng du mnyam par bri// yi ge hUM dang yi ge ba// ri rab de ni
78b6(rgyud): brten par bya// de yi steng du laM yig lasaHdbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnan pa la// skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// gshin rje gshed po mdog ser po// dbang chen
78b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bsgrub bya ser po rnams bsams la// ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa// phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu// man dar sogs ri bo dag ga sna tshogs
79a1(rgyud): ri bo rnams kyis kyag// bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya// de la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tAn na hUM hUM phar pang / la de ba dat+ta s+tha ne swAm+b+ha ya ku ru laM/ 'di ni bcom
79a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis// de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris la// bsgrub pa'i mang yang bri bar bya// der ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas// oM
79a3(rgyud): Sh+T+r-iHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+ya ya thA srar thA/ kar krit+te nan+ti ba ra ya thA a bi ru pa ke de ba dat+to/ ya dz+nyA dat+ta ya s+ya bA ka staMm+b+ha na ku ru laM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad
79a4(rgyud): gsungs so// shin tu legs par spros pa yis// 'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dag/ gshin rje gshed nag sbyor ba yis// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la//
79a5(rgyud): 'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can// ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang // dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang // tsha ba gsum dang tsha ba'i mar// dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang // da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang // tsan
79a6(rgyud): da li 'bras mdzub mo khrag/ cha sgo can gyis blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang // rab tu ltogs pa'i sbu gu yis// bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can// khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na/
79a7(rgyud): gdug pa can rnams gsang pa'i phyir// sems can gnod pa byed pa'i ming // yi ge hUM gis brten byas la// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i// sbyor bas lho phyogs la bltas te// khre chen rab tu drag
79b1(rgyud): po'i gzugs// rus pas mgo bo rnam brgyan la// ma he la zhugs lce phyung 'dril// gsus pa che la rab 'jigs dang // skrag byed smra 'bar gyen du 'breng / sma ra smin ma de bzhin ser/ kla g.yas
79b2(rgyud): na rdo rje chen po dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gyi dang // gsum pa'i phyag na gri gus go// da ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya// 'khor lo dang nI pad+ma che// thod pa nyid ni g.yon na'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tuganas/
79b3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra// g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag/ rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// ba spu lung nas 'jigs chen po// rang gis bdag po rab 'phro ba/ nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor
79b4(rgyud): steng na ni// zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas// mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis// bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod
79b5(rgyud): gdug pa'i mtshon gyis rgyas pa yis// dri ma can la nad kyis gzir// gos med 'dar zhing nyam chung bas// don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing // mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis// gnag gi thum pos
79b6(rgyud): lus gang ba// grang ba'i rlung gis gtses 'gyur zhing // me yi nang du zhugs pa la// ma he dang ni stag dag dang // khyi dang mchu rings can dag gis// sangs rgyas sde ni mngon 'jig pa'i// sdig po che dag
79b7(rgyud): za bar byed// mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas pa// tsherams lus ni bkang ba dang // rkang pa shing lcags sgrog gis bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas// pags pa dag ni bshus byas nas// de la
80a1(rgyud): tshwa dang ske tshe ba sgras// hUM zhes zer ba bsgom par bya// de yi lus srung la sogs pa// cod pan dag ni mdun du dgod// de yi go cha'ang med byas nas// stong pa'i lus ni mdun du bsam/
80a2(rgyud): rang gi lus byang khro bo ni// gshin rje gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras// de ya~M lus la brgyab nas ni// tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed// de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgoms// lag na dbyig pa stobs po che/
80a3(rgyud): gdug pa can des rdeg par byed// de yi rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba sogs// bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro// sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni// lha ma yin la sogs pas brdeg/ 'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba// snying rje la
80a4(rgyud): gnas sems kyis ni// byed pas 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do// /
80a5(rgyud): e ma ho bsad pa'i yang dag bsad// bsad pa ma yin sdig las bkrol// ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad de// sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis// mnar med la sogs mi skye bas// e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag
80a6(rgyud): bsad pas byang chub thob par byed// sems can gsod pa gsad pa nyid// snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas// e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog/ snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kriHtAn na hUM hUM pharda pa
80a7(rgyud): hUM de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kriHtA na na hUM hUM pha phaT// de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtog ma gsod pa'i rdo rje 'khrul 'khor dang / sngags dang / sman gyis gsang pa la sogs
80b1(rgyud): pa mchoga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la// yi
80b2(rgyud): par gyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri byas la// thod pa la sbyar nang du gzhug/ skud pa sngon pos bcings byas te// nyi ma phyed kyi dus sun// dur khrod sa yi nang du smra/ gshin rjegashed kyi sbyor
80b3(rgyud): ba yis// rta dang ma he zhon pa yis// lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya// khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs// gnyis ka'i phyogs su bsam par bya
80b4(rgyud): gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed// khros shing gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i// stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par bya// bsgom pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM pang pa/
80b5(rgyud): de ba dad+ha ya dz+nyA dat+te bi dwe Sha ya hU~M pha/ 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin// 'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas la// yi ge hUM phad kyis brten pa// zed pa kha sbyar nang
80b6(rgyud): du gzhug/ skud pa nag pos bcings byas la// sha za'i tshul du sba bar bya// gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// mdun du bsgrub bya bsgom par bya// yaM byang gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor
80b7(rgyud): nag po la// de steng mdog sngon rnga mo bsgom// de la gdug pa can bskyon la// lho yi phyogs su la bstan te// khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pa// sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog pa dka'// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA nan
81a1(rgyud): hUM hUM pha phaT/ hUM pang de ba dat+ta u ts+tsha Ta ya naM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltas la// ra khrag me bsregs thal
81a2(rgyud): ba dang // dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang // mar khu smyon pa'i khu ba yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya// gsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas// dbye ba rta dang ma he yi// bskrad pa
81a3(rgyud): rnga mo'i lus la gnas// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo snying khar dbang du bya// ra la skyon pas 'gugs par byed// ri bo'i dkyil du rengs bya gzhag / sha ra ba 'am seng
81a4(rgyud): ges 'gug/ de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya// ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang // kha che yi ni khyad par gyi// dbang du bya ba gro gar bro// dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// kham
81a5(rgyud): phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ kha yi sgro yi swA gu yis// nyi ma phyed na bri bar bya// pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs gsar// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs gsang sngags bzlas// lho byos
81a6(rgyud): gnas tin gcang bya// mtha' yo ya bor 'a ba la// mi ge ni de gnyis ka dang // phyi gnas kyil ci ya spangs te// yig lhag ma ci bde bar/ mngon du bsan pa khrims bya// 'das ni las rnams rab bsgrub
81a7(rgyud): pang yegs rdo sa bya bas// gshin rjeg shed byirnal 'byor pas// rab tugrags pa'i 'thar ma 'di// yi gar bris nas gnas pa dang // 'char la thos nas gnas pa yi// khyim darang 'ayab ma tas tu 'byung /
81b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs pashin rjegashed nag pa'i rgyud las 'phrul 'khor gyi go rims bri ba zhes bya ste rim par bye ba lta ba'o// de nas bcom ldan
81b2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rdul po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ nga gis rdo rjenan mnyes pa// zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rdul 'byor nas// rdo rje byag rgyas rgyas btab pas// dngas sgrub cu chen papa par
81b3(rgyud): byeng nga de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// 'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags so// dkyil 'khor rgyan lha kun gyi/ dbul gshin rje gshed po bsgom// rtab tu dkyil 'pher bri bar bya// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis kyang
81b4(rgyud): ga/ dag su ma tshag dag kyang gzung // rlom pa dag kyang yang dag gzung / dang po lan cid pan byung // gnyis par la sbyin par bya// gsas pad rdul bu dang / sgrub bapa' ba ban pa ste/ banapa
81b5(rgyud): ga/ langs byu ba sa/ yang dag gnas/ la ba'i ma sa kya ma ma na #
81b6(rgyud): nas sa
81b7(rgyud): sa// ma se sa sa
82a1(rgyud): par byas// ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya// dkyil 'khor rim gsum bya ba ni// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bris pa la// sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya/
82a2(rgyud): brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis par// grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do ma ya/ ya me do rA/ Na yod ya/
82a3(rgyud): yang yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yan+na ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phar phar/ dkyil du ya byas shar drak+She// lho ru 'jam po'i rdo rje ste// yi ge me ni nub tu bri/ byang du dan 'da' ba ni// bsgrub bya'i ming ni sbyin bya ba
82a4(rgyud): mtshams kyi stob pa dag tu'o// hUM gnyis kyis ni brten byas la// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ya tsa ni ra dzas do ru/ na yo ni ra la sogs pa// phyi rol rim par g.yon brtsams bri// don
82a5(rgyud): kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// rim pa gsum pa de la ni// kun tu cha re bor ba la// shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags// de yi bar dag thams cad kyi// cha brgyad
82a6(rgyud): bor ba dag la bri/ a mra kashwa ru/ un+daT+Ta ya ba shaM ku ru/ bi d+ha Sha ya/ shAn+te ku ru/ puT+Ti kra rba/ 'di ltar g.yon nas ni// las deng rjes su mthun par ni/ phyag 'tshal na ma tha ma'i bar// tha mar po
82a7(rgyud): Ta dang // hUM pa dang ldanas bon gyis// zhi nga rgyas dang mthar dbang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rnam par bri bar zhes bya
82b1(rgyud): bste rim par phye ba drug pa'o// / khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug skem pa yi// phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'o// mkhas pas tsa rtsi ka bsgom bya/
82b2(rgyud): 'chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma// rab sngo phyug na rdo rje bsnams// mkhas pas phag mo bsgom par bya// shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir// zhal gsum phyag
82b3(rgyud): drug dam rab la// zhi bo phyag na pad+ma bsnams// dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// khu ba dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri bsdams// nor bram rgad 'dra ba ni/
82b4(rgyud): go ri mkhas pas bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed po gsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di gsungs so//
82b5(rgyud): oM tsartsi ke sid d+hen+na nI la ha ri Ni rat+na tra ya a pa ka ri tse ru d+hi ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na// la gdangs pa dag byas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum gyi khrag chen po// 'gugs par
82b6(rgyud): 'di la the tsom mod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa/
82b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra g+ho che ston su badz+ra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ ke tu kAr+ya/ A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa la mdzes nyer byas la// kun ma'i sgra ni rten bzhag ste/
83a1(rgyud): sngags ni rjes su dran par bya// sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di// pa ta mchod rten bdag tu bstan// dal gyis dmigs nas 'dab par bya// chang ni 'grags par rab tu grags/
83a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM paM tsu pi
83a3(rgyud): tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar+d+ha naM swA hA/ tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste// kun tu zla ba nya yi bar// sbyar ba'i skad ni smra bar bya// ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas/
83a4(rgyud): rtag tu tshigs bcing brgya zin 'di// ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed
83a5(rgyud): rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i go ra'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM A kaR+Sha Ni AR+Sha tsi gau ro hrIHduSh+TA ya duSh+TA ya/
83a6(rgyud): shu kra ma A ka rA ya dza dza dza hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ pad+ma la dang rdo rje dang // dril bu lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor gyis// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// khu ba'i tshogs ni 'gugs par byed// nag kyi nang ngam dben pa ru/
83a7(rgyud): las 'di dag ni bskul byas nas// nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni
83b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thubs nas/ dbang bskur ba mchos gi dam tshig 'ang nyid kyi sku gsung brags rdo rnarnams las phyung bar mdzad do// mdus par man dar/ ba dza takA zung dang / 'a/
83b2(rgyud): ka li 'phreng ba ni/ bu khyong brang la byin gyis rlobs/ ril gyi chen pos khams gsum pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// las kyiral gringam pa 'di/
83b3(rgyud): bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di// long la slob ma yang dag gzung // btung ba rin po che 'dis ni/ rdo rje lus ni rab tu sgrub// kun tu ma
83b4(rgyud): shes bu khyod kyis// 'thung zhig ye shes las byung ba// slob ma'i khar yang blugs bye ba// gshin rje gshed kyis bsgrub pa yin// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches// shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya// de bzhin
83b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/
83b6(rgyud): srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba'i byed// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang // gdug pa can dag bsal phyir gsungs// dpal ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed// ral gri 'bar
83b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid kyis// rig pa gsum las mchod par byed// sems can thams cad spyod pa yi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// ga shin rje gshed kyi dkyil
84a1(rgyud): 'khor ni// slob dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor bri// gos kyis gdong ni bcings byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdun sgor gzhag khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad bri// skal bzang bdag ces tshig
84a2(rgyud): tu brjod// gsol btab pa yi blo bzang la// yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya// dbang bskur don du gus chen pos// de nas lan gsum ched du brjod// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpa'
84a3(rgyud): dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing // mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod// de bzhin khrus dang byug pas kyang // slob ma dad pas blug par bya/
84a4(rgyud): de la bstod pas kun kyang bya// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngags gsungs pa// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM pra dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma
84a5(rgyud): ko&haM/ zhi ba la sogs byed pa yi// sbyin sreg de nas bshad par bya// sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// zhi bzhi pa'i sems kyis te// skyes pa rgyas pa'i sems
84a6(rgyud): kyis so// dbang yang der gtad sems kyis te// gsang dang bskrad pa la yong ngo // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa ste// rgyas pa yin rdzing bu 'dra// dbang du bya ba zla gam ltar// nam mkha'i khams
84a7(rgyud): 'dra bas ni gsad// zhi ba khru gang tshad dra ste// de bzhin rgyas pa'i khwa do pa// ji ltar rgyas pa de ltar dbang // gsang pa la ni sor nyi shu/ zhi pa steng du khu byed chad// rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste/
84b1(rgyud): sor lnga gnyis ni gsad pa la// dbang la je ltar de bzhin dgrag/ chos gcig la ni zhi ba bya// zla ba nyal rgyas pa ste/ bcu bzhi la ni mngon spyod do// dbang gi las ni chas brgyad lam/
84b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rjegashed nag po'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi tshi ga rim par phye ba sa brgyad pa'o// / rgyamatsho'i sa ni thung byas la/
84b3(rgyud): k+Sha yi gzugs shig brtsams byas te// yi ge hUM pu snying khar ni// hrI d+hIHla sogs bzlas pa bya// char ni mi 'bab d+mas dag tu// bzlas pa ni byas 'bab par 'gyur// sbrul nag pa yo sha dang
84b4(rgyud): ni rnam pa'i lo ma dang bsras la// de la ril bu byas nas ni// brtul zhugs ma gyis rgya mtshor gzhug/ sngags kyi bzlas pa khri byas na// mtsho rlabs rengs byed mchog yin no// can dan
84b5(rgyud): 'bras bu brgya blangs la// 'bras dang mar shas bsres byas te// 'bum phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la// sbyin sreg byas na lha mthong 'gyur// dur khrod ro bsreg yog pa'i shing // brtul zhugs
84b6(rgyud): can gyis gzugs su bri/ spyong ba'i khu bas bsku byas la// sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thebs 'gyur// grub pa'i yungs kar drangs byas na// 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na// sbrul
84b7(rgyud): gyis bzung nas 'gyel ba la// gtor ma 'tsho bar the tsom med/ rig shong chu yis blangs la// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas// mgo la bslus pa tsam gyis ni// mgo yi nang ni nyis
85a1(rgyud): par byed// sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i// lag pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni// mgo ni zug gzer 'byung mi 'gyur// de ni 'di ltar the tsom med// bram ze yi ni sha
85a2(rgyud): dag la// dur khrong sa dang thal ba las// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la// rdo rje chen po g.yas pa na// de bzhin mi mag g.yon pa na'o// mdog ni dkar po
85a3(rgyud): cher 'jigs pa// de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lnga yis// nyin re bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// bdag gi dgra bo choms shig ces// rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ma ga ba//
85a4(rgyud): nub mo de skad brjod pas nya la// dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur// chu 'gags la sogs pas gzir zhing // yang na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// dgra yi bai re tsa na blang // mi yi rkang sbubs
85a5(rgyud): yongs bkang ste// rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na// shing rtser rgyu ba'i yi dgas mtshungs// lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
85a6(rgyud): cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni/
85a7(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sgrub po bzang po kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i// bzang po mgong rma med la// shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la// phab la legs par bkru bya ste/
85b1(rgyud): der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can// e mthong mtshar sngags kyi mthu// bsam pa chen po'i 'dod 'bod// gshin rje ga shed rnal 'byor ldan pa'i// yid kyis cung zad 'jigs mi bya/
85b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa// de kun thams cad ster bar byed// ma he dang ni ku be ra// stag dang de las gzhan pa dang // dom dang spre'u dag la ni// khyi dag gi ni khyad par dang // dug dang sa che chu dang ni//
85b3(rgyud): de bzhin cha gsum so ban dza// 'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya// gshin rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de la rnal 'byor pas gsol gdab// hrISh+T+rIHla sogs sngags kyis ni// che ge mo
85b4(rgyud): de dag la stsol// de yi pha yis ster bar byed// gal te rnal 'byor pha ma phyir// rmi lam gshin rje gshed brdeg cing // lho yi phyogs su khyer bar byed// sad nas de yi pha yis ster// zhal gsum
85b5(rgyud): phyag drug 'jigs pa la// in+d+ra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog/ tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs can// phyag tu tho ba dgod par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// mdog dmar po ste khros pas 'jigs/
85b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mjed// mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la// 'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yi// phyag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams// pad+ma zhes bya
85b7(rgyud): mkhas pas bsgom// zhal gsum phyag drug ldang khu ste// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi// las kun byed par gyur pa'o// ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya// b+ha gar ling ga rnam bsgom nyid// dkyil
86a1(rgyud): 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom// zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// gti mug rjes dran bsgom par bya// gti mug rjes dran la dmigs nas// phra ma rjes dran bsgom par bya/
86a2(rgyud): phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// 'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya// 'dod chags rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// phrag dog dran bya brtul zhugs can// so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni// ba spu'i
86a3(rgyud): khung nas spro bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gtum po'i khro bo bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lha mo bzhi po rab bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
86a4(rgyud): gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ rjes su dran pa rim par byed pa ste bcu pa'o// / zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugs su/
86a5(rgyud): bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang du mdzad// zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed// gti mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dbang mdzad/
86a6(rgyud): gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad// 'gro ba phra mas mnan mthong nas// phra ma gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad// phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad// 'dod chags kyis
86a7(rgyud): mnan 'gro mthong nas// 'dod chags gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad// phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// phrag dog
86b1(rgyud): gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas// phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad// byams pa tsa rtsi kar gsungs te// snying rje de bzhin phag mo'o// dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste/
86b2(rgyud): btang snyoms gau re'i gzugs so// bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis// rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyis// rnal 'byor snying kha'i sa bon spro// 'grub par 'di la the tshom med// de nas da ni bshad bya
86b3(rgyud): bang spyod pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ gshin rje gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis// sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'grub// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// ma he mchog ni bkug la zhon// sbrul nag gis ni
86b4(rgyud): brgyan par bya// lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya// skra yang ser po dag tu bya// gyen mdzes pa yi khyad par gyis// mgo la thod pas yang dag bskor// sma ra lkog spu ser por bya// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs
86b5(rgyud): sngags brjod cing // lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor// rdo rje gshin rje gshed sbyor bas// seng ge'i sgra yang de la bya// nus pa cung zad skyes pa ni// rol cing grong du 'jug par bya// gar dang bde ba'i cha kun
86b6(rgyud): gyis drug las skyes sogs glu blang bya// de nas rgyal mtshan khams mthong na// der ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya// 'o ma la sems gcig goms pas// phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya// phag mo yi ni gzugs gzung
86b7(rgyud): ba'i ra btsun mo kun la 'khyud pa yis// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyad// 'dod pa'i doran kun rab tu 'grub// de nas da ni bshad bya ba// phyag rgya ma ni rab sgrub thabs// gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig/
87a1(rgyud): de yi bzlas pa mngon bshad bya// yi ge hri las byung ba yi// ma he yang dag bsgom bya ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// ma he steng du bsgom par bya// gang yang cung zad
87a2(rgyud): gcod cing 'bigs// mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs de na// ma he sna tshogs sgrub pa yi// blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dbyig pa gshin rje gshed sgrub thabs//
87a3(rgyud): yi ge hrI ri gsang sngags che// ma he chen po la bcibs pa// phyag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag/ sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskus// ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus// gser gyi sa gzhi thug par mnan/
87a4(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ bye ba'i phyag can sgrub pa'i thabs// yi ge hrI las byung ba'i gtso// wi kr-i tA na gsang sngags che// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ha hA hi hi hu hU he he ho ho haM haHphaT swA hA/
