114a6(rgyud): tshig gi sngags so// oM badz+ra be ga/ rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so// oM badz+ra a sa me tri sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA// yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra sa mA dza/ 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so//
114a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya ya ma rA dzA sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya phaT phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o// shAn+ti ku ru swA hA
114b1(rgyud): zhi bar skul ba'o// puSh+Ti ku ru sA hA/ rgyas pa'i 'o// ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o// mA ra ya par/ gsad pa'i'o// uts+tsha Ta ya sAhA/ bslang pa'i 'o// swa b+ha ya hUM la/ mnan pa'i 'o// A kaR+Sha ya hA
114b2(rgyud): wa dgug pa'i 'o// oM mu/ slar dgrol ba'i sngags so// A li kA li grong khyer ni// gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste// las kyi btson ra dag kyang yin// yi ge btu ba med na ni// gsang sngags
114b3(rgyud): sgra ni log par 'gyur// yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na// gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur// gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na// sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur// drang ba dag ni ma byas na/
114b4(rgyud): shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// yi ge bsre ba ma byas na// bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur// bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub// rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni// lha min g.yul las pham pa dang /
114b5(rgyud): dbang po dgra yis bsad bzhin no// 'khor lo spo ba ma byas na// cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur// rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang // dad pa brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// dpal
114b6(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga'o// rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// las kyi 'grogs kyis byed pa ste// zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin/ rgyas pa de
114b7(rgyud): bzhin mig tu bsgrags// dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste// dbang du bya ba rig byed yin// dgug pa'i las la de bzhin mda'// bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po bzhin// mnan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa
115a1(rgyud): yis nga gsang pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod// las rnams de dag re re yang // 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste// nyi ma gnyis po gtor ma sbyin// gsum pa bzlas
115a2(rgyud): pa rnam par 'bad// bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya// lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor// drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya// bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskang // grangs kyi las la khyad par du// las
115a3(rgyud): kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i// 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi// las kyi bye brag 'di shes na// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// rgyas pa yon tan drug dang 'byor// dbang gi mos pa rnam par
115a4(rgyud): bsgyur// dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed// mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed// gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du// sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la// dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste// gal te yid/
115a5(rgyud): gnyis za gyur tam// bsam pa 'gyur ram dad pa nyams// de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang // phyir bzlog 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dad pa brtan par bsgrubs pas na// nam mkha' med par gyur na
115a6(rgyud): yang nga sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid// lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i// rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na// 'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi// gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni// ma byung
115a7(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// don la the tshom med pa yi// mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye// rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba// de la grub pa'i dngos grub ring // mnangs/
115b1(rgyud): dam pa bstar byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis tha gyur na// de la dngos grub ring bar bshad// bla mas mar ngag sbas byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing // bla ma'i phan ngag dam pa zhes// gces
115b2(rgyud): spras byas na 'grub par nges// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir// bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces// bsnyen bkur byas pas nus mthu che// gsang ste brjod pas bar chad
115b3(rgyud): medang yon tan phul ba byas pas ni// rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur// rin chen gnyis las grub par 'byung // dkon par gyur na bsngags pa brjod// bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te/
115b4(rgyud): bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang // gang gis bsngags pa ma byas na// de la 'dod don mi ster ro// dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos// dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma// dad pa bla ma
115b5(rgyud): dad pa pha// dad pa lam cher dad pa gru// dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste// dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid// dad pa bsod nams nor yin te// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang sems dad pa skyed pa'i phyir//
115b6(rgyud): gzhan la gus pa mchog tu bkur// rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni// ru sbal 'o ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang //
115b7(rgyud): 'jis pa skam po nyid dang ni// de bzhin ma yi khu ba dang // sgra sdang gi ni rdzas dag dang // 'di rnams cag tu dpyad na ni// rang bzhin gyis nind med cing // tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang / rtag tu yang tshad dul
116a1(rgyud): bab dang lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// 'di la dpyad par mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub// ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// las kyi rnam smin skyong bar byed/
116a2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten// chos gcig skya rengs shar ba ni// snod la ma reg ru sbal zho// drod ma yal bar btung ba 'am// yang ma nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // mar gyi
116a3(rgyud): bo'i chos gcig la// 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni// de nyid nas ni gzung bar bya// zhag gsum chu yis char pa btang // lo ma de bcad bza' bar bya// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // 'jim pa skas po
116a4(rgyud): sbyar nas ni// zheg gsum chu yi nang du spang // de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas// phyi ma byi la'i spar tshad re// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas// sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya// mi yi sdong po ser po ni// sa yi//
116a5(rgyud): mar gyis gril nas ni// kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas na// me chus yis btsir nas ni// btung ba'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // lan tshwa bral ba dag la ni// zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas// nam gyi dus la
116a6(rgyud): sngags pas blang // cha gsum snod du zhag gsum gzhag/ kha yi cha ni byugs pa ste// dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid// rtsa ba'i cha ni dor ba ste// 'di rnams so sor bsten pa na// tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/
116a7(rgyud): byi la'i spar tshad de dang sbyar// ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med// tshogs par bsten nas bza' bar bya// re re bsten yang nyes pa med// dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
116b1(rgyud): nad med rnams kyi byang chub grub rtags bshad pa'o// / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung
116b2(rgyud): thugs// rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// lho phyogs rgya mtsho bar brgal nas// de nag shin rje'i grong khyer ni// ga la ba yi gnas su byon// mi bad zhabs ni bcu drug
116b3(rgyud): gis lcags mkhar sgo mang bcu drug brdzis// ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis// dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis// de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas// ha ha hi hi sgra sgrogs pas// chos kyi rgyal
116b4(rgyud): bo la sogs pa// gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dpa' bo chen po ga la ci// dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi// bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams// tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bo bzhes// lha ma
116b5(rgyud): yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul ba ni// gshin rjes la phul ma mos ma// srin po sar phul gnod sbyin sde// mi yis na phul sa bdag sa// bcan gyis rtsa phul bdud kyis da// de rnams gcig tu dril
116b6(rgyud): ba ni nga bran du yang ni las blangs so// gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir// ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang // bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas// lha yi bsnyen pa rab chung nas// sngon gyi thugs dam las mi
116b7(rgyud): 'da'// mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do// ya ma rA dzA sa do ma ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ yang ro ni ra ya kA ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM hUM pa pang/ de skad smras pa dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// chos kyi
117a1(rgyud): rgyal po la sogs pa// gshin rje bo zhal sogs kun// sgrol ba'i gang du byin gyis brlabs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // 'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgog// wA brgya ngas
117a2(rgyud): mtha' ma la// nga yis bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis// zhes pas dam bcas pas dang // mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro// gtam
117a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// / bya/ rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri kriSh+Na karma sarba tsakra sid+d+ha ka ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo
117a4(rgyud): las tham cad 'grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
117a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang
117a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ma dang / yon tan gyi 'phreng ba ma dang / sems can gyi rgyang tshim par byed pa ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri
117a7(rgyud): chab ma dang / de la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas lha mo be ta li stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
117b1(rgyud): 'das da lta 'din gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pana'ang theg pa chen po pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang 'tsho bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na du rnams/
117b2(rgyud): ji ltar char gcad par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying po 'byung ngo //
117b3(rgyud): hri dam thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhabs drug pa'i nga bar gyur nas/ ma he ru gnyis pa la brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chungs bcas par/ e hrI Sh+T+r-iHwi bi ta na na hA ma
117b4(rgyud): swAh+ma zhes zhal bzhad pa dang bcas pas/ oM gsung zhing mnan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud thams cad kyis skrag cing 'dar ba dang bcas pas 'dud par 'gyur to// tshangs pa dang
117b5(rgyud): dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi// rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs pa// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka
117b6(rgyud): sprul to// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la// bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni// drug drug ldan par gyur pa sgom// zhabs kyang de dang 'dra ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni/
117b7(rgyud): rdo rje thob g.yas gnyis na// ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang // dang por zhags pa'i sngags mdzub ldan// gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu mtha' mas bsdams// steng zhal nag po/
118a1(rgyud): rab 'jigs pa// zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste// brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas// stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris shing // seng ge sa ral ral pa ni// rkyen 'greng
118a2(rgyud): 'dus te spyi bor yang // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par bcings// 'di ni khro bo tshol pa ste// lag cha sna tshogs dag dang ldan// shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la// gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang /
118a3(rgyud): dkar dang ser dang dmar ba yang // de bzhin bzhi pa ljang khu ste// g.yas kyis 'khor lo rin chen 'bar// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste// g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin// mtshams su laM sogs la skyes
118a4(rgyud): pa nga lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam// bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin// grwa yi lha mo mtshams la ni// lA s+ye mu ti kur ldan no// rin chen 'phreng ba phyag gnyis bsnams// pi wang sgrog pa'i gsung
118a5(rgyud): dbyangs can// gar gyis rgyas par 'gro ba yi// don la rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bdug spos sogs dang bzhi po yang // rang gi mtshan ma nges par 'dzin// phyag rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas so// de
118a6(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM dzi na dzi ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
118a7(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungs pa ni ser na rdo rje'o// oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs so// oM A ro li ka ste 'dod chags rdo rje'o//
118b1(rgyud): das masas na 'am pa mags pathams kyang kyi dag pas pa bang sdugs 'dagasams / sa 'a bas ldan nas shA gas
118b2(rgyud): bdag pa 'de ba shegs pas rdo rdza'i thams pade gsungs so// kha can d+hu/ de nas yang sacom ldan 'das pazhin ga shegs pa thams car bdag pas rje'i thags 'di gsungasas// sanas
118b3(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ma rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// pAN+Da ra trA~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
118b4(rgyud): rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// tA ra a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas bde ba chen po skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// lA s+ya/ de nas yang yon
118b5(rgyud): tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so// mA le/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs can ma skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// gI ti/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gar ma'i sngags
118b6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// nr-i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa/ oM badz+ra dI pa/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'gugs
118b7(rgyud): par byed pa'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcings pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dges par byed pa'i sngags rnams
119a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra a ku sha dzang / oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra a be sha ho/ blo ldan
119a2(rgyud): mkhas pas ci nus kyis// thig gis thig ni gdab pa la// tshad ldan 'jur bdud med pa dang // gsher zhing gsar pa mdzes pa yis// shar du bltas te gdab par bya// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab
119a3(rgyud): pa yang // lho ru bltas te gdab par bya// de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa// byin zar gnas te dbang ldan blta// rlung gnas bden bral la bltas te// nub du legs par bri bar bya// de nas shar du kha
119a4(rgyud): bltas te// byang du bris te byin zar gnas// bden bral min pa'i mtha' ma gdab// blta ba bden bral phyogs su'o// slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni// ri dgas zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste// mtshams
119a5(rgyud): thig dang po gdab par bya// gnyis pa'ang bden bral phyogs 'dug ste// bgegs phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya// dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba yi// gzhal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gru bzhir bgyi zhing
119a6(rgyud): sgo zhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi// dbus kyi rtsibs brgyad lte ba la// rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// gri gug kyang ni bri bar bya// shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste// rin chen
119a7(rgyud): lho mo phyogs rtsibs la// pad+ma dmar po nub du bri/ byang du rdo rje kun tu rtse// shar lho phyogs su'ang de dang 'dra// grwa bzhir rgyal po'ang gnyis bcig tu// mtshan ma rnams ni legs par bri// sgo bzhi dag tu bri ba
119b1(rgyud): yab dang lcags kyu zhags pa sgrog dril bu// gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par bri// mchod pa legs par dgram par bya// khu tshur dku gnyis gzhag pa dang // de bzhin dpral bar zhug pa dang // kha nas 'byin
119b2(rgyud): dang gar bskyod dang // bdug spos nyug dang me tog 'thor// mthe bong bsgreng ste rang lus la 'am// gzhan la zhug tshul gnas pa ni// brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag/ bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin//
119b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang // rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma
119b4(rgyud): ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ mge sogs byin gyis brlab pa la// gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis gsungs// dbang sbubs stong pa nyid byas te// snying po 'am ming gi yi gi yis/
119b5(rgyud): rigs kyis phyag mtshan bsnams pa yi// sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdag bdud rtsi myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
119b6(rgyud): zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ dag cing 'bar ba rnam brtags te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag po ste// zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam// rin chen dbus su
119b7(rgyud): bsam pa yang // ser na nyid du bsam par bya// pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam// sna tshogs dbus su phrag dog bsam// bsam bya ldag la sa bon te// 'phros pas bkug ste tshim par bya// shar ni dkar po
120a1(rgyud): chen po ste// lho na ser po nyid du'o// nub ni dmar por nges par shes// byang ni ljang khur yang dag ldan// de las de bzhin ga'i rim// dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i chan yang // byangs/
120a2(rgyud): dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// tshad med pa yi rim pa yis// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams// yod min med min gnyis ka min// gnyis ka min pa'ang
120a3(rgyud): ma yin te// spros bral ngo bo med par sgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ raM las nyi ma rnams bsgoms te// de dbus las kyi rdo rje ni// kun tu rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te// de dbus hUM las rdo rje ni//
120a4(rgyud): kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste// ra ba gur dang sa bzhi yang // de yi 'og tu nges par sgom// gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni// shin tu gsal bar bdag gis dmigs// zhe sdang las ni sngar ma byung // byung
120a5(rgyud): zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang // gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med// le lo bcom zhing khro ba med// ser sna med de g.yo yang med// sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang /
120a6(rgyud): gcig tu theg pa che la gzhol// de ni dka' ba med par yang // gzhan gyi don du 'di brtsams na// grangs ni bye ba tshang ba yis// bcu bzhir tshang ba'i gsang sngags kyis// las rnams kun grub the tshom med//
120a7(rgyud): yang lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu// yi ge rnams ni ji ltar bri// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdun chan bdun dang ldan pa yi// ro mig
120b1(rgyud): lags par bri bar bya// las can byed pa'i 'char mal// mdzad pa yis pa legs mchad la// da' ba las rnams bcam par bya/ bzlas pa'i mtshan ma thalasams// radan sa pa byung ba ngas/
120b2(rgyud): kya dang 'khrul 'khor rnams ni bri bya ba'i// rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te// tshal chen drug pa'i gling dag dang // lha lang mchod rten gzhal yas su// dam pa rnams dang nges zad de// dbang bskur mal
120b3(rgyud): 'jog pa dang // rgya mtshor bcas pa'i chun la lam// klaklo bran du 'khor zin// nges par 'grub ste 'khor la za// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa gsungs te// ya
120b4(rgyud): las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor// sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la// ba dan ldan par nges par bsam// raM las byang ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor// gru gsum po bsam par bya// baM las byung ba chu yin te//
120b5(rgyud): dkar po zlum po bsam par bya// laM byung sa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ljang ser gru bzhi bsam byas te// sngon du bsam bya ltar rim bzhin// tar phyin nas nges par bsam// bruM las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i
120b6(rgyud): rtsibs// drug nyid ldan pa'i lte ba la// bruM las gzhal yas khang pa ste// gdan dang ldan par sgrub pos bsam// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bde bar
120b7(rgyud): gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas par bsdu bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa mA dzaH/ lag ngar gnyis ni nges bsnol la// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te// se gol brdab cing brdung bar bya// lcags kyu la
121a1(rgyud): sogs rnam pa bzhis// nges par dgug pa la sogs bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so//
121a2(rgyud): oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ pra ba ra sad kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ nag por ri med pa yi/ bum pa lto ni bre tshang ba// mchu 'phyang mgrin ring gdan ldan par// snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzhug/ mgrin par ras bzang dag gis dkri// 'dab
121a3(rgyud): mar ldan pa'i lcug ma yang // dri dang ldan pa'i kha rgyan te// bdud rtsir ldan pa yis kyang mchod// bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // ba dan sil snyan rol mo yis// gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang
121a4(rgyud): mchod// 'dzam bu'i gling ngam gling gzhan dag/ nor bu rin chen bkang ba yang // stong gsum la sogs de bzhin te// zhum pa med par byas te dbul// blo ldan sgrub pos sems can la// phan pa'i sems
121a5(rgyud): kyis srog mi gcod// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod pa ma spyad brdzun mi smra// gnod pa'i rgyud phyir chang mi btung // gdug pa rnams la bzlog ste bya// dngos su'am yang na sngags dang gzhan// 'khrul
121a6(rgyud): 'khor dang ni ting nge 'dzin// sman gyis kyang ni bya ba ste// de ltar mi byed de yi ni// nges par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// gdon dang log 'dren dag gis kyang // nges par 'chi ste dmyal bar ni// yun rangs
121a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis sdug ste// de bas nam tan ldan pa ru// bzod pa mi bskyod snying rje yis// sngags kyis nges par gsad par bya// mi ldog pa yi sems su gnas// byang chub chu yis ra ro zhing // shes rab
121b1(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa yi// phyag rgya tshal de gzhol te// ngo bo dang bral dngos po 'jig/ ma byin byang chub blang ba la// brtson pas le la dor bar bya// brdzun du shes bya dngos po rnams// de nas de bzhin gzhan la/
121b2(rgyud): brjod// rgyas btab pa yi dngos po la// rgyab shig shes rab ral gri yis// bcad cing rnam pa med pa la// bsad pa yang ni nga yis bsgrags// u med pa yi yi ge rnams// steng gi g.yas phyogs
121b3(rgyud): nyid nas bri// 'og gi yi ge bri ba ni// de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri// A li kA li des bris te// k+Sha ma gtogs par dbus stong ste// de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma 'am// ming srog nges par bri ba
121b4(rgyud): yang nga lto ba'i nang du chud par bri// 'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba// grwa bzhi dag tu bri ba ni// ma ning 'dod pa'i kA li dang // A li min te lhag ma yin// gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po// ming dang bcas
121b5(rgyud): par phyogs bzhir bri// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis// bzhi pa gcig gi mgo stengs su// gsum skor nyid ni shis pa yin// las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo de// 'dri bar byed pa'i spyi dus dang // khyad
121b6(rgyud): par dus ches lha yaM ni// rnal 'byor med pas bya ba min// phyogs su blta ba'i bye brag gis// las kyi sgrub pos shes par bya// las kun byed pa'i 'khor la na// bde gshegs kun gyi snang ba ste/
121b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'ang yin// 'khor lo 'dir ni bcug pa gang // sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig padam chos spong ba'ang de bzhin zhe// 'khor los sbyar ba'ang dbang du 'dra// lha
122a1(rgyud): sin pra ti'ang zhi bar byed// dgra bcom gsod pa'ang re zhi la// brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du nges// de lta bu yi 'khor med// thog mar bris nyid 'og tu// byin brlabs ma nor de nyid/
122a2(rgyud): la rang mchod pa gus par bdag gis bya// mchod min las rnams byed pa la// 'bras bu 'byung min 'khrul pa la'ang // 'bras med ngal ba nyid yin no// yang lha mo ro langs ma nyid stan las
122a3(rgyud): langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// 'khor lo 'dri ba'i sna tsha gang // bri gzhi sbu gu ji lta bu// gcig gam 'on te de tha dad // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
122a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar// bri ba'i gnas dang
122a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i gnas// tha dang de bzhin 'khor lo sgrub// snag cha tha dang 'bru rnams bzhin// grong khyer chen po bsrung 'dod dam// skyes pa bsrung bar 'dod na yang // sro ga de bzhin u b+hi shun// zla gor na
122a6(rgyud): sha'i shun pa 'am// ras la kha chis 'khor lo no// bskal ba'i tshig dang ldan par ro// som btang ba'i lam por du// spang ma radag dbus 'khor lo gzhug/ srud pa dkar pos legs par dkri// nang
122a7(rgyud): par shar du la bltas te// me tog dkar po dag gis mchod// bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsam// mdun du skyes pa zla ba la// mtha' dag gnas par ngur du bsam// sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa
122b1(rgyud): yis dud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis// mu nur dag gis dbang bskur te/ de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya// sAr+b+ba'i sngon du bskul tshig ldan// bud med la nag ru wang s+ya// phyi rol mtshangs bzhir
122b2(rgyud): yis bgags bslang sbeng du bla re bre// phye ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin no// bre brag tu yang skyes pa 'am// bud me zhi bar 'dod na yang // gapum can dan dag gis ni// shir sha shing gi shun pa la// 'khor mo yin
122b3(rgyud): legs bris te// shar du nang par bltas te mchod// las kun byed pa'i thab la yang // sngon gsungs zhal ldan dgod par bya// phyi rol mtshams bzhir bur ba yis// bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bre// bum pa
122b4(rgyud): kha rgyan dang ldan zhing // rin chen 'bru dang sman du ldan// dri zhim chu dang ldan par bya// gos bzang gis ni mgrin pa dkri// phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// zang ka 'am dkyil 'khor lo mchod do// dri 'am chu dang
122b5(rgyud): me tog dang // bsres pa'i sbyor mos chu yang blugs// gzar bu stong gis sbyin sreg bya// chu des gzhan yang gtor bar bya// bar ma chad par nyin bdun du// de ltar rgyun du gtor ma sbyin// phyi nas 'khor lo rin chen
122b6(rgyud): dedang bum pa'i nang nas rnam phyung ste// rgyal mtshan rtse la btags su// gnas mthon por yang gzhag par bya// zhi bar byed par the tshom med// sngar bshad pa yi shing shun dang // dur khrod ras la sgrub po yis//
122b7(rgyud): yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri// so ma btang ba'i kham por du// sgrub pa'i rkang rjes sa dag dang // snang mdzad chu ngogs sa dag dang // ri dang lam sa btags nas ni// ldong ros dang ni yung ba yi// khu bas
123a1(rgyud): sbrus te gzugs byas la// 'khor lo loshi dri la lung ba dang / ljongs kyi ni khubs bsku// snying ba bcug ste gzhug par bya// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pas// lus la sogs pa gdab par bya// dgra
123a2(rgyud): rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang // khung bur brkos te gzhug par bya// laM las dbang chen gyis mnan cing // suM las skyes pa de stengs na// sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi// kham phor skud ser dkri bar bya//
123a3(rgyud): rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang // dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te// sgrub bya ser po'i ris mnan par// bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// swA hA med par stam+b+ha ya/ laM gyi mtha' can lnga stong bzlas//
123a4(rgyud): gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya// rengs pa chen po'i las 'di yis// dmag gi dpung yang nges par rengs// 'ga' tsam la ni smos ci dgos// sran ne lan gsum bsngags pa yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor
123a5(rgyud): lo bri rims dang dug gis zin pa ste// de yi steng du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te// cho gas byab cing gdon par bya// de ni de nas zhi bar 'gyur// ngag dag rengs par 'dod na yang /
123a6(rgyud): smyo byed khu ba dur khrod sol// btsag rnams bsres te so ma btang // kham phor gnyis la 'khor lo 'di// pho dang mo yi bskor phyogs gnyis// ma nor bris te kha sbyar la// ro bsregs sa dang thal
123a7(rgyud): bas g.yogs// steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni// stam+b+ha na dang ku ru laM// swA hA med pa'i sngags 'di yis// kha bcing ba ni nges par 'gyur// gang zhig gsad par byed pa la// snying rjer ldan pa'i gang zag
123b1(rgyud): gis dang gdug byed las 'di byed pa la// gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// zhag gcig gis ni 'grub par byed// bcu bzhi zhim phyed pa na// bya rog spro rtsa'i sbu gu yis// dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la//
123b2(rgyud): dug dang tshwa dang ske tshe dang // nim pa tsha ba gsum dag dang // tsha ba'i mar khu dur khrod sol// smyo byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bris// ro bsregs pa yi thal ba dang // sgrub bya'i rkang pa'i rjes kyis// mi yi rus
123b3(rgyud): phye la sogs la// gzugs byas de yi snying khar gzhug/ dur me dag la de bsro zhing // khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas ma/ skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba ni// de yi khyim mam dur du sba// de lta'i las kyi de
123b4(rgyud): 'grub ste// mtshan mo phyed na kha lhor blta// bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te// zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar// ma he'i steng na mche ba gtsigs// gsus khyim che la gyen skra 'bar// spu sogs
123b5(rgyud): gzhan yang de 'dra'o// ba spu dag gi bu ga nas// 'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi// khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste// bdag nyid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// bsgrub bya mdun du bsam bya ba// mtshams med
123b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sdig dang ldan// dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang // grong khyer skye bos 'tshe ba can// grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas// mtshon gyis btab pa byas pa la// gcan gzan sogs za mdun du bsam/
123b7(rgyud): gang du'ang de ltar yang yang brjod// lcags kyi khyud mos yan lag bsdams// tsher mas dbug pa byas pa ste// lus ni pags pa med par bsam// ske tshe lan tshwas lus byugs te// u chu ba yi sgra byin
124a1(rgyud): bsam// de yi mgon skyabs gsal byas nas// gshin rje'i lto ba'i mtha' mar gzhag be con thogs pas de za'o// 'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi// sras su de ni skye bar
124a2(rgyud): 'gyur// las kyi sdig las de grol lo// gsod pa'i sngags de spel ba ni// hUM che ge mo mA ra ya hUM// bsgrub bya nang dag dbye ba na// ma he rta yi pags pa dag/ yang na ro dang dur khrod ras// rta dang ma he byi la
124a3(rgyud): 'am dzang khyi dang nim pa'i 'dab khu dang // khyim bya'i khrag dang ske tshe bsre// der ni 'khor lo 'di bris te// rnam par 'gras pa bskul dang ldan// rta sbal dag gi nang bcug ste// ma he'i rmig pa'i nang bcug la/
124a4(rgyud): stong phrag bcu ni tshang bar bzlas// nim pa'i shing bsros de nang sba// de nang 'gras pa nyid dang ni// dpag tshad brgyas chos 'bab par 'gyur// a mu ki dang a mu ki bi dwe Sha ya baT/ rims kyis thebs
124a5(rgyud): par bya ba la// dur khrod ko ba che ba la// arga shing gi lo ma dang // tsi traka dang ske tshe dang // khrag gis 'khor lo bri bar bya// bi ba brkos la ri mo dag seng ldeng mdag me du med la// bsro zhing khros pas
124a6(rgyud): lnga brgya bzla// khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // dur khrod sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na// gi'u wang gis ni gro ga la// 'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bris te// bskul tshigs ldan
124a7(rgyud): par yi ge bri/ zla drug zad kyi mdun dag tu// gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mos// rin chen char ni 'bebs pa dang // gshin dgra ser po zla se ra la// gnas par bsams te khri bzlas na// 'phags pa
124b1(rgyud): nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur// oM cheg mo puSh+Ti ku ru lo// gro ga srog gi shog shog la// gi'u wang dang ni rang byung gi/ me tog dag gis bri ba ste// yang na tha dag khrag dang ni// bil ba'i kho pa'i khu ba dang /
124b2(rgyud): ras dmar po yi khu ba dang // rtsi rnams bsres la bri bar bya// spra tshol gyis ni 'khor lo zil/ bum pa mar spring ldan par gzhag/ dus bzhi dag tu mchod pa ni// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// de
124b3(rgyud): bzlas pa tshul dag ni// ho ba shaM ku ru ho// de ma thag tu lha rnams kyang // dbang du byed par nges 'gyur ro// thog dag la bri ba ni// zla ba gzas zi dus dag gam// rgyal gyi nyin par bri bya ste// srung ba dmar
124b4(rgyud): pos 'khor lo dkri// me tog dmar pos mchod pa bya// zod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag ste// bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi// bu mo'ang rnyed par nges 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la// gur kum sogs
124b5(rgyud): kyis 'khor lo bri// yi ge thig les rnam bskor te// a mu ki dang mA mo kI// mo ha na dang rnam spel la/ khasgrub bya'i gos kyi mtha' ma la// legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyid du// bsgoms nas zlos
124b6(rgyud): shing 'gro na yang // lha dang lha yin gyis mi mthong // bdag nyid gshin dgra nyid bsgoms nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na// rdul phran lha yi rnam par te// oM D+yan du ni bdag rang nyid// nges par steng
124b7(rgyud): 'gro gzhan dag kyang // bu mos nags kyi ras ba la la// skud pa bkal ba gzhon nu mas// sum sgril du yang de yis bya// gdug sngags stong du tshang bar te// bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin// skar
125a1(rgyud): ma rgyal gyi dus la bzla// bri ba'i nyin mo'ang de la'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhar brtag pa// g.yon gyis mdun byas gzhan la gdags// ma lus mtshon dag rengs byed de// gcer
125a2(rgyud): bu la yang rengs par byed// me tog las ni gzhan du min// sha lnga sogs kyi ril bu ni// legs par grim ma dag la bskams// lcags gsum dag gis dkri bar bya// bzlas shing mchod pa byed pa'i tshe//
125a3(rgyud): dngul dag gi ni rengs bzhin bya// 'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang // mchod pa legs par rnam byas te// bskor ba brgya phrag du ma bya// de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos// khar bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub//
125a4(rgyud): phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid// gso ba 'dra bas 'o mas kyang // nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya// rig sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te// rnal ma nyid la gnas pa yin// snum ster dag gis
125a5(rgyud): bon la/ ga nya lci bas dang ni byi tang ka/ khu bas yang de byugs pa la// thod pa sras ni rnam bkang bar// sbas te bzlas pa grangs med bya// de tshe mchod dang gtor ma dag/ yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs
125a6(rgyud): te ngang lar bcug mkha' 'gro byas 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zhus dang 'das byung gdug pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang // thig gis
125a7(rgyud): gzhal yas mtshan pa dang // rdul mtshon phyogs las rnam par brtags// yang dag byin gyis brlabs pa dang // bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang // sngags kyi dngos
125b1(rgyud): mang de bzhin mtshabs// chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang // bzlas dang de yi grangs tshad dang // 'khor lo dang mi yi ge gnyis// nges par lus dang mchod pa dang // 'khor lo 'dri ba'i mtshan ma dang /
125b2(rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi dang bsdu sogs dang // sdom pa 'khor la' yo ge bri// gzhi dang de bzhin sdug cha dang // so so las kyi bye brag ste// bsdus teng yis bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
125b3(rgyud): 'byung po rnams kyi gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di byung ngo // oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tra na na hUM hUM bang pa
125b4(rgyud): swA hU~M tra 'byung po rnams dang rnam spel te// tha mar sbyar ba byas pa ni// hi hi hi hUM pho bo bo swA hA/ dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i// zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje ni// spos med nam mkha' lta bu las//
125b5(rgyud): snying rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa// ye shes khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa'i// dud kha mun chen sku la 'dud// gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// skye med don dam ngang nyid las/
125b6(rgyud): thabs kyis sprul pa'i skur bstan pa// 'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs can// zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// ser sna gshin rje rdo rje ni// 'dzin pa po las grol ba
125b7(rgyud): yis ngang gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bor sprul// gter 'chang ser sna grol mdzad pa// bcom gser 'dra khyod la 'dud// chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i// 'dod chags gshin rje rdo rje ni// skye med
126a1(rgyud): rnam dag chos dbyings la// khams gsum pa dag khro bar sprul// ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje can// ban du lta bu'i sku la 'dud// shes rab thabs ldan ta draka/ khrag do/
126a2(rgyud): gshin rje rdo rje ni// rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las// thugs rje sprul pa'i khro bor ni// 'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri can// sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud// thams cad bskyed pa'i lha mo che// dbang
126a3(rgyud): po lta bur bsgyur mdzad pa// khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan// rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs// bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes// ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud// kun sdud lha mo/
126a4(rgyud): rin po che// rnam rtog spyon las rnam grol yang // dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gir byed// rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku// don dam thugs chung 'khor ba sel// ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud/
126a5(rgyud): 'dus byas ma lus sreg byed pa// rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed// 'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa// ma chags phyag na bsnams pa yi// 'phrin las
126a6(rgyud): dag byed can la 'dud// thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed// gnyis med bde chen dang nyid las// 'phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can// btang snyoms zhugs/
126a7(rgyud): par 'gro ba 'dul/ kun tu las kyis rgyal la 'dud// ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongs su bstod do// de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pos legs so zhes bya ba byin te lha mo rnams kyisu
126b1(rgyud): la bcud de// bdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni// bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang // 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am/ gnyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar// dmigs te ma yengs brjed pa mang // bzlas pa 'ad/
126b2(rgyud): ni de ltar bya// bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis// rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa// med de de yis thams cad 'grub// 'bum dang sa la bzlas pas kyang // phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed// gzhan du
126b3(rgyud): mi 'gro sems kyis ni// de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya// yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis// bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin// mi 'phro sems kyis 'di zlos shing // lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la// stag
126b4(rgyud): sogs chu yis mi 'jigs so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas// 'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste// de bas de ni bshad par bya// bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang // gas
126b5(rgyud): ba'i dbang gis gnyis par te// gsum par bya ba de nyid ni// shes rab ye shes de yin te// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin// brtan g.yo dngos po ma lus pa// bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la// blos ni yongs su
126b6(rgyud): mi sgom ste// kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na// sgom pa kho na de min te// thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na// de ni sgom par yongs su bsgrags// de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te// 'bad pas mnyes bya de mi spad/
126b7(rgyud): de la thams cad 'byung ba ste// bla ma la spod g.yo skya can// nges par de ni dug dang yang // gdon chen dag ni ma lus pas// 'chi zhi brlabs par de gyur nas// dmyal ba rag tu yun ring lhung // bskal pa du bar sdug
127a1(rgyud): / bsngal te// rta tu chongs 'debs par byed// de bas blo gros chen po la// nam du'ang mi spang gzhan du na// bkur sti pra dung 'gro ba la/ khan pa'i sems kyis da ltar bya// gzhan yang
127a2(rgyud): bsgom par bya ba nyid// gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba// de yi ngo bor bdag gis bya// bsam gtan ma byed de blo yis// kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya// bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis// gsang dbang lag na
127a3(rgyud): rdo rje la// bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams// dngos med mkha' dang 'dra ba las// longs spyod yul du du mar snang // shel la tshon ni ji bzhin du// 'dod pa
127a4(rgyud): lnga dang chos rnams la// rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par shog/ a la la ho rol du gsol// mnams par mdzod// mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la// gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod// rig bya dgag pa med pa la//
127a5(rgyud): mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod// ho chags pa med pas chags par mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i// de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsung ni
127a6(rgyud): 'di skad bka' stsal to// lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste// kha ni kun tu gyes pa ni// lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te// gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la// mthe bong nges par
127a7(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar// 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste// snying kha dpral ba lkog ma dang // spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAn na sU hUM par lang a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa ma/ gzhan
127b1(rgyud): yang rdo rje sems ma sogs// phyag rgyas dbang bskur dbu rgyan brtag/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa// so so'i bdag po dbu rgyan cing // dbang bskur chen bum pa che// phyag gis bsdams te dbang bskur ro// 'dzang /
127b2(rgyud): lo las kun byed pa la// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// gdug pa skrag byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar// dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka yi thugs// las rnams dag
127b3(rgyud): byed phrag dog rdo rje ste// ma lus tshems gcod gsol bas sku yi dang // hUM dang par kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas gsung // kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyi gshin rje yi// lhor 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing /
127b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sprul pa'i gnas nas 'gugs mdzad pa// ma lus kun byed 'khor lo che mchog la// gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdud// nga yis lam
127b5(rgyud): bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang // dam las 'da' zhing log pa kun skyed la// khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da' las rnam sbubs// tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par bcings// bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la
127b6(rgyud): 'dod sgrub na// ngas ni sbyin bya khyod ni dam las ma 'da' zhig/ ces dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o// 'khor lo snying khar lta
127b7(rgyud): ba'i cha// sa bon tshul te lte ba la// yi ge ma lus 'dod pa yang // mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las// grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las// k+Sha ni zad pa'i bdag nyid la// u ni hUM gi bdag nyid de// de ni sems
128a1(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin nyid// dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te// thabs ni shes rab ldan pa las// dus thabs bsten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob// chu 'gram/
128a2(rgyud): chen po bas mtha' dang // dur khrong shing drung dgon pa ste// dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim// der ni mgon po 'di la 'bad// gzhan du bsgrubs kyang de mi 'grub// skad cig de la rang bzhin kun// nges
128a3(rgyud): par mi snang rig pa yi// lam du gyur pa med par shes// 'bras bu de ni rgya chen te// mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin no// de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs
128a4(rgyud): pang skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas// sdang ba'i log 'dren skye bo dang /
128a5(rgyud): bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan pa dag ni rdo rje 'dzin// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas// bdag gi ye shes rdo rje yis// lus ngag yid du bcas pa dgas// sangs rgyas kun
128a6(rgyud): bdag nyid ni// khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag/ slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du// dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la// sgo drung gnas
128a7(rgyud): pa khyod gang yin// slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do// des bdag skal ba ldan par brjod// ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis// mgon la dbang ni bskur ba bzhin// bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir// bdag la'ang/
128b1(rgyud): mgon po dbang bskur gsol// me tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog/ rab 'byams rgya mtsho ma lus pas// slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la// yang yang mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs// rgyas pa man/
128b2(rgyud): byabye 'og tu// dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin// de nas rgyal po bde chen po// dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa// 'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum bdag/ nyid kyis 'di skad bka' stsal to// sbyin sran/
128b3(rgyud): meng na 'bras mi 'byin// de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis// de yi las la 'bad par bya// gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la// gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas// khro bo'i skyil krung bcas pa yis/
128b4(rgyud): sran ti'i stan la bdag 'dug nas// las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni// mtshan mo 'am nyi ma byed nyid la// rang 'byung ma yi dkyil 'khor du// hUM pang mtha' na yod pa yi// sngags kyis thog ma par
128b5(rgyud): mtha' mar// sbyin sreg bya ste de min// dur khrod me 'am rus pa 'am// rdo nyid las ni byung ba 'am// tsaN+Da li yi khyim nyid nas// bab khung gru gsum can der ni// tsher ma can gyi bud shing rdzas// rlung yab
128b6(rgyud): s+phar hA hU dz+wa la ra~M// rdal du brjod ma spar brjod// lag g.yas kra sha bcas pa yis// mthe zeng srin lag cu ru gzugs// oM e he hi sa hA b+hU ting ba ra'i dri dza sa twa ma gr-i h+Na tA A ts+tsha ti mA hA ra a hrI
128b7(rgyud): sa ni ha~M ta~M b+ha ba/ zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo // 'bar ba ma yi dbus nyid du// ming de zang byed ces bya ba// khro bo ma ltar phun sum tshogs// baspu lam pa de bzhin du// ngu ba'i midog can zur mog steng du gzigs/
129a1(rgyud): sgra chen mche ba bzhi ldan stobs po che// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// bzhugs nas drag po'i yi ge brjod// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// rim pa'i gnas la legs par
129a2(rgyud): bzhugs// zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma he la// bcibs pa'i du ba'i 'phreng rnams 'khrigs// phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin// de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du/
129a3(rgyud): de bzhin bdun gyi phyogs nyid dam// spyan drangs byin rlabs ldan pa la// ar+g+haM sogs kyis mchod pa bya// oM ar+g+ha pra tits+tsha swA hA/ lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag/ skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas/
129a4(rgyud): chu blangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya// oM ta ba tam mthar ni sngon gyi brjod// zhabs bkru ba la shis pa yin// dgang gzar yu ba sor bcu drug/ de min sor bzhi zab sor gnyis// zur gsum dbus su
129a5(rgyud): sor gnyis tshad// rtse gsum 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste// stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan bya// khu bcug 'dzag pa sor gcig go// khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs/
129a6(rgyud): byin brlabs sor gcig tshad can no// blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi// zabs su sor gcig gru gsum dang // yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum pa// gdeng pa byin brlabs mngon spyod kyi// gzar bu ma
129a7(rgyud): par nga yis bstan// gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing // de la de byas sangs rgyas 'jigs// bsreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg/ stong du tshang bas 'bras bu ni// nges par 'byin
129b1(rgyud): par byed pa yin// g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang gzar la// g.yas bzlugs pa'i gzar ba yi// kha ni padz+ra'i 'dab ma yin// sor lo gnyis par de rgyas so// rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag/ bsreg
129b2(rgyud): rdzas kyi ni snod yin la// rdzas rnams rdo rje rin cher dpa'// hUM pha kyi ni mtha' can gyis// bsreg byas chum dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus su gnas// kha bye gnas brtag tu'o// kur tu'ang/
129b3(rgyud): kha phye bskor bar bya// bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste// lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan// lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha// nam mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar// de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba/ rdul

129b6(rgyud): mkha' 'dra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba// shes rab dang ni snying rje ches// 'gags pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro// bde chen

130a2(rgyud): ba'i phye mas rnam byugs la// mi zhim dri dang bdug pas mchod// dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang // rnga mo'i spangs bskams bud shing ngo // sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin// min pa de bzhin seng ldeng dang /

135b1(rgyud): oM sarba du Sh+Tas spang sa gagag/ nas pa ni chab kyi snganas so// oM kus radrab 'i rba dz+nyA bang / ma tog 'bul ba'i sngags so// oM hAH ha che yang / bdun pama'o// oM kA la nu bas du byas 'das ka ma hA b+h+yaH/
135b2(rgyud): pa ti a maM ba ling gr-ih+na gr-ih+NA pa ya swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// oM hAM pA lo tsa na bi kr-i tA na na mahA At+ma sa nA dI na daM p+ta ya swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so// oM dza ya dza ya sudza ya bi shwa ru pa d+hA ri ga d+ha ga d+ha sA s+sa
135b3(rgyud): kri taM te na ta thA ga ta shu bi sardza ya ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang log pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
135b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// hUM las yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam
135b5(rgyud): par bya// dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra// dbyug pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin// ma he pad+ma nyi ma la// g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis sgom// oM ya mAn+ta kri ta hUM phang// gsang
135b6(rgyud): sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung // nam mkha'i dbyings su dbus gnas par// ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i// khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan stangs
135b7(rgyud): nang sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i// gri gug bcwa pa la dang // dgra sta dang ni thod khrag dang // phyag bzhi po na rim pas 'dzin// ma he nag pa'i zhal steng na// 'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum//
136a1(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po rang nyid sgom// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing // sha chen dag kyang mur bar bya// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu byed cing // rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya// thig
136a2(rgyud): le 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bsam par bya// las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub bo// yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// sku yi kha dog so sor shes/
136a3(rgyud): khyad par du ni bsad pa la// nag po ma he'i zhal can ni// rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste// ma he sha steng bsam byas na// khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs// res 'ga' sku la khro bo ni// lcags kyu
136a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa grangs med spro// zla ba spyang kis zin dus su// byi la'i sder mo ra snying dang / byi ba'i khrag dang mi rus bsre// gang la phog pa spro bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las
136a5(rgyud): sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos// yang na mtshan gyi khab ma la/
136a6(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje chu// dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug/ go ro tsa na sa ras chos bya// log par dam por drung byas te// lus ngag yid kyi gnas su ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus// yi ge oM dang A
136a7(rgyud): hUM bring spa phyed dur khrod sol ba dang // khrag chen ldong ros pa bla yis// dbang thob dam tshig spang byed cing // shin tu gsang la dam pa yis// ri mo mkhan ni bcom ldan des// rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas
136b1(rgyud): rnam pa dus kyi mchar byang dus// masang ba'i gnas su rabazhugs nas// bcom ldan rdo rje 'jigs mdzangad bri// tsA ba man khros pa'i zhal// de sangs 'das dpal 'jam pa'i gal// lags
136b2(rgyud): dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skra can// rab tu brjid cing khro ba'i zhal// drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che// bod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sprul// rus pa rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan//
136b3(rgyud): glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni// pad+ma nyi ma ma he la// gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gyings// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rtse gcig gnyis pazo
136b4(rgyud): bstangang gsum pa gtun shing mkha' la 'phyar// dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni// g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri// nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs// sku la khro bo du ma 'phro// sna tshogs
136b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i lha mos bskor// legs par de ltar bris pa yi// rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cad du// dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri// mgo dus rgyu ma mkha' la khyer// rkang dum lag dum ro langs dang //
136b6(rgyud): wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang // mkha' 'gro pho mo sha za'i tshogs// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri// spyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas// der ni sgrub pa po yang bri// gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur//
136b7(rgyud): gos nag gyon nas khrag chen 'thung // rta dang ma he'i rus pa yi// 'phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don// bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bris// de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag/ sha chen go ro tsa nas mchod//
137a1(rgyud): mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des// dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na// rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du thob// sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang // phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung // dpal rdo rje
137a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grus
137a3(rgyud): 'dod pas/ blo ldan ser sna rngam spangs te// brtul pod g.yeng ba rnams spangs nas// sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya// mtshal dang ba bla ldong ros dang // shan pa'i go thal dur khrodas// me dang
137a4(rgyud): ma he'i khrag gis rjes// khru do pa la khru byad rtsig/ gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni// rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la// de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya// lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor
137a5(rgyud): ning mtho gang chad du byas pa la// ma he'i khrag gis legs par byag/ bdag nyid lho yo phyogs bltas te// ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba yis// zab kyi nang gi lte ba la// me yi sa bon mngon bltas la/
137a6(rgyud): bskal pa'i mtshan lta bur sgom// der ni ma wa bsgom byas// zhal gsum phyag drug nag la chub// phyag gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud // g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la// skyabs sbyin mdzad
137a7(rgyud): cing bzang 'brang 'dzin// g.yon pas rol ba mchog stsal bcom// zhabs drug dgas drug mtshan pa brjes// zhal nas ma rnams rab 'gro zhing // 'od rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// de ltar shes nas
137b1(rgyud): rab bsrams na// 'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu 'byung // dgra bo'i gzugs rnams sha chen dang // chang dang ma he'i khrag bcas pa// stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas na// bsgrub bya khrag tu zhugs nas/
137b2(rgyud): 'ching glang po rta bong khye sha la// stong phrag gsum gyis dbang ba byed// bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu// bsregs nam lha 'byed par 'gyur// ti la dang nas gro sA wa// yung bgi ru waM so pag rnams/
137b3(rgyud): stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa// longs spyod bsam can rnyed par 'gyur// rta dang rnga mo bya rog sha/ mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges
137b4(rgyud): par bsgong // ra sha daN+Da ut+pal// chang dang ma he'i chur bcas pa// gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lkugs// dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang // sha chen til mar rab sbags te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsrem
137b5(rgyud): byas na// pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gcod// tsan dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang // til can 'bras can yungs kar dang // ut+pal ka ra ga pur dang // shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad/
137b6(rgyud): bsregs na dus rnams kun tu srung // gang zhig bya ba'i rigs sogs dang // sngags rnams bsam gtan nges ldan pas// snying rje'i yid ni ma bral na// 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya// gzhan du/
137b7(rgyud): rmongs pa'i byas pa bslu// blo gros med gang shes rab 'tshal// sngags dang dam tshig dman gyur cing // ting nge 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba// brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas// bskal pa stong du
138a1(rgyud): bsgrub byas kyang // 'bras bu yod pa ma yin te// sha thang chad pa nyid du zad// dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams// 'ga' zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas// phub ma rlung
138a2(rgyud): khar byed pa la// 'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur zhing // ji ltar sprin dang chu zla dang // dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te// thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang // sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol// ye shes gcig/
138a3(rgyud): pu rnal grol rgyu// stong par dpag par blos mi nus// de la spyad cing gzhal bzod na// brtags pa'i snying po de la med// de la dngos rnams ma grub na// sgrub pa'i ri mo gzhan spos ci dgos// bya ba/
138a4(rgyud): dang ni byed pa dag/ nges par de la brtag mi bzod// ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i// chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod// rtag pa nyid kyang rigs min te// dngos po yod par ga la 'gyur// dper
138a5(rgyud): na byis pa rnams la mas// sa 'dir sdod dang ma nyid kyis// 'bras bu shing thog mar blangs la// khyod la bde bas sbyin zhes brjod// de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang // 'jig rten rtog pa tha dad
138a6(rgyud): pas dang de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad// bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du// sha chen po yi zhal zas dang // chang dang til mar ma he'i khrag/ rab tu zhim pa'i zas mchog rnams// dus rnams
138a7(rgyud): rtag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu// bdag gis rgyun du 'don bya zhing // bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par byas// de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan de yis
138b1(rgyud): ning sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur// zhi sogs las la spos ci dgos// grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des// khyi sha sbal sha rus sbal sha// rnga mo byis pa'i sha rnams la// stong rtsa brgyad du
138b2(rgyud): bsreg par bya// rta sha dri chen rab sbyar nas// ril bu byas nas bdag mdun du// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// bud med
138b3(rgyud): dbang du byed 'dod na// nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams// rdo rje chu yis sbags byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// tha mal dbang du byed 'dod na// sha chen glang po sha dang bcas// byang chub sems
138b4(rgyud): rang rab bsres te// stong phrag brgyad du bsreg par bya// dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du// khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga// cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs// sbyin sreg/
138b5(rgyud): de rnams thams cad kyang // ma he zhal gyi sbyar bas ni// gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar// ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya// gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang // ji lta ba yi rim pa yis/
138b6(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyer gnas// sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du thob// zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis te// rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la// sdang bral chags pas dbang la'o// drag po'i las la khro zhing drug
138b7(rgyud): rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni// gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya// gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi// grub pa myur du tshol byed na// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// rdo rje 'dzin par de 'grub 'gyur//
139a1(rgyud): dngos po gang dang gang spyod yul// de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la// dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya//
139a2(rgyud): de ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de// dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni// dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te// shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs/
139a3(rgyud): duHkha 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro// blo ldan legs par blang bya ste// shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub pa bya// mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ga'// rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe// bsod nams dang ni sdig pa
139a4(rgyud): yid phung po rnam pa gnyis su brtags// 'on kyang 'dod pa thams cad ni// rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir// dmar zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'// 'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub// de bas ngo
139a5(rgyud): mtshar rgyud 'di ni// rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa// yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na// bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos// dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing // bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe//
139a6(rgyud): bstan kyang thos par mi 'gyur te// tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor// de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe// de rnams myos shing brgyal rmongs te// kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo spad// 'jig rten 'di ni shin tu
139a7(rgyud): g.yos// gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // shes nas 'chang bar byed pa dang // dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na// tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te// shi nas mtho ris myur du 'thob// gal te gzhan du rgyud
139b1(rgyud): mchog 'di// bstar ram bshad dam gsal phye na// de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas// shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro// rang gis shin tu bcang bya zhing // dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na// sdug bsngal/
139b2(rgyud): mtha' dag nges zad nas// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dpal
139b3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mar/
139b4(rgyud): pa ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// slad kyis grub thob chen po kaR+Sha shri'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ thar pa lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
139b5(rgyud): pa'o / d+ya/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI rak+ta ya mA ri tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
139b6(rgyud): dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i
139b7(rgyud): b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog/ e ma'o//
140a1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so// snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje zhe sdang rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje gshed dmar
140a2(rgyud): po'i sku nyon cig/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lags pa 'dir bshad du gsol/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags/
140a3(rgyud): rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / zhes pa ste/ rdo rje tsartsi ka dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau ri'i yang ngo // zur du bum pa bzhi rnams so// de ltar
140a4(rgyud): rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po rnams so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur to// de nas
140a5(rgyud): nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ bdud thams cad nges par 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gcig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams la nges
140a6(rgyud): par phyung bar gyur to// sngags kyis dgug dang dbang chen dang / de bzhin nus pa rnam mang ngo // ral gri sgrib thabs rgyal srid dang // pha rol sde ni rnam 'joms dang // mi snang mig sman bcud nyid dang / nges par
140a7(rgyud): grib la 'phrog par mkhas// ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang // sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs bsrung dang // sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang // byang chub sems ni rnam spyod dang // nyer malo thams
140b1(rgyud): cad spyod pa dang // pha rol grong du rab 'jug pa'i// 'od zer lnga ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'i// rdo rje srung ba'i don bsgom bya// sa yi ma yang rdo rje yis// de bzhin rab dang ni gur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
140b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa po bdud thams cad ram par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'di thams cad kyis bon
140b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams las nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya'o// k+She ma med ya ts+tsha nir dza sa do ru Na yo na ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyur ro// gti mug k+She yig
140b4(rgyud): la brjod bya// phra ma nyid brjod ma yig la'o// 'dod chags nyid kyang me yig la// nga yig la yang phrag dog yin// lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms par bsngags// dza yog tsartsi ka rab brjod// sa yig
140b5(rgyud): la ni phag mo ste// dbyangs can ma brjod do yig la// ru yig la ni go rir 'dod// Na lo nor zur ba'i ru// mi yi thod pa bzhi rnams so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
140b6(rgyud): kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang chen po'i rigs 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'di gsungs so// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan// blo bzang sems
140b7(rgyud): can don dang gcig/ byams sogs yon tan yang dag rdzogs// dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan// brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro// thog mar la sogs dag byas te// skye bos dben phyogs dur khrod sog/
141a1(rgyud): bde ba'i bstan la rang brtsam bya// rang nyid pad+ma nye ba la// rnam kod shin tu gsal bar blta// de 'og rnams kyis sems can don// bran tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te// bla ma/
141a2(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas bsgom bya// ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams khyab pa// dmigs te de rnams la ni phyag/ lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson// tsar tsika sogs rnams kyis mchod// de nas sdig pa
141a3(rgyud): rab bshags bya// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdig/ byas dang byed 'gyur de bzhin du// gang yang rjes su yi rang ba// mgon po dus gsum byas de gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams
141a4(rgyud): kyi dang bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos bcas// tshogs mchog rnams la skyabs su mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod rnams slar// rang lus dag ni dbul bar
141a5(rgyud): bgying dadam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing // shin tu mthar thugs mdzes par zhugs// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos// de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la// sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du/
141a6(rgyud): rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi// sems can rnams kyi don sgrub phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi// bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo// dpal
141a7(rgyud): ldan gshin rje mthar byed du// gyur nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi// smon lam 'di ni btab byas te// de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya// brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te// sna tshogs stong par rnam
141b1(rgyud): bsam bya// sbyor ba bral ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med// rnam par rtog dang bral nyid phyir// smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// yar
141b2(rgyud): ba laM dkyil 'khor bzhi// bsdus pa'i b+h+rUM yig las skyes pa'i// khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste// do shal do shal phyed pas
141b3(rgyud): spras dang lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes// sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i// ba dan dril bu mnyam par ldan// de yi dbus gnas pa yig gis// sna tshogs pad+ma rna ba bsam bya// der
141b4(rgyud): ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas// mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs gyur nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom// pad+ma nyi ma mnyam mnan cing // ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs
141b5(rgyud): pa nga ga yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms pa// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha// ro langs ma yis mgrin 'khyud cing // dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// klu ni
141b6(rgyud): brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum dmar po 'jigs pa ste// khrag ldan mgo bo'i 'phreng ba can// g.yas na rdo rje dbyug pa dang // g.yon na thod pa 'dzin pa'o// khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan zhing /
141b7(rgyud): ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs pa can// khro gnyer ldan zhing sku rgyas pa// stag gi pags pas rked pas g.yogs// thung zhing gsus 'phyang 'jigs par byed// dri med dag pa'i 'od zer 'bar// ro langs
142a1(rgyud): ma yi g.yas pa na// gri gug g.yon na thod pa can// spyan gsum ldan zhing skra grol ba// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// mgo yi 'phreng ba mnyam ldan zhing // gtso bo'i mchu
142a2(rgyud): la myang ba mo// shar gyi 'dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po rdo rje tsar tsi kA dang snyoms par zhugs so// lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// nub kyi 'dab ma
142a3(rgyud): la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang khu rdo rje go rI dang stobs par zhugs pa'o// car tsi kA nag mo/
142a4(rgyud): phag mo ser mo/ dbyangs can ma dkar mo/ gau rI ljang khu/ g.yon na thod pa g.yas na gri gug ste/ phyag dang / zhal dang / dbyibs ni dpa' bo ji lta bzhin no// me'i zur du lu men gyi bum pa gzhi mnyam
142a5(rgyud): gyis gang ba'o// bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla cis gang ba'o// rlung du byu ru'i bum pa sih+la sa gang ba'o// dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga pur gyis gang ba ste thod pas la bcad pa rnam par sgom pa'o//
142a6(rgyud): khro bo 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa// gtso bo dpa' bo'i ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tAn na hUM hUM par par swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so// oM ho k+Sho k+Sha yaM ka rA ya/ br-ih+Na gr-ih+Nan+tu hUM par pa swA hA/ nye ba'i
142a7(rgyud): snying po'i sngags so// oM ma hA yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dur dAn ta ma kA ya~M/ nA sha ya nI shA la/ bi drA pa ya ba~M drA pa ya/ hUM hUM pa ya swA hA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// oM dwe Tha ra ti nud nud/ traT traH
142b1(rgyud): \u0f7fAhA/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so// oM sa ha an ta kr-i ta hA d+hA baH/ oM ba shu na an+ta kr-i he hwA hU~M pa / oM rA ga an ta ma ta sU hU pa / oM Ir Sh+yA an+ta kr-i tAn+na hUM pa / dpa' bo bsa'i sngags so/
142b2(rgyud): oM ma gar ti hUH/ oM bi shu na ra ti hU dzaH/ oM rA ga ra ti hU dzaH/ oM Ar b+hu ra ti hUdzaH/ dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so// oM ma mams bik+sha ta~M/ oM badz+ra tsa rtsi / sa ra ha ra/ bun+ta mA ra
142b3(rgyud): a ru kA ya dzaH/ oM g+ho na Ne/ su g+ho d+ha/ badz+ra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+hi ra hUM dzaH/ oM marme marmA k+Sho b+ha Na~M badz+ra sa ra swa ti/ da ra da ra/ tha ra tha ra/ pa ra ba ra/ ka pa kaM paHd+hun d+hu na/ hUM a mu kaM dzaHoM ga b+hiH
142b4(rgyud): badz+ra karti ke/ g+ha g+ha rak+ta sho Ni ta pri ye gau rI ye a mu kaM dzaH/ gdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis// skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad// klu ni 'jog po dmar po yis// rna bar drag pos rna brgyan byas//
142b5(rgyud): rigs ldan sna chags dbyung ba'i rgyar// gdengs can sar po dung sbyang // lag gdub dag tu 'dzin pa ste// bad+ma gar ba sha la mdzes// gaTan sde bsangs kyang // mchad phyir thags pas mdzes pas/
142b6(rgyud): gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi// kha dog lta bu'i ska rags byas// par rtsa lta bur dkar ba'i mdog/ pad+ma chen pos rkang gdub byas// thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrog/ lce gnyis 'phreng ba'i mche ba can/
142b7(rgyud): zhes pa 'khor ba myang 'das kyi// gzugs can gshin rje gsod pa ste// rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// sngags kyis yang dag byin brlabs bya// rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug/ zhal nas zhugs
143a1(rgyud): / te thams cad du// mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// zhal nas zhugs pa snying khar zhu// der ni sa bon phyung byas te// rdo rje'i lam nas zhu ba ste// rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gnas/
143a2(rgyud): pa nga sa bon rang bzhin can blta bya// sa bon de rnams kyis byin brlabs// 'od zer mi bzad 'phro ba ni// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bsgom bya// bltas te snying khar zhu byas la// rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste/
143a3(rgyud): rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma yi// ze 'brur lha mo'i tshogs bltas bya// me tog sna tshogs nyer spyod sogs// lag pa'i yal gas gzung ba dang // yid 'phrog klu yi mchod pa dang // sna tshogs gar gi rang bzhin nyid//
143a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po rab ster ba// rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod bya// kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// khyod mthong kho bo rnam par 'jigs// bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs//
143a5(rgyud): khyod kyis gar mdzad sa stengs dang // sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo// chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yid// gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags// sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul
143a6(rgyud): pa nga rdo rje dbyangs can mas btung che// gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che// hrIHSh+Ti gsang sngags dag gis khyod// sa gsum pa yi 'khrul pa sel// snying rje'i khro bo rje btsun khyod// gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzig+sas//
143a7(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni// sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta// 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod byas te// de yis de rnams de ltar bzhin/
143b1(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rjeg shed// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// sku ma rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje
143b2(rgyud): gshed// zugs kyi rdo rjes rab gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas// dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog
143b3(rgyud): gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed// sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba// phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas
143b4(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal// aHyig las skyes pad+ma'i snod// mi mgo
143b5(rgyud): gsum gyi steng gnas pa// dag par rnam par bskyed byas te// der ni 'og tu ma dkyil 'khor// zur gsum raM yig las byung ba'o// der ni 'og tu rlung dkyil 'khor// sngon po g.yo ba gzhu lta bu// ba dan
143b6(rgyud): gyis mtshon yaM las byung // der ni de'i ming dang po las// bskyed de rnam snang la sogs pa// buM yig sogs las yang dag byung // glang po che la sogs pa lngas// hUM skye rdo rje'i 'chod kyis// bkab
143b7(rgyud): ba mkhas pas bsgom par bya// me la rlung gis bskyod pa na// der ni zhu ba rnam bsam bya// rdo rje'i ro mnyam dag gyur cing // shin tu dri ma med bltas te// hUM yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// spyan drangs
144a1(rgyud): ye shes rang bzhin can// sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab gzhug cing // mchog gi bdud rtsi lngar bltas nas// de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim bya/
144a2(rgyud): ste nga lce la rdo rje gtsang ma nyid// hUM yig yang dag byung ba lta der// de 'od spu gu'i rnam pa la// yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas// dkyil 'khor ba
144a3(rgyud): rnams de bzhin gzhan// ye shes 'od kyis snying khar bkug/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// thog ma tha ma dbus dbye bas// der yang gzung ba gcig yod min// de nyid kyis ni 'khrul gzugs/
144a4(rgyud): medang gang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas// thams cad chen sems 'khrul med// lus ni spro dang sdud pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gshin rje gshed
144a5(rgyud): dmar po'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
144a6(rgyud): po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las// ji ltar sems can rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'tshal//
144a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// nyes pa thams cad gsol ba'i bdag/ las kun rab tu sgrub pa pos// gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
144b1(rgyud): kyi thugs rdo rje'i mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal bas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung /
144b2(rgyud): mnyan to// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// dbang byed 'khrul 'khor rab gsal byed// gshin rje gshed nag 'khrul 'khor rnams// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bud med dbang byed phyir de
144b3(rgyud): bzhin// bsrung ba'i don du bya ba nyid// gi'u wang gzung bya zhi ba la// gro ga de bzhin smyug shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// namaHming ni nang du spel// nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te/
144b4(rgyud): kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste// srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// me tog dkar pos thun gsum du// shar du kha lus mchod par bya// gshin rje mthar byed zla
144b5(rgyud): shel 'od// bdag nyid bsams te 'du 'god bya// bsgrub bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya// bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams la// rdzogs
144b6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa// bltas nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT par na maH/ lha sbyin gyi shAn ti ku ru na maH/ zhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o// skyes pa rnams kyi
144b7(rgyud): zhi ba la// gur kum gyis bri rgyas pa la'ang // kha che rnams kyi 'khor lo gnyis// swA hA ming gi nang du sbal// bsgrub bya'i maung ni blangs nas ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus gzhag nas// lam phor kha sbyar
145a1(rgyud): du bzhag ste// srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya// me tog ser pos thun gsum du// byang du kha bltas mchod par bya// gshin rje 'joms pa sku mdog ser// bdag nyid nges
145a2(rgyud): par blta bar bya// bsgrub bya ser po zla bar gnas// bum pa ser pos dbang bskur bya// dbang bskur ba ni bsgoms nas su// rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzlas// oM hrI \u0f7fSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM pa
145a3(rgyud): pha swA hA/ lha sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bau ShaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM pha pa swA hA/ bo ShaT/ lha sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru bau ShaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam chog go/
145a4(rgyud): gro ga 'am yang na ras la yang // rgya skyegs khu ba 'am tsen dan dmar// ming med khrag dang bsres pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// hoHyig gis ni nang du spel// nag po la sos
145a5(rgyud): spangs 'khrul 'khor// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar te// mar dang sbrang rtsis yongs gang bar// srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya// nub du mngon par phyogs byas te// me tog dmar pos mchod
145a6(rgyud): par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms pa po// sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba// bsgrub bya zla ba dmar po la// zhon pa nyid kyang rnam bsam bya// rang lus las 'phros 'od zer ni// dmar/
145a7(rgyud): po lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya bkug par bsam nas ni// spro ba'i sngags ni khri bzlas bya// de yis bsgrub bya brgyal 'gyur zhing // rkang pa dag la de bzhin 'gyel// gos dang
145b1(rgyud): bral ba'i sna grol ba// bsams te bzlas pa brtsam par bya// gal te dbang du ma gyurar// drung med sreng ldeng ma la ni// mar stsogs dor bcas brtul zhugs can// 'khor mo de ni gang
145b2(rgyud): bar bya// oM hrI Sh+T+rI wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM pha par/ hoHlha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin pa shI ku ru hoH/ oM hrI Sh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na na hA hUM pa dbang po 'aT/ lha sbyin gyib shA mA na mchod sbyin po 26/ ces pa gsungs
145b3(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du nge mtshig go// dur khrod ras sam yang na ni// rang byang bskus pa'i ras dag la// rgya skyegs lho rlor khrag bsres pas// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// dzaHyig dang
145b4(rgyud): ni hriHyig gis// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang spel bya// btsun mo'i pad+ma'i snod du ni// kha sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya// srad bu dmar pos bkrikres nas ni// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid
145b5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed po ni// 'tshams kyi nyi ma ltar 'bar ba// lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis// bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom bya// lcags kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing // zhags pas rked pa la bcings te/
145b6(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// seng ge dmar po mnyam zhon pa// rdzas lnga yis ni gsang bya ste// de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya// gal te bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na// seng ldeng shing me 'bar ba la// 'khrul 'khor
145b7(rgyud): de bsros brtul zhugs can// der ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsal// oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tAn na par pad hrIHa mu ka a kaR+Sha ya hrIH/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM pharda pang dzaH/ lha sbyin A ka rA ya dzaH/ zhes pa gsungs/
146a1(rgyud): ter bcom ldan 'das kyi bkug pa'i dam tshig go// blo ldan dur khrod ras ma la// yung ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// khaM yig gis ni nang du spel/
146a2(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang // kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste// kham por ser po steng bzhag nas// der ni mkhas pa ri mo bris// dang por ri mo bzhi bcu bdun// mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam
146a3(rgyud): bri bya dang lcog brgyad du grags ri rab ni// de yi steng du yang dag bri// hUM yig dang ni baM yig ste// de yis ri rab nang du spel// de yi nang du lam yig gis// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya//
146a4(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la// srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni// sku mdog ser po rnam bsam bya// lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pas// dbang chen dkyil 'khor
146a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i// bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsam nas// ri rab kyis mnan myur dgod bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam mnan la// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las 'og tu// man da ra sogs 'jigs rung ri// gangs
146a6(rgyud): rig yo meng mtshungs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya mnan pa bsgom bya ste// de nyid bzlas pa bya ba nyid// oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM pa bang / lo lha sbyin sa spyan swa b+ha ya laM swAhA/ zhes gsungs te/ bcom
146a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rengs pa chen po'i dam tshig go// ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis// rang bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris nas// bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang spel te// de nas spos shing sngags bzlas bya/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iH
146b1(rgyud): wi kr-i tAn ma hA d+hu pang par la/ wa sbyin ya thA pra thA kAr+ya s+ya ri te/ tan pa ra ya ho ba rU paka/ ba rat+na ya ti bi rU ba kaM ba ta ma dA data s+ya nAg sa b+han ku ru laM// zhes pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
146b2(rgyud): rengs pa'i dam chog go// de lta dgongs pa gsungs pa 'ang // nang du shin tu legs sbas pas// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis//
146b3(rgyud): sbyar bzhin bri bya brtul zhugs can// ske cha dang ni lan tshwas kyang // dug dang rnam pa yis kyang ste// de bzhin lar tshwa tsha ba gsum// dur grong sol ba nyid dang na// smyo byed 'dab ma'i khu ba dang // de bzhin gtum
146b4(rgyud): po'i sa bon nyid// mdzub mo'i khrag ni blang byas te// tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am// cha sgo can gyis blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang // ltogs pa can gyi sbu gu yis// gdug pa'i sems kyis bcu
146b5(rgyud): bzhi la// nyi phyed na bri brtul zhugs can// ma rungs pa rnams bsad rgyu yi// sna tshogs sems can rnams 'joms pa'i// hUM yig gis ni rnam spel bya// lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pa// bdag
146b6(rgyud): nyid gshin rje gshed po ni// gtum po chen po khro bo'i gzugs// thod pa'i dus bus rnam par brgyan// ma he la bzhugs ljags 'gyur ba// gsus pa che zhing 'jigs su rung // gtsigs shing gyen du
146b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sgra// de bzhin sma ra smin ma ser// g.yas pa rdo rje'i dbyug pa che// g.yon pa thod pa nyid kyang ste// rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag mtshungs// de ltar
