233a3(rgyud): kyichog gca ma yi// bcwo'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// de na bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan dag tu 'phrigs 'gyur ba// dngos grub mi shes pa myong 'gyur// yig yo ni phyag rgya 'das/
233a4(rgyud): pad+mo las skyes gzungs bzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na// pad+mo bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsten byas 'dod
233a5(rgyud): pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sdug cing la sogs rgyan pa yi// nyi ma'i 'od zer gsar byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis// pad+mo sems dpa'i tshe 'grub bo//
233a6(rgyud): ji tsam nam mkha' nye bar ni// dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lha mo yis ni mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag
233a7(rgyud): nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyis phye ma sbyor ba yis// sbrul ni bsod par
233b1(rgyud): gyur pa bzhis lkugs zag pa'i dga' byed 'ang/ cha'ang nang la thob 'gyur te// 'ang yim tha mang thams gdagos pa thams ca da dngas thub pa/ yang 'dod dngas thab dang yang pa// 'tsha
233b2(rgyud): 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthun chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa tsam gyis de dngos 'grub/ shin tu dgyes pa pad+mo 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes so// /
233b3(rgyud): dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// mtha' mar bsgyings pa'i rgyu nyid de// dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje gzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmang byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med
233b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di na dngos grub che// dpal gyi bsgyings pa 'thob par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni rgyal byed de// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor
233b5(rgyud): bsang de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed// bdag gi mthu mos rnang rgyal te// de yi khams gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// padz+ra rdo rje rab ldan bya// 'phreng byed
233b6(rgyud): 'brang ba'i tshul gyis su// 'phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te// bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur bas// rmya skyes
233b7(rgyud): can ni sbyar byas te// phyag byas btab ste rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor lte ba yi/ rdo rje bdag nyid mchod byed de// de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas// dkyil
234a1(rgyud): 'don du ma dang bsla pa rnasams dpa'adapa' thams 'gas shing thug pas na byadag nga shi kyis na rgyag kya gagrus da sa ba bya
234a2(rgyud): gakar ni yang dag pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyas// de yang de la 'jigs sngags nas/ rang go kyis mchog stobs par byed// bdag nyid chen po rigasags sa dang // rmab
234a3(rgyud): ngo ba'i dang // rdo rje 'dzin dang rtogs rnams dang // rang gi theg pa stobs par byed// gshin rje sha ka rjel po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la// 'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa'i rnams// srog ga phyir yang sa
234a4(rgyud): par byed// gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag/ myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa
234a5(rgyud): sna tshogs byed// de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te// rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed// gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dgas bu mo rnams// sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te// brtag pa
234a6(rgyud): mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yi// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub// lha dang klu yi bu mo dang // lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa// phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na// grub pa myur du
234a7(rgyud): dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung // gang de bud med bzung byas pa// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa'
234b1(rgyud): bo kun nyid du// skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe mang ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
234b2(rgyud): nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du// de bzhin thig le'i rgyal po ste// rab dgyes rdo rje lha che bde// mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyar ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin// phyag rgya'i
234b3(rgyud): yi ge 'di yis ni// mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas nas// des ni de ma thag tu yang // bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong /
234b4(rgyud): smin ma rnam bsgyur rgyas pa yis// lta ba'i phyag rgyas par byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang // pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzung ma'i tshogs
234b5(rgyud): rnams dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang // phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog/ glal bum me 'am yi dgas sam// sha za 'phrul gyi mi
234b6(rgyud): bramang 'dzin snying kha bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyaMs dang // bed+mo dra ba sna tshogs so// lha dang lha mam me dag dang // gzhan yang gnong sbyin tshun po dang // bdud dang
234b7(rgyud): bdud kyi tshogs rnams bya// gzhan gyis 'phrog par yong ma nus// lha dang lA min gyis mtshad cing // dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byung // lha dang lha min rten byed cing // skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed// sangs
235a1(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya ga dang // de ni rtsen cing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// zog
235a2(rgyud): ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas// dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin cher nang na rin chen 'gyur// pad+mo'i nang na pad+mor 'gyur// sna chog
235a3(rgyud): nang na sna tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs
235a4(rgyud): mchog 'gyur// mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur// rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rdor 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi lus la
235a5(rgyud): yon tan ni// yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur// ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs// 'phur zhing 'og tu 'bar bar byed// de ni nam yang phug nas 'gro// sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul
235a6(rgyud): rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gying bar gar byed pa// bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// mi
235a7(rgyud): g.yeng lta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'deg pa dang ni lta ba yis// gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de// ri dang sems can thams cad la//
235b1(rgyud): sA ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang // ci dga' bar ni mngag par byed// sdug pa'i ltabs srog chags rnams// rdeg pa dang ni sbal bar byed// gtus dang gadrug 'jigs che ba dang // ma tho'i skabs sprul bar/
235b2(rgyud): byed dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o// / dang po oM gyis
235b3(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku// bde ba skyes byed bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis kyang ni bsgoms ma
235b4(rgyud): thag par rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying kha ru// bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub// bsgrubs na
235b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang rtsen byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman yang dngos grub bo// shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob
235b6(rgyud): 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi// chu skyes zhabs la snyan par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo de'i// rig mas mthong na dga' byed de// phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yis// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i
235b7(rgyud): gzugs su 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas stod byed de// 'jigs par 'gyur
236a1(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis ni// bram bzhin du mchod byed cing // kun gyis bstod mchod bsti spang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog nam mkha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang /
236a2(rgyud): lam bcu yis 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen po 'grub par 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu// 'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cig// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ zil
236a3(rgyud): kyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de// lha dang lha min grul bum dang // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po/ phyag rgya'i ye shes
236a4(rgyud): byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blang gdul dka' rnams// de dag thams
236a5(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi// dam pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi// zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid/
236a6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang // chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung // 'tsho ba'i bar du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar zhabs 'bring du// rtsi bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab
236a7(rgyud): nang spod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong // rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i
236b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// dang por oM steng thig le'i ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// gsung ga rdo rje shin tu dgyes// bde gang sangs rgyas rbarbA/
236b2(rgyud): cad kyi// mchog tu ro ni myong byed pa// dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i// gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed// yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di// byang chub chen por grub byed de// yon tan yon tan sdug mtho
236b3(rgyud): ba'i nga tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na// dpal kun bdag po de ma thag/ bdag dang bdag rig 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob// phyag rgya 'di
236b4(rgyud): yis bdag gam gzhan// rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi// de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te// ci ste
236b5(rgyud): rmongs pas 'da' byed na// de yi srog ni tha ma yon// de yis bsrung ba byas na dpal// tshong ba lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mo za bar 'thob par 'gyur// phyag
236b6(rgyud): rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub
236b7(rgyud): mi ldog dang // chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klag pa// dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang // shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe//
237a1(rgyud): dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba// ji skad nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad de spyod do// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed/
237a2(rgyud): deni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur// rdo rje gsum de rmad byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed do// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// nam mkha'i rin
237a3(rgyud): par 'gro 'ong byed// lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dag/ gnas dang zas dang btung la sogs/
237a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i las ni skad cig rnyed// bud med rin chen mchog mkhas las// bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa// de yis khams gsum thob par byed// /
237a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med do// bud med mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i legs
237a6(rgyud): spyod spyad pas 'grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur// gzugs ma kun gyi bde chen po// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa
237a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa/ khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub
237b1(rgyud): par byed pa'o// / oM bcas mi byed tha mar te// rab tu sems ni bde ba ste// rdo rje rab dges bde byed che// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sem/
237b2(rgyud): ni rab bsgrubs pa// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas nas// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung // bde ba chen pos sems thams cad//
237b3(rgyud): sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang // lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa// skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur// lha mo rnams dang gar byed cig
237b4(rgyud): de ni rab dges bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byed rab dges byed// rab tu chen po bde thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang
237b5(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de// rang gi spyad pa'i//
237b6(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa// res dga' shin tu dga' spyod pa// res 'ga'
237b7(rgyud): khab nas 'byung ba dang // res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' skye dang res dga' 'pho// res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang // res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang
238a1(rgyud): chub dang res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// res 'ga' dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bud med skyes pa dang // res 'ga' lha dang skye
238a2(rgyud): dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag
238a3(rgyud): rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa// ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gi ngo bor ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa mi phyed nye byas te// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis de 'big/
238a4(rgyud): te dang gzung ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams// bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa// 'bod pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te/
238a5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan pas so// thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje
238a6(rgyud): shin tu dges pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid la skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis po
238a7(rgyud): rdza rnga'i sgra// rab dges rdo rje byin brlabs pa'o// lha mo de dang byed dbus gzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab gis thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa// dngos phrab thams cad bsgrus
238b1(rgyud): par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gas gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'angam skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myur dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// cha dngal 'choska la
238b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing // sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyis// 'phrul gyi
238b3(rgyud): bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen po dang byed kun tu myang ba med pa rtog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen
238b4(rgyud): mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyi mi phyed ma'o// / tshangs pa'i gsung ging ror bcas// tha mar dril bu'i nga ror gnyis// dbus su ming gi 'phreng ba ste// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs
238b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byed de// 'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams// yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor
238b6(rgyud): bas bsten byas na// rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha
238b7(rgyud): tshogs dang rtsen byed cing // lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jig par byed dang rku byed dang // sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro//
239a1(rgyud): stug po'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni// brjod la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro// brjid che bad+mo chen mo la// thams cad kun tu brjod pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed de// rab tu dgyes
239a2(rgyud): pas sgeg pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas// rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par mi 'dor ba 'thob// phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te// de ltar
239a3(rgyud): byas na phyag rgya dges// rdo rje shin tu dges pa chen mo'i dri ba med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// dang po nyid du oM bya ste// thig
239a4(rgyud): le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// cho ga drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mar bzhag byas te// rdo rje rab dges brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
239a5(rgyud): cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams
239a6(rgyud): dbangang gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang // sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa// thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste/
239a7(rgyud): sna tshogs rab 'byung yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing // spyod bcas so spyong 'jog rten snang byed de// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings
239b1(rgyud): pas rab tu dga'// A li kA li pad+mo mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur// 'dis ni bde ba'i ngob
239b2(rgyud): dedang 'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan
239b3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo sde thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// / dang po oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dges pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/
239b4(rgyud): dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin
239b5(rgyud): brlabs pa// sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyis yan lag dge/ kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub// sna tshogs
239b6(rgyud): sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur// de nas de yi chos dbyings nas// dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo// pad+mo
239b7(rgyud): mdun du thog ma'i lha// byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yi nang du gzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni// mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// A li kA li rab sbyor
240a1(rgyud): bas 'bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya'o// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas/
240a2(rgyud): dang po oM ni gnas pa ste// pra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin// 'di dag mnyam par sbyo
240a3(rgyud): ba yis// sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtag pa yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i brjod gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya// myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'ang
240a4(rgyud): dpal te// ba byed thams cad lci bar sgrub// sems can kun gyi 'dod spyad pa// bde ba chen par de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ pad+mo'i tshul du skrag pa yis// rdorje sbyor bas
240a5(rgyud): la gnas pas// rdo rje chen po de dngos grub// ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrub ma rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur//
240a6(rgyud): 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yis// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos/
240a7(rgyud): dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos rnams kun gyi rjes su mthun// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par
240b1(rgyud): cung zang med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo pe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge mchog gi sku'o// / dang po oM bcas lha mo yis// ba mar chog drag
240b2(rgyud): mi phyed gnyis// de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du// he zhes bya ba rnam brgyan te// shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na/
240b3(rgyud): 'brang ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni phyir sangs rgyas mthong // chu sus de dang rtsen par byed//
240b4(rgyud): de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni zlog pa dang // bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis//
240b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal po nyid kyis stobs byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba chen po mgu bar
240b6(rgyud): byed nga bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'di// shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/ rdo rje shin tu dges pa'i bde ba'i 'phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa
240b7(rgyud): dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// / oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya// te te skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su nye dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen
241a1(rgyud): dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab kyis 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster// sdig pa kun las grol byed/
241a2(rgyud): cing nga bsod nams thams cad nye ba 'gro// mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge rgyan te 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rig ma stong gis mngon par
241a3(rgyud): mchod byed cing // rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yeng byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel ba 'thob// blo ldan nam mkha' ngos ni thams
241a4(rgyud): cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed pas rol par
241a5(rgyud): byed dang pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis// glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed// ji nyid yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i/
241a6(rgyud): de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed// baT ba dgar dzaM'i dbyangs// glu r+ya blangs pas pad+mo gnas// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yi byin rlabs dag pa dang // 'di yi byim rlabs bde ba'i rnams/
241a7(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis sbyor ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen po'i dbyangs dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i
241b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de bzhin yoni dang por te/ gdabus su nyid byes bde ba che/ rdo rje gar byed dpe pa gnyis/ 'di ni thams cad bar byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab kyis nyid/ rnal 'byor yis
241b2(rgyud): ni rgyas btab ra// bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro// 'og mir gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'grogs// bde byed chen po'i dbang cheran dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob// ji snyid gar gyi
241b3(rgyud): gtsug lag las// sgyur ba byed pa bshad pa dang // ji snyed phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'dis dngos grub// kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po// kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che
241b4(rgyud): kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// bgrogasal bgar gyi ni// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs gar ni ston byed
241b5(rgyud): pas dang myur du gar ni mang byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub po// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o//
241b6(rgyud): bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// nam mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung ba'i// 'di yi
241b7(rgyud): thabs kyis mnyam bzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar bzung ba yi// tsha ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khar bsam par bya// nam mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di ni
242a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad dbung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba// rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzim dge yi// sna tshogs chen po thob/
242a2(rgyud): 'gyur gnas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis ri gos blo/ 'dod pa chen po sten par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i
242a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i skud pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// / de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'bral ba// tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya/
242a4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcad pa yang zos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na// sgra yis thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid la dngos grub ste/ bud med pa sgo
242a5(rgyud): ut+pal dang / ma lus rgyal ba'i rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mo sbyar bas na// dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi smad pe med pa dang ldan pa
242a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o// / oM ni spyi gtsug thig ler babs// rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can// rdo rje dri bder bris pa yis// tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'ang
242a7(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen po 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi// de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen// de nas chos
242b1(rgyud): dbyings gnas pa des// A li kA li ma nyam sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis// blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rdo rje'i dri dpe
242b2(rgyud): med pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya'o// / oM mchog gtsug gtor rnams byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du// rdo rje ro ni sbyor ba che// tha mar he ste thig le gnyis// 'di yi rab tu
242b3(rgyud): dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams
242b4(rgyud): kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o//
242b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// chags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
242b6(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shad nas cang
242b7(rgyud): mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba / byang chub
243a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi
243a2(rgyud): pho nya dang pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug
243a3(rgyud): nyid du// bzhag pa yos ni 'dud par byed// bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gcol mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye mamo spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye mtsho sbas pa ngo mtshar tshe//
243a4(rgyud): kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung // kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don// kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag che// kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o nying
243a5(rgyud): po yang dag bsdus// kye mo'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma'o sgrub pa rmang byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin// kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rig ma// kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che// kye ma'o dag pa gsum
243a6(rgyud): sbyar ba// kye ma'o rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i// kye ma'o pad+ma rnam bya bas// kye ma 'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma 'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o// kye ma'o gar ni dag pa che// kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med// kye ma'o so la snyan
243a7(rgyud): rnam par 'brel// kye ma'o brdab dang mun pa sel// kye ma 'odag byed me tog 'phreng // kye ma'o yog snod dge ba ste// kye ma 'o mar me mun pa sel// kyem madron shin tu bsil// kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par
243b1(rgyud): sbyor dbyar 'o sbyar banam mkha' 'ang/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rdza mchog kye ma mngon chen bde mchog bskyed// kye mamo sna tshogs pa mchog ldan// kye ma'o snga tshogs sbrum ma dang // kyem 'ong mchar sangs kyang /
243b2(rgyud): dang dkye ma'o mchar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar lnga yi rnams// shin tu dgyes tsha rdo rje la// rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'gying ba yis/
243b3(rgyud): dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes gyur te// sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas
243b4(rgyud): pa dang yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad do// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar mdud// rked pa'i dbyibs
243b5(rgyud): ni rnam par yangs// snam gyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// choms kyi 'phreng ba kun dazla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dgyes byed dgyes par bstod// bde
243b6(rgyud): bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing // gsang ba'i thig le'i 'jig rten gsum
243b7(rgyud): po 'dir ni dngos grub gtso bstan te/ 'jig rten gsum po sbyar bar bya ba'i chos de bder gshegs don du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung // bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa
244a1(rgyud): tshul bzhi mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i dang nyid zig la'i dkyil du spang mdzad de// byang chub skang po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar skul la snyan par mdzad// dzamatshan
244a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rigs pa'i tshe la dgyes shing bzhugs// bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzin bcas pas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas
244a3(rgyud): ni de la rag lus so// a la la ho/ yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// byams ma'i gzung ma bdag
244a4(rgyud): nyid che dang rab tu rtsen mdzod la// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu de'i bdag skur cig/ mi yi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir// dam tshig chen po gsum po gsum po 'di la gnas/
244a5(rgyud): nas ni// zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu srid pa'i skyo ba yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur du bskul/
244a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dgyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dpa/
244a7(rgyud): las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tud dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang /
244b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro dang / rnam ma pa' la 'grom mchags sa bcas pa'i rnams dang / phyi nang marjo rigs las smras pa'i rnams las shin tung byas pa skyes pa
244b2(rgyud): chen po'i gar dang / dbyangs dang / rdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes
244b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang sa gsung bar gyur to// de nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du// pus po'i sgra
244b4(rgyud): nga btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol// gang gi sems can pade nyid kyi// bde bas dkyil 'tsho/
244b5(rgyud): sgrub par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te dkyil 'khor mdzad do// phyag gnyis kar dang bcas
244b6(rgyud): baM yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams sam// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// snor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom po phan tshun/
244b7(rgyud): bsnol byas te// shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod spyir sbyar byas te// lhag ma 'ong bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gis bci/
245a1(rgyud): #pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob po// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// dag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// bcoma'i gsar
245a2(rgyud): gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin brlabs gar byas te// rdo rje dpal mo bzhag byas nas// sems ni bzhugs
245a3(rgyud): pas bsgrub byas la// de nas sems de blang bya ste// blo ldan de yis btung byas te// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am// de bzhin gshegs
245a4(rgyud): pa 'phral rtag 'thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis// kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus// shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// / thal mo
245a5(rgyud): de nyid khro skyes pa// sbom po skyil krung bzhag byas te// sna tshogs 'phreng ba 'bar byed pa// rnal 'byor gyi ni lhag ma spro// 'do na rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab
245a6(rgyud): pasang rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'din bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal/
245a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang // rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas// sa cher 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs// rdo rje bung mer
245b1(rgyud): 'ardzogs pa dang / rjorje bzugs kyang kyil 'khor du/ rnga rdzasems nyid 'thab par 'gyur/ ji wa dngos grub 'dug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje pa'abo bas// skad cag gcig gis 'dren par byung / bsngal nga
245b2(rgyud): mnyes par bya ba dang // rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang // gsol bar byed dang za ba dang // phan tshun du mi skyed par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje 'brang ba zhes bya ba
245b3(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// / rdo rje thal po de nyid las// khro bo rgyab ni bskur byas te// sor mo lhag ma snga pa bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur
245b4(rgyud): ba'o/ ri ma sa dang gdon dang dug la sogs// de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kyis ni dgyes pa thob// 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang // 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam
245b5(rgyud): pang 'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis// rang dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub bo// mi la 'di yis byin brlabs te// nyi ma phyed nas spyad byas nas// 'di
245b6(rgyud): ni de ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'drar 'gyur// zhag bdun gyis gyur gzhan gyis min// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dbang du byed/
245b7(rgyud): grol 'don rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum/
246a1(rgyud): du bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o// / pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid// dag zam tho mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te//
246a2(rgyud): tshig dang tshig rnams bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam par de 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa
246a3(rgyud): yis dang pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags
246a4(rgyud): chen po nyes spangs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa// sgrub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di yi pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de bde mchog rtag thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen
246a5(rgyud): pos myos par byed pa'i dpal pad+mo 'phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// / 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas gzhag par byas
246a6(rgyud): pa ni rangam lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por der 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs
246a7(rgyud): rang sna tshogs bdag/ sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin brlabs nas/ rdza
246b1(rgyud): mas pazung ches pa' ma nga/ dang ldan par byas pas// rnamams ma sa can par 'grus/ sanangs grang dag sa rnams dus mam sa
246b2(rgyud): nas da las kyi dngos zlang thob par 'gyu jigs ngan can dang sme ma dang // sar ma 'an bzhin par byung dag / yus rgya la shes byin parlabs te/ bsan dang dngos pa thob par 'gyu shin kya byas pa sna sa
246b3(rgyud): bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// / phyag rgyang dag bstan pa'i rnams/ gar gyi rgyal gyis rang gis gnas 'dabatshig pa
246b4(rgyud): gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed do// mnga' yi tshul gyis gzung bar bya// 'don rab dgyes ga
246b5(rgyud): bo yi rang pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis myos byed pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mi shes byed pa 'jig par byed// las kyi don
246b6(rgyud): ni bka' bzhin du// dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i
246b7(rgyud): bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// / snying khar bzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yi las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed/
247a1(rgyud): rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang // thams cad 'di yis slong bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor/
247a2(rgyud): bar byed// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// bdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mor bcug pa yis// mchebs ma mchu
247a3(rgyud): bzung byas te// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis// dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas// 'deb chen po'i bde 'thob po// 'dod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang
247a4(rgyud): thar par grub byed de// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing // nam mkha' gzung ba'i thabs nyid kyi// phan tshun bcu pa'i gnon pa
247a5(rgyud): yis dang bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo// de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// sbyin po yis ni phyag byas nas//
247a6(rgyud): rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid kyi dpal can stobs pa yin// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing // sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi nadu//
247a7(rgyud): las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzung dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang
247b1(rgyud): gnas dang sbas pa dang // spyod pas gar gyis byas pas so// gzhan dag kyang dngos grub che// pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams che bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni bcwo sdug/ bzhin gshegs pa
247b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa'i dpal mo 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par bya'o// / thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis/
247b3(rgyud): bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya/ byag rgya 'dini nr-i srin zhes/ rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin/ rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste ka/ 'dod bral chags par
247b4(rgyud): sgrub pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// de phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni skor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pas bskor// sdig spangs rnams ni
247b5(rgyud): bkug nas kyang // spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar snyan par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs/
247b6(rgyud): ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin brlabs te/
247b7(rgyud): snying khar nye bar bsam byas na// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang // sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang // pi wang gling bu rdza rnga yis/
248a1(rgyud): phyag tu 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu byas pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thal
248a2(rgyud): mod nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'byangs shing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing ba chen pos bcings byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du// g.yon du 'gying bas bstan par
248a3(rgyud): byas dang byas rgya 'dzin rdul la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te/ 'byung ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na// dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// 'bying btsam gyi sbyor ba yis// 'gying ba thams cad
248a4(rgyud): 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo lha dang lha min dang // de bzhin mi
248a5(rgyud): 'am bdag por 'gyur// nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzung ma rnams kyi dag pa dag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad
248a6(rgyud): las ni byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya tham
248a7(rgyud): cad 'grub pa'o// / phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste// lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas// myur bar steng du dor ba yis// mgyogs su 'gro ba dang saM grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas
248b1(rgyud): cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gar gyis mchod byas na// thams cad las byed dngos grub bo// gang dag dngos grub med pa dang // gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams// de dag phyag rgya'i
248b2(rgyud): 'dis btab na// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis thams cad las rnams ni// rmad byung ngam pa 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// 'di yis de ni 'grub par byed//
248b3(rgyud): gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi 'phreng
248b4(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor// steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa// 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang /
248b5(rgyud): bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis// skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso
248b6(rgyud): bo 'dis mnyes nas// mchog gi thabs ni stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa// dngos po thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig pa
248b7(rgyud): thams cad 'phrog byed de// bde ba pad+ma 'thob byed cing // tshe 'di dang ni pha rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu gyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dri pa thams cad spang ba
249a1(rgyud): dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o// / thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgreng // lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog tu snang byed
249a2(rgyud): pa'ong thog ma med nas bskor ba yis// 'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de// mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang // pad+mo dra ba dga'
249a3(rgyud): ba che// sna tshogs drab dpal chen po// bde phyed chen po 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i rape med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / g.yas dang g.yon pa
249a4(rgyud): lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor bzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub byed do// thams cad
249a5(rgyud): don rnams grub pa dge/ bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyal chen po// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub
249a6(rgyud): bo daphyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas na// skad cig gcig gi gar byas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog kyang // 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs
249a7(rgyud): gar gyi gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs
249b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
249b2(rgyud): cad kyi mchog tu gsang bzla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa ka gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal
249b3(rgyud): pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
249b4(rgyud): 'di bshad nas/ slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam
249b5(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhed
249b6(rgyud): nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te dgyes par byed do// rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen
249b7(rgyud): po yis// skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa// shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyug ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzung ma'i dkyil nas skyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar
250a1(rgyud): drang du byung bas bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'das pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing // gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de/
250a2(rgyud): bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyal dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing // bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnam dag pa/
250a3(rgyud): nyon mongs mi go sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur/
250a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ras yan// ji ltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad// kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par
250a5(rgyud): mdzod// byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston// de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal
250a6(rgyud): pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po dbang skur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdun du gnas te dngos grub
250a7(rgyud): sbyin de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chen po la/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol
250b1(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba byas pa dang / gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bya/
250b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdor mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo
250b3(rgyud): bzhi pa/ karta babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan// dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras// do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gdugs
250b4(rgyud): ni rnam bres pa// sna tshogs 'phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed bstan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan//
250b5(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan de dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes// stan de la ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid
250b6(rgyud): bzhin nor bu bu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug gis rnam par mdzes// tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis// dbu la chun pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas//
250b7(rgyud): chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam gyis// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che// snying khar gsor la shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob
251a1(rgyud): ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnams brgyan pa// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la so//
251a2(rgyud): pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhes su smra// des ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang
251a3(rgyud): bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ongs bu mo btsal byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bad pa// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam
251a4(rgyud): sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo spro byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan//
251a5(rgyud): lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag/ g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mnga' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub bdag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/
251a6(rgyud): gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing // 'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chub tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan
251a7(rgyud): mdzes ma'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba
251a8(rgyud): rlo
251b1(rgyud): rab bslabs gzhag ga g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor pa la shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'grob thams/
251b2(rgyud): cad myos 'gyur ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar gyen bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams// bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen
251b3(rgyud): po 'od ldan pa// ci rigs par ni gzhag par// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad bu rang gi las kyi phyag rgya ldan// skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa// sgo bsrungs bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs
251b4(rgyud): rnams// pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang // rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang // mu ra dza dang ra dang // ga ra dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi
251b5(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag pa yi dgas rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/
251b6(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par
251b7(rgyud): byed gsod par byed dang spro bar byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong
252a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags chen mo dang chags bral dang // 'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te// ci rigs
252a2(rgyud): nub tu gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang srub pa// gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni/ bya
252a3(rgyud): rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing // 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te// lag pacwa
252a4(rgyud): dpanga'akhar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa// bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong // gsus pa phye la lto 'phyangs ma/
252a5(rgyud): nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang // khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i gdong // rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros
252a6(rgyud): pa rus pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// lto 'tshangs mo la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thob par brtson pa yis// ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs
252a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// sgo bsrungs kyi ni phyogs kun tu// sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba// byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa sna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o// lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po
252b1(rgyud): gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog wan
252b2(rgyud): bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// spyan lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnam lnga yis brgyan byas pa'o// bum pa bcu drug bzhag byas te// bcu gnyis
252b3(rgyud): brgyad ma yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang // ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag byas te// dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung
252b4(rgyud): lcags sems las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba sgrub por ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams// sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pa// kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog
252b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te// btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yos// rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga/
252b6(rgyud): dbang nga tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// tshad meng rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod par byas// sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam bzhag ste// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma spyir/
252b7(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la// he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin brlabs te// spyan drangs gtsang sbras byas pa dbul// gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyes pa byas nas slar
252b8(rgyud): smra smras sa
252b9(rgyud): sa nasu sa
252b10(rgyud): bya/ sa da/ sa sa/ smra
252b11(rgyud): gang dge slob dpon spong byed dang / yang dag bka' rnams ma byed pa// de dag zos nas grab chen po// blo ldan tshwa las btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gdod byed dang // srib ngan la
252b12(rgyud): na byung ba// rdorje sa bsdus pa yis// dmachog pa sgoms tu bskal bar bya// de nas das tshig drung byas te// rdo rje bdud byar yo bto// drang chen pa granas panaH// dardza rje 'i zung /
252b13(rgyud): kye dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di ste// khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung // oM badz+ra u da ka hUM Ta// dam tshig la ni brgyar bzlas pa'i// byin gyis
252b14(rgyud): brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug/ sgo grwar gnas nas dri ba bya/
252b15(rgyud): gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'jas
252b16(rgyud): bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnam lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i// bum pa bcu drug bzhag byas te// bcu gnyis
252b17(rgyud): brgyad ma yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang // ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag byas te// dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung
252b18(rgyud): lcags sems las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba sgrub por ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams// sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pa// kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog
252b19(rgyud): tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te// btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yos// rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga/
252b20(rgyud): dbang nga tshad med 'dod pa ni yon tan lnga// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod par byas// sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam bzhag ste// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin/
252b21(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la// he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin brlabs te// spyan drangs gtsang sbras byas pa dbul// gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyes pa byas nas slar
253a1(rgyud): gshegs so// rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya// mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// lag pa
253a2(rgyud): g.yon gyis bzung byas te// rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du// blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya// 'di las mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis//
253a3(rgyud): rtag tu dogs pa med byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang // skye bo gang dag dam la gnon// brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te// khrag chen po ni btung bar bya//
253a4(rgyud): gang dag slob dpon smod byed dang // gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/ de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan snying las btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // slob dpon la yang
253a5(rgyud): gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yis// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig brung byas te// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog/ dung chen por gzhag par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu brud do//
253a6(rgyud): kyi tshul ba yon chu 'dis// myong gyi skang la kun tu gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung // oM badz+ra u da ka dz+dzaH// dam tshig ma ni brgyad bzlas pa'o//
253a7(rgyud): brlabs te 'thung dru gzug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshigs la dga' zhes// slob ma sngags na brjod dugasu// sgo bAr gnas nas ji ba bya/
253b1(rgyud): nga dga' btsal dang / 'jug pa yis kyang sgrubab// bdag ni skal ldan pa mchog la// rab kyis 'phrul la bdag dga'as// mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'a'o// de nas rnal 'byoms mtshan
253b2(rgyud): gis nga dkyil du me tog por byas te// me tog gang la ltung ba yi// lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo// dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang // mnyam
253b3(rgyud): par bzhag ste lnga po yis// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te// de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs pa ni gzung ma'i rnams// bdag ni skal ldan zhos su smra// gang dag 'go bar gyur pa yi//
253b4(rgyud): de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzung ma de'i// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/
253b5(rgyud): sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+mo las drangs pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blang // rdo rje dkan du bzhag byas nas// rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma bde ba blang
253b6(rgyud): bar bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog go// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i// rang gi khar ni rdo rje gzhag/ sems dpa' chen po drangs bya na// sems kyi byang chub bde ba 'tho
253b7(rgyud): 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur ba yi bde ba'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad bsgrag mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di
254a1(rgyud): yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzung ma rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag/
254a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te// ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya// gzung ma de ni bdag nyid la/ bla
254a3(rgyud): ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bskur shin tu sbas pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir/
254a4(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no// de tshun chad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad// yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon
254a5(rgyud): rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gzung de dag ni thams cad la// ci dga' ba ni yon yang 'bul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid
254a6(rgyud): la bsam pa'i yon yang rung // dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs pa yis// de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul byas te// seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi
254a7(rgyud): mang sangs rgyas byin yon mtshag yon// glang po mtshan gas dag dang // sring po tha ma ma yin pa chag yon// rdo rjesams dpa rigs yin te// yon mchag gi yin yin no// rin chen pa d+mo chu
254b1(rgyud): dang nga shing rtartan shin tu brgyan/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa/ pra tig 'phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yis ni dbang phyug dang //
254b2(rgyud): chung ma bla mar dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs// glang po ca ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tam bla mar dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan
254b3(rgyud): slob ma yis// ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog
254b4(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu// pad+mo'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje
254b5(rgyud): rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kur dang // rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar// nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba
254b6(rgyud): cheng sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sbas
254b7(rgyud): pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas par dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod
255a1(rgyud): par bya// 'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi// myangs nas mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis// rang rig khyad par shes byas te// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs
255a2(rgyud): byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgur rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/
255a3(rgyud): bde byed chen po'i skyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// lha rnams kyang ni re re yang // sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas// 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba// mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan/
255a4(rgyud): 'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yis// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod// kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing / 5
255a5(rgyud): bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu band
255a6(rgyud): cing nga spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skyil mo krung chen po
255a7(rgyud): dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgyam ma shes nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka btegs byas te// bdag nyid brjen mi snang bzhin
255b1(rgyud): rtsa bskyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni/ gar bya sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdas kyi bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ bdug pa dang ni ngan thams cad/ skang cig gis ma/
255b2(rgyud): spos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du thob// mi phyed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas// 'byung ba'i tshe ni
255b3(rgyud): phaT ces bshad// pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya// mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yi sa rtsen par byas pa na//
255b4(rgyud): nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad+mo las byung ba// bde byed mchog gi dbang
255b5(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas rab dga' ba de thob pa// sems dpa' deng ni dngos grub po// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan// gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad//
255b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro nye bar gtses pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las 'grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs thams cad sdang byed cing //
255b7(rgyud): sa yi sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya// rtsa ba'i skyil mo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don// thams
256a1(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed pa'o// bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yi rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / khams
256a2(rgyud): gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung // sngags pa'i yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzir gtsang
256a3(rgyud): ma yi bzhag bdun sgom pa bsgom byas nas// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas nas// gdon mi za bar rgyal po thob// yid bzhin dgod pa
256a4(rgyud): thams cad byed// rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // gzugs ma ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi sdang bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung // 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul
256a5(rgyud): zhing 'phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed do// dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo
256a6(rgyud): thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyis rgyas 'debs na// mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ri// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// tsi ste bdag nyid rgyal po
256a7(rgyud): rurung mchog tu rmad byung sgrub 'dod na// rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshar// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin pa mam/
256b1(rgyud): skyil mo'o// de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pad+mo 'dra ba sbyar byas te// bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas/
256b2(rgyud): rnams dag dang // rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yi// bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed// sems can khams rnams thams cad du// sems dpa'
256b3(rgyud): chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+mo'i skyil mo'o// de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te// sna tshogs tshul gyi sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yi// sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson// zlos pa byed
256b4(rgyud): cing rnam bsgoms na// dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur// mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yis// las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs spyil du gnas pa yis// bla med dngos grub 'thob/
256b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o// de nas mkha' 'gro ma yi skyil mo rgyas// thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzung ma yaM ni rkang pa gnyis// yid kyis gnya' bar rkang pa 'deg/ rdo rje
256b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par bzhag nas gzung ma yi// rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas nas// zas rnams thams
256b7(rgyud): cad 'phrog byed do// btung dang bza' ba bca' ba dang // gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byed gdon mi za// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po
257a1(rgyud): yi dang dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// khams gsum rim par rgal bar byed// mig ni btsum par byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po
257a2(rgyud): rnam par 'jig/ rus sbal bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// mi g.yeng skad cig bcings byas na// gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang // dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod 'phrog/ sbal pa bzhin du mnyam
257a3(rgyud): bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed// gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas
257a4(rgyud): gdab bya// gar dbang gi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa
257a5(rgyud): gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyil mo phyed ni mnyam bzhag nas// gnyis pa yis ni mnan byas na// khams gsum
257a6(rgyud): thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam bzhag pas// skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams gsum thams cad dngos grub
257a7(rgyud): bong rigs 'dzin rnam par bzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi// mdor 'dus gzung ma'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten gsum ni rnam
257b1(rgyud): rgyal te// skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te// thams cad sgon 'gebs pa yis// che ba sbom po rab tu sbya galas/
257b2(rgyud): kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon pa'i brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya// myur du mnan
257b3(rgyud): pas bteg bya zhing // mthe'u chung bo ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la reg byas te// sa bon tshag drag hri ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi 'am ni rig ma drang bar bya// lce mi
257b4(rgyud): thog mar spro byas te// 'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste// kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis// sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te// khros pa mche ba sbyor ba yis// sor mo thos pa
257b5(rgyud): bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni btung bar bya// yi ge dang po oM dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags// u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni khro bo'i snying po ste//
257b6(rgyud): mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig/
257b7(rgyud): btsums nas// rang gi lus ni skum byas te// bum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya// nga ro dang po yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po bsgom
258a1(rgyud): byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro// de yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// 'tshe ba gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gror
258a2(rgyud): mche ba dang // 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog
258a3(rgyud): par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams// snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi
258a4(rgyud): dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus pa zhe sar bcas pa yis// shin tu lhag par phyogs par bya// nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed// myur du
258a5(rgyud): na rag lhung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang // gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen po de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde//
258a6(rgyud): de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba chen po rdo
258a7(rgyud): rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog gsang
258b1(rgyud): basbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
258b2(rgyud): gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs kyi
258b3(rgyud): g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po smras te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye
258b4(rgyud): shes bde ba che// kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che// gang bde phyir ni rig pa yi// pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad// kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bde// sems can
258b5(rgyud): kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad// kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro'i dri bas gar mdzad cing // bsnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang // mnye ba ni 'phrog pa'i tshogs// e ma'o//
258b6(rgyud): shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la spyod pa dang // sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs
258b7(rgyud): spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams ca rang gi gdan las bzhengs
259a1(rgyud): te sa shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad
259a2(rgyud): do nga sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yin// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bsten te// rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab cing // chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang
259a3(rgyud): snyoms mdzad// e ma'o 'di lta'i gzung ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma// byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jugapa 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag
