259a4(rgyud): dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor
259a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad la yud tsam yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar mnyam par zhugs
259a6(rgyud): te dbugs mi rngub/ dbugs mi 'dzin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad pa bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshegs par mi mdzad// gsung
259a7(rgyud): bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mdzad bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad
259b1(rgyud): pa nang 'deng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
259b2(rgyud): yang dang yang du 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
259b3(rgyud): zhugs te bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang thim pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa
259b4(rgyud): 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa'ang med/ khros pa dang / gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
259b5(rgyud): gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
259b6(rgyud): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan la gtsos pa dang / gcig gi sha gcig gi za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs
259b7(rgyud): la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
260a1(rgyud): cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
260a2(rgyud): la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do// ho rang bzhin dag pa dag pa pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa mtha'
260a3(rgyud): nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang / byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ a la la la ho/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi mchog dang ldan// sdug
260a4(rgyud): bsngal kun sel ba yi thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/ dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags// gsang ba'i 'gro
260a5(rgyud): ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrog nam mkha' la// dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phangs pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho
260a6(rgyud): skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis// mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nas su// bying ba'i lha rnams bslang du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul
260a7(rgyud): byas na// pad+mo ba rdo rje dang // bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol// bde ba chen po bde gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon par
260b1(rgyud): mdzad dang de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
260b2(rgyud): bzhengs nas/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsum 'di stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
260b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
260b4(rgyud): mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
260b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye ba bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
260b6(rgyud): thog mar oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste// 'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// phyung nas nam
260b7(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro ba'i snang bar byas te/ slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
261a1(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hUM hUM hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas
261a2(rgyud): bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dus pa g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spun rgyas pa che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang /
261a3(rgyud): ldan dang sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa// dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzoni// rdo rje rgyu mar rab tu gnas/ mkhas pa gang gi snying kha nyid//
261a4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+mo bde tshe yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms/
261a5(rgyud): par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen
261a6(rgyud): po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas// mthar ni dra ste tsheg drag bcas//
261a7(rgyud): 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang // sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te// slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur//
261b1(rgyud): de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yis tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnam lnga yangs par spyan// chu skyes
261b2(rgyud): bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs rgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khar rin chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis/
261b3(rgyud): dri ma gsum spangs brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngor rig pa'i// nad kyis slongs pa 'jigs par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas tham
261b4(rgyud): cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mngangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gnod chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang // nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du// nyid kyi snying khar 'di byas te// /
261b5(rgyud): nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // dngos grub don mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu
261b6(rgyud): bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i
261b7(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang bzla gsang thig le las phyung ngo // dang po oM dang ldan byas te// mi pyad rab tags
262a1(rgyud): 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor// sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste// snying khar 'di ni sbyar byas nas/
262a2(rgyud): bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing // pad+mo sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub
262a3(rgyud): 'thob// pad+mo che lus byung nas kyang // thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis
262a4(rgyud): sprul pa ni// de nas 'dod chags babs nas kyang // pad+mo'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing // 'dzum bcas pad+mo phye ba yis// thugs
262a5(rgyud): kyi dbus su yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma bltam// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol
262a6(rgyud): babadang brjid pa'i gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs// 'di yis pad+mo'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i
262a7(rgyud): phyag ni stong rnams kyi// gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu gyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba
262b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zlagasang thig le'i chen po las phyung ngo // sna tshogs chen po oM chen po// steng du cig
262b2(rgyud): ler yang dag ldan// 'di ni dbus te lnga 'og khro// sngams kyi mchos ni gzhag par bya/ sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags/ sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas/ sangs rgyas tshul ba'in kun ma nyes byas// de'adi sder/
262b3(rgyud): 'khor bar bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid
262b4(rgyud): zabar bar gtong / phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// 'byed sna tshogs mtshon che gtong // zhal lnga sna chags yangs cheg/ bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gar bar gzhan nas/
262b5(rgyud): byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du bsgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// snga
262b6(rgyud): tshogs las ni sde tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen po lem ci dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan/
262b7(rgyud): 'das la mnyes par mdzad do// gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi dngos po dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rigs byag/
263a1(rgyud): rgya yan lag bcas// lha yi de yi pha rol phyin// bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi
263a2(rgyud): mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// spyod pa'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dor ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long/
263a3(rgyud): ye shes yang dag 'byung // bya ba nan tan sems can don// rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// de nyid rig pas sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs
263a4(rgyud): rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
263a5(rgyud): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM b+h+rUM stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra ts+tshit+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kA ya oM/ oM badz+ra bAk+ka AH/ oM badz+ra A b+hi Shiny+tsa traM
263a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi
263a7(rgyud): snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o// zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do// dge 'ongs
263b1(rgyud): rgyal ba tham// ngam mngan 'a rgyal ba ma tshag/ dasa' dam la lags pa'i las// gamadan 'a sngon 'grub// ngan 'a dag na sna tshogs na// nyid kyi stong yar ngas byas te// rang gigasang ba bshad par mdza/
263b2(rgyud): gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
263b3(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung
263b4(rgyud): ngo.oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ti ri Shi dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
263b5(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA maHpra t+ya pra pek+Sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang
263b6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang gzugs
263b7(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA kr-i t+ya a nuste ne dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ oM dge 'o dge 'o stong pa che/
264a1(rgyud): oM dge'o dge 'o thugs chen po// oM dge 'o dge lo sku chen po// oM dge 'o dge 'o gsung chen po// oM dge 'o dge'o rin po che'o// dge 'o dge'o sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
264a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du bar mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid
264a3(rgyud): kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris
264a4(rgyud): nas rang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor
264a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil
264a6(rgyud): 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'o// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
264a7(rgyud): par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gzugs dpalang chos brgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yangs
264b1(rgyud): gzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs 'bras// mnyam par bzhag ste byin brlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gzhag/ gnyis po mdun du banag bus pa/
264b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun
264b3(rgyud): mo chedang dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag gnas// rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste/ gsod
264b4(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za// dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// grwa dag tu ni thams cad du// snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo bsrungs
264b5(rgyud): rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// spo ba che
264b6(rgyud): bas gar bya zhing // lha yi 'gying ba'i 'dun pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lags pas bzung nas kyang // sgo yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste// sngon
264b7(rgyud): lam mchog ni spu ru gzhug/ rdo rje chen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rang gi dgyes nas las byung ba'i// bde byed chen mo'i mnyes par bgyi// ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid thob// me
265a1(rgyud): tog 'phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la lhung ba yis// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod/
265a2(rgyud): dang mthun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi rab dgyes smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi byed paT// mtha' na ho zhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung
265a3(rgyud): ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas te// bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang // ci bde bar ni
265a4(rgyud): dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la gtugs byas te// bla ma la ni dbang bslang bya// shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen po yi// snyoms par
265a5(rgyud): zhugs te de bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te// spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya// lag pa yis ni ma reg par// kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bde bar ni btung bar bya// gzung
265a6(rgyud): ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dbul ba// ma dang srong mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang // de bzhin
265a7(rgyud): longs spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang // glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi ni sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin gshegs
265b1(rgyud): pa thams cad dang // rdo rje dang ni gzung ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yini
265b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du bla phyed tshun chad du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te// phyi nas dkyil
265b3(rgyud): 'khor bstan par bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams// dmyal bar dka' ba grangs med smin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nar tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/
265b4(rgyud): dam tshig srung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che//
265b5(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid nges 'thob bo// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te// de na sngags kyi don mi smin/
265b6(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// rams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang // de bzhin
265b7(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rnams// dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par byed// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed/
266a1(rgyud): gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lo// dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor/
266a2(rgyud): dung bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang // rdo rje las byang chubasgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/
266a3(rgyud): dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis// myur du dam tshig bsgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur// ma
266a4(rgyud): 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba yi yid
266a5(rgyud): du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de
266a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/
266a7(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen po rnams bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis
266b1(rgyud): shong sade nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang
266b2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen
266b3(rgyud): po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrug pa chen
266b4(rgyud): por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du lhags nas/ brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/ tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin te/
266b5(rgyud): gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu
266b6(rgyud): snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa
266b7(rgyud): rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin
267a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro ga nyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen po cha
267a2(rgyud): snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra d+h+r-i ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+ha dza b+he dza/ da had ha/ pa tsa pa tsan+du/ b+h+raM/ brah+mA ya prastA ya/ br-ikra n+ya na sarbam/
267a3(rgyud): rArasar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ ma ta ma te/ mo ta mo ta/ hUM bruM/ hUM traM/ traT traT/ b+h+r-i hUM traM/ d+hU traM traT/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du
267a4(rgyud): bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che ba'i lha chen po ste gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbug
267a5(rgyud): dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas/ rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgad pa'i gdangs 'dzin pas 'jig rten thams
267a6(rgyud): cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
267a7(rgyud): pad+mo'i dri ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
267b1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i kha nas phyung ngo // oM pad+ma mahA dz+wa la ma pA kro d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ khA hi Sha hi sar+b+ba duSh+TAM pra dum+b+ha naM/ da ma dam/ badz+radaSh+To ta ka Ta ma ta ma tak+Sho Ta k+ShoT/ badz+ra la ra/ tsa ba la du na theg
267b2(rgyud): tra sa tra sa/ ma hA badz+ra ba Da ba mu kha/ pra ma ta pre ma ta hUM phaT/ hri ha ha hi hi/ tsa tur mu kha/ be sha prA Na sha na/ hUM hrI hUM hUM d+hIHha/ de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar phad pad cing kha spub tu
267b3(rgyud): 'gyel te rngab 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod
267b4(rgyud): ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na stong pa dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir khyod kyi gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i/
267b5(rgyud): lus can thams cad rlag par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang / tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me lce stong
267b6(rgyud): gis gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pa'i lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang
267b7(rgyud): lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
268a1(rgyud): zugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs kanas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ ma bkro d+ha sar+b+ba duSh+TA na sa ma b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha han ha na hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin/
268a2(rgyud): gyikhang pa 'di thams cad dum bur brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'ang 'gul zhing kun tu 'byor nas gnas par 'gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa'ang kha spu ba tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur/
268a3(rgyud): tong de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod me lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs
268a4(rgyud): thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na/ de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang / srin po chen po'i gzugs
268a5(rgyud): bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
268a6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes la 'jug par
268a7(rgyud): mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas/ bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i rnom chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mche ba chen po 'byin pa zha la mi
268b1(rgyud): sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi mtshan po stong gi gzi brjid can/ rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bangs pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ ngur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag rgya ma'i keng rus dang / khrag dang /
268b2(rgyud): sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang / tshal rnams zas su gsol ba/ me'i pags pas sna ma g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo bo'o 'phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang khong bu dang
268b3(rgyud): rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / ce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu
268b4(rgyud): gnas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par
268b5(rgyud): byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil
268b6(rgyud): bar gyur te gnas so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du'ang pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje'ur ru
268b7(rgyud): chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
269a1(rgyud): bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing / khro bo chen po'i rnam par brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam/
269a2(rgyud): pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams
269a3(rgyud): cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs sngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thang du song ste/ rje cig rje cig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i
269a4(rgyud): bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcug nas/ 'jigs byed gdungs pa bal skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su
269a5(rgyud): 'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing / bgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to// oM
269a6(rgyud): mahA b+hai ra ba beSh+Ta~MSh+Ti/ TaT rba ta Ta ta/ ha ha oM ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro
269a7(rgyud): 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te/ he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbubs bu drangs nas/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang rnams za zhing
269b1(rgyud): che mche ma mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo// mamo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor bcas te spab ba nas/ khro bo bdag nyid//
269b2(rgyud): kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du'ang bcug/ dam tshig la'ang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po blo
269b3(rgyud): bo chen po drag po bzhad pas bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo
269b4(rgyud): tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo d+ha bo d+ha/ mahA b+hai ra ba da rab pa sA ra ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra khAny+dza b+hany+dza
269b5(rgyud): shIg+h+ra~M ma hA badz+ra/ tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha da pa na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do//
269b6(rgyud): khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bskor ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag rgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar
269b7(rgyud): ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad ma tshar 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra an+d+ra n+yA hAs hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hUM ha/ i ti/ de
270a1(rgyud): nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par kha sbub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas/ mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad
270a2(rgyud): dong oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ha na ha na/ kr-ih+na gr-ih+Na hUM/ ma ta ma ta kiny+tsa rA ya si/ sUr+ya sa ha pra hasti/ re ka ba su rA dza la la rtsi pra dz+wA la ti/ ma hA murti A kan+t+ra A kan+d+ha a bya wa ma bya wa maM/ kri na pa tsakra b+hai ra ba
270a3(rgyud): hrid yaM hUM b+hI/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhed cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to// de nas 'khor
270a4(rgyud): lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ kha sbub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la sbyas/
270a5(rgyud): su song ngo // de nas biSh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so// kA le kA ye gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te
270a6(rgyud): ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song zhig/ de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te gdabs nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin
270a7(rgyud): chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba sUr+ya b+hi kra Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha gar pa su d+he/ ram sa med ma dzen/ oM bA b+ha b+hI/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlag par gyu'o/
270b1(rgyud): gnas so// de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang / ma hA shrI dang / lag sme yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par brtul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis d+ha/
270b2(rgyud): gdong chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba Da ba mu la kha la khA hI lA h+ni/ tsa tur mu lA/ bi ba pi ba/ A s+ya ru d+hi raM/ A kaD+D+h+ya a kaD+D+h+ya/ hr-id yAM trA na/ ha ma he/ badz+ra b+ha ga ba mu ka
270b3(rgyud): haM hi kha ma hA/ shwa shwe shwe ra NI hrIM/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang
270b4(rgyud): nas rgyu bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor ba la sbub 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyobs shig ces smras so// kA ye ka ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song / khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma dul re zhes smras/
270b5(rgyud): song de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams
270b6(rgyud): myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor ro// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra sa ti dang / shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom// de'i tshogs kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhugs so//
270b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen pos khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do// oM gu la gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ a kaR+Sha ya a kaR+Sha ya shakra
271a1(rgyud): hrid ya/ ma hA badz+ra daMSh+TA ya/ hUM bAk+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to//
271a2(rgyud): de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos bsgyings te/ mi bzad par khros gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin zhes de la smras so// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khros rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug
271a3(rgyud): gi nor bu phyung snying yang dral te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so// de nas ngo'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing spangs pa'i yid du gyur te
271a4(rgyud): skyabs su nye bar gyur to// de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rol cing
271a5(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad
271a6(rgyud): dong oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha sa he ro ba saM ha ra sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ ut+ta ba kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/ swA pa ya swA pa ya/ sarba kro d+ha ma duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba
271a7(rgyud): ya nga bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra brah+ma biSh+Ta ra ma he shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga baM/ su ra ta so khya kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sad+d+he na sa ma yau tsa ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen/
271b1(rgyud): brna ba chen pos tho bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / bzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba ma gyur/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnga rdza las phyung // sgrub ra ba'i d+hA na du d+hA shA /
271b2(rgyud): hU~Md+d+ha/ Ak+Sha d+hA ya a kaR+Sha ya/ bid+ha yab shi ku ru/ sar+b+ba krod+d+ha/ sa ma ya/ @ ts+tshar+m+mAdz+nyA na~M hU~M/ de nas zla bo chen po'i dmatshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang ga dkyil 'khon chen
271b3(rgyud): pol 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes spro zhes gnas par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig
271b4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo // oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag la khyed kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs
271b5(rgyud): pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa'i rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs
271b6(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tud dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta/ mahA kro d+he shA ri ud shrI dzAHuHshrI
271b7(rgyud): badz+ra a mr-i te hUM AHde nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo de dag kun tu khros te smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom
272a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rig ma 'di phyung ngo // oM a mri ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA mri ta mu le/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra pad+ma sad
272a2(rgyud): yo ge ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ pi tha bi tha/ mArtaM a/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs/
272a3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to//
272a4(rgyud): de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams// 'jigs pa
272a5(rgyud): che las skyob pa ste// rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong // che ba che khyod skye bo skyong // thog ma med khyod nga ro thogs// nga ro'i stang ni cha
272a6(rgyud): yang med// gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis// 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod//
272a7(rgyud): kyis gtong ba mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba dpa' glong grol
272b1(rgyud): mdzad do// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyi mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam par zhir 'gyur ba// rdul dang bral ba 'jug pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las
272b2(rgyud): rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas mgos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog
272b3(rgyud): ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu
272b4(rgyud): bdag cag kyang // dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig
272b5(rgyud): nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang /
272b6(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro
272b7(rgyud): ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas
273a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas/ yang rdo rje gzung ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
273a2(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba/
273a3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+he shro ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni mu drA Ni/ ma hA pa la yA na la sh+ma shA na b+hi She Ne/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha daMSh+Ta ka rA la kr-i ta ba da ne/ sar+b+ba sha truM/ pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin
273a4(rgyud): du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa'i
273a5(rgyud): 'khar ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sta gri dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / su su ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ya dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag te dang / gri rnams
273a6(rgyud): phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o//
273a7(rgyud): oM ma hA badz+ra d+harma kro d+he shwa ri ma hA sh+ma shA na b+hi Sha Ne ni lA dzA la sa ha sra pra dzA li ta mUrti d+he re kA pA la mA lA/ b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ na ra du ti ra ra tra/ pa ri pu ri/ ta ka pA la/ aste kha T+wAM ga badz+ra tri shA la gan+d+ha ma hA
273b1(rgyud): kro d+ha na/ nA r+d+ha dz+dza d+hU hUM d+hu/ ha he ru ru bun+d+ha pri ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
273b2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes khri ma'o dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi su dang / gsung dang / zugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM hU tram hA sA r+ya badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma pa/ zlas mAs/ sarba duSh+TA/ pra duSh+Ta d+hA paT/ oM r+tha hr-ig 'a
273b3(rgyud): khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por gtor zhing / shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste// dbu rgyan thod pas brtseg
273b4(rgyud): par bya// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing // yi dgas chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas
273b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
273b6(rgyud): oM hrIHbadz+ra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/ d+ha ra bi ke be hUM he hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM hri/ hi sha hi sha/ ma hA badz+ra ba dab mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hUMn+tu/ hi hi hUM hrIHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du// 'di
273b7(rgyud): ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste/ khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong // ma re'i rta la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa//
274a1(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtseg ka 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang
274a2(rgyud): gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang/
274a3(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha ma hA bi shwe shwa ri hUM hUM hUM/ ha haM haM/ ma hA kro d+he gu mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon
274a4(rgyud): mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong //
274a5(rgyud): rab tu drag la ro myang zhing // gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa// za byed me bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi
274a6(rgyud): rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/
274a7(rgyud): phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su bskor// bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung // de ni de lta'i stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la
274b1(rgyud): sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gang byas
274b2(rgyud): pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom
274b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba
274b4(rgyud): rnams nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra sa twa a ru rA gi ni ma hA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra a kaR+Sha Ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ dzA dzA hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ku la a
274b5(rgyud): nu rA ga ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hI he he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hA s+yA swa hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA te dza a b+hi She ke tsU taM trUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ri ma hA sAr+ya b+h+r-i kr-i Te ka ro ki tra ta Ta tadz+nyA phaT/
274b6(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu kro d+he shwa ri pa dz+nyA bi dza yot+ta ye hUM hUM traM traM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha AT+Ta A si hUM hUM tr-i ta~M hrid ya hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro hA b+hak+Shi Ni hUM hUM bAk+Sha bak+Sha hUM hrI
274b7(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA tik+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM hUM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na hastAts+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra du bo ni hUM hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badz+ra tsakre Na/ tsAr+Na ya tsUr+Na yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba/
275a1(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA shwa ga pra b+hA Ni ts+tsha hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha hA bi shwa mu khi hUM hUM baT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pA Nin+d+ra hUM ha haM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra yak+ShiNi
275a2(rgyud): hUM la la khA hi khA hi/ a bi b+ha A bi b+ha hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra b+ha ni d+ha ni ma hA ke d+he / ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ pi ta ya pi ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra hA la da mi ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba
275a3(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA li ni hU~M d+hu d+hu hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+rad+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha gan+d+ha ba sa~M d+hU ga gr-i/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hi ri many+dzu kro d+he shwa ra ma hA lo ka d+hA ra Ni kaM dI pa yaM dI pa ya hA nAM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ratra
275a4(rgyud): lA su hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma mai hA kro d+ha mA le d+hA ri Ni ts+tsha phaT/ oM sir+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA gA ta na tsA hU~M he/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi ni d+hi ke dz+dza hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma bA kro d+ha a kaR+Sha ya r+d+har+m+mA dz+dza
275a5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ba d+ha ba~M d+ha ba~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA badz+ra ba shi ni hwA hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha rA ma hA bo d+ha sh+ya sh+ya hUM ho/ oM hUM tA hrIHAH/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu reng sa dag
275a6(rgyud): par gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol/ bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas//
275a7(rgyud): bzung la rol pa'i bde ba bzhes su gsol// ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing // snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten pa// bde ba mchog
275b1(rgyud): gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// ru mu ma hA su d+hu dza hi ni dz+wa la su rU pU mU/ ma hA su hA dza i ni/ dzA la su sU pa b+hA dzu/ ma hA su hU/ i ni dz+wA la suh+Na u dzi/ u ma hA su hU dzo/ dza i ni rdza su hU ka a la/
275b2(rgyud): la la ho/ mahA su phur ma ra ma hA su hU/ a la la la ho/ ma hA su tra Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
275b3(rgyud): te rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha gi ni hUM phaT b+hai/ oM badz+ra TAH
275b4(rgyud): nI ma hA he ma ba ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ku mA ra pri ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni dri sh+ye mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra muSh+Ti ta na/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI
275b5(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra krod+ha ya d+ha ra la lo hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI mya hA kro d+ha tsaTe rje ts+tshin+d+ra ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nr-i mahA mr-i tot+ta pa ta ki hU~M phaT+Ta/ oM badz+ra nA ki no ma stu so makro d+ha phU phaT/ oM badz+ra nA ki nI mahA badz+ra
275b6(rgyud): tan+ti hU~M phaT/ i badz+ra nA ki nI mi hA mA ra NI hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra nA ki nI pa hA pr-i ti ka pi la hA se hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA sau mya kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra nA ki nI ma hA a mi ta pu dan n+ta ra hUM phaT
275b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki nI badz+ra ping ga li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI pi ba pi ka ru ka raM ma hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni
276a1(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra pA she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI A na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra be b+hi ni gu gu ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la ya b+hasmiM ku ru hUM
276a2(rgyud): phaT oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra bi ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra da~MSh+Te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA puSh+Ti mAM sA sha ni hUM phaT/
276a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra badz+ra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA kaM nI e kaR+Sha Ni ma hA pad+ma rA li mu ku hU~M dz+dzaHdz+dzaHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki n+ya a bi sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ban+d+ha hUM hUM bi ba hUM
276a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma he to tha Ni sa ma ye hUM hUM A A/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha sa mAM sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ ma hA ku b+ha kar+Na hUM hUM hUM hUM k+ShaH/ oM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa a kar+N+Na pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra kA la
276a5(rgyud): shi ni b+han d+he hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra rAk+Sha sa bi d+ha ba~M d+ha ya/ bi sha ya bi sha Na sar+b+ba na hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya sar+b+ba na ma hA bi kri bi kri tA na na~M/ ha ya gri ba hUM phaT/ de nas
276a6(rgyud): rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang du// chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas yid 'ga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor
276a7(rgyud): ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par
276b1(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang gzugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM DA ki nI A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+hA ya to Sha ya ta A \u0f7f sar+b+ba na badz+ra nA ki nI hri da yaM hUM dz+dzaHdz+raHrUb hoHnA k+ki hUM
276b2(rgyud): ai he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya ba d+ha ya bi d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ma hA baT ba mu kha/ A kan+d+ha/ pra be sha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ mo hA ya
276b3(rgyud): to ba ya/ ha ha hi/ khro za'i sngags kyi tshigs 'dis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug
276b4(rgyud): ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / DAk+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad
276b5(rgyud): la sbyar ro// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing // zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu bsgreng / lhag ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar
276b6(rgyud): btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no// phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin// bcings pa de nyid 'bebs
276b7(rgyud): ba dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed// gdug dang thams cad gsod byed ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed/
277a1(rgyud): las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub mi 'gyur te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje bcings pa
277a2(rgyud): gnyis su byas te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste phan tshun bsnol// khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste snying par bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis/
277a3(rgyud): thathams cad las kyi rnams// ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen
277a4(rgyud): nor ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phrul bar byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang // cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong // thal mo sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus su sbyar/
277a5(rgyud): lhag ma 'dab ma la bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no// sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rta gdong gi'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag
277a6(rgyud): tu 'phur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa la sogs dngos 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/ nga ni bstan
277a7(rgyud): de rgyal ba'i rnams// rnal 'byor pa yi drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yan lag mchod des sbyar// de nas mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rang
277b1(rgyud): ting rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing / dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu ba chen po'i brtag par byed// phug na thod pa gri dag dang // rdo rje la Ta rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan/
277b2(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbu dmug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis// bde ba dam pa longs spyod mod// rab rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'das/
277b3(rgyud): zla ba dri meng stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi// / byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod//
277b4(rgyud): a la la la ho/ mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyi ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te// rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams la
277b5(rgyud): thugs rjes sgrol// a la la la ho/ che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang
277b6(rgyud): longs spyod bsnyen pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang // rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i ngos ma mthong // kye ma'o ma skyes chos te snying po las 'byung ba// bsam gyis mi
277b7(rgyud): khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing // dur khrod chen pos/
278a1(rgyud): dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las skyed par mdzod// a la la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags meng bzhin// sdug pa'i bcings pas
278a2(rgyud): ma zin rnams grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shig snang ba'i rnams// mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol//
278a3(rgyud): 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnams khro yang // byams pa'i thugs rjes kun nas khyab par
278a4(rgyud): mdzod// e ma'o bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag ma rol pa mdzod/
278a5(rgyud): thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongs su gsal bzla ba bzhin// 'jig rten
278a6(rgyud): gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas rtsen// 'di yis gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdungs gnyen pa'i nga ro yis//
278a7(rgyud): dpyid kyi rgyal po gru blangs te// mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te// rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ongs pa'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni//
278b1(rgyud): bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs/
278b2(rgyud): spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas bzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+mo che ba las// rdo rje chen
278b3(rgyud): po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te// mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub thob// oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba
278b4(rgyud): yis rang kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod// rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis rtsen pa rnams byas na// bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yis/
278b5(rgyud): rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i che ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so// / mgo la zad mo phyed sbyin te// chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs/
278b6(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa yang dag ldan// pad+mo'i dkyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis brtson par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen po'i gar byed cing // rab dgyes bde byed
278b7(rgyud): gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang // sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te// sangs
279a1(rgyud): rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing // mkhur tshos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du
279a2(rgyud): gzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing ma nye// g.ya' byed pad+mo rnam bzhi bya// pad+mo phyi phyir rab ma nye zhing // ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar// sen mos mtshan khung sum mdo dang // rna ba gnyis su rab tu
279a3(rgyud): gzugs// dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed bar bya// g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis// mkha'
279a4(rgyud): 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams
279a5(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye shes so// de dag thams cad mgu nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nyes pa'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde
279a6(rgyud): ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdon mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas// gang gi myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab
279a7(rgyud): rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i
279b1(rgyud): kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur/
279b2(rgyud): bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i// 'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang // mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes
279b3(rgyud): song de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu sdug por 'du ba mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol/
279b4(rgyud): ba 'debs// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin
279b5(rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/
279b6(rgyud): ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can spras yin te// gti mug mdongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te//
279b7(rgyud): des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yi// rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa bkur brten na// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur/
280a1(rgyud): g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi sbyin ma bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa y-i// g.yas
280a2(rgyud): kyi sprin mas phyag lan bya// g.yas kyi lag pas snying la ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnyes byas na// 'din rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bslang ba yi// nam
280a3(rgyud): 'ag de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rdol 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon du bgying ba'i bsgyings pa yis// lag pa snying khar brkyang bya ste// dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan
280a4(rgyud): nang de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la
280a5(rgyud): ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni
280a6(rgyud): dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor
280a7(rgyud): pa las rnam baphrul na/ mas yis// mas dadasan la pa / jam zus rgyam mamams// dzin pa pang pa' ma shes can// rnal 'byung ba yis tul
280b1(rgyud): yang bskur byas sa// rje 'dzin pa gran ci bang // da nas ngan ngas par 'gyur// la gcas cam dum nam sbyor bas/ pan nan du bang bstsu bas/ khams dasus rang kyis bdag pas /
280b2(rgyud): ldan rdo rjem pa yong 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te// snying par 'khor la bzhin du skyor// zlab gcig tsam sanyas sbyar bas// 'alar la bskor ba rab tu stug/ nyid g.yon par rab sbyar
280b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni mnyam bzhag pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams
280b4(rgyud): thams cad rab grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste// rtse mo kha phyeng rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po za bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor
280b5(rgyud): 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar
280b6(rgyud): tengade gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis zla ba gcig byas na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer// dpa' bo chen por
280b7(rgyud): de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying khar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro// sbom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni
282a1(rgyud): rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang // dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams// 'di
282a2(rgyud): yis thams cad 'phrog byed de// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying khar rab tu
282a3(rgyud): gzhug/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur// thal
282a4(rgyud): mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'bro ba tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste/
282a5(rgyud): sha zas bza' bo las kun byed// thal mo nyid ni bcings byas na// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor spor// sbom po'i zur ni sbal nas kyang // chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang // thams/
282a6(rgyud): cad las ni sbyar byas te// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du
282a7(rgyud): gzhug/ khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig tu ni gnon byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di
282b1(rgyud): yis rgyas btab pas// de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong
282b2(rgyud): byed dang lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag
282b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // maM haM zhes pas klu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas
282b4(rgyud): 'bod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed// hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed// phaT phaT ces pas gsod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes
282b5(rgyud): pas dam par byed// dge ba dbang nga ro mchog/ d+hu b+h+rUM zhes pas gsod par byed// hUM b+hU r+b+hu buM/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar byed// d+hA tr-i zhes pas gzi brjid byed// dz+riM t+yai zhes pas 'dren par byed/ dza
282b6(rgyud): zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smir// hr-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed// d+h+r-i d+hI zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hr-i hri zhes pas 'dren par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyan
282b7(rgyud): par byed// hr-i hriM zhes pas rmongs par byed// hraM hraM zhes pas gnon par byed// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// haM haM zhes pas srung bar byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gsad par byed// hu hu zhes pas
283a1(rgyud): mgu bar byed// g+h+raM g+h+raM zhes pas 'phreng bar byed// gaM gaM zhes pas tri ru byed// ra re zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo
283a2(rgyud): tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
283a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang ga gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid
283a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// skrag mo rol pa bde ba mchogasil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs/
283a5(rgyud): brda ba dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis// sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol// de nas
283a6(rgyud): bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung // sna tshogs chen po rnam mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// bla med chos kun
283a7(rgyud): dbang po ste// rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te// rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdig
283b1(rgyud): pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed// sa dang bar sngang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la sbyin//
283b2(rgyud): tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang
283b3(rgyud): ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad de// skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste// bcu gsum phra ba dbu ru
283b4(rgyud): ldan nga 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'dra// 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar po can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni// ji byas myur du drang bar bya// dang /
283b5(rgyud): po drang ba gnyis drang bas// tsheg drag des ni lcags kyu byas// lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi// phan tshun du ni bsgrub byas
283b6(rgyud): nas dang rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya// sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du// de ste sa bon gzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs
283b7(rgyud): kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub po// de nyid sngags dang snying po dang // phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // 'grub pa
284a1(rgyud): nyid du yong mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying khar sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar byas// sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid/
284a2(rgyud): du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis chen por// 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur ba nye// rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po
284a3(rgyud): 'gro 'ong byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrogs so// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad
284a4(rgyud): pa gsang ba zhes bgyid pa// de nyid don du sgrub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs// dkyil
284a5(rgyud): 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang // gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje pad+mo rnam mdzad pas// rig ma dang ni lhan cig rtsen/
284a6(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang // gzung ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed bya dang // rab dgyes bdag nyid
284a7(rgyud): bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang // pad+mo'i gnas ni gang bya dang // sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang /
284b1(rgyud): shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba// sbyor ba rab sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// sgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba// sbyor dang sbyor bar yang dag sbyor// de nyid gsal bar
284b2(rgyud): sems dpa' che// phan par dgongs pa ro nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mardo rjes su dris pa rang gi thugs la bzhag ste// nyid kyi sku dang /
284b3(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa
284b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung // snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che/
284b5(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzung // bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ji bzhin par//
284b6(rgyud): pa yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags// dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lnga yi sbyor
284b7(rgyud): ba ni ngagasang ba gsang ba rab tu sgrub// rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung //
285a1(rgyud): rje bstan pa gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// nu ma mtshan khung mkhur chos gnyis/
285a2(rgyud): 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnye ba'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // zhe
285a3(rgyud): sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / bla ma smod rnams bsgral bya ba// sha dang khrag dang klad pa'i rnams// drangs te tshogs kyis mchod par/
285a4(rgyud): byang 'di ni gsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // bla ma spong byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te//
285a5(rgyud): thams cad nad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po stan byed cing // 'o 'dod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag/ bstir med chen
285a6(rgyud): po brlab par 'gro// lus dag sems ni bde dam pa// rig ma kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen po bde ba yi// tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te// dza zhes skad
285a7(rgyud): cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyed par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba/
285b1(rgyud): bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste// de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyun gyi 'phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya// bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni//
285b2(rgyud): lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang // de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rjes su sgrub pa lha ma'i don// sgrub pa chen po gnyis ka'i rgya/
285b3(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyis ka gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan
285b4(rgyud): pa'i nga rab dgyes ro myang ba de dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ba// bdag ni sems dpa'
285b5(rgyud): 'o zhes bsams na// 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang dgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis
285b6(rgyud): gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun
285b7(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis//
286a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang // rdo rje bstan pos bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa
286a2(rgyud): skyed nga mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya// 'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas// sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo// 'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang // rdzu
