286a3(rgyud): 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang // byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad byung ba// de dag de nyid sbas pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris
286a4(rgyud): pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang // bdag po chen po mchod byed ma// de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur// srid pa
286a5(rgyud): gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod byed cing // skad cig skad cing phyag kyang byed// ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa//
286a6(rgyud): sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas// rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas// dngos
286a7(rgyud): grub chen po des 'thob bo// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la// cung zad mi 'grub yod med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub// rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo/
286b1(rgyud): ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i tshe// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i
286b2(rgyud): gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzod// ra mar ma sa maho ma hA sa twa/ rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// zla gsang thig ler yang dag ldan/
286b3(rgyud): bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyi// rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du// sbyor chen nyid kyis rol par mdzod// theg pa chen po bo de che yi// pad+mo rdo rje'i rin chen gyis// rnal
286b4(rgyud): 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes longs spyod gnyis sten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te// gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po// rab dgyes bdag
286b5(rgyud): nyid nyid sten mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang // gzhug pa dang ri gtong ba'i mchog/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen
286b6(rgyud): po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal
286b7(rgyud): 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu 'khyud pa dang / spros pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / mnye ba dang / thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang /
287a1(rgyud): kun tu bskyod pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing
287a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gzung ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang / rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin du dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam
287a3(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas te gnas so// de nas rnal 'byor ma chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rdzogs
287a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ni mgu ba che// bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// mgu ba chen po'i bde dang ldan// kye ma'o bde ba
287a5(rgyud): bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed// khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzang dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal ba chen po sring mo
287a6(rgyud): dngang ra bde byed bde bas rab rmongs pa// mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgya che mchog gi mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu// rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde byed
287a7(rgyud): chen mo yaus// gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed// lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang // klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang // 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis// yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed// de
287b1(rgyud): nas dbang po lha chen po// bdag nyid chen po lA yi lha// kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis// lnga yis lnga ni sngon du 'gro// dpa'
287b2(rgyud): bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas mngon mchod cing // 'jigs shing sgeg pas mnyes par byed// tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang //
287b3(rgyud): bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang // sil snyan 'phreng ba ro chen dang // gling bu rgyad dang rdza rnga dang // pi wang pal kig ha la le// stog dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang // zhi dang rmad byung 'jigs byed dang /
287b4(rgyud): bdag dang khros dang spun rgyas pa// skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing // byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // snyid ces pa dang hUM hUM dang // ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing //
287b5(rgyud): rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yis// rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams
287b6(rgyud): cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas
287b7(rgyud): pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang // shin
288a1(rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing mi mnyan pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang panyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems/
288a2(rgyud): can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dang / rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang /
288a3(rgyud): spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang
288a4(rgyud): shes bya dang/ bdog dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang // skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad
288a5(rgyud): pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang / khyab byed
288a6(rgyud): dang dang zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal ba dang
288a7(rgyud): ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo dang / rin po che dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang //
288b1(rgyud): sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang
288b2(rgyud): yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang / cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thar byed
288b3(rgyud): dang grol ba dang / rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so// de nas
288b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
288b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grol ba chen po la phyag mdzad de// mngon sum du yang dag par bskul
288b6(rgyud): nas dril pa/ su ra ta s+t+waM sta ma si ha/ gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che// gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba
288b7(rgyud): che gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa
289a1(rgyud): yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bsnyems pa yis ni myur du
289a2(rgyud): 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba ma nyam sbyor bas// rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang // dmar dang
289a3(rgyud): snang mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos/ rdo rje pha rol tu
289a4(rgyud): byin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi
289a5(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan song
289a6(rgyud): 'dzegs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cig
289a7(rgyud): pad+mo tshul du rab rtogs phyir// de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyed// nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' che na nga
289b1(rgyud): rgyal yin// ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za// sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir// de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab dgyes
289b2(rgyud): sbas pa che// 'dod pa ma gtogs bde byed ma/ bde phye 'dod pa nga yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med/ byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te// sangs rgyas
289b3(rgyud): bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhon// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do// thams cad byang
289b4(rgyud): chub sems ngo bo// bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad// d+hi zhes pa ni gzung ma'i mchog/ ci zhes pa ni zag par bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde
289b5(rgyud): byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing // tshe 'di nyid la thob par
289b6(rgyud): 'gyur// bde ba kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzung ma yin// hrI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// yi ge myur du 'grub par
289b7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tar kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen
290a1(rgyud): na grub par 'gyur// sngangs kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug mchog gi sngags rgya'o// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad/
290a2(rgyud): de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o// dam tshig sbas pa
290a3(rgyud): tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/ sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yi phyir ni dam tshig che// dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste// dam tshig
290a4(rgyud): yi ger ldan pa yis// sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na// bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin ma kun// pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad
290a5(rgyud): cing brtag pa la ni yang gsol pa// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs chen po de dag kun// de la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
290a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de bzhin
290a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin pa'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo // nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis/
290b1(rgyud): spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/ 'jigs dbang gdon mi za grub rnams// rigs ni rnam par brgyar bstan te// mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang
290b2(rgyud): ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'// bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
290b3(rgyud): mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan me dam tshig mchog tu srung ba'i rnams// bcom ldan
290b4(rgyud): 'das gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa
290b5(rgyud): mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas// nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrungs pa yis ni
290b6(rgyud): bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyis kha dog dbyings chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung
290b7(rgyud): du rab sbyor bas// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgya brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni// nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom// rang bzhin gsum po
291a1(rgyud): gcig tu sgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du sgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min no//
291a2(rgyud): rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin
291a3(rgyud): chen po dang // gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gang gis 'das byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur na// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam nam
291a4(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba// shin tu mi bzang smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // g.yon gyis phyag rgyas slar gsol pa/
291a5(rgyud): gar dbang rnam par gnon par gar mdzad cing // mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam/
291a6(rgyud): sad par gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor// zhi ba'i thal
291a7(rgyud): mo mchog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgya la// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis// sbas
291b1(rgyud): pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di ni de las bstan// 'di la khrus med nges pa
291b2(rgyud): medang dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje
291b3(rgyud): dbab pa skyes 'gyur na// ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'phur// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig
291b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang // grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing // rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog/ 'gying ba'i
291b5(rgyud): longs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas// sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub// sna tshogs dkyil
291b6(rgyud): 'khor gar byed cing // lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang // phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang // khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka' gnod pa 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/
291b7(rgyud): me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hUM mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing //
292a1(rgyud): thig le tshur sbyar na// rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi// sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// sems
292a2(rgyud): can rnams kyi don kun byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog
292a3(rgyud): la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pa shod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang // ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod//
292a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan bde byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// phyag rgya bcing ba bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzod// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum
292a5(rgyud): pa phyag rgya chen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar bgyid bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag/ sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par
292a6(rgyud): mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin// nam mkha'i snying po mthing kha che// tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer 'phreng ba rmad byung ba/
292a7(rgyud): gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed pa bsam par bya// rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du nam mkha' 'gro byed cing // rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par byed// sna tshogs
292b1(rgyud): sbyor ba bde che ba'i// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs/
292b2(rgyud): par rang gi 'khor lo mchog gis brgyan// rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam// pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni// brtse dang ldan pas bsgom byas te// snying po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la
292b3(rgyud): bde byed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba
292b4(rgyud): chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rab tu rgyas pa'o// / de nas phyag rgya bcing bshad de// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gis myur du bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub
292b5(rgyud): bde cher 'gro// thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su bya// de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad bar bar du// mnya
292b6(rgyud): du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du sgrub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro// 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa
292b7(rgyud): yos dang gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya// de nyid las ni sor mo kun// kun tu bskum te bcing bar bya// rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pa ni// bcing ba ldan par rnam bsgyur te// de nyid sbom po rab
293a1(rgyud): bcug nas// khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'du ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing // rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed// de bzhin bcing ba rnam gzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbya/
293a2(rgyud): 'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che// nam mkhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing ba bcing byas te// khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis pad+mo sgrub// btsong
293a3(rgyud): ba de nyid rab tu sbom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te// las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// dor yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro// bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro ba'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas/
293a4(rgyud): pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbus su bcug bya ba// de 'di bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo// dngos grub
293a5(rgyud): thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o//
293a6(rgyud): bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya// drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te/
293a7(rgyud): g.yon gyi snying khar bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje ni tshul gyis gzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sgrub// gdon mi za bar tshe 'di
293b1(rgyud): la nga rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snying khar gzug/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa la bde ba rol ba yis// 'di yis mi zad 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying khar g.yon/
293b2(rgyud): pa gzhag/ rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar gzhag/ g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzin
293b3(rgyud): gnas// 'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar sbyar// lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba//
293b4(rgyud): sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yi// de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar
293b5(rgyud): bar bya// g.yas ni snying khar bzung byas te// brjod pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid
293b6(rgyud): la the tshom med// de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya// sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngon
293b7(rgyud): sum rdo rjer byas pa yis// bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing // skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcings pa tsam
294a1(rgyud): gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob// rab gyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas drang byas te// zugs kyu
294a2(rgyud): tshul du gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su
294a3(rgyud): bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar
294a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs spyod pas// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes ro la bsgyid
294a5(rgyud): ma yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin sbong po'i rtse mor sbyor// snying rje chen po der bzhag pa// skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// de nyid don kun bstan byed pa// 'di ni yang dag
294a6(rgyud): bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i thal mo bstan pa ste// khro mo rtse mo zlab po yis// mthon
294a7(rgyud): por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// spros pa chen po'i
294b1(rgyud): dpyas pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing // rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yige thabs gnas nas// de 'ad
294b2(rgyud): chos kyi gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims nas// gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byin
294b3(rgyud): brlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyi spro che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams kyis gsol ba
294b4(rgyud): btab pa mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // / bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig le
294b5(rgyud): lhar ni yang dag ldan// tha mar ha ra thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes// snying khar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing // spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te//
294b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren par thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog/ ha ra thig le yang dag ldan// cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa// 'di ni snying khar bzhag
294b7(rgyud): byas na// bde bar nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin tu brtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog par gzhag / ltos ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan// skal
295a1(rgyud): / ba chen po rdo rje can// dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs//
295a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin
295a3(rgyud): gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'di'i 'di tshe 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la
295a4(rgyud): sogs sprod pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// // de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug
295a5(rgyud): pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro// mdur du thog ma'i lha nyid du// rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo
295a6(rgyud): de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyar te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags ni rang gi snying khar bsgom// khro mo'i bu mos
295a7(rgyud): mdun du bskor// khro ma chen mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hUM byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur// de dag gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/ skyobs shig
295b1(rgyud): skyobs shig ces smra zhing // rdo rje gtsol drar par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste// las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan/
295b2(rgyud): pas 'bum bzlas te// las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa'ang sgrub par nus// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro ba'i
295b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / de nas sangs rgyas che de dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzugs ma rnal 'byor pa thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// phan tshun
295b4(rgyud): bde ba ldan pa yi// dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te// rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel// skal ba chen mo rtsen par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi
295b5(rgyud): 'khor ma'o tshogs rnams la yang dang yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig pa'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha/ du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi kan+d+ha bi kaD+D+h+ya sar+b+bar
295b6(rgyud): rA ta tsakra sany+dza ya/ badz+ra ang+ku sha hUM phaT/ 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcing ba gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje khro ba rab sbyar ba// rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems
295b7(rgyud): can rnams// phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcings pa mnyam bzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin gzhag/ dbus su
296a1(rgyud): sbom mo gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te// rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo spang // bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya// de 'i/
296a2(rgyud): bcing ba dam byas te// dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// bzhugs/
296a3(rgyud): pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug
296a4(rgyud): bcings dga' ba bskyed na rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi// rab
296a5(rgyud): dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis bzung // de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag
296a6(rgyud): gis blangs// rang bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje cha yis 'di skad spras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs bsgogar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab kyis longs spyod gar byed cing
296a7(rgyud): bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid che// legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so sna tshogs che// legs so legs so
296b1(rgyud): dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
296b2(rgyud): chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la/ gtsigs
296b3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems pade thob par spon/ @rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta ta tA sa gra ha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/
296b4(rgyud): bo skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
296b5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyi rlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa
296b6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
296b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can
297a1(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyin pa thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum/
297a2(rgyud): du bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang nor bu rin po che
297a3(rgyud): chen pos smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par
297a4(rgyud): byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras
297a5(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang po dang nam mkha'i snying dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs tham
297a6(rgyud): cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
297a7(rgyud): de'ang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun tu gang bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
297b1(rgyud): tshad med grangs pad pa rnabs snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chad do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha
297b2(rgyud): dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad
297b3(rgyud): thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas
297b4(rgyud): pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par
297b5(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag par nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams
297b6(rgyud): cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa/ mkhyen pa sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing / de bzhin
297b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
298a1(rgyud): byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye
298a2(rgyud): shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen por bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
298a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
298a4(rgyud): kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
298a5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
298a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyang ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
298a7(rgyud): dbang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang // mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang // rin chen dpal
298b1(rgyud): rang 'dzub pa che// kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang // 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus marungs dam du bzung // rdo rje lcags
298b2(rgyud): kyu mda' gzhu dang // rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung // las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas// thog pa tha ma med cing zhing // ma rungs khro ba bzod pa che// gnod sbyin po ma
298b3(rgyud): dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che// u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyon dang mkha' dang sa// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum
298b4(rgyud): dngangarang 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang // 'khor dang mya ngan mnga' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag
298b5(rgyud): pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang // bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso ngas rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar dang /
298b6(rgyud): spyod dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs// byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' che dang /
298b7(rgyud): phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can tag don rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs
299a1(rgyud): chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po// bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen po'i thugs byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshes/
299a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
299a3(rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te// byang chub sems dpa' de
299a4(rgyud): la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka'
299a5(rgyud): ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams
299a6(rgyud): cad grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
299a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
299b1(rgyud): gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar blos shing sgrub par gyis shig/ oM
299b2(rgyud): tsit+ta pra ta bo d+ho ka ro mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnabs
299b3(rgyud): bdag gi snying kha na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni
299b4(rgyud): ji ltar sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya
299b5(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ oM bod+hi tsit+ta ut+pad ya mi/ zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub
299b6(rgyud): sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni dkyil 'khor du
299b7(rgyud): mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur kyis// de legs par sgrubs
300a1(rgyud): shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyings su soms/
300a2(rgyud): shig pa oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdag gis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
300a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par
300a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs/
300a5(rgyud): song nga de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub
300a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ri bdag lags par
300a7(rgyud): mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa' rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi skur
300b1(rgyud): bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA gasta thA a haM/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
300b2(rgyud): dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
300b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de bstan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin
300b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa
300b5(rgyud): nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ma nyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
300b6(rgyud): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis ngag go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin
300b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin de
301a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyab pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /
301a2(rgyud): po chos kyi ye shes ni bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang bu rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu'i rin po che'i las byas pa gang na ba
301a3(rgyud): der gshegs byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te
301a4(rgyud): bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs
301a5(rgyud): pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
301a6(rgyud): dmigs nas mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir// phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
301a7(rgyud): pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon parade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung
301b1(rgyud): ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gsheg/
301b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad nyid kyis gdon mi za zhing thogs pa med par ston pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin/
301b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
301b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra
301b5(rgyud): satwA de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi
301b6(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
301b7(rgyud): shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'daso rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su bzhugs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brten pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
302a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa
302a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so//
302a3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo // rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig
302a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams
302a5(rgyud): cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
302a6(rgyud): kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs
302a7(rgyud): pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid
302b1(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes par ba
302b2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang shin tu
302b3(rgyud): brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod
302b4(rgyud): pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i// kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan// de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' cher po kur
302b5(rgyud): tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyar snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
302b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang
302b7(rgyud): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes
303a1(rgyud): chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bsrub pa dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid
303a2(rgyud): bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i
303a3(rgyud): bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i
303a4(rgyud): dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes
303a5(rgyud): ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin
303a6(rgyud): cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa'
303a7(rgyud): chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba
303b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/
303b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur
303b3(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams
303b4(rgyud): byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal
303b5(rgyud): po nyid yin pa dang / shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
303b6(rgyud): la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lugs kyu nges pa'i rgyal po dag/ gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab// grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren no// de nas byang chub
303b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
304a1(rgyud): gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
304a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde
304a3(rgyud): ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dam pa'i dngos grub kyis bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po
304a4(rgyud): de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs par zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags
304a5(rgyud): kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yis// ye shes bla na med pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir// kun nas
304a6(rgyud): spyan drangs dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
304a7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rA ga/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
304b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma zag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad
304b2(rgyud): kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin
304b3(rgyud): tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams
304b4(rgyud): byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu bdud byed pa nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan
304b5(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na// 'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir// 'dod
304b6(rgyud): chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil
304b7(rgyud): 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
305a1(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi/
305a2(rgyud): bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems
305a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems/
305a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye
305a5(rgyud): shes 'di ni dri ma med// 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal
305a6(rgyud): po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin
305a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sA d+hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de
305b1(rgyud): legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje dgyes/
305b2(rgyud): pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la
305b3(rgyud): sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin dga' bar byed pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur
305b4(rgyud): nasang byang chub sems dpa' rab de dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
305b5(rgyud): kye ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi// legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga'
305b6(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas
305b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i la/
306a1(rgyud): kyashes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas//
306a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i
306a3(rgyud): lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes
306a4(rgyud): pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa/ 'di ni rab tu 'jug byed
306a5(rgyud): pasang rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes
306a6(rgyud): par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen
306a7(rgyud): po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/
306b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rat+na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma zag pa 'din rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad
306b2(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo // nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od/
306b3(rgyud): zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings de dag
306b4(rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/ yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i
306b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams cad mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las
306b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin
306b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba
307a1(rgyud): dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
307a2(rgyud): la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang / khams gsum bdag por dgongs pas na/ rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi// dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no// de nas
307a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang dag
307a4(rgyud): pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
307a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong
307a6(rgyud): bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje
307a7(rgyud): rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de
307b1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyings// dbang
307b2(rgyud): bskur de ni bdag yin te// bdag gi lag tu byin pas na// rin chen la ni rin chen gzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las
307b3(rgyud): byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
307b4(rgyud): 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas
307b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
307b6(rgyud): de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyisku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang
307b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas
308a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o
308a2(rgyud): sems can khams kun// snang byed gzi brjid dpe med bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi// 'dren pa rnams dang sbyor byed pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus
308a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
308a4(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang
308a5(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi
308a6(rgyud): 'od 'thob cing dong grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag ni phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
308a7(rgyud): kyis rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje'i ces bya ba rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed
308b1(rgyud): cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdang ba 'di// mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pas// shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i// e ma'i 'od bas shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom
308b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
308b3(rgyud): pa thams cad dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ke tuH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
308b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal mtshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan
308b5(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las 'jig rten
308b6(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas
308b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dpal nyid dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub
309a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o don
309a2(rgyud): kun grub pa dang // dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi// don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// 'dra med dpal ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku
309a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yor phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
309a4(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshar gyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal
309a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang bar bya dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba
309a6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag
309a7(rgyud): tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309b1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje rdul mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs/
309b2(rgyud): pa kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309b3(rgyud): chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar byed pa'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
309b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra hA sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
309b5(rgyud): byung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs te gcig
309b6(rgyud): tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
309b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
310a1(rgyud): 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu dgu
310a2(rgyud): ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis// sangs rgyas don la rab
310a3(rgyud): sbyor phyir// e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ bzhad chen rmad du byung chen yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
310a4(rgyud): las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' yang nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
310a5(rgyud): cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus
310a6(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang mngon par shes
310a7(rgyud): pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
310b1(rgyud): dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing
310b2(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad du byung skyed ston pa po// dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// dbang bskur ba chen po dang /
310b3(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// de nas yang
310b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
310b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag
310b6(rgyud): ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis
310b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu
311a1(rgyud): 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje baH
311a2(rgyud): dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes dang / mngon
311a3(rgyud): par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu kun tu spyan ras gzigs
311a4(rgyud): kyi dbang po yin pa nyid dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
311a5(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te// gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams la// rnam par dag pa dmigs
311a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i
311a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
311b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag
311b2(rgyud): par bya ba dang / thams cad kyis yid bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/
311b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag
311b4(rgyud): tu rdo rje pad+mo byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab
311b5(rgyud): ma kha byed pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste
311b6(rgyud): bdag gi lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
311b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
312a1(rgyud): badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral grir gyur
312a2(rgyud): byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje ral
312a3(rgyud): gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu rnga mo nga mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs
312a4(rgyud): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub
312a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
312a6(rgyud): 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang // dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das
312a7(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang ba 'anod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshes
312b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang /
312b2(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
312b3(rgyud): gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de
312b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral
312b5(rgyud): gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// dgra rnams thams cad gcod byed cing // sdig pa thams 'joms pa'i
312b6(rgyud): mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
312b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra he tu/ de nas de bzhin
313a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje 'khor lor gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
313a2(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su bzhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig
313a3(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams
313a4(rgyud): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i//
313a5(rgyud): phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
313a6(rgyud): la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi// e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag/ gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// de nas
313a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i
313b1(rgyud): bka' nod cing bzhugs par+yA to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
