313b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba/
313b3(rgyud): nas nga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir// rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no//
313b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje/
313b5(rgyud): bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags 'di myur
313b6(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
313b7(rgyud): cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
315a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyo
315a2(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra karma/ de nas rdo rje sems
315a3(rgyud): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
315a4(rgyud): nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar
315a5(rgyud): byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin la kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs ma lus pa de'ang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
315a6(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyibs thams cad mnyam pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag
315a7(rgyud): gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
315b1(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs
315b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin
315b3(rgyud): las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// 'phrin las/
315b4(rgyud): mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces/
315b5(rgyud): bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas
315b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
315b7(rgyud): cad la mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za bar tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi
316a1(rgyud): las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya'i 'phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dang /
316a2(rgyud): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo//
316a3(rgyud): bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje sna
316a4(rgyud): tshogs zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs
316a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/
316a6(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed du bcug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
316a7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
316b1(rgyud): badz+ra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
316b2(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams
316b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
316b4(rgyud): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
316b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha
316b6(rgyud): 'dir brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // rdo rje'i lus su byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka' ba'i lus
316b7(rgyud): de nga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
317a1(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang
317a2(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku 'thob
317a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i go cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
317a4(rgyud): cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po rdo rje'i grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i grogs po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
317a5(rgyud): la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste/ brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa
317a6(rgyud): yin de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
317a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ya k+Sha/ de nas
317b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon ma chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
317b2(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te byung nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
317b3(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang
317b4(rgyud): cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab
317b5(rgyud): tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rje can gyi thabs
317b6(rgyud): chen te// zhi yang sems can don du ni// ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su bcom ldan 'das thugs las byung
317b7(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
318a1(rgyud): rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma
318a2(rgyud): lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes dang mngon par shes
318a3(rgyud): pa rnams thob cing / dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon chad byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de
318a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bo rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi khar bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs
318a5(rgyud): pa thams cad la bsdigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te// thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid
318a6(rgyud): do de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
318a7(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sin+d+hu
318b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma zag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar gyur te byung nas
318b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las
318b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes
318b4(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang rab tu brtan
318b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te
318b6(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'i rab tu brtan bcings pa'i// dam tshig bdag ste brtan bdag nyid// bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir// grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed// de nas byang chub sems
318b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka'
319a1(rgyud): nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
319a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtags
319a3(rgyud): pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar
319a4(rgyud): du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
319a5(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshu ra zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching /
319a6(rgyud): zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcings pa che zhing brtan// sangs rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir// dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka'// de nas de bzhin
319a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya tha
319b1(rgyud): cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// bam po gnyis pa// das/
319b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyil
319b3(rgyud): shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
319b4(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // satwa badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i
319b5(rgyud): 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thamasas kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur
319b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyis
319b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sngang mdzad kyi spyan ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
320a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang // rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bas de bzhin
320a2(rgyud): gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las
320a3(rgyud): byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // rat+na badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin
320a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi
320a5(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas cher yang gcig tu 'dres
320a6(rgyud): te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
320a7(rgyud): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags// gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas yang
320b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas ye shes
320b2(rgyud): la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang
320b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // d+harmA badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu pad+mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
320b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag les kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs/
320b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+mo chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan
320b6(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma dag/ gang phyir rang bzhin
320b7(rgyud): rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
321a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba
321a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // kar+m+ma badz+rI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
321a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
321a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig
321a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
321a6(rgyud): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po dag/ gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams// ma lus par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gshegs
321a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so// de nas yang bcom
321b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
321b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan
321b3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu
321b4(rgyud): 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod lam sna tshogs brgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa
321b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bsdus par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te
321b6(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni// mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas// mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom
321b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring po che'i 'phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
322a1(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra mA le/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar
322a2(rgyud): gyur nas byang ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyu
322a3(rgyud): nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'ang
322a4(rgyud): ched du brjod do// e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes// bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang // rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
322a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang
322a6(rgyud): gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo
322a7(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang
322b1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du/
322b2(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i// klu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin// gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yi// mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
322b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen
322b4(rgyud): mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra nI tri/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas
322b5(rgyud): byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
322b6(rgyud): deng mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar
322b7(rgyud): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i// mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin
323a1(rgyud): gang phyir rdo rje gar tshogs/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs
323a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyir las bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
323a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin
323a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo ches tso mo 'di rang gi thugs
323a5(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+hU po/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa du mas rdo rje
323a6(rgyud): dbyings thams cad du khyab par gyur te byung nas/ bdug pa'i mchod pa rgya mtsho de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams sa cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas
323a7(rgyud): byang ste yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i
323b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che// rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi// gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/
323b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung
323b3(rgyud): ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra puSh+pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
323b4(rgyud): las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed pa gyur nas byung ngo // me tog thams cad
323b5(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje me tog gi lha
323b6(rgyud): mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gan nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
323b7(rgyud): dong e ma'o me tog mchod pa dag/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de// gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang
324a1(rgyud): po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba mchod pa'i dam tshig las/
324a2(rgyud): byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra A lo ke/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
324a3(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka las 'di byung ma thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
324a4(rgyud): de nyid do// thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/
324a5(rgyud): lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched
324a6(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni// rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te// gang phyir snang bcas myur du ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
324a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i/
324b1(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tham/
324b2(rgyud): cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri thams cad kyi mchod
324b3(rgyud): pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom
324b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o dri yi rang
324b5(rgyud): bzhin gyi// mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong bdag/ gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri// lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang byang
324b6(rgyud): chu ba chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
324b7(rgyud): ye shes mthong ba'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags
325a1(rgyud): klu'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di/
325a2(rgyud): rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra aM ku sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs mang po thams cad du gyur nas
325a3(rgyud): byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
325a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtsemo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang /
325a5(rgyud): rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma
325a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pa// dkyil 'khor kun la rten par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
325a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyal
325b1(rgyud): 'jug pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs kanas phyung ngo // badz+ra pA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la
325b2(rgyud): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams ba cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi
325b3(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur
325b4(rgyud): nas nga bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
325b5(rgyud): cad 'jug cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran zhugs pa thams cad kyang // bdag gi slar yang drang bar bya// de nas
325b6(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
325b7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra s+pho Ta/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
326a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do//
326a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung
326a3(rgyud): nas gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje
326a4(rgyud): chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje lcags sgrog
326a5(rgyud): dam pa bdag/ 'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i
326a6(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra A baM
326a7(rgyud): sha de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
326b1(rgyud): pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste gcig tu
326b2(rgyud): 'dres nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i
326b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag/ kun gyi ngag tu gyur
326b4(rgyud): nas kyang // bran du yang ni gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed
326b5(rgyud): pa'o rang de nas bcod ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i se gol gi mtshan ma mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba
326b6(rgyud): byin rlabs 'di gsungs so// badz+ra sa rA dzaH/ de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya
326b7(rgyud): mtsho'i thams cad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtseg
327a1(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / ror bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gangan ba der gshegs nas kyang ched du
327a2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+da naM ka ro mi/ zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci gar zlos shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa
327a3(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// e me'o byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin bzhugs pa mdzes// de nas de skad ces
327a4(rgyud): gsungs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas
327a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang
327a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du
327a7(rgyud): gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen 'dod nas skye ba med// rdul phran thams cad ji snyed pa'i// sangs
327b1(rgyud): rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang
327b2(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba brtan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub pa'i dngos
327b3(rgyud): grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha med pa'i rdo rje
327b4(rgyud): chen po 'dzin pa la maud brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang // phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o//
327b5(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal ba sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/
327b6(rgyud): bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o// rdo rje legs pa sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che// rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la/
327b7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don// rdo rje nam mkha'i nor bu che// nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la// rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od zer
328a1(rgyud): zi brji pa// phyag 'tshal du rje 'dasas la// sems cad na brda rje dpal// do nal mtshan ba dga' byed// dza chen padan can dga'// phyag 'tshal rdza
328a2(rgyud): khyod la// rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje chos rab de nyid don// rdo rje pad+mo rab dga' byed// rdo rje dbang
328a3(rgyud): rab rdo rje'i spyan// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu bzab// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che// rdo rje
328a4(rgyud): 'khor lo tshul chen po// rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog/ rdo rje zlos pa rab sgrub sbyin// mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod/
328a5(rgyud): lang rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'// las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro// rdo rje nges pa'i rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje srungs pa brtan pa che// rdo rje go cha sra ba che// brtson 'grus mchog ri thub par dka'/
328a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jig pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la// rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab sdud nyid// rdo rje 'ching
328a7(rgyud): bar rab grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba rgyal po rtsa brgyad 'di// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs// mchog rnams kun gyi de
328b1(rgyud): dbang bskur// gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la// rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// ming brgyan brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag
328b2(rgyud): cag gis ni bstod pa yin// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// tshul chen yi ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dang
328b3(rgyud): pa yi cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
328b4(rgyud): tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po
328b5(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags// sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher// sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// ci rigs par ni
328b6(rgyud): mchis nas kyang // phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor// gsar pa legs par bkal
328b7(rgyud): nas kyang // tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ci rus kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing // gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni
329a1(rgyud): ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyad// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig
329a2(rgyud): gdab bo// de yi rib pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi// thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa// rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas
329a3(rgyud): brgyan pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ri dbus rnams su// rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi
329a4(rgyud): po legs par gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu// rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo
329a5(rgyud): 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag/ gdon mi za grub dkyil
329a6(rgyud): 'khor du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag/ 'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag/ sgo rnams kun gyi
329a7(rgyud): nang du ni// sgo spangs pa'i yang gzhag par brtsi// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ro// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gnag/ de nas rdo rje slob dngon gyis// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgyar// chag bzhin bcings
329b1(rgyud): bzhugs nas kyang // s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par brtsi// de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po di gas so// bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// ji lta bar ni bka' nod do// de ltar bgyis na bdag meng brjod//
329b2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje sgrub bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni// se gol mang po brdab bgyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sangs rgyas thams
329b3(rgyud): cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams// dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus gyur te// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing /
329b4(rgyud): ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad bar du brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na// de bzhin gshegs rnams bstan par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa// grogs po nyid du
329b5(rgyud): bar gnas// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang /
329b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa// de ltar sems dpa' chen po sgrub// dza rU baM hoHzhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa// sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas
329b7(rgyud): ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir// thams cad mdzod ces gsol
330a1(rgyud): bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las brgya'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa/
330a2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchis so// de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams
330a3(rgyud): cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la sdod du gyur pa dang sdod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
330a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song
330a5(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la midag pa dang / sngar spyad pa
330a6(rgyud): la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
330a7(rgyud): sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gang mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas kyi spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid long
330b1(rgyud): ma chud pa la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du rab thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ yang dag par bsdus par
330b2(rgyud): gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil
330b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyu thams cad du
330b4(rgyud): 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams
330b5(rgyud): cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa rnams kyis
330b6(rgyud): 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang rnyed par dka' ba ma
330b7(rgyud): lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lnga spos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho na re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o// de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang
331a1(rgyud): ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba tathA ga ta pU dza pa sman ya at+manA ni r+yA ta yA ma~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+ra sa ta ya d+hi tiSh+Tha sa ma/ zhes brjod do// de nas/
331a2(rgyud): de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag ste dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+be ta thA ga ta pU dza la a b+hi She kA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra
331a3(rgyud): rat+na a b+hi Shi ldum/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te las phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sir+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bad+ha nA ya At+ma naM ni R+sha tra
331a4(rgyud): yA mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA pa bat+tA ya ma/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying khar bzhag nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/
331a5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dza karma Na At+ma ni ni rAr+yAN+Da yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kam ku ru ma~M/ zhes brjod do// de nas stong g.yogs gos dmar po gyom la gdong dmar pos dkris nas/ sems
331a6(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'ang brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du 'jug/ bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do// sam
331a7(rgyud): yA hUM de nas bcug ma zag ma thag tu 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
331b1(rgyud): thams cad grub pa'ang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta sngos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rnga lnga'i ye shes bskyed par bya ba yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams lam stan//
331b2(rgyud): dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang du bstan pa dang phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/
331b3(rgyud): 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dang tshig yin gyis/ gal te 'ga' zhig la spras na klad pa 'grus par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i tshwa'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du
331b4(rgyud): gzhug go// de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng // khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul de smra na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// oM badz+rod ka Tha/ de
331b5(rgyud): nas slob ma la 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs
331b6(rgyud): pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par/
331b7(rgyud): bsgo'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go// 'dri ni rdo rje dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje yi shes bya
332a1(rgyud): meng ri// de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra A be sha ka de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par
332a2(rgyud): rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhug go// de bas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skyes par 'gyur te/ ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
332a3(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro// de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur
332a4(rgyud): rong 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams
332a5(rgyud): cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di la skyes par 'gyur ro// bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin
332a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// de nas phyag
332a7(rgyud): rgya de bcings la rang gi snying khar 'grol zhing snying po 'di'i brjod du gzhug go/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shA to me b+ha ba hr-i da yaM me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra ya ts+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas me tog
332b1(rgyud): gi zung ba de dkyil 'khor chen po dor zhing snying po 'di brjod du gzhug go// pra tits+tsha badz+ra ho/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo// de nas 'phreng ba 'di drangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor
332b2(rgyud): bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go/ oM pra ti grah+Na sA mi ma sa twa mahA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de ltar babs
332b3(rgyud): bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go// oM badz+ra satwa sa yan+te/ t+ya tsak+Shu rag ta na tad pa ra ud g+ha Ta ya ti satwA k+Sho/ badz+ra tsak+Shu a nut+ta ra he badz+ra pA sh+tsa/ de nas dkyil 'khor
332b4(rgyud): chen po rig bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying kha na gnas so// de
332b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
332b6(rgyud): gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro// de phyir chad don thams cad dang / yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thab
332b7(rgyud): cad nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i rang gi dri'i chu dang snying po 'dis
333a1(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas phyag rgya dang 'phreng ba gang yang rung ba zhig bcings la/ rang gi mtshan ma lag par gzhag pa 'di skad du brjod par byed// sangs/
333a2(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'di
333a3(rgyud): rdo rje ping gi dbang gis dbang bskur bar byed/ oM badz+ra sa twa tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ke taH/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug
333a4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyis dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
333a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o// de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
333a6(rgyud): bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter nus na/ snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya/ bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi// ga ter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dbyibs gcig bris nas kyang /
333a7(rgyud): nam mkha'i ngos su bsgom par bya// gang du ltung ba mthong ba der// gter yod par ni rnam par bshad// blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs// lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni// 'di ni yod ces bdag nyid kyis//
333b1(rgyud): bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi lus ni thams cad la// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni// babs par gyur nas gar gnas pa// gter ni de na yod par bshad// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag
333b2(rgyud): yin no// oM badz+ra ni d+hi/ oM rat+na rid+hi/ oM d+harmA ni d+hi/ oM karmA ni d+haM/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs
333b3(rgyud): 'dra bar// bsgobs na chu yi steng na 'bar// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob// de ltar 'bab pa byas nas kyang // gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus// bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur/
333b4(rgyud): yang 'gyur// de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar ni// bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje dbab par bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms
333b5(rgyud): nas nga gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dz+wa la/ badz+ra rU pa/ badz+ra A kA sha/ badz+ra ma hA/ de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub
333b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni// steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te// lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs steng /
333b7(rgyud): 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par// bsgoms nas rdo rje'i
334a1(rgyud): spyan gyis ni// rig 'dzin go 'phang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgobs nas ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun tu myur
334a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin no// badz+ra d+ha ra rat+na d+ha/ Ad+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje kun gyi ting
334a3(rgyud): nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i dbyibs su bsams nas ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur// kun la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrubs pas/
334a4(rgyud): myur du ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na// bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing // rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// nam mkha'i
334a5(rgyud): dbyibs ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs su bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra badz+ra
334a6(rgyud): shud+d+ha satwa satwa/ bud+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so// de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba sa yan+te/ hr-id ye sa ma
334a7(rgyud): bsti ta ni bid+yA ta ta k+Sha NA~M/ ya yAng ya ti pra yang i daM na yaM/ de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur/
334b1(rgyud): ta rang lus de nyid kyis dmyal bar 'gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// thal
334b2(rgyud): mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs nas// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa'i dngos gnyis ni// dal gyi brdabs par sbyor ba yis//
334b3(rgyud): ri bor yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na// rigs rgya yud kyis rlag par 'gyur// phra mo dbab pa'i
334b4(rgyud): cho ga byas// sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cing // rdo rje bsdams la bkrol ba ni// gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog/ de nas de dag gis gsang ba sgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi//
334b5(rgyud): bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya// yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang // de yi lus kun khyab par bsam// de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra har
334b6(rgyud): de nas snying po 'di byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis ye shes bslab par bya'o// cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/ khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung la/ phyag rgya gang yang rung ba
334b7(rgyud): bstan par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas pa ma de'i tshe de de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de
335a1(rgyud): dag the tsom du gyur te/ gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// khyod nyid kyang ngan song du ltung bar
335a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bshad do// sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod byed cing //
335a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya'o// sgrub ma thag tu 'di yis ni// ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid rnams 'thob// sangs rgyas 'grub par dka'
335a4(rgyud): ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//
335a5(rgyud): rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dod pa kun bdag bde chen dang // rdzu 'phrul tshe stobs
335a6(rgyud): gzugs mchog rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams ldan par// sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par
335a7(rgyud): bya ngab de nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang // grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// dang po nyin re dus bzhin du// rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs/
335b1(rgyud): byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya// de la phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// rdo rje 'babs pa byas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de
335b2(rgyud): yi mdun phyogs su// sems dpa' chen po de sgom mo// ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas// rang gi lus su bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par
335b3(rgyud): bya'ongade la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra satwa a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o// badz+ra satwa dri sh+ya ho/ sems dpa' chen po rjes su drad par bya ba'i snying po'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sems
335b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/ rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni// der bdag sems dpa' lus su sgom// sa
335b5(rgyud): ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o// gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni// dzaHhUM
335b6(rgyud): baM ho zhes brjod la// legs pa'i cho ga yid kyis ni// lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go// de nas bla med rdo rje las// de dag gi ni las bshad do// sangs rgyas rjes su drar grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du
335b7(rgyud): myur du 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje sa phyag rgyas// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje 'grub na// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur//
336a1(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje pa phyag rgyas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje
336a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga
336a3(rgyud): yis rang sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyir par byed// rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis// rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'gyur// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yi// re ba rnams ni yongs su skong // rdo rje band pa'i cho ga yis//
336a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhed// rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas/
336a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob// rdo rje las mchog bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go cha bskon pas na//
336a6(rgyud): rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrub pas na// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas na// rdo rje chen po
336a7(rgyud): dga' ba thob// rdo rje 'phreng ba bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis// rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur// rdo rje gar ni bsgyur ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do//
336b1(rgyud): rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis// 'grob thams cad cheb par byed// rdo rje'i ma tog sbyor byed pas/ de ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje sdang ba'i phyag rgya ches// rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed// rdo rje ji yi
336b2(rgyud): ga sa ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu drangs pas na// 'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa'i cho gas ni// thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags
336b3(rgyud): sgrog sbyor bas ni// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i/
336b4(rgyud): ye shes bshad de// thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/
336b5(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na// de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi// bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams padam byas la// gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam sbreng // gung mo nang du gzhibs pa ni/
336b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad// gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang // gung po pad+mo 'dra ba dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya ni// de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs kyi
336b7(rgyud): dam tshig 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgya bcings dang dngos grub dang // las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis// gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng //
337a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje// mdzub mo'i lcags kyus mdzub mo sbyar// ka legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po ni// phyag rgya mang po dngos grub 'di// mtha
337a2(rgyud): bong gzhibs la mdzub gnyis bcag rtse sprangad rdo rje rim cher yin// de nyi dgung po srin lag dag// mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de la srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis// mnyam pa'i gshibs
337a3(rgyud): pargyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang // de yi phyogs su gzhag pa'o// mthe bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang // de nyid gung mo sbrang rtse mo// bkrug pa/
337a4(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri'o// de las srin lag mthe'u chung gshibs// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin// bsdams pas mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba// bkan te la phyogs gzhag pa'o// mthe bongasathe chung
337a5(rgyud): spang bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pas// snying khar brkyang ste gzhag pa'o// mdzub mo rtse bcug che ba la// mthe'u chung gshibs pa brkyang ba'o// mthe'u
337a6(rgyud): chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir pa'o// snying khar mthe bong bsnyams la gzhag/ rab tu brgyab 'phreng ba'o// thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung // gar las thal sbyar spyi ba
337a7(rgyud): gzhag/ rdo rje bcing bzur du krugs// rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnams te rab tu bsdams// rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o// mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis na
337b1(rgyud): mdud pa dor// mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing // rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad de// rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi phyag
337b2(rgyud): rgya snying khar gzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag rgya ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yin// dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar
337b3(rgyud): bcas// de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad kun nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i
337b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// legs so bas ni spyod par byed// rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang
337b5(rgyud): bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching 'gyur bas// re ba kun yang rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun
337b6(rgyud): dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyis rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i ral gri thogs pas ni// nyon mongs thams cad des gcod do// rdo rje 'khor lo brtaran byas pas// dkyil
337b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur// rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas// lus
338a1(rgyud): ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ma rungs bdud ni des 'joms so// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pa// phyag rgya kun kyang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzum pas
338a2(rgyud): lha yi dga' ba rnams// 'phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyis rnams// glu yis rtag tu skad gsal ba// gar gyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur// bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed// me tog gis ni mdzes
338a3(rgyud): pa'i gzugs// mar mes snang ba dag pa nyid// dri yis lha rdzas 'dri can du'o// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug par byed// rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing ba ste// rdo rje
338a4(rgyud): dril bus 'bebs pa'o// de nas rmo kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa
338a5(rgyud): ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na// phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// A na ya sI zhes brjod na// gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs// a ho su khaM zhes brjod de// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur/
338a6(rgyud): sA d+hu sA d+hi zhes smras na// legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed// su ma had taM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur thob// rU pa d+yo ta zhes spras na// chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur/
338a7(rgyud): ar+tha prap+ta zhes spras na// reb kun kyang rdzogs par byed// ha ha hUM he zhes bag na// sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur// sarba ka ri zhos spras na// mi bya yi rnams kyang skyong // du la
338b1(rgyud): dazhes smras na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// bud+d+ha bod+d+ho zhes smras na// dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// pra ti sha b+ha zhes smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig sgra// swap+na
338b2(rgyud): Shi tAM zhes smras na// kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur// nir b+hA ya tI zhes smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur// sha trUM b+hak+Sha zhes smras ni// dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur// sarba sa
338b3(rgyud): zhes smras na// thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma hA ra ti lha yi dga'// ru pa sho b+has gzugs bzang nyid// sho tra sau khya bde ba sbyin// sarba pU dza mchod par byed// pra skad ni yid ba
338b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ pha lA ga mi 'bras bu thob// su te dzA gri gzi brjid che/ su gan+d+hargi dri mchod can// A ya hi dza 'gugs par byed// A ya hi hUM 'jug par byed// he s+pho Ta baM 'ching ba che// g+har+N+Na a
338b5(rgyud): a rab bskyod pa/ de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa dge ba bshad do// lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms na// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bshad do//
338b6(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dang bcings te// mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// de nas bcings pa rab tu bshad// g.yon pa rdo rje mdzub po ni// g.yas pa'i
338b7(rgyud): nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yi sa reg pa// de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdod
339a1(rgyud): mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo rje las rnams
339a2(rgyud): byed pa ste// ba sgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul gyis ni// legs so zhes pa snying khar gzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje
339a3(rgyud): gnyis// snying khar nyi ma brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye// snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdung // mgal
339a4(rgyud): me'i 'khor lo bskor bar dang // rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o//
339a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// 'phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin/
339a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni// mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub// rgyab gnyis kyang ni
339a7(rgyud): bsnyams te mnan// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad pa// rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying khar goms par bya// de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya// rdo rje'i las ni rnam pa
339b1(rgyud): mangs ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yi// gzhan la
339b2(rgyud): pan byed ldan par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs mchog gis myur ba ni// sems can kun la mi 'dzegs sbyin// rdo rje bsgying ba brtan
339b3(rgyud): byas la// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed// rdo rje lcags kyus skad cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang 'gugs// rdo rje mda' yis rdo rje yi// lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal
339b4(rgyud): ba kun// legs so zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin// rdo rje chen po nor bu sbyin// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgreng bas ni/
339b5(rgyud): des ni rin chen char yang 'bebs// rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur ba zhad 'gyur// rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i chos nyid de yis mthong // rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na/
339b6(rgyud): des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs rnams ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gar gyi
339b7(rgyud): mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go chas lus bcings pas// rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mche ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms// rdo rje khu
340a1(rgyud): tshur kun 'phrog cing // phyag rgya grub pa kun tu rnyed// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje 'phreng bas gzugs bzang ba// rdo rje glu yis gru snyan cing // rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed//
340a2(rgyud): bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa// me tog gis ni rgyan rnams te// mar me yis ni gzi chen po// rdo rje'i dris ni dri bar ldan// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa'o// rdorje
340a3(rgyud): lcags sgrog gis ni bcing // rdo rje dril bus bskyod pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying khar brdab par
340a4(rgyud): bya ste snying po ni 'di brjod do// badz+ra ban+d+ha trar+tha/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po
340a5(rgyud): brjod do// ang de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do// ma hA sa ma
340a6(rgyud): ya satwa haM/ 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i
340a7(rgyud): sems dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis sgom mo// sa ma ya haM/ de nas rang phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms nas/ sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab pa'o// sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas bsgrub
340b1(rgyud): par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar re zhig nor grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// ar+tha sid+d+hi/ 'dis phyag rgya grub na nor chen po skye bar 'gyur/
340b2(rgyud): rong de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra sad+d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra bi du d+ha ra sid+d+hi/ 'das ji ra
340b3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos sgrub bo// dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang ngag dang / sems
340b4(rgyud): rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/ bdag rang gtong bar 'dod na de nas snying po 'di brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA pa ya/
340b5(rgyud): badz+ra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho re b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo be b+ha wa/ a ru rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa ma/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wAn/ sar+b+ba ta
340b6(rgyud): thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma hA sA ma ya satwa AH'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang / de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang / dam pa'i chos spod pa dang / nyes pa thams
340b7(rgyud): cad byas pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / dngos grub dam pa 'am/ rdo rje dngos
341a1(rgyud): grub pam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
341a2(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo// /
341a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra puH/ de nas snying kha nas byung ba rin cheran rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor zhing bcings nas/ de bzhin du go cha'ang snying po
341a4(rgyud): 'dis bcing ngo // oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu drA me tri d+h+ri ku ru ba ra ka ba tsi na baM/ de nas yang go cha'i mthar 'phreng ba bcings pa gtad la/ thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po 'dis mnyes par
341a5(rgyud): bya'ongang badz+ra tu Sh+yo ho/ cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang / bcing ba dang / mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas//
341a6(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'
341a7(rgyud): rnams// sgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'dir ri ci dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thog/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni// rtog pa las bshad//
