341b1(rgyud): rang byas pa 'am// sgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do// de nas gsang ba'i mchod brjod cing // rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis gru blangs te// gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas
341b2(rgyud): nang rdo rje rin chen bla ni med// rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gar lag pa gnyis gshibs pa
341b3(rgyud): gsang ba bya'o// bdug pa la sogs pas mchid pa bya ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bsdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go// de nas thams cad
341b4(rgyud): la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar bzhugs pa
341b5(rgyud): rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang / kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul
341b6(rgyud): zhugs spyir no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs bstan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya/
341b7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha e kha twaM d+ha ra yA mi/ badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad du su la'ang ma bzla zhig ces bsgo la mna'i snying po'ang bstan to// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slar bkye ste/ de bzhin
342a1(rgyud): kya bya/ gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shing dkrol nas// oM khyed kyis
342a2(rgyud): sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// badz+ra satwa muH/ de ltar dkyil 'khor thams
342a3(rgyud): cad la bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
342a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / bam po gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs
342a5(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das
342a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de nyid de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas
342a7(rgyud): kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
342b1(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor cher po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la/
342b2(rgyud): pan bzhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang // bud med gzugs su'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi byag
342b3(rgyud): rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+hA tI shA ri hU~M badz+rI Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
342b4(rgyud): pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig
342b5(rgyud): pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+rI Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
342b6(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na badz+re Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa tham
342b7(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma badz+ri Ni hUM
343a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge
343a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma badz+rI Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen/
343a3(rgyud): po dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM gu h+ya rat+ne aM ku shi hUM/ oM gu h+ya rA gi rA gA yA hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra sA d+hi shwa ri hUM/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin
343a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i lcags rgyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags ma dang / legs ldan ma ste rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wa dza amra
343a5(rgyud): gu h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra hA sa badz+rI hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang / rin po che'i sgron pa dang / rgyal mtshar gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan pa dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste chos rnams so// oM badz+ra
343a6(rgyud): rnam ma byas pa yi hU~M/ 'gabyas sa yo / e badrub kyi med la / i thaN+Da wa cas pa ma ng+ge/ rdordzang blo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'tshar mo thamasas dang / 'u rlo ma sa
343a7(rgyud): kyi gzungs ma rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa pa yai hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka btso hUM/ oM badz+ra gu d+ya daMSh+Ta d+ha ra NI hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya puSh+Ti hUM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ba ma dang
343b1(rgyud): mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi/
343b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad do// oM badz+ra gu h+ya sa twa badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gud+ha d+harma badz+re Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu d+ya karma badz+rI Ni hUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin
343b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bzhag go// de nas yang
343b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dzA pra brta nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a b+hi She ka pU dzas
343b5(rgyud): ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta rA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu d+ya gI ti pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya nAM t+ya pU dzA sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA ya hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang
343b6(rgyud): bcas pa rang gi mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams dgod do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
343b7(rgyud): bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams
344a1(rgyud): cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// khri yi steng du
344a2(rgyud): rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems shes bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng // rang gi dbang ri bskur bar bshad// rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng // mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi rdo rje khriyi steng // rdo rje
344a3(rgyud): kun+da zhes bya bar bshad// pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni// 'od kyi 'khor lo brten pa'o// khri yi steng du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje la skyes par// legs par sbyin pa gnyis de
344a4(rgyud): bzhin// ren chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// phyag mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas// rdo rje gnyis par so yi 'phreng // rdo rje dbus su pad+mo bri// ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin
344a5(rgyud): ni ngang rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs// 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi lce// rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang / go na rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri// lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya bya// sems ma rdo rje la sogs ni/
344a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang ci rigs bya// rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshar/
344a7(rgyud): ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gi rigs bcings te 'jug
344a8(rgyud): dang /
344b1(rgyud): par bya'o// zhugs nas lan cig bskor te phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas/ rang gi snying khar tshul bzhin du bkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas ji lta ba'i las
344b2(rgyud): rnams byas te phyir byung ngo // phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzung ngo // de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas
344b3(rgyud): g.yogs la byin to// rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// de la dang po'i re zhig rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus swa ni// rkang lag thal mo
344b4(rgyud): sbyar nas kha// glal cing rdo rje bsgom byas na// rdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis ni 'bod byed cing // lcags kyu ma yang
344b5(rgyud): 'gugs par byed// mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis ni// glal zhing snying khar 'phangs nas ni// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang // 'dud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed// bdag gi lus kyi snying la ru// rdo rje go
344b6(rgyud): cha'i tshul gyis ni// dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra rA ga ma ho/ badz+ra aM ku shi dza/ badz+ra ma ra ya mA ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ban
344b7(rgyud): d+ha rak+Sha haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni// dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad // de yis bud med bltas pas ni// rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin//
345a1(rgyud): rab tu myur bar mig bskul zhing // mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yin par bshad// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o// khro gnyer gnyer ma rab bsdus/
345a2(rgyud): pa dang khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa ste// khro bo'i lta bas byas nas ni// khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed// ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba// brtan par 'dzum pa med pa'i mig/ byams pa'i lta ba yin
345a3(rgyud): par bshad// nad dang gdon dang gdug sel to// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti a~M ku shi dzaHkro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hrIHdzaD+ha tiSh+Thi phaT/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig gi
345a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// ho ha~M ho ho zhes smras na// sgra dang bral bas de ma thag/ sems can kun ni mgu bar byed// de ni rdo rje tshig gsal ba'o// dza dza dza dza zhes brjod na// khro ba'i tshig ni
345a5(rgyud): gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba ste// skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis// ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yis// sems can kun la bdud byed do//
345a6(rgyud): nananahaM zhes smras na// phra ba'i tshig ri gsal bste// 'jig rten 'di kun srung byed po// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rnal ba'ang srung // de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra ho badz+ra badz+ra hUM / badz+ra tsa/
345a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas la// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang
345b1(rgyud): du byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa// rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i spyan ni
345b2(rgyud): bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// chos rnams thams cad des btung byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom
345b3(rgyud): byas na// rdo rje thams cad des srung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra pA NaM sarba sha ma na ya sarba bud+d+ha ho// badz+ra gar+b+ha badz+ra pA ni shIg+h+raM A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHbadz+ra ne tra sarba d+harmA na mA ra ya
345b4(rgyud): hU~M phaT/ badz+ra bi shwa rak+Sha sarbA na hUM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag gis bdag gi snying khir ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcing byas la// rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro
345b5(rgyud): ba thams cad 'bab par byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// rin chen rdo rje bcing byas la// 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas na ni// thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag gis bdag gi
345b6(rgyud): snying khar ni// chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas la// khro bo'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// las kyi rdo rje bcing byas la// byams pa'i lta bas
345b7(rgyud): bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya ho/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya dza/ badz+ra gu byas ma ya hU~M/ badz+ra
346a1(rgyud): gu h+ya sa ma ya haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa/
346a2(rgyud): de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la// mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni// gung mo bsnams pa'i tshigs su sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang por bshad// de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/
346a3(rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas// pad+mo srin lag mthe'i chung gung // lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang // mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtse// de nyid mthe bong gnyis kyis sbas// legs pa sbyin dang mdzub
346a4(rgyud): rin chen// radzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar// srin lag gzhibs mthe'u chung rin chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed// mthe bong mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug/ sor mo bar du
346a5(rgyud): 'khor lo brkyang // de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung // mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rjes dga'// mdzub mo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug/ mtheb gnyis dbye ba de nyid las// de nas nang du rdo rjer bya// rdo rje gsang
346a6(rgyud): ba de rnams ni// rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin// chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nang du bkug pas so// las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i// mtshan ma lus su bstan pa'o// de
346a7(rgyud): nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// a/ dz+dza/ ho/ sa/ oM/ aM/ traM/ ha/ hrI/ hUM/ maM/ raM/ kaM/ haM/ hUM/ baM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams
346b1(rgyud): su bya ba dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa// gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no// de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes smras shing // bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni// 'dod la chags pa/
346b2(rgyud): bde ba'i bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni// dus kun tu ni bcing mi bya// gsang ba 'am ni don chen la// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// 'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas// rang byung
346b3(rgyud): rnams kyi lha mo brtan// sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na// rang gi bdag po btang ba re// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams bcing ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no// bdag gam 'on te gzhan yang
346b4(rgyud): rung dang rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// snying por bcas / 'di yis ni// bcing ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung // badz+ra hUM ban+d+ha/ de nas dgrol ba yin no// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// snying por
346b5(rgyud): bya ba de nyid kyis// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// de dang de nas dgrol bar bya// oM badz+ra muH/ de nas brtan par bya ba yin te// rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying kha nas ni spyi bor dgrol// mdzub
346b6(rgyud): mo yis ni go cha bcing // snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM dr-iD+D+h+ya badz+ra ka ba tsa dr-i D+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par byas// thal mo
346b7(rgyud): brdabs pas kun sbyar la// snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas// dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la// dus 'di nyid du sbyar bar bya// thams cad
347a1(rgyud): 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil
347a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin
347a3(rgyud): gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sUk+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs
347a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM satwa sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra
347a5(rgyud): dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rir cher 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
347a6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+wA ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi
347a7(rgyud): ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
347b1(rgyud): pa gdon mo za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig par
347b2(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sUk+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
347b3(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi
347b4(rgyud): khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/ yang gcig tu gyur nas ting nge
347b5(rgyud): 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
347b6(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ de nas de spras ma thag
347b7(rgyud): tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs
348a1(rgyud): teng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje phra mo'i bdag
348a2(rgyud): ste che dang gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
348a3(rgyud): cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo phyogs rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis/
348a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so// nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
348a5(rgyud): kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go// de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du
348a6(rgyud): dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
348a7(rgyud): shes kyi rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // badz+ra nA bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug
348b1(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje de las ye shes chen po
348b2(rgyud): 'di ba ni phyung ngo // badz+ra At+ma ka dr-iD+ha badz+ra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha rA ga badz+ra pra b+he sha hrid yaM/ a ho badz+re duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
348b3(rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen
348b4(rgyud): po rnams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying kha'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te
348b5(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // badz+ra rat+na At+ma ka hr-i da ya/ badz+ra sUr+ya tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra d+ha dzA gra bi hr-i da ya/ badz+ra has/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang
348b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin
348b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang
349a1(rgyud): gi snying la rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di ba'i byung ngo // badz+ra pad+ma At+maka
349a2(rgyud): hr-id ya badz+ra ko Sha ka tiSh+Tha badz+ra tsakra hr-i da yaM pra be sha/ badz+ra dzi ha gra hr-i da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang //
349a3(rgyud): 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin
349a4(rgyud): to de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas/ yang rdo rje shin tu phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs
349a5(rgyud): te bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // sarba badz+ra At+ma ka hr-i da badz+ra ka ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rak+Sha hr-i da ya/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las
349a6(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching /
349a7(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs
349b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/
349b2(rgyud): rang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag
349b3(rgyud): ste bzhugs so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do//
349b4(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ri// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag
349b5(rgyud): rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing // de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya// ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo
349b6(rgyud): bcing bar bcings// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/
349b7(rgyud): ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing // snga yi rtse mor bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mo bde
350a1(rgyud): reg pas// sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'i// mtshan ma gal te byung ba na// mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba// sems de kun tu khyab par bya//
350a2(rgyud): ji tsam 'dod pas sems khyab nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas de yang bsdu ba ni// sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba/
350a3(rgyud): de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyis brtag pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yin no// sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra s+pha ra Na/ saM ha Na badz+ra/ badz+ra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/ sems dpa' gang gi
350a4(rgyud): byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan par chen po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can kun la des khyab byi// byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa//
350a5(rgyud): sems can kun don ldan pa yin// sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin// chos sam yang na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab
350a6(rgyud): cing dga' bar 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po goms par bya// de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// /
350a7(rgyud): ma hA me tri s+pha ra Na/ ma hA kA ru Na s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha pra mo ha s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba sa tAM saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa'i ye shes bslab bo// nam mkha' yi ni phyogs
350b1(rgyud): gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug kyang rug// rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu// rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis// mnyam par bzhag pas snying par/
350b2(rgyud): ring rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta ba yi rim bzhin du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po// gnas rnams kun tu bsgom par bya// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'o//
350b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun tu// dza lta ba yaM go rims bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra mu khi b+ha be// ma hA bo d+hi satwa A b+he sha/ badz+ra pA tsa
350b4(rgyud): d+hA ra sha ya swa ru baM/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti A be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyis sgom pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil
350b5(rgyud): 'khor dbus su ni// bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// bdag nyid snying khar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid
350b6(rgyud): kyis ni bsgom bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub sgom pa'o//
350b7(rgyud): de la snying po ni 'di rnams so// sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/ badz+ra satwa badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha/ ta thA ga to haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid gsal ba'i phyag/
351a1(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sems can thams cad chags par
351a2(rgyud): byed nga bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis rim nyab sbyar bas// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig
351a3(rgyud): tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni sna tshogs las dang pa nyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni
351a4(rgyud): mnyam sbyar bas// las rnams thams cad dos sgrub po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
351a5(rgyud): bong rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du// des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// de nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//
351a6(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying khar rdo rje la sogs 'khor// bsgoms na rdo rje la sogs pas// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin
351a7(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar// bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste// ting 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog/ de rnams kyi ni bcings pa bshad// skyil mo
351b1(rgyud): klang 'dug gan t+ya la du// g.yas bcus de bzhin slar bcus pa// snying lar gnas pa bzhi pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro// dpral bar bzhag dang lhag pa dang // drag pa dang ni dgod par
351b2(rgyud): sbyar khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang // snying khar rgyas dang kha nas dbyang // spyi bo bong ka khar bzhag pa// mdzum mo gnyis bkug bdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o//
351b3(rgyud): Dok+ki / khra kra / maT/ a tha/ dzA dzAM/ aM aM ba baM/ triT/ hrI pha/ b+hi rba/ kra sha/ ha ha/ ba ba khaM ba~M/ phaT/ zas/ de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog/ phra mo'i rdo rje can rnams bslab// ye shes khu chur dam tshig
351b4(rgyud): lasang gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so//
351b5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kying ma tshig gi ye shes byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes byab
351b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin
351b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i
352a1(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
352a2(rgyud): rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di spras pa/ oM sarba/
352a3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las/
352a4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de
352a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las dam tshig gi rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
352a6(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nut+tar pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tham/
352a7(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs/
352b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag nardo rje de nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod/
352b2(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams pa 'byams sprin rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin
352b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub chen
352b4(rgyud): po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
352b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang / khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don bya ba la
352b6(rgyud): sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so// mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la tshe
352b7(rgyud): ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag/ mchod pa kun ni byed pa
353a1(rgyud): yin dgang phyir sangs rgyas nyid chen du// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas
353a2(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA tan pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ri Ni hUM A/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA tan pU dza s+pha ra Na karma gri dza/ oM sarba
353a3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nirA ta na a nu ra ga pU dza s+pha ra Na karma pA Ne hUM ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba et+man rI Sh+Thanas druka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti aH/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ma dang
353a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa
353a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya A b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma Ni oM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo badz+ra te dzo ni dz+wa la hrIH/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sha pa ri pU ra Ni tsin+ta
353a6(rgyud): ma Ni d+hA dza a gre b+h+yo badz+ra d+h+wa dza a gri tAM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pri ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hI s+ya ha/ dbang mo chen mo dang / snang ba chen mo dang / rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgu
353a7(rgyud): marnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA tA sa mA d+hi b+hiHs+phu ro mi ma hA d+ha trA gr-i hrIH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nir ha reHstu no ma ma hA g+ho ShA nu ge d+haM/
353b1(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri brta di sarba su trA nAn yeHsU no mo sarba maN+Da le nAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+to b+haSha bud+d+ha sa~M gI ti b+hin yaM/ spya no mi badz+ra bAtse baM/ ye shes chen mo'i glu dang / dbyangs chen mo'i rjes/
353b2(rgyud): su 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga d+hU pa me ga s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba
353b3(rgyud): ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta a lo ke dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ku ru ku ru/ sems can mA dang / byang chub
353b4(rgyud): chen po'i yan lag can ma dang / mig ldan ma dang / dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med
353b5(rgyud): pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags// dkyil
353b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya// rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
353b7(rgyud): rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ba bcug nas kyang / 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/ mchod
354a1(rgyud): pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyi nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa
354a2(rgyud): gnyis su sbyin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas byang chub chen po'i sems sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//
354a3(rgyud): byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed na// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas
354a4(rgyud): yin bsam zhing // 'phreng ba la sogs rab mchod pas// mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // snyam pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas//
354a5(rgyud): mchod na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur// de la snying po ni
354a6(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no// bud+d+ha At+ma ko&haM/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ bud+d+ha sU ti ka ro mi/ bud+d+ha pU dza ka ro mi/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i drug rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/
354a7(rgyud): mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing // de bzhin sangs rgyas rtag mchod na// rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// rjes su yi rang
354b1(rgyud): bas mchod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur// lus
354b2(rgyud): dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// pra NA mi nu ta mo de bud+d+ha pU dza ba
354b3(rgyud): rinA ma/ de nas chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni// dga' ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/
354b4(rgyud): chos rnams kun mi 'dus pa yi// a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni// de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam/
354b5(rgyud): chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgra brnyan dag dang 'drar bshad de// chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis// mchod na sangs rgyas gsung
354b6(rgyud): yang 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra/ d+harmA tsakra niSh+Ta pany+tsa/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/
354b7(rgyud): rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni// chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyug/
355a1(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms dang// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi lus/
355a2(rgyud): ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra kA ya/ d+harmA kA ya/ satwa kA ya/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsapa
355a3(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rang byung la naM las kun gyis// 'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni// phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang // 'dra bar de ni myur du 'gyur// shin tu chags/
355a4(rgyud): par sbyor ba yis// dam du bzung ba'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na// rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas// brtan par gyur pa'i mchod bde bas// sangs/
355a5(rgyud): rgyas rnams la phul na ni// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// kun tu sbyor ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i phyir ni bral bas na// rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag gi gas/
355a6(rgyud): pa'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// ra ti badz+ra/ rA ga badz+ra/ pra ti badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying la rgyab logs
355a7(rgyud): rgyab sbyor ba// dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du// kha dang rna ba mgo lhag pa// spyi bo phrag pa kha rked gzhag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// phyag/
355b1(rgyud): rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje bcings pa dang byas la// snying pa la sogs gnas tshul du// bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye
355b2(rgyud): shes bslab par bya'o// oM kra sa yu sa tri ra kr-i na khaM shaM hUM hUM sha no shI sAM/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
355b3(rgyud): pa las/ rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams
355b4(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du de bzhin
355b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti baM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
355b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i
355b7(rgyud): snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra satwa muSh+Ti sar/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/
356a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i tshig rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyani snying po 'ang/
356a2(rgyud): smras pa/ oM badz+ra rat+na muSh+Ti traM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs
356a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+harma muSh+Ti khaM/ de nas de bzhin
356a4(rgyud): gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po
356a5(rgyud): chen po 'ichog rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad sdu 'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di spras pa/ oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ti haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang
356a6(rgyud): gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
356a7(rgyud): 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas
356b1(rgyud): na rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya// thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste// de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/
356b2(rgyud): dbus su ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri// de nas rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad smra bar bya'o// khyod kyis
356b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la'ang ma bstan cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par lta ba dang sdig pa'i las byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do// brtson 'grus chung ba dang // sbyor ba med pa dang // ri mo mi
356b4(rgyud): shes pa de dag rdo rje'i dbyings la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil
356b5(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang
356b6(rgyud): yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
356b7(rgyud): gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas kyi khams su lhung bar gyur pa 'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur
357a1(rgyud): ta re zhes bskol / gdong g.yogs bkrol nyid dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig spos shig ga bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi byag /
357a2(rgyud): gang dang gang bcings pa// bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni// der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje gsung ba bzhin// bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya kun// de dag kun gyis
357a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po gshibs nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas gzung bar bya// de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa// de ma thag tu de dbang bskur// de nas
357a4(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod
357a5(rgyud): par bya'o// glu dang gar dang zas dang bro// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni// las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
357a6(rgyud): ye shes bslab par bya'o// mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas// dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas// mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te//
357a7(rgyud): gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshibs// mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse sbreng // dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de// ting
357b1(rgyud): 'dzin dbang du 'gyur ba'i tshul// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung // mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung bsnol ba ni// rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor lo// de nas sems dpa'/
357b2(rgyud): rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
357b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang
357b4(rgyud): 'grub bo// de ltar ras dang / rtsig pa dang / nam mkha' dang / gnas thams cad du bris na dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo// dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa
357b5(rgyud): nyid kyi tshe ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/ la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang
357b6(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang / ro dang / zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du yang lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes
357b7(rgyud): bcom ldan gyis gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
358a1(rgyud): zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
358a2(rgyud): badz+ra satwa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang /
358a3(rgyud): bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
358a4(rgyud): bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bzhad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/
358a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya// de nas dgug pa dang gzhugs pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin
358a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang khong du ma chud pa su la'ang gsang ba 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod ngan
358a7(rgyud): song thams cad du lhung ba 'am mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab bo// zla rgyas dkyil
358b1(rgyud): 'khor la 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes bslab
358b2(rgyud): bos 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu// khams gsum na yang gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig/ ma hA sa ma ya ha na phaT/ ces mna'i snying po spyir no//
358b3(rgyud): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o//
358b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyang de bzhin no// ri mo la sogs pa dang lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la'ang ji ltar 'dod par cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbyings
358b5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du'ang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
358b6(rgyud): gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs par gsol to// oM legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//
358b7(rgyud): rngardza rgyam khyong legs pa ste// rdo rje la sam byong legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyigasang// zag pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje/
359a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par byas nas bsgrubs na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'grub// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni// 'dod/
359a2(rgyud): pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas ni// bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg
359a3(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / bam po bzhi pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
359a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis
359a5(rgyud): gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad// rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od// rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po//
359a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ spos med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las dang srung ba che// gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
359a7(rgyud): dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// don kun gyi ni de nyid don// sems can don chen kun rig pa// kun mkhyen kun byas
359b1(rgyud): thams cad de// kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang // dam tshig chen po de nyid don// sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa/
359b2(rgyud): cheng rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po// rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchod chen mchog
359b3(rgyud): rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che// rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang // rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog
359b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che// sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che// sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa// thabs
359b5(rgyud): chen dang ni dngos grub che// rdo rje sgrub khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po// rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal
359b6(rgyud): long sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes// rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab// ston zhi khro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che// yang
359b7(rgyud): dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul// pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba// kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen//
360a1(rgyud): kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa// rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba po// rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog/ phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag bya mchod cing rjed
360a2(rgyud): pa dang // rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas bya// gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus// kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/
360a3(rgyud): byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing // klu grangs gang zhig mchod byed pa// de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar
360a4(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
360a5(rgyud): cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas rdo rje de bdag nyid kyi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bos nas 'di skad gsungs
360a6(rgyud): song bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la so/
360a7(rgyud): pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas gdul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par/
360b1(rgyud): snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par
360b2(rgyud): zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas
360b3(rgyud): pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhugs so//
360b4(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa
360b5(rgyud): nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
360b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
360b7(rgyud): zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di
361a1(rgyud): phyung ngo // hUM de nas de phyung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can/ sprin ma bcus shing
361a2(rgyud): dpral bsnyer ba/ mche lhag ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa/ rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang rgyan sna
361a3(rgyud): tshogs kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings
361a4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma thabs kyis 'dul ba yi// thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te// gang phyir sems can 'dul
361a5(rgyud): thabs phyir// dri ma med pa'i khro gnyer rab// de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin
361a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
361a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM su~M b+ha na~M sr-i b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAr badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
361b1(rgyud): ka nas byang ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag rdo rjer gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
361b2(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te spyan drangs nas/ rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su
361b3(rgyud): gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni// kun tu babang po sdig med de// gang phyir sems can 'dul don du//
361b4(rgyud): khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ yang
361b5(rgyud): bka' nod cing bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
361b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // hUM Tak+ki dza/ de nas de byung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
361b7(rgyud): sprin rgya mtsho thams cad nas/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad re gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing
362a1(rgyud): lus pa med pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas ri rab ri gang na ba dang / rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i/
362a2(rgyud): kha bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs partse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas phyag
362a3(rgyud): na rdo rje rang gzugs kanas rdo rje de blangs te gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
362a4(rgyud): grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom
362a5(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su 'gro ba grub par byos// kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir// grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par byos// de nas 'jig
362a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces smras so// kye gnod sbyin
362a7(rgyud): nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo/ dbang phyug chen po/ byed pa po/ 'jigs pa po/ 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po/ lha'i lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas
362b1(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kye sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ de nas lha chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
362b2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems cad dbang phyug chen po la de skad bka' stsol ba 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum
362b3(rgyud): kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa la sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod
362b4(rgyud): sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas khyed khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas sa re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha'
362b5(rgyud): ngag gi dbang por gyur pa dang rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor po dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyir khro zhing gtum pa chen po rab tu 'jigs pa'i
362b6(rgyud): gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad smras so// kye d+ha ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po bas khyod kyis nga la ci'i
362b7(rgyud): phyir bka' stsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de snyems pa dang bcas pas gsor zhing 'dzub ste 'di skad ces smras so// kye lus srul po mi'i sha za ba/ zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za
363a1(rgyud): zhing kha zas dang / mal dang / gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/ de nas lha chen po dbang phyug pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang nam mkha'
363a2(rgyud): rnams khro bo chen po chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang long zhig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom
363a3(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs/
363a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam
363a5(rgyud): tshig dran par byas so// oM suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do// hUM de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus
363a6(rgyud): pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha sbub tu dgyel te nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo // lha chen po zhes
363a7(rgyud): bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur te shi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje 'jig
363b1(rgyud): rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la sbubs sbyin pa byos te pa bsad cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/ lha thams cad bos te
363b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te khyed rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su dpal nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
363b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o// khyod kyis bston pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
363b4(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lha rnams 'di ni nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab de
363b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste
363b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed kyi nang na'ang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams
363b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems can de rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so// de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i
364a1(rgyud): dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to// de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag/
364a2(rgyud): kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyid cing mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang / de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyis/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no//
364a3(rgyud): de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnamasabacom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung
364a4(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di la kun tu bskyab par gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bskyab par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
364a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas
364a6(rgyud): khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sa re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems
364a7(rgyud): can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sreg par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i
364b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i
364b2(rgyud): sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gzan par bya'o// gsol pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje khro
364b3(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so//
364b4(rgyud): oM brjod tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun rgyal ba las sems
364b5(rgyud): dbugs byung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang ba spu lang ba med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
364b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lnga'i dbang po lha chen po 'di ma bslang na 'di'i srog de chung gzan par gyur te ci rung / gsos na ni de'ang skyes bu dam par
364b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so// badz+ra yuH/ de nas 'di smras pa thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang 'dod na
365a1(rgyud): ldang ni ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di lta bu'i 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
365a2(rgyud): khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi/ nga ma yin no// dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rung ba'i sems can
365a3(rgyud): 'di las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di bskyab mi nus so// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
365a4(rgyud): po yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to// ji ltar zhe na/ khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
365a5(rgyud): las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad
365a6(rgyud): ces gsungs so// kye ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur to// de ltar 'gyel bzhin du'ang
365a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te 'di skad ces smras so// nga shi bar bzod kyi/ khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang
365b1(rgyud): pa'i mthil nas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'di phung ngo // oM pa ta ka ri Sha na badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba
365b2(rgyud): lhag ger byung ba/ gdong chen po'i rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang
365b3(rgyud): ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badz+ra hUM/ oM pa ta ka ri Sha/ sarba badz+ra d+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badz+ra hUM dza/ de skad gsungs pa dang / lha chen po dang lha mo u mar bcas to da
365b4(rgyud): bAgyen khar bstan nas gcer bur byung ste/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rje rjes su spyod pas bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs
365b5(rgyud): kyi drung du bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mchis
365b6(rgyud): brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra kra ma ho/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
365b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes lnga chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma'i steng du mnan nas rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra A b+he sha ha na pa taM traH/ de nas de smras pa
366a1(rgyud): zag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go// de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las
366a2(rgyud): byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen
366a3(rgyud): po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM bud+d+ha maM tri badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu lha chen po la 'babs pa'i
366a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur te/ de'ang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes
366a5(rgyud): dang mngon par shes pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
366a6(rgyud): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phral nas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
366a7(rgyud): kyo 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'odas pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i
366b1(rgyud): dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so// de nas lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// yi ge'i tshig
366b2(rgyud): gis mnan nas su// mya ngan las ni 'das par bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams
366b3(rgyud): cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
366b4(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa
366b5(rgyud): de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la'ang gnas par gyis shig/
366b6(rgyud): de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no// byang chub sems ni rim bzhin
366b7(rgyud): dung bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni// byang chub chen por ci nus par// shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams
367a1(rgyud): 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas nas/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug go// oM badz+ra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na sta ban d+ha sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa twas
367a2(rgyud): ma yaM a nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya staM/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ s+thi ro me b+ha ba.A hA d+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra ti hA ro me b+ha bsar+b+ba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas 'di smras
367a3(rgyud): mthag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsung gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro be te r-in ti r-i'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dmad 'ching bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas/
367a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur
367a5(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o//
367a6(rgyud): mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje mtshon cha ste// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i
367a7(rgyud): bdag po rnams la rjes su byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni dbyig pa'o// ser smug ni rdo rje ser sdug ste/ de la sogs pa
367b1(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bsgyur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje glang po'i snga'o// sbrang rtsir byed pa ni rdo rje 'brang
367b2(rgyud): pa'ong nga rgyab ni rdo rje dbang po'o// rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byir
367b3(rgyud): pa 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje thob pa'o// me ni rdo rje me'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og gi dbang po lnga
367b4(rgyud): thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so// gtsug pungs ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o// ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya
367b5(rgyud): ba'i dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma laM rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang
367b6(rgyud): bskur bas dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bkod do// 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o// rug mi n+ye ni rdo rje gser ro// 'aSh+Ta ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o// tshangs
