367b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje zhi ba ma'o// dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal mor dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ba'o//
368a1(rgyud): ro zhan ni rdo rje mdangs so// dbyig pa 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o// skye ba 'phrog ma ni skyed 'ching ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni khro mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas
368a2(rgyud): nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o// za ba ma ni rdo rje zab mo'o// bgo ba ni rdo rje bsgo ba mo'o// dga' ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni
368a3(rgyud): tshogs kyi gtso bor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ zhi ba mo ni rdo rje pho nya ma'o// rlung ni mgyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o// me ni rdo rje 'bar ba ma'o// ku be ram
368a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje 'bar ma ste// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje'i kha'o// tsa pun tri ni rdo rje'i dus so//
368a5(rgyud): sna chad ma ni rdo rje rul pa mo'o// ba ru na ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
368a6(rgyud): rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs ste/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/
368a7(rgyud): rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed// oM ha ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni// gsu zhis
368b1(rgyud): phyir yang gcu bar bya// dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// dgos pa 'grub phyir 'dug par byos// khyod kyi srog ni ma rung bar// dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re/
368b2(rgyud): bcing ba dam byas te// mdzub mo 'gugs nas rab tu mnan// mthe bong gnyis ka mtshams sbyor bas// gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing ba
368b3(rgyud): las dgal te 'ga' yis bcings gyur na// dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yis// mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni// mdzub mo sor rgyab nas ni mdud// bzlog ste
368b4(rgyud): mgo bor gzhag par bya// bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig 'di// rdo rje rig 'dzin bcing nas ni// khros te gang la bltas pa yi// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yi// srung ba
368b5(rgyud): dam bcings mnan pa ni// de ni gsang ba'i dam tshig ste// sems can thams cad srung ba'o// gang zhig gang la bskyabs pa'i phyir// khro bor ldan pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la srung ba
368b6(rgyud): yi dang de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byos// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo la// mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam par byas// gcu zhing slar bcu drag bkrol nas// spyi bor mnyam
368b7(rgyud): zhugs gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na// khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod// rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por bya// mthe bong
369a1(rgyud): gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya rabacings nas kyang // bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya// gal te gsod par 'dod na ni// dgug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdu/
369a2(rgyud): du rtag tu 'dug/ de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM ba li tod pa li ta badz+ra A ka R+Sha ya hUM dzaHdzaH/ rdo rje
369a3(rgyud): gcu pa'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o// hUM badz+ra a gra dI pa ya sa ma ye hUM/ bar snang nas spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA la a gra baM/ 'phreng ba can rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la spyod
369a4(rgyud): pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA tA la bAny+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hAny+dza ka hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'i// de nas bcom
369a5(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings
369a6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
369a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs
369b1(rgyud): song oM badz+ra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da lam badz+ra d+ha ra sad t+ya mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te// snying khar yongs su bskor bar bya// mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i phyi
369b2(rgyud): rol gyi// dkyil 'khor 'gugs pa mchog yin no// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
369b3(rgyud): rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye grogs po dag srog gcod pa dag spang zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi
369b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems cad de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas
369b5(rgyud): mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje
369b6(rgyud): khro bo 'di gsungs so// oM duSh+Ta badz+ra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+han sa ya bi ka ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Da la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza mar da mar da/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+ta badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro
369b7(rgyud): mdzub legs par ni// sen mo sprang de dkris nas kyang // rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba// phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms// de nas 'di smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad
370a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing da bral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa'ang dral te/ ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yaM bsregs shin/
370a2(rgyud): tu btsos pas 'o dod cher 'bod cing 'phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
370a3(rgyud): cag srog dang mi dpral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams
370a4(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM suM b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje
370a5(rgyud): khro bo mi bzad pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA badz+ra khur kro d+ha pa ta ye sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da laM/ bi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM b+hi k+ka ra bi d+hin sa ya s+phoT ya b+hany+dza ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na
370a6(rgyud): ha nad ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa traM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur nas rgya ma
370a7(rgyud): chen por lhung ngo // de ras byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad
370b1(rgyud): thul cig ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
370b2(rgyud): oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
370b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra A ka rA ya shI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra ha~M/ badz+ra d+ha ra sa twe na hUM dza/ de nas de spras ma thag tu 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te 'khod do// de nas
370b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'phra man pa la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang / rang
370b5(rgyud): tshig dang / sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / gcig pu 'bar bar gyur pas khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs sa re/ de nas 'phra med pa la sogs pa'i
370b6(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka'
370b7(rgyud): stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po skyed la thabs sbyin pa sgrub par gyis shig
371a1(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hrid ya ma kaR+tha
371a2(rgyud): yang yang t+ya yaM ma to pA ma d+hA ra d+he na me ya te/ tad+ya s+ya hr-id yaM ni swa mi du sa ma ya hUM dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgyab cing ba bshad do// snying khar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis// shin tu dam por bcings nas ni/
371a3(rgyud): rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo yis// rang gi mtshan khung drud par bya// khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zo zhig/ de nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon
371a4(rgyud): thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchod rgal te rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
371a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi/ bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de nas/
371a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nang dgug pa'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa pa ya/ A na ya
371a7(rgyud): sarbadad+ya b+hu dza ra d+hin+na sha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i rang thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ rims la sogs pa
371b1(rgyud): nang 'di rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa long zhig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
371b2(rgyud): 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/ da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo
371b3(rgyud): rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba a ba ra NA ni bud+d+ha sa t+ye na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje
371b4(rgyud): thal mo dang sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang // mthe bong bsnams te sbyar nas ni// mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa// phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i rad thams cad kyis gang btab pa
371b5(rgyud): la las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thong zhig/ khyed dag srog dang bral la re/ de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
371b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du nyid kyi thugs
371b7(rgyud): ka nas phyung na/ de la bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
372a1(rgyud): oM k+Sha pa ya badz+ra swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs
372a2(rgyud): so nga oM sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha Ni bi sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod
372a3(rgyud): dongong de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ ngan song gis sar lhung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams dkon mchog gsum
372a4(rgyud): la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa dang / ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung zhig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
372a5(rgyud): 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las skyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / khyod la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas phyag na
372a6(rgyud): rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+ha na ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarba pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba sa traM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra/
372a7(rgyud): Ta nga de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te// gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su// tha ma bzhi ni rtse mor sbyar// sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin// de nas ngan song gsum gyi
372b1(rgyud): 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so//
372b2(rgyud): ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen por bor ro// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi
372b3(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu thob par
372b4(rgyud): bya ba'i bar du tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams
372b5(rgyud): ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra pa Ni ma hA maN+Da laM pra be
372b6(rgyud): sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tran+ni ba ra ya pra be bya pra mo sha ya tru ra dr-iSh+Ti par+ya paM maM / bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA shA ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos
372b7(rgyud): nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang / dngos grub dam pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon
373a1(rgyud): par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen pos dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal/
373a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog
373a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa'i// ma rung thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma
373a4(rgyud): ya sU tAM/ mA ti kra ma ho/ gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir gdod// rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ngar dang 'phreng bas shin tu brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su/
373a5(rgyud): sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen brgyan par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bri// shes rab can gyis de nang du// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ ka ba
373a6(rgyud): brgyad dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan byas te// de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// srad bu bres par tshon gyis dgang // de la tshon la bzlas pa
373a7(rgyud): ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra tsi thas ma ya n+de/ de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi pa// yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags/
373b1(rgyud): ni 'di'o// oM badz+rod grA Ta ya sa ma ya pra b+he sha ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am// sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i// pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag
373b2(rgyud): par bya// be la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni pra dIp+ta A ka ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya hUM dzA/ sangs rgyas spyar sngar
373b3(rgyud): rdo rje ni// 'bar byas bskor bas gzhag par bya// de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba// pad+mo rdo rje kun de bzhin// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di yon no// hUM satwa badz+rI dz+wA la
373b4(rgyud): mA lA hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM traM/ oM d+harmA badz+rI dz+wa la mA lA hUM hrIH/ oM karma badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM a/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du// shes
373b5(rgyud): pas cho ga bzhin bri ba// rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro// de le rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ 'di bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil
373b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad la'ang srang bu la brgal te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas de'i phyag rgya bshad do// yid kyis ri mo bi tig nas ni// rdo rje srang bu 'am gzhan yang rung // phyir phyung nang du zhugs
373b7(rgyud): kyang ni// dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur// de'i dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni// ut+pal cher sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus// mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal//
374a1(rgyud): khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal// g.yon bcung rgyal du bzhugs pa ste// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/
374a2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi// nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri// de yi snying po ni 'di yin no// hUM de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo gzhag pa ni//
374a3(rgyud): khros pa mche ba byung ba ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od // de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM ka makro
374a4(rgyud): d+hA rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra dAn+ti~M kro d+ha sA d+hu hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // der ni rdo rjer dbang bskur bas// rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri// de nas de rnams
374a5(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di bshad do// traM oM badz+ra b+hikra Ta~M kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA ki tu de hi hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra tra sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ dkyil
374a6(rgyud): 'khorangs pa gsum par ni/ rdo rje shugs kyis brtul nas kyang // rdo rje sde ni bri bya ba// khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// hriHoM badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi shod+ha
374a7(rgyud): mdzubaT/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da le sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ba ta ba ta hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas/
374b1(rgyud): byang rdo dbab pa bris pa ni// rdo rje khro za'i tshogs kyis bskor// de nas de rnams rgya snying po bshad do// aHhUM badz+ra karmA dz+nyA phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha swA pas/ oM badza yak+Sha krod+hA 'du lA/
374b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du// ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o// de nas
374b3(rgyud): de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no// oM badz+ra lA sa ye rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le A b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gI te gA ta gA ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ri NaM t+ye ba sha~M ku ru hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam
374b4(rgyud): pa'i phyi rol tu// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams gzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dza s+pha ra Nas
374b5(rgyud): pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM brda pup+pa prA dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sA lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pA dza sA ra Na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni// lcags /
374b6(rgyud): la sogs gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su// phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams so// de nas de dag gi snying po rnams bshad do// oM badz+ra ang+ga sha ma hA kro d+ha a kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba sa ma
374b7(rgyud): Sh+T+r-idza/ oM badz+ra pA sha ma kro d+ha pra be sha ya sar+thas pa ya hA ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ma thA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sar+b+ba sa ma ya ts+tsha ba/ oM badz+ra A be sha ma makro d+ha a be sha ya~M sar+b+bas ma ma spras/ de nas yang 'ang
375a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rdo rje phra ma ta rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcis/
375a2(rgyud): te zhugs shing / zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te tshar gcad par rigs pa
375a3(rgyud): rnams ni tshar gcad do// bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu na de ni ji ltar bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/ rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying khar ji lta ba bzhin du
375a4(rgyud): bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/ yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad bcings shing de nas thams cad byon par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug
375a5(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug cig/ rdo rje slob dpon de rang gis khro ba rdo rje ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ slob ma la'ang snying po 'di dang 'ching du chu gcig/
375a6(rgyud): gr-ih+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM/ de nas gos sngon po bgos la/ mgo la gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te/ dar sngon pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma yaM ma pra be shA mi/ de nas
375a7(rgyud): bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra A be sha a/ de nas babs nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
375b1(rgyud): brlabs so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyang sad cig gis shes so// gnod pa'ang med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
375b2(rgyud): zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad la tshar gcad pa dang phan gdags pa byed nus par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'ang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub bo// de nas mna'i snying po byin cig/ de nas
375b3(rgyud): gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam
375b4(rgyud): par rgyal bar nus par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes byas pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnan par nus par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
375b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur
375b6(rgyud): bas dbang bskur ro// rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'di lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// oM badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra kar+m+ma ka rod+b+ha ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra
375b7(rgyud): kro d+ha tA a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra nA ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag
376a1(rgyud): nas dang 'bar ba mang po 'od can gyi// rdo rje dbyibs ni snying khar bsam// skye bo kun la 'bebs par byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas// dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang /
376a2(rgyud): de bzhin du ni bsam byas nas/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mo mgul du bsam// sems can thams cad
376a3(rgyud): rlab par byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag/ skye ba 'di dag thams cad bsrungs// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi
376a4(rgyud): snying po ni 'di dag yin no// nAsar+b+ba badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha a/ ho rat+na badz+ra krod+ha b+hA Sha ma nA tra~M trUM/ badz+ra d+harmA kro d+ha nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ hUMka ma badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ de nas lnga thams cad dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag tu
376a5(rgyud): bslab bo// hUM zhes bya ba bcings nas ni// lag pa rdo rje lcags kyur bsam// khros nas mdzub mo bskul nas ni// lha rnams 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni// rdo
376a6(rgyud): lcags kyi bris nas su// de nyid kyis ni rtag mnan na// lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gugs// rdo rje'i lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya// legs par phye ste bzhag nas su// bskul na u ma la sogs pa// bud
376a7(rgyud): med thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje lugs kyu ba zhag pa ni// 'jug po nyid kyi de bzhin te// des mnan lha yi gang yin pa// de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no//
376b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra lod+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ma a~M ku sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha daSh+Ta a gra A kAR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa gats+tsha a ka rA ya mi te badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu s+phar hUM ba
376b2(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo// brkyang zhing bskum pas gnas nas su// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// hUM tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis// skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/
376b3(rgyud): rdo rje dag ni legs par smras// hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis// thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gugs// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas// rdo rje khro bo lnga mchog gis/
376b4(rgyud): kye bo kun gyi bdud byed de// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to// yid kyis lus la go bgo ba// bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste// go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni// skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung // de nas de
376b5(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha kA yA be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi d+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+hA ga bAM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi nA sha ya hUM ka re Na pA ta ya
376b6(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM ma no dr-i D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas// badz+ra tsU zhes bzlas
376b7(rgyud): pa yos// gad dang gang du kun zhugs pa// phyag rgyas btib par de 'gyur ro// sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba// ke hUM phaT khros nas su// lan cig gang la sbas pa ni// rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug/
377a1(rgyud): rdo rje khro ba'i ting 'dzin cing // rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi// sems can gang dang gang yin pa// de nas de ni dran nyams 'gyur// yid la bsad ces bsams nas sa//
377a2(rgyud): snying khar rdo rje sgom par byed// hUM zhes bya ba'i nyid kyis kun// rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs// sems can gang dang gang dag la// yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa gang // phyag rgya 'dis ni shin du las
377a3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go/ Tak+ki hUM phaT/ Tak+ki a/ Tak+ki dza/ Tak+ki hUM/ Tak+ki haM/ phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis
377a4(rgyud): sbyar ro// de nas gsang ba khro bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo// yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni// hUM zhes gang la sbyar bya ba// dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas na// de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur//
377a5(rgyud): hUM zhes bya bar ldan pa yis// mchu sprad sos ni mchu bzung nas// dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa// gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur// hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa// de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur//
377a6(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni sprang gyur na// gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob// hUM zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing // dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang // yan lag kun gyis bcir gyur na// de yi lus ni bsrung
377a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag gi/ hUM a/ hUM dzaH/ hUM hi/ hUM haM/ hUM haM/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid phyag
377b1(rgyud): d+ha'i ye shes bslab bo// gang gi sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na// de ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang // sa
377b2(rgyud): la bris te de ltar mnan// ji ltar bris pa'i go rims bzhin// ut+pal che sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal
377b3(rgyud): bar rdo rje hUM dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub// ji ltar ri mo bri ba bzhin// 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar
377b4(rgyud): bya nga de nas de rnams las bshad de// rdo rje las ni bla na med// sangs rgyas rjes su drar grub pas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo// 'jig rten dag las rgyal bcings na// 'jig rten gsum las
377b5(rgyud): rnab rgyal 'gyur// rdo rje tshe dang kun tu 'gro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba 'dra// rdo rje dbang gi rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang // las kyi rdo rje khro bo che// rdo rje las ri byed par 'gyur// sems
377b6(rgyud): dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan// khro bo lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs// khro bo chags pas chags par byed// khro bo legs pas dga' ba ster// khro gnyer gyis kun ma rung byed// khro bo nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ dpal
377b7(rgyud): gyi khro bo don rnams sdud// ha hanod pas bdud du byed// chos kyi khro bo chos rnams sdud// rdo rje ral gri gcod par byed// rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog/ khro bo smra ba'i tshig 'phrog go// las kyi khro bo las rab ste//
378a1(rgyud): srung ba yis ni srung bar byed// khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za// khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyab cing ba bshad do// rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa ni// dam tshig mchon/
378a2(rgyud): tu grags pa yin// de dag bcing ba bshad par bya// khro bo bcing ba bla na med// lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas su// mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni// 'jig rten gsum
378a3(rgyud): las rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te// nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgugs// gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mor bya// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs// mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya// g.yas pa
378a4(rgyud): lcags kyus dgug par bya// de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dud// legs pa sbyin pa de yin te// mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar gzhag/ snying khar mdzub po nyi mas bskor// lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor
378a5(rgyud): gzhag/ mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya// mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste// g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o// gung mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi// kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang // mdzub mo gung /
378a6(rgyud): mo rdo rjer sbyar// mdzub mo yis ni mgul par bskor// mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che// mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rje bcings// rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa// sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM// zhes bya chos kyi
378a7(rgyud): phyag rgya ste// hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig go// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// tr-inI rdo rje snying po yi// hris na rdo rje sde yaM'o// a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/
378b1(rgyud): hUM he/ traM/ traM hrI/ hed+he ha/ d+he ka d+hi hUM/ graM/ kri bi/ tri aH/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi// chos kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi/
378b2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis// khro bo khu tshur gnyis su bshad// gang dang gang gis phyag rgya rnams// las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya// de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang // phyag
378b3(rgyud): rgya de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mong ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag
378b4(rgyud): rgya ning rdo rje mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyi ste// dngos grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob// mthe'u chung gnyis ka lcags kyur bcings// rdo rje gnyis ka steng 'og tu// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag
378b5(rgyud): rgya ni ma skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs// rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// thams cad kyang ni gnon pa ste// de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed//
378b6(rgyud): rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs pa// rab mnyam gzhag pa mnyam nas ni// shi ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par ni// rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su/
378b7(rgyud): bsgyur te gtsug tu gzhag pa ni// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe bong bsnyams nas nang du gzhug/ mdzub mo dmar por bkug nas su// gcus pas zhabs su 'gugs
379a1(rgyud): pa 'ong 'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su// gang gi gzugs la skad g.yon pas// legs par mnan pa'i sems can de// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phyag/
379a2(rgyud): rgya gnyis bcings te// gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni// sems can gang gi lus la ni// babs nas de yang rdob par byed// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pha rol go char bya//
379a3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na// nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su// yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa ste// rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur/
379a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan// mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni// rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su/
379a5(rgyud): gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni// lha 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan// mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi'o//
379a6(rgyud): / rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las// mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang // rgyab spur mdzub mo gnyis sbrel te// bsgyur ba mkha' la spyod pa'o// rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya//
379a7(rgyud): 'di ni sa yid pa tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub po la// mthe'u chung mdud cing drag tu gtog/ 'di ni sa 'og 'gugs pa'o//
379b1(rgyud): rdo rje cing baspel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dang por te// gung mo mtho bong rdo rje 'i// gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mnyam gzhag ste ni snying khar gzhag/ khro bo lu rbu
379b2(rgyud): btsir ba ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na// ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed// g.yon par
379b3(rgyud): mdzub mo rdo rje la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus bzung // rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yis// gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su// lag ngar snying khar shin tu bsdam
379b4(rgyud): rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis mtshan lung // drud pa yis ni snying 'byin to// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du ni// yid kyis khros nas btsir bya ba// rims la sogs 'gug
379b5(rgyud): dam pa'o// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su// mthe bong rab tu mnyam sbyar ba// mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du// mdzub mo gnyis ni spras
379b6(rgyud): nas kyang // legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni// skyel ba slong ba'i dam pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// gung mo gnyis ni ngos sbyar nas// mtha' ma bzhi yi ngos sprad pa// skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral to//
379b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang po srad bus bre// srad bus bres la phyi nas ni// srang bu
380a1(rgyud): ji bzhin bre bar bshad// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi// mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyar ba// byas nas tshon rnams thams cad la// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgrag par bya// rdo rje mdzub mo
380a2(rgyud): legs par ni// sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no// de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bshad do// brkyang bsgrub kyi ni tshul
380a3(rgyud): byas te// khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing // khro zhing khro bo'i lta bas ni// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/
380a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // bam po lnga pa// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
380a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba badz+raH
380a6(rgyud): badz+ra mA te A na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra satwa na hUM dzaH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba kun nas 'bar
380a7(rgyud): bas bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan
380b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
380b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa
380b3(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir// btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin// hi de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje
380b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas
380b5(rgyud): rnams su// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang // ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri/
380b6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de'i// dbus su mdung rtse zhing bris la// rdo rje rab tu gnas bya zhing // 'od 'bar dbus su bri ba ni// de yi go rims ji bzhin te/
380b7(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang // mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin no// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang // 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen bri
381a1(rgyud): bar bya// khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri// de bzhin rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi 'phreng ba de'i// ngos su rdo rje'i bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/
381a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni// pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje pad+mo lnga rdzas bris// 'bar ba'i dbus su pad+mo bri// ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no// rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du// rtag tu
381a3(rgyud): de yi phyogs su gzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang // rdo rje dmyal la rdo rje bri// rdo rje 'od ni chen por bskor// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du//
381a4(rgyud): 'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go cha'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ grwa dang phyi yi gnas rnams su// tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/
381a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na// dzaHoM badz+ra krod+ha sa mA ye dza~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ro Sha a~M ku sha A na ya sar+b+bany+tsi/ oM badz+ra ro She kA ma badz+ri Ni ba shaM me A nA ya hi dzi/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya saH
381a6(rgyud): rjerdo rje dzaM zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dza~M oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+he ha ra sar+b+ba ar+thany+dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA lA pra be sha ma he krod+hi ag+ni dz+wA la ya sar+b+ba ra bi ro She dzi/ oM badz+ra d+ha dz+nyA kra ke s+phu ra ma hA krob+h+ya
381a7(rgyud): hi me sar+b+ba sAny+dzi/ oM badz+ra an+da hA sa ni hA sa hA satwe Ta hA se na mA ra ya dzi/ rdo rje dzaM zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badz+ra shud d+ha kro d+he ha ne he na mA ra ya duSh+TaM di/ oM badz+ra tik+She kro d+he ts+tshan+da/ kro d+hi sha na sar+b+ba niH/
381b1(rgyud): oM badz+rA he tu ma hA kro d+hi pra be sha tsakra/ pra be sha ya sarbAn+di/ oM badz+ra dzi hA ma hA kro d+hi ba she ba tse muny+tsa hU~M/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// Ni oM badz+ra sar+b+ba mu khe kar+m+ma badz+ri d+hi ma hA kro d+ha kuru ku
381b2(rgyud): sar+b+ban hi/ oM badz+ra kro d+he rak+Sha min+ta/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra kro d+he ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta A kA la bi sha ne ba ya hi/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti bi d+ha hi/ rdo rje hi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su
381b3(rgyud): rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra hUM khe/ badz+ra hUM g+h+raM/ badz+ra tsUte/ badz+ra hU~M tAM/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i snying po rnams brjod par bya'o//
381b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ti te/ badz+ra nan+ta/ badz+ra d+ha tu/ badz+ra Do ta/ de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badz+ra dza dzaM/ badz+ra hUM hUM/ badz+ra ba baM/ badz+ra a a/ de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i
381b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do// de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje thogs
381b6(rgyud): te rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o// de la gar dang /
381b7(rgyud): lan gyi gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi gar rnams ni 'di yin no// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu
382a1(rgyud): len cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtog par bya'o// de nas ji skad/
382a2(rgyud): zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgyar ni// snying khar shin tu bcing bar bya// de nas
382a3(rgyud): gar gyi cho ga yi// rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo // rdo rje mda' ni 'phang bar bya// rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs pas kyang // rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya'i cho ga
382a4(rgyud): bzhin bkrol te// thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yi ni// phyag rgya rdo rje ma nyes par bya// ma nyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub// de la
382a5(rgyud): gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sid+d+ha badz+ra ka A nA ya badz+ra/ rA g+na ya badz+ra/ sA d+hu badz+ra/ de'i 'og tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyigayon pa ni// khu tshur g.yas
382a6(rgyud): pas bzung nas ni// bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni// dpral ba nyid la gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang // bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni// rdo rje ha
382a7(rgyud): ha zhes dgod cing // mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang // dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang // sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed// de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i phyag
382b1(rgyud): rgya'i snying po 'di rnams yin no// e hi badz+ra tadz+wa la yab rke pa dz+ra/ As badz+ra/ de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni// pad+ma kha dbus sbyar ba yi// mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying khar gzhag bsam pa g.yos par/
382b2(rgyud): gdung bar bya// de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yi// ral gros bgegs ni gcod ltar bya// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis// 'o khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig tu gru len ltar
382b3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya// mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no// ga mA ya badz+ra ts+tshin+da ya badz+ra/ brah+ma ya
382b4(rgyud): badz+ra ra bru hi badz+ra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dgabakan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang // bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor du// mdzub mo'i rtse mo gzhag par bya// / rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni// lus kun mchog
382b5(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor du// gar gyi tsho gas brtan par bya// snying khar rab tu gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas mnan par
382b6(rgyud): bya nga mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur// mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// nr-i t+ya badz+ra/ rak+Sha badz+ra/
382b7(rgyud): khA da badz+ra/ ban+d+ha badz+ra/ de nas khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis// khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtog bya// skye bo gang gi ming spros pas// de yi snying ni
383a1(rgyud): 'bas par 'gyur// mam su sa yis bzung nas ni// gangag par spros gzar ban// da mam sa yang sgyur 'gas te// gang gi bka' las 'da' ba 'o// rma ma chen pa
383a2(rgyud): 'di lta ba'i// mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni// gang gi song na spos bltas pa// de yo mos ni rdul bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la// bdag rang ga ni snying khar yang /
383a3(rgyud): bcings pas btsir nas ni// de yi sams ni 'jig par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// d+hu badz+ra/ s+phoT tha/ hUM badz+ra mu ka badz+ra thA/ hUM badz+ra ni d+hAH/ hUM badz+ra ma no za/ de nas rdo rje chen
383a4(rgyud): po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po 'di bcing ba bshad ngo // mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcings nas ni// rdo rje khro bor gzhag par bya// g.yon
383a5(rgyud): partse gsum rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyis bshad// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo thang kar brkyang // de bzhin bkan pa pad+mo'o// de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gzhag par
383a6(rgyud): byang rdo rje mthil du bcing bya ste// khros pa'i yid kyis dgab pa ni/ man bong mi rnam pas so// khro zo to rin tan bshad// mdzub mo lcags kyus bkug pa nyid// mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o// de ban
383a7(rgyud): mdzub gnyis legs sbyar ba// mdzub mo spar de dpral bar gzhag/ snying gar nyi ma rab tu bstan// mdzub mo bsdams nas spyi bor gzhag/ bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya// mdzub bsnyam/
383b1(rgyud): bad+mo la 'bus bzhin// gnyis gar la gri chang bar 'dzin// mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o// mdzub mo bsnyams te kha nas 'byung // mdzub mo legs par brkyang pa dang // mdzub mos
383b2(rgyud): mgul du bcing bar bya// de gnyis kha 'gram mche bar gzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad de/
383b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba// dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnams bcing ba bshad par bya// rdo rje bcing ba bla na med// snying khar bzhag nas rtsibs log gcu// mangs drangs pa ni
383b4(rgyud): g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas ni dbyung bar bya// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang // bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya// kha yi
383b5(rgyud): dbus su rab bzhag pa// mdzub mo ral gris 'bebs par bya// 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang // kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste// spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro// dpung pa snying kha rtsibs
383b6(rgyud): legs rnams// rdo rje gsung ba de bzhin bya// mche ba'i gnas su bzhag pa dang // khu tshur dam du bsdams pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni// mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcings//
383b7(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa la// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// phaT3/ sha ta Ta/ ma ta ha/ sa ta ta/ raT ta/ ta rba ta
384a1(rgyud): pr-i ta ta/ ha ta ta/ pa ta ta/ tra ta ta/ ka ta ta/ d+ha ta ta/ ku ta ta/ ri ta ta/ kha ta ta/ ba ta ta/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya ba cing ba bshad do//
384a2(rgyud): mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// gnas gang yin par gzhag par bya// khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa
384a3(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po las/ khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
384a4(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro
384a5(rgyud): d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang
384a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje
384a7(rgyud): spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig
384b1(rgyud): na gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sUr+m+ma badz+ra kA makro d+hA krA ma hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang
384b2(rgyud): gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bkod de/ de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsungs pa/ oM sAt+ma badz+ra satwa su dz+nyA na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sAr+m+ma badz+rA aM ku sha sA
384b3(rgyud): ka rA ya ma hA kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+ShA rA ga kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya te kra mahUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sAk+Sh+ma badz+ra puSh+TiM kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha he ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sha badz+ra dz+wa la/
384b4(rgyud): maN+Da la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra tsakra kro d+ha sar+b+ba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shri kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sUD+D+h+ya hA sa kro d+ha ma hA Ta Ta hA sa ha ha ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+har+m+ma badz+ra
384b5(rgyud): kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM sAk+Sh+ma badz+ra ts+tshe d+ha kr-i d+hits+tshin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA tsakra ts+tshin+d+ra pa ta ya shri pra be shi ye hr-i da yaM b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra hUM kA ra hi ne tA ya bAka
384b6(rgyud): dzin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+re kar+tha kr-id+ha/ sar+b+ba kam+be ka rod b+hA ba/ sar+b+ba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma ka pa tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+re yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na b+ha ya
384b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba dr-iSh+TAny+tsi t+ya mA tre badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM pha Ta/ oM badz+re sUk+Sha muSh+Ti kro d+ha ban+da ban+da hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/
385a1(rgyud): oM bi sho d+ha na badz+ra krod+d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang // yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi// khyim gyi dbus su lhung bsams nas// de 'i rigs de 'jig par 'gyur/
385a2(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje 'phra tshul gyis// snying par rdo rje bskams nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// bsgoms nas
385a3(rgyud): gang du lhung ba de'i// snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs kyis// btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni// snang ba gang la
385a4(rgyud): lhung ba ni// de yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra pra ba ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM bud+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse mor rab sbyor bas//
385a5(rgyud): zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang // gang du lhung ba de lhung 'gyur// zla bar rdo rje bdag rang gis// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang // rab tu khros nas gar/
385a6(rgyud): lhung ba// de yi rigs ni mod la lhung // bdag rang phyag na rdo rje ni// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang // gang du lhung ba de yi yul// ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur// bdag rang sangs rgyas
385a7(rgyud): gzugs nyid du// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid kyang // gang du lhung ba de yi ni// snang srid ring po mi thogs 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// bo d+hA gri pra ba ta ya hUM/ satwa badz+ra
385b1(rgyud): pra ba ta ya d+hu/ badz+ra sata pra ba ta ya hUM/ d+hu da d+hA pra ba ta la hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis lo/
385b2(rgyud): bskor ba// rdo rje hUM byas 'khyud nas ni// gang gis ming spos de 'chi'o// rdo rje khro bor snyoms par zhugs// sna nas phra mo thang cig tu// dbugs btang tsU zhes bya tshul gyis// 'jig rten gsum/
385b3(rgyud): yang ltung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar la// khros nas rdo rje lta ba yin// bltas pa yis ni mun par 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur// bu gu nas ni zhugs nas su/ yid kyis gang yang
385b4(rgyud): rung ba ni// snying nas drangs pa de yis ni// rang ngam de ni dbang du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra shwas bi shra ba tA ya hUM phaT/
385b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra pr-iSh+Ti bi sha bi sha bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hU~M hr-id yak+Sha Na kro d+ha pra ti bi sha ka yaM hr-i da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta paT phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de lar
385b6(rgyud): zhig phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas de ma thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje rigs
385b7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las// hUM zhes bya dang ldan gyur pa// ci rigs gnas su bzhag na ni// grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog
386a1(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro za'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//
386a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bus bre// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri// ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// phyag rgya de nyid kun ris shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis
386a3(rgyud): brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// rdo rje khro bo'i cho ga bzhin/
386a4(rgyud): de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do// de la dang po nyid du re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni/ de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
386a5(rgyud): rdo rje khro bor bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur gyis/ de la legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir nas// de bzhin
386a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa 'thob pa'i 'bras bu'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa
386a7(rgyud): thams cad lta zhig spos kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgo nas gdong g.yogs bkrol to// de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// de
386b1(rgyud): nas rdo rje khro ba'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la// hUM zhes bya bas gar sbyar bas// de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas/
386b2(rgyud): te cho ga bzhin du mchod pa ni// ji srid bar du mchod pa des// de srid kyi ni dgra bo 'jig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar byas// khro bor ldan pa ji srid mched// de snyed sems kyi
386b3(rgyud): ma rungs byed// de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na ni// ma lus pa ni thams cad kyang // de dag phyir zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no//
386b4(rgyud): hUM hUM nA sha ya badz+ra/ hUM bi nA sha ya sar+b+baM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra pra t+ya nA ya shI g+h+raM hUM/ sems can gang gis dgra la ni// lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas// byams pa mched pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje 'phro
386b5(rgyud): bas 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// snying rje can gyis su gang la// snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go/ chos sam yang na chos min
386b6(rgyud): pa dang rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// de ltar bsgoms nas sems can la/ hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed// gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa
386b7(rgyud): de rnams yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir// hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// b+hai ra badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ga ru Na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM bi shud+d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/
387a1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// paTaka sha Ta/ mnu/ sa rba ra Ta/ tarba/ hri ga ha pra kra tra sa da gra b+hA rba kri Ta/ rir/
387a2(rgyud): kha Ta/ kha Ta/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te// ji ltar rigs pa'i
387a3(rgyud): gnas su sbyar// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen mo'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo
387a4(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
387a5(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kar+m+me shwa ra hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
387a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tad+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bid+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye trai lo kya bi dzi ya gi ra sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma
387a7(rgyud): ya badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ti thA ga ta kI ya sha du sa ma ya s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bid+hi
387b1(rgyud): bstAr sa ma ya n+tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thAg tAHpradrA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pA yang kar+m+ma bad+d+hA/
387b2(rgyud): bisA ra Na sa ma ye n+tu/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba a ba lo ke d+hA tu mi
387b3(rgyud): bi me hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bskAr sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed/ 'jig rten
387b4(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid du yang dag pa'i
387b5(rgyud): sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul par byas te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyi 'khor
387b6(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs
387b7(rgyud): so de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad
388a1(rgyud): srang bu bre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas na ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun tu// dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya/
388a2(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su ni// rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po rnams// ji ltar rim bzhin gzhag par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// mchod pa chen
388a3(rgyud): po rnams gzhag go/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do// oM badz+ra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na kar+m+ma sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha Na kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM dza
388a4(rgyud): oM badz+rA ra ti rA ga kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti ba shA~M ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Da le ba shI ku ru NAM/ oM badz+ra rA dzA grA ke s+phu ru/
388a5(rgyud): re ba shrIHku ru hUM/ oM badz+ro da ta ha sa ba shrI ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma rA ge rA ga ya tsU/ oM badz+ra trik+Sh+Na rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra maN+Da le rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra bA ga rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma/
388a6(rgyud): sa ma ye tsa ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ka btse ba d+he rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra ya k+Shi Ni mA ra ya badz+ra da~Mg+d+ha ya b+hin+de d+hi d+ha ya mug su hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma muSh+TAM sid+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
388a7(rgyud): 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do// de la dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// yam shing dmar
388b1(rgyud): po rnams kyi me// rab sbyar rdo rje khro ba yis// mnyam par bzhag pas snyoms zhugs la// til bsregs par ni sdig bsregs shing // yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin za rab tu spar
388b2(rgyud): nas kyang // rtag tu 'bras ni sbyin sreg na// gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yam shing mngar po rnams kyis kyang // mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te// ngur ba'i yal ga mar bcas
388b3(rgyud): pas ngang bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel lo// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin za rab tu spar byas la// ku sha'i yalag 'bru mar gyis// bsreg pa byas na nges par srung // de la de
388b4(rgyud): dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sar+b+ba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ oM badz+ra pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ yam shing tshabs dang
388b5(rgyud): por ni// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// me sbar nas kyang se ba yi// tsher ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan pas me sbar na// me tog
388b6(rgyud): dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung // sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs// rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang // yam shing des ni ma sbar te// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs nA ni// rdo rje bcing ba
388b7(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// yam shing de nyid kyis su ni// mnyam par bzhag ste me bus la// 'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg/ skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur// re te ba ru sa ma~M b+hi d+hu lcag ni sa ma hri sa/
389a1(rgyud): dzu hed tig ta pha lA ku to ma ri pA ta pa ta ye ta/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra rA gA ya swAhA/ hUM badz+ra b+han+d+ha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra
389a2(rgyud): mA ra ya swA hA/ mkhas pas yam shing skyur mo yis// khros nas byin za spar nas ni// 'bras bu lo ma skyur bsregs na// dbang du bya ba dam pa'o// yam shing de dag nyid kyis kyang // mnyam par/
389a3(rgyud): bzhag ste mi spar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na// 'dod pa bzhin gyis gzugs rnyed do// de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis// byin za rab tu spar nas kyang // mi snang me tog sdong bu yis//
389a4(rgyud): ba sregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag ste me sbar la// nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis// sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro// de la de dag
389a5(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di dag go// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ru pa badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM A d+yi sh+ya badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha ba tsa ri Ni swA hA/ khro bor mnyam bzhag yam shing ni/ ka shin tu kha
389a6(rgyud): bos ma sbar la/ badz+ra me tog bsreg byas na// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan la me sbar la// lha yi 'phreng ba gang bsregs pa// de yang bka' bzhin/
389a7(rgyud): nyan par 'gyur// khro bo nyid du mnyar bzhag ste// yam shing des ni ma sbar te// phyag na rdo rje'i 'phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// lam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros
389b1(rgyud): te me sbar la// chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang // skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA/ hUM so rib shaM kA ra/
389b2(rgyud): badz+ra ya swAhA/ hUM badz+ra pa Ni ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ dz+nyA bud+d+ha ba shaM kA ra badz+ra ya swA hA/ de nas gsang ba las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// yod 'ong bud med dang lhan cig/ gnas shing bre
389b3(rgyud): gar aM dza ner// bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang // de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur// ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi
389b4(rgyud): yis ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro// go ro tsa na bu gar bcug/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir nas// gzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur kum bu gar bcug
389b5(rgyud): nas ni// bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra ba shaM ka raM sid d+ya hUM/ oM
389b6(rgyud): badz+ra gu h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje bgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po
389b7(rgyud): mdor bsdus na// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par bzhag/ hUM zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin// oM zhes dang po yi ge a sa// chos
390a1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgyu gnyis byas nas// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so// de bzhin
390a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan
390a3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta
390a4(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM badz+ra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi
390a5(rgyud): rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM b+h+ri ku nI badz+ra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM ma hA pad+ma
390a6(rgyud): badz+ra dr-i TA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma a gra kri ta/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
390a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying /
390b1(rgyud): dang 'drabs na// rdo rje khro ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus // sangs rgyas kyin phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la
390b2(rgyud): sogs bri// 'jig rten gsum+b+ha las rgyal la sogs// sangs rgyas phyogs kun tu bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par
390b3(rgyud): byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ sa phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med lhan cig gnas na ni/
390b4(rgyud): grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos dag rab brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi
390b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// lhan cig 'khyud na kun
390b6(rgyud): 'grub 'thob// de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+haprA te ho/ oM badz+ra bi shud+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha ru ki hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha kA yA ba pan \u0f89\u0fa4
390b7(rgyud): badz+rI hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbas pa'i phyag rgya bslab bo// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni// bud med mchog ni mgu byas na
391a1(rgyud): shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po brjod do// ho badz+ra kA ma/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi
391a2(rgyud): rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dir rdo rje sil snyan dang / rnga dang / brdung ba dang / brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'dus pa'i snying po'i glu blangs te/
391a3(rgyud): de phul nas phyag rgya dang / 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de la gar gyi mchod pas ni mchod pa 'di yin no// rdo rje gar
391a4(rgyud): gyi sbyor ba yi// rdo rje khro bo'i sor mo yis// rdo rje hUM gis phyag rgya ni// snying kha nyid du bcing bar bya// de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa ni// g.yas pa'i chang pas gzung bar bya// bsgyur nas dpral ba
391a5(rgyud): nyid du ni// mdzub mo'i ngos kyis gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar yang bskor nas ni// mnyam par pad+mo kha dbus sbyar// mdzub mo snying khar bzhag nas ni// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// rdo rje
391a6(rgyud): khro bo mdzub bsnyams te// bkan nas rtse mo spang bya zhing // de las bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du// mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi
391a7(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo gsungs pa/ hUM de nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// gsang po'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba ste/
391b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su legs bri ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje hUMni phyag rgya che// lag par 'dzin pa rdo rje bcas/
391b2(rgyud): brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang // kha dog gzugs ni ji bzhin bya// de nas 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye
391b3(rgyud): shes bslab bo// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis// bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs na ni// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i/
391b4(rgyud): snying po 'di bshad do// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya kr-i ta/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa
391b5(rgyud): gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur// de la 'di sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ hUM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM ka/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te/
391b6(rgyud): de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs ma la sogs pa gzugs thams cad kyi dngos grub ni thun mong ngo // phyag rgya gcig
391b7(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gis
392a1(rgyud): rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol ga ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad
392a2(rgyud): du'ong de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'di skad
392a3(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa'akhyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod kyang legs// rdo rje chos kyang khyod legs pa// rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs// mdo sde 'di ni legs
392a4(rgyud): bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste/ theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
392a5(rgyud): po las// rdo rje chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du// byang
392a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i lus
392a7(rgyud): 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas gtang bar byos// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
392b1(rgyud): ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bkum lags na/ de ltar de bdag gis gtang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten
392b2(rgyud): gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra satwa hUMdza
392b3(rgyud): de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam bya ste// tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang // shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni// srog ni phyir yang 'thob par 'gyur// di nas
392b4(rgyud): de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs de/ thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas ched
392b5(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang // 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub
392b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra muHde nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par/
392b7(rgyud): zur sprad bsdams te bzhag na ni// rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing // 'og na de dag 'byin par byed// de nas de dag gsung ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar par
393a1(rgyud): rang gis shes par gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus dang bzhin gshegs pa nas sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems canathA/
393a2(rgyud): cad kyi don dang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
393a3(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo // oM tsan+dot+tA re sa man+ta bA dra ki ra Ni ma hA badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam
393a4(rgyud): par ni// mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni/ rdo rje'i ri mo zhes kyang grags// de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen
393a5(rgyud): po de'i mgo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su leg na
393a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo rje'i rig pa dab pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
393a7(rgyud): mdung rtse ngas mgal ma'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni blan
393b1(rgyud): rang mas chamams sa ras pa// sangs rgyas cad thum par 'thab// denas kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdzamam tang nga 'dzin las yangs nus/ sa
393b2(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sdug par rdo rje skal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskurabs lnga la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rlabs
393b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog
393b4(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so//
393b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams
393b6(rgyud): thams cad snang bar byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do// de nas gzi brjid kyi phung
393b7(rgyud): po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Ti Sha a na a ba lo ki te mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bing
394a1(rgyud): ra ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAt+ma/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ni suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT
394a2(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM Ta ki dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na ut+ta ma dz+wa lA ya hUM phaT/
394a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ badz+ra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba bi d+yo ta ta ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs
394a4(rgyud): kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ut+ta ma badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum+b+ha ni su b+hA A karA ya/ pra be sha ya A be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ sa ma ya/ gra ha ya/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru
394a5(rgyud): ma hA satwa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ oM sum+b+ha ni sun+d+hu badz+ra
394a6(rgyud): bi d+yot+ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shU la/ de nas rdo rje
394a7(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sar+b+ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
