394b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra pra d+ha re Na ra Na dz+nyA paT/ de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra mo na ma hA pradz+nyA swA phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra s+pha dA ma ka hUM phaT/ rig pan
394b2(rgyud): rgyal po rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badz+ra kuN+Da li ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha grih+Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha
394b3(rgyud): pa tsa bi d+hon sa ya badz+re Na mu da nai pa la ya ti b+hI ta sa hri da ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra pra bA mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bas/
394b4(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+radad+hA ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ti be hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra ping+ga la bi sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+pam+bi ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnams so//
394b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra sho d+ha ma hA ga na pa ti rak+Sha sar+b+ba dub+he b+h+yo/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ye hU~M phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje 'phreng bas rang gi hU~M/
394b6(rgyud): po 'di phul lo// oM ma la ga Na pa ti mA la ya a kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ba shaM ku ru mA ra ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra ba shi ma hA ga Na pa ti ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rnam par
394b7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra bi dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga NA pa ti hUM phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so// de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo//
395a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra mu sa la ku ru sar+b+ba dush+tsa hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje chung gi po nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ran la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti sar+b+ba duts+tshad+hU padz+ra/ de nas rdo rje ma 1/
395a2(rgyud): rang ga snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra a na la ma hAdz+rahU~M dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba thad+h+wi ku ru sar+b+ba dudz+dza hU~M phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba.oM badza b+he ba badz+ra da pa sha la
395a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ma hA yak+Sha hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba ma hA ts+tshat+ta swA da /
395a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra kA la ma hA mr-i t+yu put+pA da hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi nA ya ka sa su big+h+nAM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje klu'i rdorje/
395a5(rgyud): rjes rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badz+ra na ga badz+ra A na ya sar+b+ba dand ne hi r+ya garna ne muk+Sha a lang+ga ra b+hai ri sarbo pa kA ra Na ni badz+ra d+ha ra
395a6(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra ka ta/ b+hin+da b+hin+da ha ra ha ra prad+d+he matra ts+tshed dzA baT/ zan rnams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'gugs pa
395a7(rgyud): dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ad+hu sha ya dza A karA ye hUM phaT/ de nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pA sha kad+ha dz+dza/ de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa
395b1(rgyud): dzubadra spong ba/ de nas las kyi ming po gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra ka rmas pa ya kr-ita/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad cing kyil 'byor chen po 'dra ba shad do// danam
395b2(rgyud): rab tu bshad phyag/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de la 'di ni srad bu bre ba'i snying po yin no// oM sar+b+ba badz+ra sA
395b3(rgyud): taM A ka rA ya sar+b+ba maN+Da la hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang // seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni// de nas srad bu nyis rim du// byas nas de yi srad bus bre// de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying
395b4(rgyud): po yin no// oM badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang // dkyil 'khor zlum po srad bu bre// de yi phyi rol byung nas ni// nyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin no// de yi/
395b5(rgyud): rim pa gsum du ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor sras bus bri// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du// gI yi ri mor srad bu bre// srung bu bri ba'i cho ga'o// de nas srang bu bres pa der/
395b6(rgyud): dag pa'i tshan gyis dbang bar bya// g.yon pa rdo rje'u tshur ces// chog bzhin du gzung bar bya// dang pi thos nas kyis ci bder// de la 'di ni chen gyi sring par// mi badz+rad dgas pa ya /
395b7(rgyud): nganas rdo rje slob dpon yang // mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas// rdo rje yon sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya// de la sgod bye ba'i snying po na 'da'o// oM badz+ra san sa
396a1(rgyud): ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM s+phu ra badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gser ram yang nang dngul yang rung // sa la rab tu bris pa 'am// phagra gru bzhi'i steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs
396a2(rgyud): gzhag par bya// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM sar+b+ba bid/ sangs rgyas rI phyogs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po bzhi gzhag go/ mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni// 'jig rten gsum las
396a3(rgyud): rgyal zhes bya// de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sum+b+ha ni sub+h+r-i hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga bA badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha A
396a4(rgyud): na ya sar+b+ba rat+na hriHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ta kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sid+g+ha ri shA rU pa ta ya sid+d+ha ye hU~M phaT/ 'jug gam phyir ni byang ba na// srad bu'i 'og 'jug yid bsams
396a5(rgyud): nas dang rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste// de yis ri mo brgal bar bya// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ba grA kra ma hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du/
396a6(rgyud): lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri// de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra tsakra hU~M/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Da hUM/ oM badz+ra daN+Da ka sha hUM/ oM badz+ra a yu d+ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs
396a7(rgyud): kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pra dz+wa la tad p+ta badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra/
396b1(rgyud): so madz+dza/ oM badz+rad NA hUM/ oM badz+ra ba kri ta hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sgon bzhi po rnams su yang // rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// thams cad rims pa bzhin du bri// de dag gi dam tshig sa
396b2(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra d+ha ma hUM.oM badz+ra mA la hUM/ oM badz+ra ar+tha hUM/ oM badz+ra a si hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni/ ka lta 'og rim pa
396b3(rgyud): ji bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra mu sa la hUM/ oM badz+ra pA ta hUM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM badz+ra gra ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/
396b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran// lha 'og rim pa bzhin du'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra be ga hUM
396b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra ha ra Na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni// lnga 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// ma mo thams cad bri bar bya// de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang // sgo ba rnams
396b6(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no// de nas rab tu bshad bya ni// cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o// de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje
396b7(rgyud): slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad sgo zhig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas// de khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas/
397a1(rgyud): khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re/ zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no// rdo rje khro ba ta rin ti ri'i phyag rgya'ang ston cig gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ rdorje
397a2(rgyud): khro bo chen po yis// dam tshig khyod kyi rigs bsregs pas// klad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang // lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed// dam tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi
397a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA ra/ gr-ih+Na ba d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// lag gnyis bla za 'og tu gtang // mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ba
397a4(rgyud): dngangang las kyi phyag rgya ma tshig 'di// rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bshad // de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te// snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra a b+hiShe kas b+hi'i chu badz+ra d+hA ba te sa ma gro gr-i/ de nas
397a5(rgyud): g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis gzhug go/ oM badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra a bi sha/ a bi sha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me tog
397a6(rgyud): gtor ro// oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho/ de nas de dag gar lhung ba 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan to// lha gang yin pa de
397a7(rgyud): ni de la mi bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta ba dag yod de/ gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
397b1(rgyud): rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni dam tshig go// gzhan du na lha gang la dad pa de dag la ma ra'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par
397b2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i 'phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/ rdo rje ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o//
397b3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni// mdzub mo bkug nas gnyis kas bkab// sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o// rdo rje
397b4(rgyud): bcing ba byas nas ni// mthe bong gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng // gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste// gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni/
397b5(rgyud): dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste// rig pa chen po dam pa'i 'o// reg pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya bcings nas rab btsir ba// snying khar mthe bo'i ngos kyis so// sems dpa' yi ni snying por
397b6(rgyud): bshad// de nyid las gung mo srin lag/ sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni// bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya// de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni// snying khar yang ni bsgyur
397b7(rgyud): bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa'o// de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o//
398a1(rgyud): sems ma 'ardo rje ma byas te// mthe'u chung rdo rje spang ba ni// thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'ang ni thams cad sgrub / sapa bong mthe'u chung bcings nas ni// g.yon/
398a2(rgyud): pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum// ce gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse// rdo rje phyag rgya bzung ba ste// rdo rje rig pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// d+ha mardo rje la sogs brtags/
398a3(rgyud): rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o// rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te// mtshan ma kun kyang des gzhag go// rdo rje'i rigs ni
398a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste// sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang // mdzub mos mtheb stan srung ba dang // oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas// rdo rje steng du gzhag pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i
398a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so// rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te// khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum/ ka la yi phyogs su bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya
398a6(rgyud): tshogs so// g.yon pa'i mthe bong steng du gzhag/ 'phreng ba bcing ba'i thabs su sbyar// nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus
398a7(rgyud): pa'ong g.yas pa mdun du gtun rings 'dzin// lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te// g.yas pa'i 'od ni 'bar bar bstan// rdo rje khu chur bskyod par bya// pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so// bsgyings
398b1(rgyud): bcas mdzub mo'i khar mche ba// dbyug pa bsnun cing gnas pa dang // dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang // g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bya
398b2(rgyud): ba ni nga g.yon pa'i rdo rje zur nas so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// grub pa dang ni las nyid dam// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang // bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni/
398b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug tor chen po srung ba che// gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster// rdo rje hUM zhes bya kun byed// snying khar bzhag pa thams cad 'gugs// sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams
398b4(rgyud): so ma thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub// rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che// grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub pa// dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs// dbyug pan/
398b5(rgyud): shing gis mya ngan 'da'// rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so// 'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul/ zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste/
398b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// 'phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad// 'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod
398b7(rgyud): pa'o tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so// kho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te// 'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg/ gnod sbyin ma ni gdon spong ngo // pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje
399a1(rgyud): mche ba bza' ba ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod ma'o// bgegs byed ma ni rab tu bgegs// 'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de bzhin
399a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas
399a3(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
399a4(rgyud): gsungs so// oM badz+ra ba si tre swAhA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+ha ri hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kra me hUM phaT/
399a5(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na kro d+he swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi
399a6(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad+ma ne tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ka prA ka re swA hA/
399a7(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shU la gre swAhA/ de nas rdo rje myur ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rab gi rig pa
399b1(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra tsakre hUM/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa/ oM badz+ra g+hAr+d+ha ke hUM/ thub pa'i rdo rjes sbas pa/ oM badz+rad n+ta kaSh+Te hUM/ rdo rje batshon chas smras pa/ oM badz+re hUM/ rig pa'i /
399b2(rgyud): po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so// oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra sau ma hUM/ de nas
399b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra daN+De hUM/ rdo rje ser smug gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra biSh+Ta ni hUM/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ oM
399b4(rgyud): badz+ra ma de hUM/ rdo rje'i phreng bas spras pa/ oM badz+ra mA le hU~M/ rdo rje dbang gis spras pa/ oM badz+ra a b+hi She hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po'i dam
399b5(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje gtun rings kyis rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu sa la gra he hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra pA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM
399b6(rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas spras pa/ oM badz+ra gra he hUM/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje thugs kyus smras pa/ oM badz+ra daSh+ThahUM/ rdo rje dus kyis spras pa/ oM badz+ra ba she hUM/
399b7(rgyud): rdo rje ngan khrid kyis spras pa/ oM badz+ra bin+d+he hUM/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badz+ra ha ri Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas yang phyag ni rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil/
400a1(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// grwa bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srang bus bres// de yi nang du der yang /
400a2(rgyud): ni ngade bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// bzhi po de yi phyogs kun gzhag/ dkyil
400a3(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ bzhi po rnams ni sgo srungs so// 'jigs
400a4(rgyud): ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang // du rag g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas// phyi yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// lha mo rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas tshe
400a5(rgyud): ga rgyas pa rnams// ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te/ rdo rje lugs kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas/ rdo rje 'chang
400a6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du'ang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma spa zhig/ gsang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces sgo zhig/ de nas las kyi rdo rjed
400a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug cig/ zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ de las thams cad byed do//
400b1(rgyud): de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba spros shig/ dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi ga rtag tu las kun byed pa ste/ klam dang sring mo rnams dang ni//
400b2(rgyud): chung ma bu dang 'dra ba'o// de la de'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bak+She sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma
400b3(rgyud): yin par mi 'gyur ro// ci dga' bar thams cad spyad nas sgrub par bya ste/ de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis shes nas las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do/
400b4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro bo mdzub bcug dang // snying khar yang ni bsdam par bya// ngos kyi mdzod spul nas drang //
400b5(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis// mdung rtsi rtse gsum mnan par bya'o// 'di btsongs pas ni yang dag par// rig pa dam pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje
400b6(rgyud): rigs ni thams cad kyi// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus// dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcu ma// dril bu'i phyag rgya'ang de
400b7(rgyud): bzhin no// de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang // seng ge'i rnam par bya ba ste// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang // 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyug pa'i khu tshur/
401a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang // kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so// gtum pa'i phyag rgya 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin// spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs
401a2(rgyud): kyi steng dkyil 'khor rgya ni srung ba'o// tshogs rnams kyi dam tshig go/ lag pa bsums pa khar bzhag ste// rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste// phyi nas khar yang
401a3(rgyud): gnas par bya// po nya po'i dam tshig rnams so// mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang / btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o// dpung pas bsnol bas bsnolta ba dang // myur du 'phrog pa'ang de
401a4(rgyud): bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
401a5(rgyud): rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
401a6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phadz+ra/ de nas yang rdo rje
401a7(rgyud): snying pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje rgyun gyis rang chos kyi dmatshig 'di gsungs so// oM mA ra mA ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang
401b1(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje smrams spras pa/ oMts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM A
401b2(rgyud): bi sha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM b+hur b+hur ba swa hUM phaT/ oM b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya thA
401b3(rgyud): ya hU~M phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// oM d+ha ma d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba shrI b+ha ba hUM phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUM phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o// oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM g+hu g+hu hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wA la
401b4(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM khA da khA da hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o// oM kha na la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ oM pi b+ha bi b+ha hUM phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje
401b5(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor de// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// dkyil
401b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu// snying khar mtshan ma yang dag gzhag/ de nas dam tshig
401b7(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcangs pa bcings te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su'ang
402a1(rgyud): ma hA zhig ces bskol dz+wal bung tshul du drug cig/ 'disan bsgos nas kyang man ni snying po byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba'o// de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de na/
402a2(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje khyod// mi rtag par ni ma rungs byed// rdo rje slob dpon pasti stang med// rdo rje grogs dang mi mdzan dang // gdug la byams dang skye bar ni// gal te khyod kyis byas ma'o// de nas gdong
402a3(rgyud): g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// thams cad mnyam pa
402a4(rgyud): nyid bsam pa// rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste// 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'da'// rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med// rig pa'i rgyal
402a5(rgyud): po'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// sems can gdul phyir khro bo mchog/ zhi ba yis na nges par gsod// dbyug pa 'dral 'tshog pa med// log par lta ba 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin
402a6(rgyud): rnams so// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med// 'phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo// tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// 'tshog
402a7(rgyud): pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te// reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// mche ba dag par zhugs pa ste/
402b1(rgyud): 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
402b2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom
402b3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
402b4(rgyud): seM oM badz+ra kam pra brta ni sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi la saM pU dza ya hUM/ de nas rdorje
402b5(rgyud): snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra gI te ga hi hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
402b6(rgyud): rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra Ni t+ya Ni t+ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yota ta ma ne tra bi kur ba bi
402b7(rgyud): kur ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha badz+ra ag+ne dz+wa la tri shU lan bi na hrid ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha chen mos rang gi
403a1(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra ha ma ts+tshin tsakre Na badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra ku mA ra shIg+h+ra~M a be sha
403a2(rgyud): ya gan+d+ha shab+de na badz+ra pA Ni pri ye badz+ra sa ma ye ma nu s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra shA ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha ma la ya sar+b+bAn mAr ya
403a3(rgyud): shAM ta tri h+ye hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di spras so// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badz+ra bin+d+ha bin+da pI Sha ya pI Da ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hri da ya ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+me hUM phaT/
403a4(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje mi 'chi ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra a mr-i te badz+ra duSh+Ti gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha ha na sar+b+ba bi d+h+wa~M sa ya/ bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da pa bi ku ru mut+ta ni/
403a5(rgyud): ta ya badz+ra Na ye ke tsi ta ma ma mu ka ra bi na yA ka tan+t+ra ma dIp+ta kro d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra kAn+ti mA ra ya sau ma rU pe pra ti ba ta rage
403a6(rgyud): na shIr+g+haM s+pho Ta ya badz+ra d+hA ra t+ye na ma hA dz+yo snA kA ra le shI ta ri smai badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra dan+ta kr-i g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje tsong
403a7(rgyud): cong khro bo chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra mA le me kha le kha na kha na sha pa de ni ba shI ku ru dza daSh+Te mA ra ya bi sha ne hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rig pa rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'dzums rang
403b1(rgyud): gi las kyi dam tshig spras pa/ oM badz+ra ba la ye me ts+tshin+da si na bin+da badz+ra Ni mA ra ya u ma da ya pi ba pi ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig spras pa/ oM badz+ra a sha ne pa kI la sar+b+ba
403b2(rgyud): duSh+TAM badz+ra da sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra Ni ma nu sha ma na se a ha re NA ra ru ti sa shu ta tsi pra ya mdza ba sA nu le ba na bi le ba ta gra t+te/ a na ya sar+b+badan+tu n+yA ya hi ra N+ya su bar+d+ha A di ni gra ma ya de ba rak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/
403b3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra bA sa naM A na ya sar+b+ba sra an+d+ra pa Na di n+ya pa ka ra Na ni shAM g+h+raM ba shA~M ku ru dI pa do ma pra yats+tsha a b+hi sha sa t+ye ka ta ya badz+ra ko Sha d+ha ra Ni hUM
403b4(rgyud): phaT de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra ba shI A na ya ba shI ku ru sar+b+ba pri ya sar+b+ba pu ru Sha na da sri ku ru krud daM pra sa da ya sarba b+h+yaHba ha re b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi tsa re ya kar
403b5(rgyud): badz+ra pa ta ka d+ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje tshogs kyi'o// de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti A na ya sar+b+ba maN+Da lam pra be sha ya/ A be sha ya bar+N+Na ya sar+b+ba/
403b6(rgyud): kar+m+ma Ni ma ku ru shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM la gu tra sa ye mA ra ya/ dbye ba re b+ho d+ha ra ya bi dza yaM ka ri badz+ra pa tA ka d+hA rA NaM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM be ga badz+ri Ni g+huT+TaH
403b7(rgyud): g+hu shi ba de mA ra ya bo g+hi ri bo dz+nyA sa ya badz+ra pA sha d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam chog 'ad spras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la yang had ha b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M /
404a1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'jigs mas rang gi las kyi dmatshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra big te pra be ka daSh+Tha kArA la kA rA la bai shi sha na bAka tre shIg+h+ra~M A be sha ya bAk+Sha ya ru d+hi ra bi pa ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra pA/
404a2(rgyud): sha d+hA ra Ni hUM bas/ rdo rje po nya ma rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdo rje bran mos rang gi las kyi dmachog smras so// oM badz+ra puSh+Ti A na ye badz+rad bA ya na~M ka ba tA la ne ba saM nI la na kha na/ lA ci 'a rje
404a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe bri ba sha ya s+pho Ta ya mA ra mA ra Ni sar+b+ba drASh+TA nA badz+ra Ni shi ta sid+d+ha ri NI hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra kA li me tra pre ta du bi ni ma nu Sha mAM sa ru d+hi ra thaM
404a4(rgyud): ya e ts+ya ho \u0f7f kr-ih+Na/ badz+ra nA ki ni badz+ra shU la la~M sar+b+ba pag N+Da mA tri b+hU ti/ ha ra ha ra prAdz+nyA/ a mra ka s+ya ka pA lA ma la kr-i ta sar+b+ba ka ya kany+tsi ra ya si badz+ra la DA ga d+hA raNI pra ta ma nu la shan ri na d+ha a
404a5(rgyud): sha ya b+han+d+ha la mA ra ya badz+ra rat+na sa~M d+hu d+hU hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bskul mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra pA ta ma ma ru 'u ye ma ma sar+b+ba ru d+hi ra mu tra pre ri sha shi li s+phA shI g+h+nAn re ka tog d+ha
404a6(rgyud): hir N+ya la hi k+ShUM pa ti ma mu ka sa ku ru badz+ra shi ni ka d+hA ri Ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni mi ku ru swA hA hUM/ de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig spras pa/ oM badz+ra ma ka re gra sarba sa shAM g+h+raM pra be sha ya pA tI lo b+hak+Sha ya badz+ra
404a7(rgyud): ma ka ra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/
404b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bres// dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya// de dag phyogs su rim par yang // sems dpa'
404b2(rgyud): chen po rnams gzhag go// de yi dbus su chung mar bcas// rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid// rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs gsang // gar gyi mchod la sogs pas mchod// de la lha mo'i go rim bzhin// 'khor lo'i dkyil
404b3(rgyud): 'khor tshul bzhin du// rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra// gar byed par yang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so// grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su// bdug pa la sogs rim
404b4(rgyud): pa bzhin// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma
404b5(rgyud): mthong ba dang las mi shes pa su la'ang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes spros shig/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
404b6(rgyud): te khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do// oM badz+ra satwar+ya A be shal shag n+ti te ba ma sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM aHhUM A la la la la badz+ri/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug
404b7(rgyud): ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de phyin chad lus dang / ngag dang / lci ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o//
405a1(rgyud): de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te// rdo rje rig pa
405a2(rgyud): dam pa la// rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs mchod// rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang // lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// rdo rje gar gyi/
405a3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus so// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas// las kyi phyag rgya dgrol bar bya// kar gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni// gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni// rdo rje 'dzin
405a4(rgyud): pa che sogs kyi// las grub par yang nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas
405a5(rgyud): pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag
405a6(rgyud): stemakhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na/ de bzhin gshegs
405a7(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba gang lags bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
405b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya// de nas phyag na
405b2(rgyud): rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad gsad kyang ni// sdig gis gos par mi
405b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams 'phrog
405b4(rgyud): kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gis gsang ba'i pad+mo 'di gsungs so// 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba la ni de phul ba//
405b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyis gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams
405b6(rgyud): cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yi// las rnams thams cad byas pa yis// bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
405b7(rgyud): pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba legs so zhes bstan pa// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod leg pa ste// rdo rje las ni myong/
406a1(rgyud): legs so// sado 'di legs par spras pa ste// rdo rje theg pa blan med // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyigasang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
406a2(rgyud): cad kyi kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// bam po drug pa/
406a3(rgyud): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
406a4(rgyud): pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ pad+mo sems dpa' bad+mo che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che// spyan ras gzigs dbang brtan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa
406a5(rgyud): che sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros che// pad+ma'i bdag nyid parda che// pad+mo'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo las byung pad+mo'i 'od// pad+mo dag par rab dga' byed// rdo rje pad+mo pad mchog lus// bsgo
406a6(rgyud): gyu / ldan pa dang // dgas tshan mnas// gan pa pa ba // dpa' ma la rgya 'tshal sa/ sems can pasas pa
406a7(rgyud): 'byor chen po mes po che// bde za bde byed dag pa'i don// sangs rgyas pad+mo khyod phyag 'tshal// chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dam pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin// chos chen shin tu chos mchog pa/
406b1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems mchog gtso// chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa'
406b2(rgyud): sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras gzigs dbang mtshon pa'i mchog/ mgon po chen po rnam gzigs gtso// 'jig rten sdang ba 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal/
406b3(rgyud): 'jig rten yi ge yi ge che// yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra// yi ge yi ge thams cad gzigs// 'khor mo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag na pad+mo pad chen po// dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin pa po// sangs
406b4(rgyud): rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang ldan// chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog/ 'jig
406b5(rgyud): rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'i dpal ni mgon po gtso// chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa// tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po// tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sdang bsdang
406b6(rgyud): mchog sdang ba'i gtso// snang gsal shin tu snang ba'o// snang ba'i mgon po mgon po che// sangs rgyas sdang khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po
406b7(rgyud): mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po// chos spyan gzigs pa chen po yis// ting 'dzin ye shes
407a1(rgyud): thams cad la// rdo rje spur khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams// bstod nas goms par byed pa ni// 'jig rten dab /
407a2(rgyud): po thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab pa// rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
407a3(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der mngon du
407a4(rgyud): phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste ched du brjod pa di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu dag pa ni// bdag gi rdo rje pad+mo 'di// pha yin 'di ni bdag gi bu// rigs 'di byin gyis
407a5(rgyud): brlab par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
407a6(rgyud): te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam chog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // hriHpade nas de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa tham
407a7(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka nas pad+mo lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od rnam pa du ma byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par
407b1(rgyud): dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thas
407b2(rgyud): cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad+mo d+ha ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
407b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra bid+yA hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+not+ta ma tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
407b4(rgyud): po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yot+ta ma hriH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM
407b5(rgyud): badz+ra bi d+yat+ta ma a/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
407b6(rgyud): dgra thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hU~M hrIHho/ de nas de spras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das
407b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+mo la bzhugs te/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / rgyan sna tshogs
408a1(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can/
408a2(rgyud): thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/ yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du /
408a3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs ni
408a4(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag nyid de// gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na// lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
408a5(rgyud): dbang pos rang gi rig pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / gdon dang / grub pa dam pa dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / ye shes dang
408a6(rgyud): mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu rgya rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ rdorje
408a7(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra bas na// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa dang // srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang 'phreng bas brgyan pa dang // dkyil 'khor grani
408b1(rgyud): thams cad dang // slodang sa byung mtshams rnams sa// na chen gyis brgyan par/ phyir la kyil 'byor srang babre/ de yin du srang bun// grubazhi par nibri bar bya// gnyis pa gyur na smos cing /
408b2(rgyud): pad+mo 'dra bar bya ba yin// ka pa brgyad kyi tshul du ni// pad+mo 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi ge sar dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyini sku gzugs gzhag/ de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// drang \u0f7f/
408b3(rgyud): hUM sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni// pad+mo'i dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // sna tshogs pad+mo'ang de bzhin no// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM hUM hriHkr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul
408b4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri// gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste// de yo phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul
408b5(rgyud): du sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che// mtshan ma pad+mo 'chang ba bri// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// a oM ta thA ga ta d+harma hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badz+ra satwa hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra/
408b6(rgyud): ya mA ra ya/ pad+ma ku su ma a yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo g+ha sha ho/ oM pad+ma saM b+ha ba pad+ma hasta sA d+hu hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// zor tsugs
408b7(rgyud): dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// khrog nyer la sogs tshul du ni// mtshan mar pad+mo 'chang bri ba// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin
409a1(rgyud): no d+hu pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti Ti Shi khang oM pad+ma su ra ya dz+wa la hUM/ oM pad+ma ma Ni kri tud+ha ra tsan+ta pra ha da la a ba lo ka ti shwa ra de hi ma sarba ar+d+ha na shrI b+h+rU~M sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma aT+Ta ha sa me/
409a2(rgyud): ka da sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par// pad+mo steng du bzhag par bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad
409a3(rgyud): dung lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// pad+mo la sogs tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hrIHoM tAr pap+pa sa ba lo ki la mA ma sa ma ya saH/
409a4(rgyud): hUM.oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+ShI d+ha ra Sha Ta ge na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma nI la ka tA sha ra ka tsakrA ga ta pad+ma pA Ni brag+hA ha tsa ma Ni ba sin kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo bI ta a dzi narma ba tsa tsan+tod/ d+ha ri ya nA rA ya na bang
409a5(rgyud): re tre ni mu kha aT+TAr+tha hA sa na pra bi sha ya sa ma ya na/ de hi ma sid+d+h+ya A lo ki te shwa ra hUM/ oM brah+ma pad+ma saM b+ha ba dza pa dza pa pad+ma b+ha sha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de
409a6(rgyud): bzhin te// der ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa// pad+mo na dung rtse thogs par bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du// mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin brig// sems dpa' chen po cho ga bzhin// de mas
409a7(rgyud): kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hrIHoM pad+ma na d+he shA ra nA thA pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma sa ma ya/ A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya A baM sha sarba karma sid+d+hi s+tha pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/
409b1(rgyud): oM ba yan d+ha tad a ba mag te shA ma k+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka bcas ma ya dz+dza/ oM sa hA pra tsaH ba shArU pa tsa~Mka/ badz+rad ma? sA kar la bshan badz+ra dzAd ya pad+ma ya krA Sha du zhud dzAd+ha ky-i d+h+r-i kA/ oM zlas
409b2(rgyud): sa ma la s+t+ra ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis birgal nas ni// grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul// pad+ma lkog mo la sogs la// de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams so//
409b3(rgyud): oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ga ya ma hA de rI ga ma hA pU dza sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma sA le a b+hiny+dza/ a bi She ke pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma gI te gI te pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma ne wi d+ye sarba pU dza prA bad+d+hA na sa ma
409b4(rgyud): ya hU~M rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pad+ma'i mchod pa la sogs bzhi// mchod pa'i lnga po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM
409b5(rgyud): pad+ma d+hU pe pU dza sa ma ye pra hri da ya pad+ma ku la da yi te ma hA ga Ni pad+ma ti hUM/ oM pad+ma pASh+pe pU dza sa ma ye pad+ma ba si ma hA bIr+ya pad+ma ku la pra ri ha ri sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma dI pa pU dza sa ma ye
409b6(rgyud): pad+ma kA la sun+da ri mahA tud+ya a lo ke badz+ra pi tsi na ya pad+ma sa ra sA ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra gan+ta pro dza si ma ye ma hA padz+ra ku la tsi re ku ru karmA Ni mo pad+ma sid+d+hi hU~M/ de nas pad+ma'i sgo bzhi po// kun tu tshogs som
409b7(rgyud): ji bzhin du/ ji lta ba bzhin legs bri ba// de dag snying po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// oM ha ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma a~M ku sha A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yan pad+ma aM ku sha d+hA
410a1(rgyud): ra T+TadzaH/ oM a g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ma hA pa shu pa ti la ma pa ru tsa ku be ra pra be sha d+ha ra pad+ma ku la sa ma ya n+nat+ma/ oM pad+ma po Ta s+phoT ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma ya shAR+Sha
410a2(rgyud): tsA ba oM mu kha sa na ta ku mA ra be 'drar par+b+ba g+haN+De A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM sarba mu dra ma ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha pad+ma a be sha a a a a/ de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes pa
410a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang por pad+mo'i slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad+mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying
410a4(rgyud): po 'dis las rnams bya'o// oM ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha a/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ pad+mo'i dbyibs brlabs nas rang gi pad+mo'i ming
410a5(rgyud): brjod la pad+mo lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams bya'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas
410a6(rgyud): pad+mo'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de nas dang por pad+mo'i slob ma rnams la mna'i snying po byin la 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// deng ni khyod kyi snying kha na// pad+mo sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te//
410a7(rgyud): ciste tshul du spras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste// gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas
410b1(rgyud): nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa yo ma ya swA/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs/
410b2(rgyud): nas gzhug par bya ste/ snying po 'di yin no// oM pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad+mo'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no// oM pad+ma hasta d+harma ha na pa lA ya he ne// de nas
410b3(rgyud): 'di skad du pad+mo'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o// de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// ji ltar pad+mo dkar po 'di// 'dod pa'i nyes pas mi chags bzhin// thams cad dag par
410b4(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur// de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// snying la pad+mo bris nas kyang // pad+mo bsgom
410b5(rgyud): na snying kha yi// pad+mo dpa la yang dbang 'gyur na// bud med phal la smos ci dgos// dpral bar sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te// rtag tu bsgom par byas na ni// bsgoms pa des ni myur du yang //
410b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// kha yi nang du lce steng du// sangs rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na// spa dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyi// rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur// gtsug tor dbus su padz+ra/
410b7(rgyud): ning spoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang // gtsug tor bcwo bsgoms na ni// mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM padz+ra shre yaM b+ha la ya //
411a1(rgyud): oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pra ya ts+tsha bau/ oM pad+ma sa ra smai bi sho d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma ud+ha gr-ib shi ku ru dzaH/ rtsig pa 'am yang na mkha' la'ang rung // pad+modam pa bsgoms na ni//
411a2(rgyud): 'di ni sems can thams cad kyang // dbang du byed pa dam pa'o// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo dam pa bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs// ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur//
411a3(rgyud): rtsig pa 'am yang na nam mkha' la// pad+ma rgya gram bris na ni// gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi// de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje pad+mo bsgoms
411a4(rgyud): nas kyang // de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni// pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra dza gad ba sha~M ka dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya oM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a shan
411a5(rgyud): ba ku ru baM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU pa ne d+hA ra sha ya b+ha ga bAM baM/ oM sa mA d+hi badz+ra pad+mo Sh+Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+raM hi/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du kha spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni/
411a6(rgyud): de yi mdun du d+ha mthon kyi/ sa gyi mtshig gis 'dren par bya// dkyil 'kho la sogs tham sna // spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya// nges pa'i zhags pa'i phyag d+ha yis// 'gro ba thams
411a7(rgyud): cad des dbang byed// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar byi// de yi mdun du pad+mo yi// lugs sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings// dkyil 'khor la sogs
411b1(rgyud): khabs ca dra spyan ras gzigs dbang byi de yi// mdun du pad+mo dral bu yis// thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+mo A kaR+Sha ya sarba ma hA sa twa na
411b2(rgyud): sa a mo sde pa sha kro d+han+da na haM/ oM pad+ma s+pho ta baM/ oM pad+ma g+ha sA a be sha ya sarba AH/ bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// bzlozha la bzhi sems dpar yang // bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni// nang
411b3(rgyud): cig gis ni gzugs mang 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// pad+mo pad+mo bsgoms na ni// zang mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor
411b4(rgyud): dbus// bdag gi sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur na// tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin
411b5(rgyud): dung bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po nams ni 'di yin no// pad+mo bi shwa/ wA ma kA la pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka ya/ lo ki shwa ra/ de nas
411b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // pad+mo la gnas
411b7(rgyud): sems dpar ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid sgom// de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mo bcings na ni// spyan ras
412a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni// bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur// pad+mo badz+ra'i ting 'dzin 'thog/ sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog/
412a2(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur// pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bad+mo khro bo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad+mo 'dod pa'i
412a3(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje pad+mo grub mchog sbyin// 'dod pa'i pad+mo rab 'dod ldan// dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyin// khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur// pad+mo'i
412a4(rgyud): nyi ma gzi brjid mchog/ pad+mo zla bas mdzes pa che// bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob// grol bas dngos grub mchog 'thob bo// pad+mo ral gris longs spyod 'thob// mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa
412a5(rgyud): che dang dgos dkar gyis ni dngos grub 'thob// pad+mo gar dbang gis 'grub ste// mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med// rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul// pad+mo khu tshur rab tu sgrub// sgeg mo dga' zhing 'phreng
412a6(rgyud): ba'i nor// glur blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim// me tog mdzes shing me tog lta// dris ni mchog gi drir yang 'gyur// rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs// gdon mi za bar dbang du byed// pad+mo lcags
412a7(rgyud): sprog bcing po che// dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// rdo rje bsdam pa bcings nas ni// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng // phyag/
412b1(rgyud): rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig sa sangs rgyas chos ni rab 'thob byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// mdzub mo gung mo srim lag mnyam// sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par/
412b2(rgyud): byed dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam pa// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i// phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub/ de las gung mo rin chen 'dra// rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed// gung mo
412b3(rgyud): pad+mo'i tshul du byas// pad+mo'i dngos grub 'thob par byed// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni// skad cig gi ni dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje bsdams
412b4(rgyud): la mdzub bsdams pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par byed// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rdo rje thal mo bsdams ras kyang // gung mo mnyam par bsdams
412b5(rgyud): nas ni// mthe bong mthe'u chung phye ba ni// sna tshogs pad+mor bshad pa yin// de las mthe bong gnyis bsnol te// mdzub gnyis rtse mo spad la dgug/ dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug pud// gtsug
412b6(rgyud): bung sangs rgyas yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bong mnyam nas btud nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprang dgug/ bkananas ting nge 'dzin du bcug/ thal mo pad+mo mnyam sbyar
412b7(rgyud): yang mdzub mardo rjer skams nani// mthe bo ngas la sbyar ba 'ang// nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas ni// legs par bkan te bcings nas kyang // mthe bong gnyis
413a1(rgyud): ne bad+mor spang// sangs rgyas bsgo yin par bshad / mthe bong gnyis ni rdo rje banyam// mdzub mo lcags kyur la grir bya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye// glang mo srin lag brjod/
413a2(rgyud): byang pad+mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// mthe bos mthe'u bzung dgug pas// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bzung ba ni// pad+mo'i brdas ni 'gugs par byed// thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas ni// bkan legs
413a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings na ni// legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed// pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags// thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// mdzub mo rtse mo bsnyams te dgug mthe'u chung phye nas mdzod phur gzhag/ pad+mo khro
413a4(rgyud): mnyes zhes bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// sor mo thams cad dkyil 'a khor du// snying khar rab tu brkyang ba ni// pad+mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad// thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra/
413a5(rgyud): bar bya// dpung pa'i spyi bor rab brgyan pa// pad+mo rin chen rgyal mtshan rtser// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor gzhag/ kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas// nyid kyi kha nas dgod pa dang // kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur/
413a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin pad+mor bcings nas ni// mthe bong gnyis ni so sor dgyed// pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i tshul du dgug/ pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya dang // dngos grub thams cad grub par byed/
413a7(rgyud): ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni// pad+mo'i ril gri'i phyag rgya yi// mthe'u chung pad+mo chen por bya// mthe bong gnyis ni dbyug ltar bslang // mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya// gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya// rdo rje thal
413b1(rgyud): mo radam byas la// g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug/ g.yon pa'i mdzub dathe ba bzlas pa bya// sor kun tu skyes la bye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du
413b2(rgyud): 'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ri// spyi bar bzhag pa bad+mo can / rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// rtse mo thams cad kha phye ba// bskor te pad+mo'i snying khar ni// bzhag nas bstan par byed pa po//
413b3(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni// thal mo bkyang ste bskums nas ni// khar bzhag pad+ma'i gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni phyir
413b4(rgyud): bkug ste// rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab mnan pa// pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog
413b5(rgyud): rnams bcing ba'o// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni phyir bkug la// rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo mnyam sbyar
413b6(rgyud): lang mdzub gnyis mdud par mdud pa ni// nges par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya yin// mthib mdzub lugs sgrog 'dra bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// pad+mo thal mo mnyam sbyar la// srin lag
413b7(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis par du// mtho bong gnyis bcug dam du bcer// de nas pa d+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te khA tho kr-i hi/ shri shi d+hi ha/ kr-i ti kr-i bi/ bau raSh+Ti a bad+mo'u
414a1(rgyud): tshur gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya sgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i
414a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting
414a3(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i
414a4(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
414a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM karma sa ma ye hUM
414a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/
414a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// pad+mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad sras bus bre// de dbus pad+mo'i steng du ni// rdo
414b1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbang marba// da yo phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshig mchog rnams lhag ma bzhin// rang gi rig parnam ldan par// chos cardo rje la sogs bri// de la de dag ga snying po na 'di rnams yin no//
414b2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+ha ma shwa ri dz+dza/ oM d+harma sa ma ye badz+ra badz+ra na hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She kA rat+na sa ma ye ts+tsha/ oM tA rA sa ma yai hUM/ oM bi shwa mu khe hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du// rdo shugs
414b3(rgyud): kyis brga' nas ni// de yi dbus su pad+mo yis// bskor ba'i pad+mo bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+mo'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa// pad+mo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid/
414b4(rgyud): phyag tu// de la de dag gi phyag rgya 'di rnams yin no// hriHoM pad+ma te thA ga to/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dre pad+ma badz+ra aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA raM NI hUM/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ oM pad+ma duSh+Ti/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang /
414b5(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// gtsug pud chu skyes che gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// pad+mo'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi//
414b6(rgyud): dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// shI oM b+hi kra Te be ta Ti badz+re hUM/ oM pad+d+he dz+wA le/ oM sau me ni badz+ron hUM/ oM padz+ra ma hA sa na a kad sha ba dA
414b7(rgyud): dair da ri i aT+Te ban+de tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sa~Md+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ga sum par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de yi dbus su pad+mo mdzes// pad+mo'i byag
415a1(rgyud): rgyu gzhag par bya// de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'ogs rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// pad+mo la ni gnas par bri// de la de dag gi/
415a2(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// b+hi dzi oM tA re tut+tA re hUM/ oM hrIHhUM oM pad+ma tsakra sho la d+hA ra Ni/ ni la kaN+De sid d+ha sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM pAdz+ra ra bA se na pad+ma saM b+ha baM bad+ha bad+d+ha hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor
415a3(rgyud): bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // pad+mo'i dbus su pad+mo bri// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bskor 'od bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo'i
415a4(rgyud): dbus na gnas pa yi// pad+mo'i mtshan ma ldan par bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// s+t+ri oM pad+mo na rte/ shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA na ta na ta hUM/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa
415a5(rgyud): ban d+ha ra kra ma na hUM/ haM oM ma hA pra tsaN+De pad+ma yak+Sha ni bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra NI bi shA ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba/
415a6(rgyud): pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgya// mdor na pad+mo'i mtshan ma can// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+mo ra ti pA dze ho/ oM padz+ra a b+hi She pU dze ra ti/ oM pad+ma gI ti pU dze gi/ oM pad+ma ne wi d+ye pU dzaH/
415a7(rgyud): oM d+hU pi pad+ma ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma puSh+pa dz+dza/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+ha ri / d+harma A lo ke pU dza hUM/ oM pad+ma gan d+he hUM/ mchod pa rnams so// oM pad+ma a~M ku sha A rA ya ma hA pad+ma ku la na/ ha ya grI ba sa ma ya hA dza/
415b1(rgyud): oM a mo k+Sha pa sha kro d+ha sa pa ya pra be sha yas zas tra sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma shA ka la~M baM/ oM pad+ma kan+d+ha d+hA shA g+h+ra~M A be sha ya/ sa ma ya sha na mu kaM a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'dir
415b2(rgyud): dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ badz+ra'i slob sa rnams ji lta ba bzhin btsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung ngare/
415b3(rgyud): tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi de rmig lam du ci zhig sdang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// des gal te nam ma
415b4(rgyud): dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub pa'i ye shes bslab bo// ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dag par 'gyur ba'i ye
415b5(rgyud): shes bslab bo// ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo// ci ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par shes nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol
415b6(rgyud): nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed do// phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang sdod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
415b7(rgyud): pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che// sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi//
416a1(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni// mnyam par bzhag pas brtan byas te// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// mchog gis dngos
416a2(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// pad+mo pad+mo sems dpa' che// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms// bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi// dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur// rang byung gdon mi za ba yi// dbang phyug
416a3(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin bsgrubs mur bar yang // mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+h+ya ho/ oM bud+d+ha a bi Sha ka ko d+ho haM saud
416a4(rgyud): d+h+ya ho oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+h+ya ho/ oM a mo g+he shwa ro he sid d+hu maM/ de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// kha yi nang du dbyig bcug te// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid nyid kyis/
416a5(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyu las stong du 'gyur// gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// mu
416a6(rgyud): tig 'brum bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis// rin chen thams cad
416a7(rgyud): blangs na ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang // gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma ma rdza rat+na pra d+ha pU dza/ oM pad+ma su bar+d+ha pra d+ha hU~M dza/ oM padz+ra/
416b1(rgyud): saban tha d+ha d+hAdz+dza/ oM bzlas ca smra kyang / danas rjes su dga' bar ye shes na'ang yin te/ sna chogs dbang phyus phyag rgyam// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms ma// brjoblangs te bdun gnas pa
416b2(rgyud): gang yin des ni de mgur byed// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// pad+mo dmar po dam bzung ste// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas
416b3(rgyud): kyang bad+mo blangs te ji lta ba// rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga bzhin du pad+mo bzung // lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni//
416b4(rgyud): bud med thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bi shwe shwa ra ma hA pad+ma ho/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM yo ga pad+ma ho/ oM karma pad+ma ho/ de nas mngon spyod kyi ye shes
416b5(rgyud): bslab bo// sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che// bdag nyid mdun du pad+mo bcad// phyag rgya pad+mo de nyid kyis// de yi 'chi ba skad cig go za pad+mo bzung nas brtan bya ba// cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du/
416b6(rgyud): dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis// nan tan kho nar gzhig par bya// gang gi ming spos 'jig pa ni// ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su// ji ltar de ltar pad+mo thogs// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur//
416b7(rgyud): gang gi gzhig par khros na ni// las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su// bskor zhing brtag pa byas na ni// de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM satra pap+pa tsu dam
417a1(rgyud): ra ya ho phaT/ oMs pa ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA shA ya ra ta phaT/ oMd+ham+ba pa dz+ra s+yAd bi na sha ya pra ta ya ba Ta/ oM kam padz+ra s+phoT ya dza ba ta ma s+yakr-i ta paT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshag
417a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur// pad+mo pad mchog ce byed cing // mnyam par bzhag na dngos grub thob// bud med du ni parlobasas/
417a3(rgyud): de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur// rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni// bsgoms na des ni de 'grub pa// bud med du ni bcwo bsam// de steng pad+mor bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad+mo pad+mo mchog/ dag pa'i
417a4(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med du ni bad+mo bsam// de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing sna tshogs pad+mo mchog/ sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//
417a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya hrIH/ oM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta saM yo ga sA d+ha ya shrI/ oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya d+hi/ oM bi shA pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya s+t+ri/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i
417a6(rgyud): ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo// sor ma ci spyad pad+mor bya// rdo rje khro ba'i mdzub gnyis spyad // rtse gnyis nor bu'i brjor ltar// rdo rje bsnam pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas
417a7(rgyud): kyang dgung mo gnyis ni myur gur sbeng // mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan// chos kyi rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar gzhag pa dang // ting nge 'dzin tshul
417b1(rgyud): pang dugakag/ bskrad nas spyi bor gzhag par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbyung bcings la// mchod rten pad+mor tshul du ni// gung mo'i gnyis na bcing gyur na// sangs rgyas pad+mo yin par bshad // de las/
417b2(rgyud): mthe bong rdo rje dang // mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya// pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// de las mthe bong bsnol nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung
417b3(rgyud): khang drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdum pa dam byas las// mthe bong gnyis mnyam bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni/
417b4(rgyud): dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mor bya// de nyid las ni snying khar yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing // lhag par rab tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams pad ma
417b5(rgyud): byas la// mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mor dgug/ de bzhin pad+mo ral gri ste// mdzub mo pad+mor byas pas sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bong g.yon pa nang du gzhug/ dung ste mthe bong thobar
417b6(rgyud): bsgreng // sor mo bskum brkyang pad mthe'u chung // de las thams cad bcum nas kyang // mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mthe bong g.yas la sbyar ba yi// mdzub mor nor bu 'greng bar bya// rdo rje
417b7(rgyud): bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mdzub mo bsgreng ste bar byed pa// pad+mo spyan gyi yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams padam byas la// mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// dam du mdzub
418a1(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug ste// mthe'u chung gnyis ni go char bya// de las mtheb gnyis mche bar bya// mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig mchog
418a2(rgyud): nibla med de// rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'dra byas la// mthe bong phan tshun bsnol ba ni// gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung
418a3(rgyud): gung mo mnyam bsgreng la// mtheb mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni// gtsug pud dbus na de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bong pad+mo 'drar byas la// kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang //
418a4(rgyud): pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams
418a5(rgyud): pa las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'drar byas la// mthe bong gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni// gung mo gnyis ni rtse spur bkug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb gnyis rdo rje rab sbyar la// mdzub mo
418a6(rgyud): ral gri lugs kyur bya// mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drar byas la// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la// mdzub mo mthe bong rtse sbyar bka/ dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya// de la
418a7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis bkug la// mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan pa ni// pad+mo dgyes pa bdag nyid che// legs so zhes bya sbyin byed kyi// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos sgyur la/
418b1(rgyud): mtho bong gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o// de nyid snying khar zhi mar bya// spyi bor pa rdo rgyal mtshan bya// phab ste la yi 'bras bzhag pa// pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa ma//
418b2(rgyud): rdo rje nang du bsdam byas la// chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni// mthe'u chung mthe bong rab bsdams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mdzub gung pad+mo ral grir bya/
418b3(rgyud): de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya// bzlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthib mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya// de nas snying khar sbyar ba ni// gsang ba'i srung ba yin par
418b4(rgyud): bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drar byas lag/ mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang // mtheb gnyis phyir bkyed mche ba can// de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni//
418b5(rgyud): mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi// pad+mo gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o// pad+mo lA s+ye la sogs pa// de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la//
418b6(rgyud): de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya// de nas pad+mo gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/ hA grA prA hA/ shA sA d+hA hA/ gA dA krA bA/ dA rA Sh+Ta swA/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyis su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs/
418b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dmatshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
419a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa
419a2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma sa mA d+hi dz+nyAn ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gis rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harmA hUM/ de nas
419a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na d+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
419a4(rgyud): gsungs so// oM d+ha rmAd+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM karma d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
419a5(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa kun tu spun ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// chos kyi
419a6(rgyud): ye shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sems
419a7(rgyud): dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bi shwa shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha mu ku Ta hUM
419b1(rgyud): oM d+han d+ha d+he shwa re trUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyAnA pad+ma bud+hA d+h+waM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma badz+ra d+har hU~M/ oM trAnA pad+me mAr hU~M/ oM dz+nyA nA pad+ma d+haSh+TI dz+dza/ oM dA na padz+ra d+h+wi kuTi dz+dza/ oM dz+nyAn padz+ra sAN+ya n+tu/ oM dz+nyAn bAH/
419b2(rgyud): shAhU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+hA hA sad+d+hi/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tIr ts+tsha/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma kA m+bA ra t+na/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma nAnA ya trAM/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma hA sad+d+hi/ oM dz+nyA na pad+mAn rte shwa ra t+na/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rak+Shan+tu/ oM dz+nyA nA badz+ra yak+Sha d+hu/
419b3(rgyud): dz+nyA ne badz+ra mun+d+hi hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pa ma lA s+ye d+d+haM/ oM nIn badz+ra mA le hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra kA~M te dz+dza/ oMng+ga nA badz+rar+tha t+ya d+d+he/ anA nA badrA d+hA pa d+d+he/ oM dAn badz+ra pun+na d+h+waM/ oM dA na pad+me dzI pa hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn bad+hAhrIts+tshi dz+dza
419b4(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a~M ku sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a ma g+ha pA sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+phoT hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lte ba bzhin du
419b5(rgyud): bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la'ang ma brjod cig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la//
419b6(rgyud): snying khar pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // pad+ma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad+mo bsgoms byas te// goms nas shin tu brtan gyur na//
419b7(rgyud): de ma thag tu mkha' la lding // 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// lce la pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur bar yang // nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// gtsug
420a1(rgyud): tu bad+mo ba sgoms nas kyang // grub pa gyur na myur du ro// skad cig gis ni sang du lding // de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// oM par+tha dz+nyA na hr-id ya A be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi She A
420a2(rgyud): oM pad+ma rA na bi d+yot+ta ma A be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na uSh+NI Sha a be sha/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na// skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur//
420a3(rgyud): nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // de yi steng du bdag 'dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs
420a4(rgyud): shig bsgoms byas la// gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs// mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la// mthong ba'i pad+mo de zos na// de ma thag
420a5(rgyud): tu mi snang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma A kaR+Sha/ oM pad+ma ra tha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/ oM pad+ma ra sa ya na hUM phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad+mo ni// kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs
420a6(rgyud): pa'i nga dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni// gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad+mo'i dbyibs bris la// de nyid bsgom pa byas na ni// gzugs mang
