420a7(rgyud): 'chang bar de 'gyur ro// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na yang / sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams
420b1(rgyud): ning snga chags dbyibs su byas kyang ni// de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing // ci dga' gzugs su nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rU pa pra brta ya A be sha/
420b2(rgyud): bai sha padz+ra pra bar+Na ya maM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+mo a be sha/ oM ba sh+lo pad+ma ma no ta kI pa A kA sha bi shwa rU paM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la// bad+mo blangs te
420b3(rgyud): rab byin na// gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya zhes bya bcings na ni// des ni pad+mo blangs nas kyang // byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi// phyag
420b4(rgyud): rgya gang yang rung bcings la// ye shes pad+mo gang byin pa// de ni de yis myur dbang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// pad+mo byin pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tu de
420b5(rgyud): dbang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ oM karma pad+ma ho// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes
420b6(rgyud): bslab bo// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// pad+ma'i pad+mo gzhag par bya//
420b7(rgyud): chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa
421a1(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i ba/
421a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
421a3(rgyud): gsungs so// oM hUM d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
421a4(rgyud): gsungs so// oM pad+ma karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
421a5(rgyud): kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// pad+ma'i las zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
421a6(rgyud): tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad+mo yi// mtshan ma 'dzin pa thams cad bri// de la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pu ri Ni hUM/ bi shwa ka me
421a7(rgyud): shwa ri hUM/ oM ta thA ga te shwa ra a bi She ka karma bi drA hUM/ oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bud+d+he hUM/ oM pad+ma karma badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dza karma
421b1(rgyud): sa ma ye dz+dza/ oM pad+ma ka ma duSh+Ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra karma b+h+r-i ku Ti hUM tra/ oM pad+ma karma sAr+ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa dze ts+tsha/ oM pad+ma kam hA sa hU~M/ oM pad+ma kurma tA re hUM/ oM pad+ma kam ku mA ri hUM/ oM pad+ma kam nA ra ya
421b2(rgyud): nits+tsha oM pad+ma karma pra g+ni hUM/ oM bid+ma karma narte shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma daMSh+Ta karma ka ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma muSh+Ti ga tA ya hUM/ oM ra ti pU dze d+hu dza/ oM a d+hi
421b3(rgyud): She kaM pU dze hUM dza/ oM gI ti pU dz+re hUM d+ha/ oM nai wi t+ya pU dze hUM baM/ oM d+hU pi pU dze hUM aHoM puSh+pa pA dze hU tra/ oM A lo ke pU dz+r-i hA d+hi/ oM gan+d+he pU dze hUM baM/ oM ha ye grI ba a na ya hUM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pa
421b4(rgyud): sha kro d+hi pau DA ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shA ka la ban d+he hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma gan+d+he A be sha ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du
421b5(rgyud): bcug ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes sgo zhig/ de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i
421b6(rgyud): ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya che// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni// sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur// 'jig rten
421b7(rgyud): dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam par
422a1(rgyud): bzhag bsgoms la// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms// mdor na gang yang rung ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la// las rnams
422a2(rgyud): thams cad bshags na ni// las rnams kun las rnam par dag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sarba pA paM saM sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma/ oM sarba a nan ta t+ya sho d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma
422a3(rgyud): oM sarba pA paM pra Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// shin
422a4(rgyud): tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms byas la/ shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni// bud d+h+ya bud d+hu zhes
422a5(rgyud): brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par gyus 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hI zhes brjod na/ ka las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten
422a6(rgyud): dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na/ ka las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pA pAM k+Sha ya pad+ma ka oM
422a7(rgyud): a bA ra Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM ni bA ra Na kA ya badz+ra/ oM karma kA ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// rab tu mnyam
422b1(rgyud): par bzhag bcings la// tsha ma mo oM zhes brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed// 'dzag rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / khA b+ha b+hA b+hA zhes brjod na// sangs
422b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // he he he he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad nges mchor 'gyur// pad+mo'i las
422b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag btsangs la// d+he d+he d+he d+he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM bA kar padz+ra/
422b4(rgyud): oM he kA ra pad+ma/ oM d+he kA ra pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher// mnyam par bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // hri hri hri hri zhes brjod na// 'jig rten dbang
422b5(rgyud): bor grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang // shI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i mnyam
422b6(rgyud): gzhag par// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // d+hig d+hig d+hig d+hig ces brjod na// pad+mo khro bor 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo chen po dge ba yi/ kha las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // sr-isr-i sri sri
422b7(rgyud): zhes brjod na// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM hriHsid d+h+ya/ oM shrI sid d+h+ya/ oM d+hig sid d+h+yaH/ oM si sid d+h+ya/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes/
423a1(rgyud): ni 'di yin te/ 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ gabud med kun dang rtse byed cing // oM ho su khwa zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang
423a2(rgyud): bor snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dges so// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /
423a3(rgyud): a ho ra ti zhes brjod na// de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // su kha su kha zhes brjod na// de yi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur// de la de dag
423a4(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra brta na pad+ma/ oM prI ta kA ra pad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brta na pad+ma/ oM ma hA su kha pad+ma dri DA hUM/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/
423a5(rgyud): de nas pad+mo tha la sbyar te// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs// ka las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ khu zhes bya ba brjod par bya//
423a6(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya des sgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
423a7(rgyud): 'dinas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag tu byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yug tu'i snying po 'digs/
423b1(rgyud): song oM badz+rad pa padz+radz+dza/ de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad+na NA
423b2(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rab kyi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma padz+ra d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba pu khe hUM/ de nas byang
423b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje
423b4(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje bkrol sogs bri
423b5(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la'ang ma brjod cig/ khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang mi bde ba ma
423b6(rgyud): spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes sgo zhig/ de nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya ste// lag pas pad+mo bzung nas kyang // bsgrims te legs par bsdam par bya// drings
423b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams mchod na// mur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag par gtsug pud dbus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la// 'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na// 'jig rten
424a1(rgyud): thams cad dbang du byed// pad+mo pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin// yid kyis su ni de bsad do// bang du log pa de rgyas pa'i// sa sogs pa yi las
424a2(rgyud): byed do// pad+mo pad+ma chen po'i gzugs// pad+mo brgya grangs nyid du ni// byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang // bskor nas dab ba la sogs de byed// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+nahUM/
424a3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hUM/ oM badz+ra hUM tra/ oM gan+d+ha pA dza gr-i sA d+hA ya hriH/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba sha~M ku ru sarbA na lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/ oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ye/
424a4(rgyud): sarba pra tir+tha ka na sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+rig oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni// bsgrub par bya ste
424a5(rgyud): dam tshig 'di// sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub// de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma rA ga sa ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po
424a6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
424a7(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sarba dza ba da bi nA ma hA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+haM bi shwa rU paM san d+hA ra ya ma me tsa sarba
424b1(rgyud): sid drA la pra ya cu'iH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab sub shang byag/ 'gro ba 'dul bar/
424b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du pad+mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar bya// der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya/
424b3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas/ de bzhin du bsgo ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor legs par
424b4(rgyud): bris nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam
424b5(rgyud): par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o// dngos grub rnams kyang
424b6(rgyud): de bzhin no// de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la'ang bya'o// dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig
424b7(rgyud): tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi//
425a1(rgyud): mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs par// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na/
425a2(rgyud): nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// bam po bdun pa//
425a3(rgyud): nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid debyang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam
425a4(rgyud): mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i dngos gsol ba btab bo// nam mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po// rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rin chen khyod
425a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// dbang bskur rin chen chen po ni// dag pa che zhing dge ba che// sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku// rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba// nam mkha'
425a6(rgyud): kun gyi 'od che ba// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod spu de bzhin gshegs// rin chen thams cad
425a7(rgyud): rab kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rin chen gtso rin drag/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen// rin chen pad+ma nam mkha' che/ mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
425b1(rgyud): rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che// mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i don// sbyin mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen
425b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa// sems can kun don de nyid don//
425b3(rgyud): don chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad che// sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin
425b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchogadabang chen khyab pa
425b5(rgyud): chen po ste// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phul bas rab kyi mchog/ rin chen rgyan te rin chen 'dzin// rin chen snang bas snang ba che// rin chen
425b6(rgyud): grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phung po rin chen don// nor bu rdo rje nor bu yi// rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar// rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal// che nyid shing ste rin chen dbang // re ba thams
425b7(rgyud): cad skong mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes// rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal// srid tshe khyab par bdag nyid kun// mchog par sbyin zhing mchog chen po// phun sum thams cad
426a1(rgyud): 'byor pa'o// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di// su yang rung ba 'chang byed na// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// skad cig tu ni sdig med
426a2(rgyud): 'thob// rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog/ nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam
426a3(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de
426a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na
426a5(rgyud): hUM de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hA tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa
426a6(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
426a7(rgyud): po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa ra rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che
426b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas/ de dgag/
426b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
426b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so// de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang
426b4(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te
426b5(rgyud): byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas/ yang slar byon nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
426b6(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen
426b7(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsas/
427a1(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas
427a2(rgyud): rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po ngam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa// gruba'i pa la spro bzhi pa// tababs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste// srang bu ba'izhi dang ldan pa/
427a3(rgyud): lang dar dang 'phreng ba lnga ldis brgyan// dkyil 'khor chen po'i grwa rnams dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bras bre// de yi nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen las
427a4(rgyud): byung gnas bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor lngar ni brgyan gyur par// der ni srad bu bre bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi// der ni sangs rgyas gzhag
427a5(rgyud): par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bud+d+ha rat+na hUM/ oM badz+ra ma Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ oM ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na ba rA hUM/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis
427a6(rgyud): brgal nas kyang // rdo rje snying po 'dir gnas shig/ rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri// da mi phyogs rnapas thams cad du// lha 'og gi rims ji bzhin du// rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen pa rnams
427a7(rgyud): bri'o cha de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha prad hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma Ni tsin+da A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bA na si d+yA si dz+yadz+dza/ oM rat+na a~M ku sha a kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+tha na sa ma ya shI g+h+raM sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu sma ra hU~M/
427b1(rgyud): oM ti nA ga ba sha~M ku ru sarba nakA shar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na rbats+tshi n+d+ra/ rin chen 'phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rin chen 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri//
427b2(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thob pa'i// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/ oM
427b3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta i b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na ma Ni sUr+ya hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+h+wa dza sarbA sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+nan+ta hA sa hA sa hUM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni//
427b4(rgyud): rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa// de dbus gnas par bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lte 'og go rims ji bzhin pa re// nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi
427b5(rgyud): snying ngo ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM he ga sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na gang+gA hUM/ oM rat+na ko Sha gra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra brta ya hUM/ oM rat+na ba shi hUM/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
427b6(rgyud): nas ni// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i// sems dpa' chen po der yang bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad// mdor ni lag ni phyag rgya yang // rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' che rnams cho
427b7(rgyud): ga bzhin// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti b.rA ya sarba bar+Na sa~Mr+b+ba d+ho b+ha ga bAn Ni ta to hUM/ oM ma Na pU dza sa ma ya nAM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tsa hUM/ ya~M ma Ni deSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA dz+nyA na Na/
428a1(rgyud): sha ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ban+d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lnga 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rin chen la s+ye la sogs bri/
428a2(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na de ti hUM/ oM rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na grI N+Te hUM/ oM radzAn t+yeb+h+rUM/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ khyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa nas
428a3(rgyud): su nga bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/ oM puSh+pe ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan+d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni// sgo ba rnams ni
428a4(rgyud): gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba ra tA A kaR+Sha ru Na ma hA satwa b+ha ga bAn taM A ka rA dzaH/ oM sarba rat+na pra be sha ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa ma hA ma Ni rA dza ku la rat+na pA sha hUM/
428a5(rgyud): oM ma Ni b+han d+ha ha d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha ya a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches
428a6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra ma Ni sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos blasgo
428a7(rgyud): brag pa gcig tu gzar te/ de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o// oM ma Ni rA dza ku lAn/ de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la'ang marjod cig/
428b1(rgyud): khyod tshe rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mizer bar gyur ta re/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyis su bya'o// theg pa chen po mngon/
428b2(rgyud): par 'dus pa'ang brjod par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
428b3(rgyud): chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thams cad smar stsol cig ces spras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
428b4(rgyud): gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying
428b5(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya che/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bcings// gter brkos nas ni gang dag na// gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur// dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la// gang na gter rnams yod gyur
428b6(rgyud): pa dang der ni phyag rgya ba cir na ni// de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// gang na gter rnams yod pa yang // yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur/
428b7(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na// de nas gter yod shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ma
429a1(rgyud): Ni ra t+na A bi shats+tsha/ oM ma Ni bi Sha pa ri sha ya n+tu/ oM rak+Sha sa ma d+hi prA hi/ oM rat+na A bi shad ra sha ya n+tu/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// gang du lus ni 'khor gyur pa// den tshan/
429a2(rgyud): chen gter yod par// dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa// de nas rin chen chen po yi// gter yod par ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin
429a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la babs pa bdag nyid kyis// rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis// gter ni gang na yod par smra// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du// babs
429a4(rgyud): nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa// de na ga ter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+phoT s+pho Ta ya ni d+hi/ oM ma ma
429a5(rgyud): Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM bru hi/ oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar sha ya swAhA/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa// de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi// gter yod ye shes shes par bya/
429a6(rgyud): gang du dgas yod der yang ni// dam tshig mchog ni mchog bcings la// gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa// de na gter na yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du nges par dgos gyur pa/
429a7(rgyud): de na nges par gter yod par// ye shes bskyed de shes par bya// gang na yang dang yang dogs par// las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// der bcings de na gnyis gyur pa// gter yod par ni shes par bya//
429b1(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha/ oM rat+na na sa ma ya muny+dza ni d+hi ban d+hi/ oM d+ha ma rat+na bru hi ni d+ha naM/ oM sarba karma Ni s+phoT ya dar sha ya d+hi badz+ro dadA k+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms/
429b2(rgyud): nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na gnas pa der babs na// de na yod par rnam par bshad// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni// gang na
429b3(rgyud): gnas pa brtag gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par rtag tu shes// de na gter ni yod par bshad//
429b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba de na yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA rat+na pA rI
429b5(rgyud): kA ya bi sha/ oM rat+na sa ma ya hrid dar sha ya/ oM rat+na pa rik+Sha dz+nyA na a bi sha/ oM ma Ni karma bras+sa ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/
429b6(rgyud): gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// babs par gyur na gter sbed do// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // bud med dang ni rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya ma gyur tam/
429b7(rgyud): de na gter ni yod par bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po gas
430a1(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ma/
430a2(rgyud): Ni saM yo ga bi sha/ oM sa ma ya saM lo ga d+hA Do ma b+ha ba/ oM di ni dz+nyA na A bi sha saM yo ga/ oM sarba karma sa swaT saM yo ga/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bslab bo//
430a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po
430a4(rgyud): rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub// rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren// nor bu dga' bar rjes dgar byed// nor bu mgu
430a5(rgyud): khas dgyes par byed// nor bu lta bas nor thob bo// nor bu 'phreng bas dbang bskur zhing // nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ yid bzhin nor bus ci dgar sbyin// rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur// rin
430a6(rgyud): chen chos kyis chos kyang 'thob// gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed// rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po// rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur// smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob// rin chen char
430a7(rgyud): gyis nor chen po// nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid// rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed// rin chen mche bas nor thob bo// khu tshur nor bu'i dngos grub thob// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam
430b1(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob// rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas// rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas/
430b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob bo// de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyar te snying khar gzhag/ mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i nor bur bcings// 'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur// rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi/
430b3(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin// rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis// sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo// mdzub mo mnyam te phyir bkug la// mthe bong rdo rjer bcings pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i phyag las
430b4(rgyud): byung nga 'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la// gung mo myu gur bsgreng ba ste// 'di ni bcing ma thag tu yang /
430b5(rgyud): rang gi dbang bskur 'thob par 'gyur// de nas gung mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mor bya// 'dis ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs// mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur// mdzub mo mthe bong mthe'u chung rngam//
430b6(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya// gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar// srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng // rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang // mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying la// don kun
430b7(rgyud): sgrub pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang // grang ma gnyis na nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi phyag tu 'di// nong bu chen po rab sbyin no// de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis// lugs kyu'i tshul dudus
431a1(rgyud): pa ning don kun 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya ste// ro bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad// de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul/
431a2(rgyud): byas la// drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed// de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis// sbyar ba legs so zhes bya'o// de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang // mthe bong
431a3(rgyud): gnyis ni dbus sbyar la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni// nor bu lta bas bshad pa ste// lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// don kun grub pa'i 'phreng ba ni// rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur// de nyid
431a4(rgyud): snying khar mthe bong gnyis// bsgreng ste ngos kyis sbar ba ni// nor bu nyi ma'i snying khar gzhag/ gzi brjid chen po rab sbyin 'gyur// srin lag mnyam te bsgrengs nas ni// phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya// rdo rje nor
431a5(rgyud): bu chen po gtso// re ba thams cad rdzogs pa'o// de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing // kha 'gram dgod par bskor ba ste// rin chen cher dgod ces bya ba// bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub// ting nge 'dzin
431a6(rgyud): du sor mo sbrum// nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i// de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni// sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed// bathe bong gnyis ni nang du dgug/ mdzu gnyis nor bur byas pa ni// nor bu ral gri yin te
431a7(rgyud): mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje bsdams las 'khor lor bya// mtheb gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis nor bu 'drar byas pa// 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob par byed// de nyid
431b1(rgyud): thal mo'i tshul du byas// kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni// de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang // rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te// sor mo thams
431b2(rgyud): cad bsgreng ba ni// phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs// rdo rje nor bu chen bcings la// gar byas gtsug pud dbus bzhag nas// kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na// rin chen kun gyi de mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag
431b3(rgyud): rgya ning ngar grin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya// bur bu bcings pa zhes bya ste// srung ba yi ni cho gar grags// don kun grub pa de nyid las// gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa// nor bu che ba ba zhes bya ste// 'jigs
431b4(rgyud): byed don kun 'phrog pa yi// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub bkug mthe bong gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan te btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub thob// dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams/
431b5(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni// ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la// 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu btags// grang mo nor bu'i tshul du bya// de dag nyid la rnam par btags// lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul gyis ni// las rnam
431b6(rgyud): thams cad rab 'grub byed// de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// tra gra tri hriHshrI i ri d+hI di gri bi ri Ta ya a/ rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/
431b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // de nas yang
432a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
432a2(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na d+hU pe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shi lA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas
432a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheni pa rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung
432a4(rgyud): so nga oM d+harma a b+hi she ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
432a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam bste// rdo rje
432a6(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri ba ste// khril
432a7(rgyud): gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso// rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni// nor bu 'phreng ba pad+ma'i nor// nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM tra oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She
432b1(rgyud): ka pA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na br-i ti sa ma ye hUM/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po bri// de yi phyogs ni
432b2(rgyud): thams cad du// lta 'og gi rams ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slong dpon nyid kyis bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba Amra sid+d+hi pra be ma hA badz+rI rat+na sa ma ye ma Nis rba
432b3(rgyud): ar+than ma sA d+ha ya d+ha ri NI hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni rat+na sa pa ye aM ku sha ma Ni kra la dza/ oM ma Ni rag sa ma yai nAM/ oM ma Ni sA d+hu hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par ying // rdo rje shugs
432b4(rgyud): kyis brgal nas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin// nor bu de yi dbus su bris// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag
432b5(rgyud): rgya rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go// oM ma Ni rat+na ne tra A nA ya ba shaM ku ru sarba arba sa~Mrba dA na shI b+h+rU~M tiSh+Thi a~M ku shi ts+tsha/ oM ma Ni rak+Sha rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+yA dz+wa la lasaH
432b6(rgyud): mahA rA dzi ni hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan+da d+h+wa dzA gr-i hUM/ oM ma Ni hA s+ye hA sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// nor bu pad+mo bri bar bya// de yaM phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi
432b7(rgyud): snying po 'di rnams so// oM mai Ne se ma d+hi rjen tshwa/ oM ma Ni ri tA d+ya klas pa ye hUM/ i ma Nis ma ya ko Shad+de/ oM mdzes pa ya tsarba nu/ o ma cing shwa kr-i hUM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni// rdo rje shugs
433a1(rgyud): kyis brgal nas kyang // rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing // las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas// yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya'o// nor bu mtshan
433a2(rgyud): mar ldan pa rnams// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bye// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hUM/ oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma ye ni tra A/ oM ma hA pU dza sa ma na sa ma ye
433a3(rgyud): rak+Sha ra.oM badz+ra ma Ni rat+na daMSh+Ta ka rA le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du
433a4(rgyud): bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis tshul 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo la/ rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o//
433a5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang // bzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// rang gi gnas
433a6(rgyud): su bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya bcings
433a7(rgyud): nas ni// mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// rang gi gnas su de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// ma hA badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rat+na a
433b1(rgyud): b+hiShiny+tsa ma~M/ d+ha rma raHa b+hi Sha l+yA ma/ karma rat+na a b+hi'i ny+tsa maM/ phyag rgya chen po'i snying khar ni// rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur// mchog tu mad du byung ba 'thob/
433b2(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen dpral bar bsgoms nas ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na// thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// lce la rdo rje rin chen bsgom//
433b3(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba ni 'thob par 'gyur// rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen gtsug tor bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las legs byed pa'i rgyal por
433b4(rgyud): 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na hri da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka dza/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/ oM badz+ra rat+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hi Sha nas man/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis/
433b5(rgyud): bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang / ras la sogs par bris nas ni// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// ra sa la sogs par bris nas kyang // sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni// dam tshig
433b6(rgyud): rnams kyis bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs la bris nas kyang // bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni// nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// ras la sogs la rdo rje yi//
433b7(rgyud): rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na bid+ha a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra rat+na bi ma
434a1(rgyud): ba a b+hi'i ka/ badz+ra rat+na bim bku ru/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung // rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur tam kha yang na rin chen bzhag kyang rung / snying khar bsgoms nas dbang
434a2(rgyud): bskur 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gser ram rin chen gzhan las byas// rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni// nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms
434a3(rgyud): nas kyang // rang gi khar yang bcug na ni// tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni// gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na// las rnams kun gyi bdag
434a4(rgyud): por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na hr-i da ya A ba ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka ma hA ar+tha pA da/ oM badz+ra rat+na pa tsa pA de/ oM badz+ra rat+na ma hA karma pa de/ de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi
434a5(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// nor bu bud med bu gar bcug/ de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog
434a6(rgyud): gi nor bu ni// bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de ni bud med bu
434a7(rgyud): gar bcug/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings// bud med bu gar las phyag rgya// bcings par gyur na las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// de la de dag gi
434b1(rgyud): sA pa ni 'di rnams so// oM mamra sang d+he/ oM sa ma la a d+hi'i ga sang d+ha/ oM rnam sa da d+ha/ oM ka mras d-i/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad // na du na ru/
434b2(rgyud): bcings// gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams// sor mo brkyang ba byas nas na// spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang
434b3(rgyud): srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni// mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang 'thob bo// rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang mtheb ngos spang // de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang thog// de nyid mtheb gnyis mju/
434b4(rgyud): gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni// bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // dbang rnams kun gyi 'phreng ba ste// bsgyur nas
434b5(rgyud): dpral ba nyid du yang // bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang // bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni// bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur//
434b6(rgyud): mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni// mdzub gnyis kyi ni rtse mo yang // nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // rdo rje khu tshur gung mo gnyis// nor bu
434b7(rgyud): 'dra bar byas nas ni// nor bu 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo nor bu 'drar byas la// mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+mo// kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub// gung mo gnyis
435a1(rgyud): ni nor bur bcings// sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams// nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni// 'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// gung mo mthe bong rdo rje yis// rin chen
435a2(rgyud): tshul du byas nas kyang // srin lag mthe'u chung mnyam pa yi// khar bzhag lce sngo nor bu sbyin// de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya// de ltar de nyis lcags kyur bya// mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang // de nyid dga' bar
435a3(rgyud): rab sbyin pa'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor bubacing // mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste// srin lag ngos gnyis 'dud pa la// mthe bong gnyis kyis bkab pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor// dpung pa'i spyi bor
435a4(rgyud): brkyang bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni// mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng // de dag pad+mo 'dra bar bya// gung po gnyis ni nor bur bya/
435a5(rgyud): de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya// rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang // rdo rje 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya// mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya// sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang // de dag spyi bor
435a6(rgyud): bzhag pa ni// rin chen tshar gyis char 'bebs so// de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni// snying khar rin chen gnyis byas pa// mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin che ba// dbus su bsnams pa khu tshur ro// de nas dam
435a7(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni// mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi// dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed// ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang ba'i sbyin// dus
435b1(rgyud): rnams kun tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// traM/ gr-i/ traM/ saM/ gra kha/ d+h+r-i/ haM/ be/ daM/ kr-i/ be/ kra She/ y+Ya maM/ gsang ba gsang ba'i khu chur mchog/ gnyis su/
435b2(rgyud): byas na las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las// rin chen phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so//
435b3(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
435b4(rgyud): zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA ni ta ta ma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
435b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
435b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+ham a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa das pa 'di gsungs
435b7(rgyud): so oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/
436a1(rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus
436a2(rgyud): brephre nga chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// snying kha'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di ye shes kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungs so// oM dz+nyA na sarba sid dA dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/
436a3(rgyud): oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha dzaH/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a bI She ka/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUr+ya/ oM me Ni dz+nyA nad+b+hadza/ an+dan+da hA sa ma Ni d+hI na pad+ba
436a4(rgyud): hUM oM ma Ni t+yag/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na k+Sho/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsakra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni bA Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni ri ratA b.rA hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na Na nr-i t+ye pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na puSh+Ti/
436a5(rgyud): de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la'ang marjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur te/
436a6(rgyud): re zhes bsgo la/ nor bu'i rigs kyi cho kyi ye/ shes bskyed par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin ces// smra zhing gsol ba
436a7(rgyud): gdab par bya// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/ bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces// tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te
436b1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag nas kyang // rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la// dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas
436b2(rgyud): dam pa'i las byin zhes las la gsol ba gdab par bya// de dag nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM de hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sarba rat+na b+ha ga bA badz+ra gar+b+ha
436b3(rgyud): oM da his d+ha d+harman b+ha ga bA badz+ra gad+hA satwa/ i de hi sA d+ha ka rba b+ha ga ba~M badz+ra gar+b+ha/ nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs bsams pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom
436b4(rgyud): nas su// phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya/ nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya/
436b5(rgyud): nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa'i// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab// nam mkha'i phyogs sam
436b6(rgyud): phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dA na gar+b+ha de
436b7(rgyud): sarbas rban/ oM nAn gad+had nyis rba rat+na/ oM dz+nyA na ga d+ha de nyis rbad+ha ma/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha da nyis thagams/ rdo rje snying po zas nas kyang // snying lar yongs su bsgom byas la// gang gi chen snying 'da' ba/
437a1(rgyud): tshe grub pas ror ster ro// rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni// bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang / gang tshe mgo bo 'dar gyur pa// des ni mngon par dbang zob bo// rdo rje snying
437a2(rgyud): po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa// de tshe des ni ngag 'grub bo// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor// rab tu bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa/
437a3(rgyud): de tshe 'phang du lding bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM hr-i da ya gan+d+he de hi d+ha nas/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// oM b+ha ga garba sid+h+ya/ oM rat+na gar+b+hoShI Shi A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdo rje
437a4(rgyud): snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la// i lo rat+na zhes brjod 'grub// nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas
437a5(rgyud): bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la// mi li rat+na zhes brjod thob// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab
437a6(rgyud): lang tsi li rat+na zhes brjod thob// nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol btab la// ki li rat+na zhes brjod thob// de la de dag gi
437a7(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM i li/ oM mi laM/ oM tsi li/ oM ki li/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying
437b1(rgyud): pa bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis na mnyam spad na// dngos grub mchog na thob par 'gyur// rkani lar ma thus pa bzhin// rnga rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po nyis ni mnyam sbyar la/
437b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dag gar rtses pa// 'jig rten kun gyis de dag byed// nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs
437b3(rgyud): kyis rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la// thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// A kA sha gu h+ya dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ tsa~M
437b4(rgyud): dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pri yA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na gu h+ya sarba lo kai rA kA ya hUM/ sarba gu t+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o// dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o// de
437b5(rgyud): nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// sA bA ra sa ra te ka ha da ma ti he ba ka na ya a
437b6(rgyud): de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ji bzhin par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa
437b7(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
438a1(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs ras// rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She kats+tsha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag dngos 'gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa
438a2(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hUM kA ra a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She kaM hUM/ de
438a3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba d+harma a b+hi She ka ran+ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis
438a4(rgyud): rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad
438a5(rgyud): bya ba dang las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin cheran dgos pa zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de yi dbus su tshul
438a6(rgyud): bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni// rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma Ni rat+na pU dzA gra oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi
438a7(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ oM pa Ni rat+ne hUM/ oM pa Ni rat+na A a kaR+Sha karba sa ma ye hUM/ oM pa Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti ka ma pU dza pra badz+ra/ oM ma Ni rat+na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza sa pa ye hUM/ oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na tiSh+Tha ka ra She/ oM ma
438b1(rgyud): Ni tA mA la pA dzA/ oM maN ra t+na s+yAd+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ha dza kad pA dza/ oM ma Ni rany+dza Ar+tha r+tha hA sa pAdz+re/ oM pad+mA ma Ni samA d+hi samA ye n+tu/ oM sarba t+yagA nu swA ti samA d+h+wi ka r+tha kar d+d+hA/ oM maN+Di ra/
438b2(rgyud): tik+Sh+Na sa ma ye ts+tshin+da n+tu/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra sa pa ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na b+ha'i b+had b+had hUM/ oM me N+Do rat+na karme NitrUM/ oM ma Ni raShA kA ba tsa rak+Sha mAkaM/ oM ma Ni rat+na dr-iSh+Ta khAd khAd dz+nyAM/ oM ma Nikar+m+ma muSh+NI dz+dza/
438b3(rgyud): ma Ni rat+na lA s+ye pU dzA ho/ oM ma Ni mA le a b+hi She ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gI te pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na Na nr-i t+ye pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pa pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+paM pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ne rat+na a
438b4(rgyud): lo ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na aM ku sha a kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha a/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir chos
438b5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur te re zhes bsgo la/ las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o//
438b6(rgyud): rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang // mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya gang yang rung
438b7(rgyud): bcings la// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// dbang bskur ba ni des thob bo// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na// 'gro ba'i
439a1(rgyud): dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na// skad cig tu ni don kun pog/ de la de dag gi
439a2(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na pU dza ba shr-i ku ru/ oM rat+na pU dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM rat+na pU dza ya d+harma nA shA bA di/ oM rat+na pU dza karma sarba arba me sA da/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin/
439a3(rgyud): te rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub dam pa
439a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// nas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/
439a5(rgyud): de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ t+ya dzA ga du Na dza sarba rak+Sha sharmak+Sha kr-i te/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya de sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig
439a6(rgyud): gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag
439a7(rgyud): rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pa rang gi rig pa rab pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+rar rji tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas na rdo rjes rang 'i phyis rgyang/
439b1(rgyud): gsungs so// oM badz+ra mA le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnga rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni rat+ne/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis
439b2(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma rat+ne/ de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa dr-iSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
439b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni//
439b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste// khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis
439b5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag na ni// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra ratI ba sho ka/ sarba sid+d+ho pra yats+tsha hUM tra/ de nas gsang
439b6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/ khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis na sprad nas kyang // gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di
439b7(rgyud): yin te/ oM badz+ra rat+na sa kha'i btu d+hA ra ba'i/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi ha ha ha tA/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcings pa dang rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab bo// dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas
440a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba ni snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma Ni d+ha ra sarba ar+tha sid+d+him+ba pra yats+tsha ho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra raH/
440a2(rgyud): hUM de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yi
440a3(rgyud): shes bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rnams// chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab
440a4(rgyud): par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la'ang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
440a5(rgyud): mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin cher khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa
440a6(rgyud): bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa
440a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / bam po brgyad pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
440b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de khon nyid kyi chog rgyas pa'i drung 'di gsungs so// de la re zhig dang po pa'i phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa phrag tu
440b2(rgyud): che bcings nas mkha'i dbyings thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la// rang gi snying du bcug nas ni// ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la// zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas nyid thob des 'di sgrub/
440b3(rgyud): ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // de nyid chen po tshig re rer// brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang // thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na// tsi ste 'dod na bdag nyid des/
440b4(rgyud): byag zi can dge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gongs shin// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya ma pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa// de ltar bdag ces bsgoms
440b5(rgyud): na ning nga sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ bdag ces brjod
440b6(rgyud): na nges par yang // sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// thams cad kyi ni kun dag par/
440b7(rgyud): las rnams thams cad sbyangs na ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
441a1(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi// bkas ni sems can kun don du// phyag rgya chen por bsgrubs na ni// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas
441a2(rgyud): 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyangs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa// de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni// skad cig gis ni gzi chen
441a3(rgyud): thob pang de nas chos kyi phyag rgyangs pa'i dngos grub kyi rlung bshad do// yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te// chos mchog 'di ni rjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzican nyid du
441a4(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i// gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na// skad cig gis ni gzi can
441a5(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad+mo'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag
441a6(rgyud): mu stegs can gyis spang gyur la// de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni// theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni//
441a7(rgyud): byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga bzhin ldan khyab byas nas// skad cig gcig gis gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces/
441b1(rgyud): smrab gyur ba'i tshul 'di ni// 'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de// skad cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgyangs pa'i dngos grub kyi rlung bshad do// bdag gi lha dang reg pa dang // mnyan pa dang ni dra
441b2(rgyud): pa'ang rung // sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar phyin 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
441b3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces// bsgom par bya ba rnams bsgoms nas/ skad cig gis ni/
441b4(rgyud): gzi can thob// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sems can kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ skad cig
441b5(rgyud): gis ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang // nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing // chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid
441b6(rgyud): la thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub sbyid ba shad do/ dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor sgrub pa la bcom ldan na// gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang // mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs
441b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
442a1(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/
442a2(rgyud): de la 'dod pas spyod bar byed// sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi// ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod pa rnams la chags
442a3(rgyud): bral min// dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// sems can don du
442a4(rgyud): khro mon yang // khro bo chen po rab tu ston// rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yis// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' 'o// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang //
442a5(rgyud): de yi dgos par de byed de// pad+mo'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung // ci tsam nus pa nyid
442a6(rgyud): du ni nga sbyin pas nyi ma stongs par ni// bya min dam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
442a7(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes// brjod na chos nyid
442b1(rgyud): yi ge ni// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che// ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos// bde ba thams
442b2(rgyud): cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o// de la rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya
442b3(rgyud): ba'i phyir// de la khro bar ma gyur kyang // ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub thob// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// pad+mo chu yis ma chags pa// de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags
442b4(rgyud): zhes smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do// sgrub par byed cing smra ba
442b5(rgyud): ni nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
442b6(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
442b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su// ji bzhin du ni btul nas su// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// dus
443a1(rgyud): bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang // byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos
443a2(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// marungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang byed de// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyi 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi las
443a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la
443a4(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang // re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// las kyi don du bsgrub pa'o//
443a5(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi
443a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs/
443a7(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan la sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/
443b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob// de la 'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen po
443b2(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
443b3(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing // rdo rje chos ni chos rnams kyi// chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// de la 'don nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
443b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// las kyi rdo rje snying khar gzhag / chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni// las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
443b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshes/
443b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// de ltar 'jig rten kun shes te// dag la dag dang
443b7(rgyud): dkar 'od gsal// chags la dmar dang dmar ser khro// shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// zla ba'i dkyil
444a1(rgyud): 'khor 'od bcas pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos
444a2(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba// de lta bur ni yid shes so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos
444a3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am// yi ge 'phreng ba thob 'gyur na// mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar// shes pa de 'drar der sems shes// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes
444a4(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni snang gyur ci // mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de nyid snyoms par zhugs nas ni/
444a5(rgyud): 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni 'chag pa'ang rung // ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na ni// sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni de bzhi//
444a6(rgyud): dung nga sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
444a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na//
444b1(rgyud): ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyung ngo // nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// dkyi'akhor 'di ni sar/
444b2(rgyud): sgyu mthong // sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid// mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o// de la 'ang ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rlung ngo // de lta bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo bsangs sdang nano//
444b3(rgyud): rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes yin te/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i// pad+mo sngon po rigs grub pa'o// dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur// de la
444b4(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// de nyid mkha' bzhi dri med las// 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni// mthong na dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rje/
444b5(rgyud): sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi mdun mthong na'o// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas
444b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di
444b7(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
445a1(rgyud): bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// rab
445a2(rgyud): mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// mig gi
445a3(rgyud): rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// rna ba'i rnam shes
445a4(rgyud): bskyed nas kyang // des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang // shin tu ring na gnas thos zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas
445a5(rgyud): kyang ngang sems can gang la des brtags nas// de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// bdag gam sems can gang yang rung // yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa/
445a6(rgyud): gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // rdzu 'phrul
445a7(rgyud): gang dang gang 'dod pa// de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyis ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes
445b1(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// khros nas dgos pa
445b2(rgyud): thams cad ni// lta 'og rims pa ji bzhin bya// rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di
445b3(rgyud): ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo//
445b4(rgyud): lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang po sa gsungs// /
445b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga
445b6(rgyud): thob bo/ lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas na// mngon shes lnga ni des thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
445b7(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i
446a1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi// tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing // bden pa chen po//
446a2(rgyud): bsrungs na ni// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung
446a3(rgyud): ba'i 'dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi
446a4(rgyud): rgyud ngo // ci ste dngos rgya chog 'dod na// shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing // bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so//
446a5(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+mo chen po rigs mchog gi/ pad+mo'i chos la mna' dor zhing // bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya// zhes bcom
446a6(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar// sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing
