446a7(rgyud): bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
446b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
446b2(rgyud): tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas// de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur// zhes bcom
446b3(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// su ra ta traM zhes brjod na// de nyid bskul ba'i bdag
446b4(rgyud): nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun// nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub
446b5(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi
446b6(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sarba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na// bdag gam yang na gzhan dag gis// bud med chags la sogs ldan na// thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rig
446b7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// oM zhes bya bas mdo bsdu na// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang byang nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs
447a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi mtshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
447a2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs
447a3(rgyud): rgyas byang chub brtan par yang // bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// bcings nas de yi mdun du yang / rdo rje
447a4(rgyud): sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ngo // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgos
447a5(rgyud): na ni nga nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni// zhi rim du ni
447a6(rgyud): dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// rigs thams
447a7(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di
447b1(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom// de nas de ma thag tu 'grub
447b2(rgyud): ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa bdag ces bsgom
447b3(rgyud): nas kyang // phyag rgya thams cad sgrubs nas ni// grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// bdag
447b4(rgyud): nyid nyid kyis rdo rje'i dbyibs// rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing // phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs/
447b5(rgyud): song de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad+mo chen po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad+ma'i dbyibs su bsgom par bya// zhes
447b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/
447b7(rgyud): nor bur chen po'i rigs mchod pa// kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grubadam pa'i chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sem
448a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
448a2(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlob bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
448a3(rgyud): so de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlab kyi rgyud yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas la// snying la mdzod spu mgrin pa dang // spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis
448a4(rgyud): rlob dang ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // snying la
448a5(rgyud): mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting
448a6(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// rdo rje pad+mo ma byas la// snying la mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i
448a7(rgyud): rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu chen bcings la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos
448b1(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rlung ngo do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi chung 'a
448b2(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni
448b3(rgyud): de 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa// sangs rgyas
448b4(rgyud): phyag rgya mdun nas ni// brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang // 'phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur// de la 'di na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbang gi 'phreng ba ni// bcings nas
448b5(rgyud): dpral bar bzhag na yang // 'phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin no// rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // mgo bor
448b6(rgyud): bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug gi ni dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
448b7(rgyud): dbang bskur lding ngo // rdo rje rim chen myu gu bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi// dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
449a1(rgyud): snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
449a2(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni// phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag pa bcings// zlos shing
449a3(rgyud): sngags kyi rig pa ni// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ngo // sems drapa'i
449a4(rgyud): byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// zlos pas myur du grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la
449a5(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste// bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/
449a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas/ byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/
449a7(rgyud): snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub
449b1(rgyud): kyi rgyung ngo // nam mkha'i kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
449b2(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i
449b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas lA/
449b4(rgyud): de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
449b5(rgyud): dor grasang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis// gsang ba'i mchod brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
449b6(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo gsang brjod byed cing // khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na// myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub bo// zhes bcom
449b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang ngag gis phul nas
450a1(rgyud): ni dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung
450a2(rgyud): dor gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis// rgyal pos mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa'i thams cad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs/
450a3(rgyud): song ba nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur// cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// zhes
450a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sem
450a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i/
450a6(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no// lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes// de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces sangs rgyas
450a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam bzhag
450b1(rgyud): pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes lnga ni ngag gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon
450b2(rgyud): par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang // mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur//
450b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam
450b4(rgyud): bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes
450b5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur// ces bcom
450b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs/
450b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
451a1(rgyud): 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
451a2(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen por sgrom byed cing // byang chub chen po'i
451a3(rgyud): ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di rdo rje rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
451a4(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung
451a5(rgyud): so de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas bzlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ bsgoms
451a6(rgyud): na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i
451a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs
451b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub
451b2(rgyud): kyi rgyung 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sems can don rnams rab 'byed cing // sangs rgyas rjes su
451b3(rgyud): dran gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
451b4(rgyud): dongong ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom byed cing // de nyid bskur na myur bar ni// mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan
451b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'don rdo rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub pa byed do// sangs rgyas bka' na srung ba dang // sems cadan don srung ba'i phyir// rngas pas mdza su
451b6(rgyud): byas rnams ni// mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub sa chud do//
451b7(rgyud): tshogs pas kun tu lta ba dang // byams dang snyid rjes chos spra dang // mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spun gyis gsungs so// de la
452a1(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang // nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing // de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni sang/
452a2(rgyud): rgyas mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
452a3(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyung ngo // de ltar rnam dag
452a4(rgyud): de sbyin pa// 'dod chags la ni mnyes mi bya// sems can kun gyi don du brtson// 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
452a5(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di stan bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
452a6(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams// dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang // sangs rgyas
452a7(rgyud): bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// pad+mo 'dab ma kha
452b1(rgyud): 'byed cing // 'dod chags dag la kun rtog la// gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing // 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// 8
452b2(rgyud): la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer// spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur na// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du
452b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tham
452b4(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun don ma mthong zhing // sangs rgyas de nyid ma
452b5(rgyud): sbyangs la// yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// gsang na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
452b6(rgyud): kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dngos grub thams cad ma tho ba la// rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing // rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni// gsang na dngos grub myur du thob// ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
452b7(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing // de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal thob byed na// hUM zhes bya bas gsad par
453a1(rgyud): byang ba zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// snying rje med cing byams med la// sems can ma rungs mi sbyong zhing /
453a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni bslus na yang // gsod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos
453a3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// mi gtong bdag la nor med cing // nor stor ba dang gnod byed la// dbul por gyur la sems can rnams// gsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad
453a4(rgyud): yongs su slong bas gsungs so// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang // rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na// de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das
453a5(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
453a6(rgyud): kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid// rtag
453a7(rgyud): par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni srung ba rmad kyi mchog/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyung ngo //
453b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig ka lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na// 'di ni srung brtag chen po// skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//
453b2(rgyud): de la 'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi spang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdo rje hrul mos byed pa// 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la srung // zhes
453b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang
453b4(rgyud): gis mtshan zlos pa// srung ba 'di ni rmad du che// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par/
453b5(rgyud): ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// srung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchogaces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
453b6(rgyud): rlud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhengs pas
453b7(rgyud): gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad brtags pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i
454a1(rgyud): smad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs/
454a2(rgyud): shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legs so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te
454a3(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//
454a4(rgyud): rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
454a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
454a6(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur// bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya// zhes bcom
454a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa' rdo rje snying khar bcings//
454b1(rgyud): nga yi chung mkhyor sdug pa nga / brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgru bya ste// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/ shin/
454b2(rgyud): tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang // dngos
454b3(rgyud): grub thob par ma gyur na// hUM gi phyag rgyas bsad na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de bzhin 'di
454b4(rgyud): ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang // bdag gi chung ma'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub
454b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog
454b6(rgyud): ces smra byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs so// rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang
454b7(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
455a1(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes rjod cig/ zung med kun la chags byas la// sems can don gyis mi skyon// nges par sangs rgyas
455a2(rgyud): des mnyes so// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin shegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya//
455a3(rgyud): bud med kun dang rtse byed pa// rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam
455a4(rgyud): tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud // gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod// lus dang ngag la dam dges pa// 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan
455a5(rgyud): 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag
455a6(rgyud): la bdag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
455a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la// ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na// dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/
455b1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i klud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs/
455b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i chung 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam bzhag
455b3(rgyud): pas bsgoms nas kyang // dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
455b4(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sems can kun la chags byed cing // yul la skyo bar ma gyur la// bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no// zhes bcom
455b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rna ba'i rnal 'byor hUM zhes pa// phrag pa'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// mi 'grangs rnal 'byor 'di
455b6(rgyud): bsad ces// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do//
455b7(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so//
456a1(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// reb thams cad yongs bskangs nas// bud med dam ni sdug pa yi//
456a2(rgyud): dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de
456a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/
456a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms la// bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
456a5(rgyud): rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs// bud med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur// zhes bcom
456a6(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag d+ha ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni//
456a7(rgyud): yid kyis de ni dbab par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad+ma/
456b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang bar
456b2(rgyud): rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid du phab nas gar byed 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so//
456b3(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang
456b4(rgyud): ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag
456b5(rgyud): bud med rnams kyis bskor// der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang // sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra// byar+ya he ta baSh+Ta sa ba bi bo data swa mA ma sarba/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag d+ha ni//
456b6(rgyud): rgyal rnams la yang de skad brjod// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
456b7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings ni 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni mchog tshal te// dkyil
457a1(rgyud): 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni// sur ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho// badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid+ha mAM// zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par
457a2(rgyud): 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni// mgunas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang
457a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyin// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par yang // mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur bar yang // dngos pab
457a4(rgyud): 'debs pa gsol byed cing // rA ga tA si saM b+ha ta// 'dod chags las ni khyod gyur ces// sman kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor/
457a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// pad+mo'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba// rA ga d+harma ma hA pad+ma p+pa sid d+ha la ga
457a6(rgyud): me bi bo// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni// kun gyi de ni dngos grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang
457a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud do// nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni// don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang // dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni// zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya// sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mAM rA ga shi sid+hi mAM/ sid+d+ha madz+dza
457b1(rgyud): ma hA sa twa/ de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun// zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis// bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur//
457b2(rgyud): gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
457b3(rgyud): rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
457b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ta thA ga ta ma hA de bi bya// pri ya sarba su kha pra ta// bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas// bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o//
457b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje tshul gyis 'di
457b6(rgyud): spros shig/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya haM/ twa me bar+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba kA ya ma ma ri shwa ra dza/ badz+ra gar+b+he sa mu tak+Shi pa/ rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas// lus kun la ni brtag
457b7(rgyud): 'gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du dngos grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sid d+ha si d+ha sa ma ye/
458a1(rgyud): sa ma yo ha taM pri ya mAM/ zhes bskul myur du chags gyur na// rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo
458a2(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud+d+ha bud+d+ha ma hA satwa/ bar+ya ta me a ti pri ya/ zhes ni bskul na myur ba yang // rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
458a3(rgyud): chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sarba karma ma da war+ya wa tA ma me sid+d+h+ya d+ha badz+ri Ni/ rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rjes su chags nas 'grub par
458a4(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
458a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir/
458a6(rgyud): ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun mo rab spa bar// shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so//
458a7(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing // sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni//
458b1(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che bar/
458b2(rgyud): dang ldan shes nas dang byas nas// bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub
458b3(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// chags pa'i dag pa'i chags bral gyi// sems can don gyi yid phyung nas// mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste// lta ba ngan pa'i gcong rong lhung // theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir// gsod pa'i
458b4(rgyud): tha tshig mchog yin te// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tsho gri gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyung ngo // mu stegs
458b5(rgyud): can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// de la
458b6(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag tu legs par bsag par bya// bud med bla med rin chen zhes// bsams nas de ni 'grub par
458b7(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
459a1(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub/
459a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rlung ngo // bud med chags rnams yongs bskor la// kun nas rtses pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas mchod phyir phu la na yang // mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
459a3(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rab dag ngal te skyo ba na// rab dga' las byung bde ba de// phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i
459a4(rgyud): phyir phul na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// hUM gis dam tshig bcings nas ni/
459a5(rgyud): skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni// 'byed par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud/
459a6(rgyud): do nga 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gdong du bltas nas ni// bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de yi 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo spyan gyis gsungs so// de la/
459a7(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis rgyan nas kyang // bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni// mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur/
459b1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
459b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms
459b3(rgyud): kha dang ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar// gzhan gyi bud med rtsi byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
459b4(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang // rdo rje 'phreng ba 'ching byed cing // de nas rdo rje glu blangs la// rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la// 'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang
459b5(rgyud): gar gyis bde ba las// bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te// de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sgom/
459b6(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang // gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i
459b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
460a1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gas pa/
460a2(rgyud): ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
460a3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
460a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las// sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na// myur du bla med thob/
460a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sems
460a6(rgyud): can thog ma tha la med// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi sems gang ni// brtan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o//
460a7(rgyud): rdo rje mnyam par mnyam bzhag na// nges pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de// rdo rje bzhed pa de bzhin
460b1(rgyud): gshegs// nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma/
460b2(rgyud): dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchogaces
460b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
460b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma
460b5(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par bzhag las ting 'dzin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub
460b6(rgyud): ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste// gzung ba'i
460b7(rgyud): tshul gyis lcags kyu yin// phra mo rtogs phyir mnga' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya// spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs// gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste// rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng ba gsung //
461a1(rgyud): 'dzab phyir bzhad par grags pa la// 'dod chags dag phyir pad+mo yin// ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste// tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya// rgya thal
461a2(rgyud): tshul du kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin// 'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdabs pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan
461a3(rgyud): la sogs// bsgobs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gas pa
461a4(rgyud): ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
461a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la// lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub
461a6(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya// /
461a7(rgyud): rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang // nyid kyi phyag rgya btab na ni// bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher// shes/
461b1(rgyud): nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// ji ltar dam tshig
461b2(rgyud): dam pa 'di// skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du
461b3(rgyud): mi 'da' bar/ kau shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'don chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rlung
461b4(rgyud): dongong mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje dag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang // des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la
461b5(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // bka' nyan pa yi las de ni// shes na
461b6(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas bcom
461b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
462a1(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin
462a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po sngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje
462a3(rgyud): las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// rigs thams cad kyi brtag pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang
462a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub tu
462a5(rgyud): rgyud do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
462a6(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas// rab mnyam bzhag
462a7(rgyud): pas bsgoms na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'din rnga rje'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
462b1(rgyud): khams gsum nam rgyal cha lugs su// bsgoms nas 'dun dang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
462b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni bad+mo'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par// 'dul bar de ni rab byed ces// bcom
462b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi chud do// don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms na mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/
462b4(rgyud): phun tshogs don ni des thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
462b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur la// /
462b6(rgyud): rdo rje phra bo tshul gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi ngas
462b7(rgyud): tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // badz+ra sa twa zhes brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
463a1(rgyud): de la 'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// dran byed mdun du de bzhin te// tsUn+d+ha hUM hUM zhes brjod na// dngos grub bla med/
463a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing /
463a3(rgyud): sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i
463a4(rgyud): gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang // sid d+h+ya sid d+ha zhes brjod na// don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi
463a5(rgyud): dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
463a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med// ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste// a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni// skye ba med par dgongs pa
463a7(rgyud): steng nga phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni// shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang // yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni// bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin
463b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis/
463b2(rgyud): dang nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
463b3(rgyud): rgyud do// sdig pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba'i phyir// bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsung
463b4(rgyud): song nga de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes// dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang // thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/
463b5(rgyud): chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can
463b6(rgyud): don phyir sbyin byed cing // bsams pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi// rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so//
463b7(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
464a1(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas kyis ni ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgyur/
464a2(rgyud): pa 'di ni bsgoms par byas nas kyang // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge
464a3(rgyud): 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bla med dang ni las mang rnams// sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang // shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur// zhes
464a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir// mtshams med byed las mi zlog na// gsod pa'i
464a5(rgyud): las la dad pa can// des ni 'grub par mi 'gyu zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag
464a6(rgyud): kun dag pas na dgos pas kun// des byed las 'di yin no bar// shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos kyi rgyud do// srid/
464a7(rgyud): ldan dbul po thams cad kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la// don kun grub pas kun bdag ni// grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so// rigs thams/
464b1(rgyud): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'dis sus so// de la 'di ni de bzhin/
464b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud // rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'bad pa kun gyis sbyor na ni// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas
464b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyung ngo do// slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob ma yin bu min pa yi// mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de// de dag
464b4(rgyud): gsang bas phug rgya 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sA ras hUM byang ldan gyur la// rdo rje
464b5(rgyud): khro ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phra mo'i la shes kyi ngos grub kyi byung do// brtsonan pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dam
464b6(rgyud): mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rigs kyi phra mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
464b7(rgyud): rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu phra mo'i lha 'bar bas// don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi
465a1(rgyud): rgyad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
465a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dziran// sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra// dkar po rgyug par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan
465a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes// phyin chad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// rtag pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
465a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos grub yod par 'gyur// de snyed kyi ri gzugs brnyan rnams// mkha' chug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang
465a5(rgyud): rung bang mthong na rdo rje spyan dag par// shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni// bla na med pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub
465a6(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// g.yas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi// mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni// sprin 'drar myur du 'khor ba yang // mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang // rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jim
465a7(rgyud): par ma gyur la// phug rgya de ni bzung na ni// rdo rje spun ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'don pad+ma'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyang // gang cha su'am ngasar
465b1(rgyud): ba dang // dkar ba'am ser ba'am sna tshogs kyi/ dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i cha// dgongs 'gyur 'khor la'i spun 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mos gsungs so// dal 'don nar drag
465b2(rgyud): rigs kyi spun gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi byung ngo // mkha' la rin cher 'dra ba dang // gser la sogs pa 'dra ba ni// gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig/ de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying
465b3(rgyud): pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i ngos
465b4(rgyud): grub kyi chung 'di gsungs so// de la 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub co rgyad do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor rdul dud// 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir// gtso ba thams cad pachod byas
465b5(rgyud): par sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags bdag ces sgor byed cing //
465b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na// rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos
465b7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa// khams gsum rnang rgyal ba 'dra ba'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo
466a1(rgyud): rjes gsungs so// 'di la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni// 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi
466a2(rgyud): ge yis// sangs rgyas mngon par mchod na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs//
466a3(rgyud): kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/ bsam pa g.yos pas gdud na ni// phyag la rtag tu brtson byas la// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
466a4(rgyud): rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las
466a5(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying
466a6(rgyud): la gnas// a ma sems can don rnams la// stobar gyur pa gang bshad mang // 'don las byings tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bskams nas sangs rgyas mtshad na na/
466a7(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems
466b1(rgyud): dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so//
466b2(rgyud): de la 'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje drug rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob
466b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa
466b4(rgyud): bdag yin te// bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur gnas la// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshigags
466b5(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun la don chen sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad
466b6(rgyud): grub pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi chos
466b7(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni// go char bcing
467a1(rgyud): te spyi bor bzhag/ shin tu yang ni bsrung bar 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi
467a2(rgyud): dngos srab kyi chud do// rtsig pa lam ldan 'jab// ram bris nas mtshar bslang ste/ mams dpung ma gang bsams pa// ngan 'ang yi bang du 'gyur// nas bcom ldan 'das lags pa byag
467a3(rgyud): rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sa la gnod sbyir gdong bris la// de yi tshig gi phyogs su ni// mdzub mo'i sen mo bcugs na yang // bud med mchog
467a4(rgyud): ni 'dran par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// lag pa gnyis su pad+mo blangs// 'dod chags
467a5(rgyud): dag pa lta byed cing // rdo rje lta bas bud med de// bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub
467a6(rgyud): da do// rdo rje macan ti 'dzin nanas/ lag pa gtas kyis na dragazung // rdza nas byaba'i rgyal ces ni/ brang ma dran la 'dung byung// masacam ldan 'das da sngams spas// gas pa
467a7(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin/
467b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar// gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol ba ta ba ste// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya//
467b2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das las rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang
467b3(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa cho gar sbyar// dgos pa gang zhig spras pa de// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos
467b4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang // rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom
467b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos
467b6(rgyud): pa gang bsams pa// de yis dngos grub thams cad thob// ces bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po
467b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs
468a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgoms pa'i dngos grub
468a2(rgyud): kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya
468a3(rgyud): rab bsgrubs pas// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis
468a4(rgyud): brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste// sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la// bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis// bsgoms
468a5(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis
468a6(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
468a7(rgyud): pas gsungs so// de la 'od ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdul 'byor gyi rgyud // chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la// ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun// sems dpa'
468b1(rgyud): chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// sangs
468b2(rgyud): rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang // mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams// bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs
468b3(rgyud): so nga rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
468b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lor sbyar ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon
468b5(rgyud): 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs
468b6(rgyud): ba thams cad byeng khon nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud bye ma chog rgyas brdzogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khon ci
468b7(rgyud): bsdus pabam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba ngan cing chags bral la// gsang ba 'di na mo rigs te// sems
469a1(rgyud): tsam kun la pa mngon du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas
469a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te// dkyil 'khor chen po
469a3(rgyud): mthong nas bdug pa dang mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
469a4(rgyud): zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'jug ste// dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
469a5(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza bas+than ya
469a6(rgyud): At+ma naM nir+yA tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ya At+ma naM/ nir+ya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ma
469a7(rgyud): naM niR+YA ta ya mai/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma bral la la
469b1(rgyud): zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing / bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la/ ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur
469b2(rgyud): bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni/ de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i
469b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bri zhing / sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la/ rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o// de nas ri
469b4(rgyud): mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'jab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs
469b5(rgyud): pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin
469b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas
469b7(rgyud): mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya krol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'bar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag
470a1(rgyud): rgyabacings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang / me snang ba dang / las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis
470a2(rgyud): kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod na ni nges rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga'
470a3(rgyud): ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o// de nas nas langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs/
470a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na
470a5(rgyud): yang de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog zag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
470a6(rgyud): gsungs so// ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lam cig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro// dbab pa yang bya ste
470a7(rgyud): tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zer pa dang gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / lag pa dang / mda' thogs pa dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i 'phreng ba dang / pad+mo dang /
470b1(rgyud): ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad lan cig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed/
470b2(rgyud): der rma bya'i mjug sgo'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas
470b3(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rma bya'i mjug smos rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de
470b4(rgyud): nyid la lan cig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// mjug sgo de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' drang
470b5(rgyud): kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu
470b6(rgyud): 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o// ci ste dbang du
470b7(rgyud): byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de byin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin
471a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed ni sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ci ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na yang
471a2(rgyud): des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlos shing bla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la/ de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o// de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis
471a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa
471a4(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o//
471a5(rgyud): de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la/ de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang chad pas gcad par nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te
471a6(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na yang nges ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing gci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas stong du bzlas par
471a7(rgyud): dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du
471b1(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par gyur to// de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du/
471b2(rgyud): bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam
471b3(rgyud): gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan bdag pa dang chad pas gcad pa rnams byed cing / lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas
471b4(rgyud): ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing / lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de/ hUM zhes bya
471b5(rgyud): bas lha la sogs pa pa rungs pa thams cad gnon cing / de nas bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang
471b6(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzab byas la zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas hUM zhes bya
471b7(rgyud): ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs rnams ston pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang /
472a1(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dgag pa bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa
472a2(rgyud): dang gang po cher bgad pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / ji lta bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las thams cad la 'jug pa
472a3(rgyud): dang rnga dgag pa dang / bsdig pa dang / gsad pa dang / sems can thams cad phyag rgyas gang ba pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad gru len du gzhug pa dang
472a4(rgyud): gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings pa dang / dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// mi ste rdo rje phra mo
472a5(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na yang des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du sgom zhing // de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o//
472a6(rgyud): de nas nam nangs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste las sgrub
472a7(rgyud): par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos shing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog zag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
472b1(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas las thams cad byed par 'dod na yang lan cig brjod de yid kyis bsams pas srung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas
472b2(rgyud): pa rdzogs so// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi yo byad dang chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub par bya steras
472b3(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/ de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' bzhi bris la/ grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o// de nas
472b4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i ska/
472b5(rgyud): 'byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du pad+mo rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas
