472b6(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam nangs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do//
472b7(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// tsaM sta ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin
473a1(rgyud): sa bzlas pa bya'o// nas nam nangs pa dang dang nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rna chos kyis gsungs sa brgya sta las sgrub par 'dod na yang
473a2(rgyud): de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog zug tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// d+ma'i rigs kyi lo byang dang chog rgyas pa/
473a3(rgyud): rdzogs so// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas
473a4(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu
473a5(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do//
473a6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin
473a7(rgyud): du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste nor bu ye shes sgrub par 'dod
473b1(rgyud): na yang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin du bsgom par byas te/ dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba
473b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang de
473b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de nas las sgrub pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan
473b4(rgyud): gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
473b5(rgyud): 'dzin pas gsungs so// nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang
473b6(rgyud): por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// snying po sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o//
473b7(rgyud): de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur/
474a1(rgyud): rong de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar
474a2(rgyud): gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par gyur
474a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to zhes spras la/ rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//
474a4(rgyud): de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rig pa thams cad ji ltar sgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang
474a5(rgyud): rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpar bsgoms na bsgrub pa bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi
474a6(rgyud): thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs
474a7(rgyud): kyi dngos grub ni/ 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang / dngos grub chen po rnams so// de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gangan gter yod par
474b1(rgyud): dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na ci sta rdo rje lta bu yar bar mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lugs sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya cing /
474b2(rgyud): tes brkos la dza ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na cod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub
474b3(rgyud): par byed na badz+ra sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi
474b4(rgyud): gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi sdang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpag tshad stong gi steng du ldang ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag chad
474b5(rgyud): stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad stong khor yug gi sems sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs
474b6(rgyud): thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar pang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs
474b7(rgyud): nas kyang sus kyang cung zad kyang rgal mi nus te bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/ gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan
475a1(rgyud): pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
475a2(rgyud): mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyis gsungs so//
475a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rigs 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod
475a4(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te slar 'ongs shing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i ni tshod dang ldan pa dang / sgra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang /
475a5(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
475a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig
475a7(rgyud): gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan
475b1(rgyud): pa'i dide bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan
475b2(rgyud): pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lud shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshang du
475b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang
475b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal
475b5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po'i rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
475b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la
475b7(rgyud): 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad hUM zhes byas pas 'dul bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM
476a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing / rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo
476a2(rgyud): stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rin
476a3(rgyud): po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams
476a4(rgyud): songangade la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi
476a5(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so//
476a6(rgyud): de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
476a7(rgyud): bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang
476b1(rgyud): ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / srung ba dang
476b2(rgyud): pad+mo'i dngos grub rnams so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+mo 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par
476b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad srung ba dang / sba ba dang
476b4(rgyud): bskyab nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid pad+mo'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la pad+mo lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag
476b5(rgyud): bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mos gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang
476b6(rgyud): gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni/ 'di lta ste
476b7(rgyud): nyid kyis dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
477a1(rgyud): mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos
477a2(rgyud): grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyar bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas
477a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar// de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la
477a4(rgyud): 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes// de yi thabs ni sgom pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di
477a5(rgyud): ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni
477a6(rgyud): rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig mu na chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te// de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo// brtag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
477a7(rgyud): de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgya bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams
477b1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nam/
477b2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi
477b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi byung ngo // sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub
477b4(rgyud): kyi byung ngo // bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rlung
477b5(rgyud): dong de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
477b6(rgyud): yi ge a la 'jug byed cing // yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la// rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po
477b7(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so// nga la 'dzin phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi chung ngo // shes dbangs 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzid ces grags pa ste// des ni phug tu myur 'grub par/
478a1(rgyud): bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// shes rab sgra yi rjes
478a2(rgyud): 'brang ba// ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa// de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab
478a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te// shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
478a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyis gsungs so// brtag pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par
478a5(rgyud): bya'o/ dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang // /
478a6(rgyud): kyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin
478a7(rgyud): dam pa'i chos bklags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni// nges par sngags ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul
478b1(rgyud): las dang tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs ras kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems/
478b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// thams cad sems
478b3(rgyud): de nyid bdag po// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te// 'di la
478b4(rgyud): rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du/
478b5(rgyud): dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung // mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che//
478b6(rgyud): de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snying bar yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// de ni myur du grub pa thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
478b7(rgyud): rabs gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho ma nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho gargyas pa'i rgyud ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes
479a1(rgyud): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med
479a2(rgyud): pa'i nga ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa yi ye shes las// brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rje brtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi byud do// marton/
479a3(rgyud): gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// cho ga bzhin du ri mo bris/
479a4(rgyud): rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog las// rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// rtog pa las ni 'dod chags
479a5(rgyud): 'byung // pad+mo la ni de gnas te// de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni// grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin tu mchog tu
479a6(rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas// lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po
479a7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis// yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te// ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas// de phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye
479b1(rgyud): shes kyi byung ngo // ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' kha mi phyung bzhin// bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags 'byung
479b2(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod// de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do//
479b3(rgyud): ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang // dag gi reg mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos sus// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rtog pa thams cad kyi sring
479b4(rgyud): po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni// gzhan
479b5(rgyud): yang rung ste byung ba na// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing zos 'gyur shes par bya// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya
479b6(rgyud): bcings// 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na// 'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin/ rang
479b7(rgyud): gi lce la smras 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud do// rig pa lan cig
480a1(rgyud): brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'brung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyi de ni shes par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
480a2(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin no// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te// ji ltar de
480a3(rgyud): ltar 'dug nas kyang // skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'odi ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang
480a4(rgyud): ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te// ji ltar ro mo'i tshul du ri// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas byas te// shin tu khros nas bsgrub byas na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas
480a5(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi skur 'gyur la// pad+mo 'byung ba bsgrub
480a6(rgyud): bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/
480a7(rgyud): rdo rje rir chen dbang bskur na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// lce ni
480b1(rgyud): shin tu mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsungs gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i/
480b2(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgra bsgrags// khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan// rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs
480b3(rgyud): songang de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing // phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis// zlos pa po rnams
480b4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// shin
480b5(rgyud): tu yongs su gsal tshig gis// rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing // tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes
480b6(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud ngo // rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas// rdo rje sems
480b7(rgyud): dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// sems can
481a1(rgyud): kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa spang ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
481a2(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar pad+mo rab chags la// dgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa// de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang /
481a3(rgyud): srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi// dgos pa'i
481a4(rgyud): don ni kun sgrub cing // rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes// grub na myur bar de 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag
481a5(rgyud): rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog/ thams cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
481a6(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang // ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung // rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings// gos kyis
481a7(rgyud): g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyas pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// lag pa g.yon pas pad+mo/
481b1(rgyud): yi 'khu tshur bcings te smras nas ni// tsi dgar myur du pad+mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'dzin nor bu'i rig kyi gsang pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya smung /
481b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// g.yon pa'i rin chen khu chur ni// bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la// ci dga' bar ni rim gror byed// rin chen dngos grub thob 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rigs thams
481b3(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// rdo rje ngag dang rdo rje'i lha// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo// zhes bcom
481b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// de nas
481b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// /
481b6(rgyud): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par
481b7(rgyud): bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rgyud thams
482a1(rgyud): cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btab
482a2(rgyud): bong rdo rje dbyings kyis sems dpa' che// sems can don mchog pa nyid can// shAka thub rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don// sems can rgya ste tshul chen po//
482a3(rgyud): sems can don chen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// smra ba chen po rab rig mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod
482a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// las chen spang ba chen po ste// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrubs pa// bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyud khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin pa khyod kun brnyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen
482a5(rgyud): pa'ong sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po// shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal
482a6(rgyud): yong gakyis ge shA che// shAtugatu thub pa che// 'dul ba chen po khyab papo// 'grongon 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// rdo rjem
482a7(rgyud): po mgon chen po// sems can tshegs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen sdang ba chen po ste// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog/ bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa rang
482b1(rgyud): byang bcang ldan 'das bkya pa' 'grub pam/ ldan padag thab pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal da la phyag 'jal lo// nam ma pa'i sa m+b+ha sa yin no// thugasas smra pa sgrum pa 'o// ga/
482b2(rgyud): sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gsung min gsung ste gsugi mchog/ gsung gsung gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sems min sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems
482b3(rgyud): gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum pa dor min spyong // rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// kun
482b4(rgyud): khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis skad cig nyan byed ngam// klog ga yang na
482b5(rgyud): sgom pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das
482b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
482b7(rgyud): rnams yang gcig tu 'dra bar mdzad par gsol/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i/
483a1(rgyud): phyir 'ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdur/
483a2(rgyud): durdul phra mo thams cad ji ltar skyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na/
483a3(rgyud): rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu de bzhin/
483a4(rgyud): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thar cad rab tu bskor bar
483a5(rgyud): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar
483a6(rgyud): 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// blamar 'thor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra modza da pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzi/
483a7(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigs
483b1(rgyud): sra bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu de bzhin du/
483b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo shin tu phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
483b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// nor bu'i 'khor lo
483b4(rgyud): rab tu bskor// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sbom pa yang rung // de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang /
483b5(rgyud): rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems
483b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi yi nang du bab nas kyang // dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don// rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon po rab tu sgrub par mdzod// de nas yang
483b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
484a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdza/
484a2(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs rdo rjer bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
484a3(rgyud): cad dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang
484a4(rgyud): nas tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje na// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten/
484a5(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji skad bzhugs pa rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
484a6(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcam
484a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems kyi rlung 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /
484b1(rgyud): bcas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / rab brang bzang po thams cad dag bsu'i ltung buthams cad dang / rdub shin tu bral snye kya kyil 'khor bams cad dang / thugs rnams su nungs nas zhugasaso//
484b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rang bar ma lon pa zhig na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
484b3(rgyud): byur bar mkhyen nas/ ri rabaril tsa monas spang po byang chub gangan ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rgya blangs nas cheng du bad pa
484b4(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang phyir gdul bar dbang brtan rnams// mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig
484b5(rgyud): rten pa// lta ba ngan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi
484b6(rgyud): shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ci byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste steng du bzhugs
484b7(rgyud): nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas//
485a1(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di brjod do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
485a2(rgyud): rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la 'di de ltar gyur pa de 'di dag brjod do// de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad
485a3(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos/ lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu
485a4(rgyud): bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad cing yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
485a5(rgyud): byang chub ston gyis/ 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cig/ lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyung ngu bsgrub par bya'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
485a6(rgyud): du ma yin no// de legs kyis der mchod pa la 'dod par sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang
485a7(rgyud): chub par zhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te ran
485b1(rgyud): kyi gangan 'di las bzhengs la/ lnga rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bdag po//
485b2(rgyud): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par sgrubs shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
485b3(rgyud): gis byang chub stsol bar mi nus/ ci ste bdag gis rus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa
485b4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de ni gzugs min gzugs min min// bden min rdzun min gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi
485b5(rgyud): smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtsa'i gdan las bzhengs te/ lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs shig/
485b6(rgyud): de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo ma thog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang chub sems ni brtan par
485b7(rgyud): byos dang sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la// sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig
486a1(rgyud): rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa
486a2(rgyud): med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che// snang ba che zhing dag
486a3(rgyud): pa che nga mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che// kun gyi bde ba bde ba
486a4(rgyud): tsheche'abade mchog thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs pa zhes bya rab mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che// rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen
486a5(rgyud): rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che// rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che// nam rgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'od chen lham pa chen po ste// rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod
486a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor bas gtong // nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che// gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes
486a7(rgyud): pa'i shugs kyis rol tsong dgyes// chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri ma//
486b1(rgyud): shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste// sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chung de 'khor lo che// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi
486b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las te las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed
486b3(rgyud): pa ste gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje srung bgo cha che// go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che// srung ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag
486b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyir khro bo che// ma rung thams cad skrag byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcing ba che/
486b5(rgyud): khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che// rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing // brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// byang chub sems dpa' khyod yin te// khyod la brten
486b6(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/
486b7(rgyud): rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i// bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub thob par
487a1(rgyud): shog mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// rab dad pas ni lan cig tsam// gang gis legs par brjod pa ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// zhes
487a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin
487a3(rgyud): no rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen/
487a4(rgyud): khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar bcas
487a5(rgyud): pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma
487a6(rgyud): nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
